S01divyav_u:001.001_0: buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:001.001_1: asmāt parāntake vāsavagrāme balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:001.003_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:001.004_0: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnāyācate ārāmedavatāṃ vanadevatāṃ śṛṅgāṭakadevatāṃ balipratigrāhikāṃ devatām/
S01divyav_u:001.006_0: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante/
S01divyav_u:001.008_0: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāa jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:001.009_0: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
S01divyav_u:001.009_1: mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharavḥ pratyupasthito bhavati/
S01divyav_u:001.010_0: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:001.012_0_0: anyatamaśca sattvaścaramabhavikaśca hitaiṣī gṛhītamokṣamārgāntonmukho na nirvāṇe
S01divyav_u:001.014_1: katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ jānāti/
S01divyav_u:001.017_0: saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:001.017_1: saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:001.018_0: sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati--diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva/
S01divyav_u:001.019_0: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:001.019_1: so 'pi āttamanāttamanā udānam udānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:001.022_0: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmādeśayiṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:001.024_0_0: āpannasattvāṃ ca tāṃ viditvā upariprasādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇairuṣṇa
S01divyav_u:002.001_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:002.002_1: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇaviśālalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūruttuṅganāso ratnapratyuptikayā karṇikayā āmuktayālaṃkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:002.005_1: dharmatā yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:002.007_0: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:002.009_0: ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ, śravaṇeṣu ca nakṣatreṣu/
S01divyav_u:002.009_1: bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:002.010_1: tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/
S01divyav_u:002.011_0: tenaikasya dāraka iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam, aparasya pālaka iti/
S01divyav_u:002.012_0: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:002.013_0: so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:002.016_0: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:002.016_1: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:002.017_0: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍataḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:002.018_0: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:002.018_1: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:002.019_0: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:002.020_0: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:002.021_1: sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/
S01divyav_u:002.022_0: sa kathayati--tāta, kasyārthe tvaṃ nityameva kṛṣikarmānte udyuktah? sa kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:002.022_1: yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi,
S01divyav_u:002.027_1: tathāpi me ratnānāṃ parikṣayo na syāt/
S01divyav_u:002.028_0: sa kathayati--tāta anujānīhi māma, paṇyamādāya mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:002.029_1: balasenena gṛhapatinā vāsavagrāmake ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śroṇena koṭikarṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:002.032_0: balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--[3]kīdṛśena yānena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yāsyati? sa saṃlakṣayati--saced hastibhiḥ,
S01divyav_u:003.003_1: sa pitrā āhūyoktah--putra na tvayā sārthasya purastād gantavyam, nāpi pṛṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.005_1: na ca te sārthavāhe hate sārtho vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.006_0: dāsakapālakāvapi uktau--putrau, yuvābhyāṃ na kenacit prakāreṇa śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo moktavya iti//
S01divyav_u:003.008_0: athāpareṇa samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayano mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba gacchāmi,
S01divyav_u:003.010_2: mātā sāśrudurdinavadanā kathayati--putra, kadācidahaṃ putrakaṃ punarapi jīvantaṃ drakṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:003.012_1: sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayano mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.014_0: sā kathayati--putra, kharaṃ te vākkarma niścāritam/
S01divyav_u:003.015_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:003.015_2: atha śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmoṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ samudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.018_0: nipuṇataḥ sāmudram yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudramavatīrṇo dhanahārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.019_1: tena tatropaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tad vahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā tilataṇḍulakolakulatthānām/
S01divyav_u:003.021_1: sau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'pi sārthavāho dāsakapālakāvādāya sārthamadhyādekānte 'pakramya āyaṃ vyayaṃ ca tulayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.023_0: paścāt tenāsau dāsako 'bhihitah--dāsaka, paśya sāthaḥ kiṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:003.026_0: sa sārthaḥ sarātrimeva sthorāṃ lardayitvā saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:003.027_1: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchati/
S01divyav_u:003.028_0: purastād gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? pṛṣṭhata āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:003.028_1: pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? madhye gacchati/
S01divyav_u:003.031_0: bhavantaḥ, na śobhanaṃ kṛtam yadasmābhiḥ sārthavāhaśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.001_1: āgacchata, kriyākāraṃ tāvat karmah--tāvanna kenacicchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāmārocayitavyam yāvad bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmitaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:004.003_0: śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śrutam--śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:004.005_0: pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchatah--kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:004.006_1: paścāt te kathayanti--amba vismṛto 'smābhiḥ sārthavāha iti/
S01divyav_u:004.007_0: tābhyāmeka āgatya kathayati--ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:004.008_0: tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.008_1: apara āgatya kathayati--amba, diṣṭyā vardhasva, ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:004.009_0: tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.010_1: tābhyāmudyāneṣu svakasabhādevakuleṣu cchatrāṇi vyajanāni kalaśāni upānahāni cākṣarāṇi abhilikhitāni dattāni sthāpitāni--yadi tāvacchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jīvati,
S01divyav_u:004.012_0: atha cyutaḥ kālagataḥ, tasyaiva gatyupapattisthānāt sthānāntaraviśeṣatāyai/
S01divyav_u:004.014_0: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ sārthavāho 'pi sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭa ātāpitaḥ prativibuddho yāvat sārthaṃ na paśyati nānyatra gardabhayānameva/
S01divyav_u:004.016_0: rātrau ca vātena pravāyatā vālukayā mārgo vyapoḍhaḥ pithitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.016_1: te ca gardabhāḥ smṛtimanto gandhamāghrāyāghrāya śanairmandamandaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.017_0: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kasmādete śanairmandamandaṃ gacchantīti kṛtvā pratodayaṣṭyā tāḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.018_0: te saṃbhrāntā ākulībhūtāḥ smṛtibhraṣṭā unmārgeṇa saṃprasthitāḥ, yāvadanyatamāśāṭavīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.019_0: te tṛṣārtā vihvalavadanā jihvāṃ nirnāmayya gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:004.020_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi etān notsrakṣyāmi, anayena vyasanamāpatsye/
S01divyav_u:004.021_0: ko 'sau nirghṛṇahṛdayastyaktaparalokaśca ya eṣāṃ pratodayaṣṭiṃ kāye nipātayiṣyati? tena ta utsṛṣṭāh--adyāgreṇa acchinnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni bhakṣayata anavamarditāni,
S01divyav_u:004.021_1: pānīyāni pibata anāvilāni, caturdiśaṃ ca śītalā vāyavo vāntviti/
S01divyav_u:004.024_1: yāvat paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:004.025_0: tatra dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālo raudrāścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.026_1: upasaṃkramya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti atra bhoḥ puruṣa pānīyamiti/
S01divyav_u:004.028_1: tena sārthavāhena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdo niścāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.029_0: yāvat pañcamātraiḥ pretasahasrairdagdhasthūṇāsadṛśairasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhairanuparivāritaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:004.032_1: pretanagaramidam, kuto 'tra pānīyam? adyāsmābhirdvādaśabhirvarṣaistvatsakāśātpānīyaṃ pānīyamiti śabdaḥ śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.002_1: kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? śroṇa duṣkuhakā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.003_1: ahaṃ bhavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te gāthāṃ bhāṣante--
S01divyav_u:005.005_0: ākrośakā roṣakā vayaṃ matsariṇaḥ kuṭukuñcakā vayam/
S01divyav_u:005.006_0: dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:005.007_1: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgacchan? sa saṃprasthito yāvat tenāsau puruṣo dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.008_0: tenoktah--bhadramukha, aho bata tvayā mamārocitaṃ syāt yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:005.009_0: sa tenoktah--śroṇa gaccha, puṇyamaheśākhyastvam, yena tvaṃ pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.011_1: yāvadaparaṃ paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:005.011_2: tatrāpi dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālaścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.013_0: upasaṃkramyaivamāha--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.014_0: bhūyastena pṛṣṭah--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.015_0: tena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.018_0: kuto 'ham yuṣmākaṃ pānīyaṃ dadāmīti? te kathayanti--śroṇa, pretanagaramidam/
S01divyav_u:005.019_0: kuto 'tra pānīyam? adyāsmābhirdvādaśabhirvarṣaistvatsakāśāt pānīyaṃ pānīyamiti śabdaḥ śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.020_0: sa cāha--ke yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? ta ūcuh--śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:005.024_0: dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:005.025_1: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ sa pretanagaraṃ praviśya kvastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvannirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.026_1: sa tenoktah--bhadramukha, aho bata yadi tvayā mamārocitaṃ syād yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:005.028_1: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvan nirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.029_0: yāvat paśyati sūryasyāstagamanakāle vimāna, catasro 'psarasah abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:005.030_0: ekaḥ puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:005.032_2: svāgatam [6]śroṇa, māsi tṛṣito bubhukṣito vā? sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devo 'yaṃ vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:006.002_2: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.006_0: taistaṃ puruṣamavamūrdhakaṃ pātayitvā tāvat pṛṣṭavaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhikṣito yāvat sūryasyāstagamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.007_0: tataḥ paścāt punarapi tadvimānaṃ prādurbhūtam, tā apsarasaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.008_0: sa ca puruṣastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:006.008_2: kena ca karmaṇā ihopapannāh? te procuh--śroṇa duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.010_1: sa cāha--ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī, kathaṃ nābhiśraddadhāsye? śroṇa, ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake aurabhraka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:006.011_0: urabhrān praghātya praghātya māṃsaṃ vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayāmi/
S01divyav_u:006.014_0: bhūyo bhūyaḥ sa māṃ vicchandayati--bhadramukha, aniṣṭo 'sya karmaṇo phalavipākaḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.015_2: sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, kiṃ tvametānurabhrān divā praghātayasi āhosvidū rātrau? mayoktah--ārya divā,
S01divyav_u:006.017_0: sa kathayati--bhadramukha, rātrau śīlasamādānaṃ kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi/
S01divyav_u:006.018_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ divyaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:006.019_0: yanmayā divā urabhrāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:006.023_2: sa urabhrān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:006.025_2: bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
S01divyav_u:006.026_1: śroṇa, yadi na śraddadhāsyati, vaktavyastava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:006.028_1: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādeśaya/
S01divyav_u:006.029_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:006.031_0: tatra ekā apsarā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā,
S01divyav_u:006.031_1: ekaśca puruṣa abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate [7]paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:007.001_0: sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:007.001_1: svāgataṃ śroṇa, mā tṛṣito 'si, mā bubhukṣito 'si vā? sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:007.003_2: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyāstaṃgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:007.006_2: tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvaduparimastiṣkaṃ bhakṣayantī sthitā,
S01divyav_u:007.009_1: sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:007.016_0: sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, paradārān kiṃ tvaṃ divā gacchasi,
S01divyav_u:007.017_0: sa kathayati--bhadramukha, divā kiṃ na śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāsi? mayā tasyāntike divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:007.018_0: yattanmayā āryasya kātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam,
S01divyav_u:007.018_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyasukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:007.020_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:007.026_0: bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
S01divyav_u:007.026_1: etanme kaḥ śraddadhāsyati? śroṇa yanna śraddadhāsyati,
S01divyav_u:007.026_2: vaktavyah--tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇakalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:007.028_1: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya/
S01divyav_u:007.029_1: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:007.030_2: tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā/
S01divyav_u:007.032_0: sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhā--[8]śroṇa, svāgatam/
S01divyav_u:008.001_0: mā tṛṣito 'si mā bubhukṣito 'si vā? sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:008.003_0: uktaṃ ca--śroṇa, yadi ete kiṃcinmṛgayanti, mā dāsyasīti uktvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmasvakaṭāṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā/
S01divyav_u:008.008_1: kasmāt tvayaiṣāṃ dattam? kiṃ kathayati--ayaṃ me svāmī, ayaṃ me putraḥ, iyaṃ me snuṣā, iyaṃ me dāsī/
S01divyav_u:008.010_0: sa āha--ke yūyam, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? tayoktam--śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:008.011_0: ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? sā kathayati--ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake brāhmaṇī āsīt/
S01divyav_u:008.014_1: cittamabhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prasādajātayā piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:008.016_1: mayoktam--āryaputra, anumodasva, mayāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:008.017_0: sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:008.017_2_0: tāvattvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍakaṃ dattam? so 'marṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt
S01divyav_u:008.017_2_1: sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti? tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyaṃ busaplāvīṃ
S01divyav_u:008.021_0: so 'pi mayoktah--putra, anumodasva, mayāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:008.021_1: so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:008.021_3_0: tāvattvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍaṃ dattam? so 'pi amarṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt
S01divyav_u:008.021_3_1: sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na bhakṣayatīti? tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyamayoguḍaṃ
S01divyav_u:008.024_0: nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ mama jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:008.025_1: sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:008.026_0: ahaṃ teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ saṃdiśāmi--kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayata? te mama saṃdiśanti--na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:008.029_0_0: mayā snuṣābhihitā--vadhūke, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmakaṃ lūhāni
S01divyav_u:008.029_0_1: upanāmayasi? sā kathayati--kiṃ svamāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:008.029_0_2: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:008.032_0: nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratupasthitāyāṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni dattvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi/
S01divyav_u:008.033_0: sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:009.001_0: [9]te mama saṃdiśanti--kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni asmākaṃ praheṇakāni preṣayasi? ahaṃ teṣāṃ saṃdiśāmi--nāhaṃ lūhāni perṣayāmi,
S01divyav_u:009.002_0: mayā dārikābhihitā--dārike, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi/
S01divyav_u:009.004_0: sā kathayati--kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati,
S01divyav_u:009.004_1: yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti? tasya karmaṇo vipākeneyaṃ pūyaśoṇitaṃ bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:009.005_0: mama buddhirutpannā--tatra pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇīyām yatraitān sarvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:009.006_0: yayā mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte trāyastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyam,
S01divyav_u:009.008_0: śroṇa, gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakam? tatra mama duhitā veśyaṃ vāhayati/
S01divyav_u:009.009_0: sā tvayā vaktavyā--dṛṣṭāste mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:009.010_2: bhagini, tvameva kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:009.011_0: śroṇa, yadi na śraddadhāsyati, vaktavyā--tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:009.013_1: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:009.015_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:009.016_0: evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:009.017_0: tayoktah--śroṇa, gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakam? bhagini, gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:009.018_1: śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇaṃ suptameva vāsavagrāmake paitṛke udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata/
S01divyav_u:009.020_0: sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭāchatrāṇi vyajanāni,
S01divyav_u:009.020_2: laghvāgamanāya, kṣipramāgamanāya, cyutaḥ kālagato gatyupapattisthānāt sthānāntaraviśeṣatāyai/
S01divyav_u:009.022_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:009.025_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--ehi śroṇa, śvāgataṃ te/
S01divyav_u:009.026_0: dṛṣṭaste śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokah? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭo bhadanta mahakātyāyana/
S01divyav_u:009.027_0: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:009.028_1: sa āryeṇoktah--śroṇa, tāṃ tāvat pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ paripūraya/
S01divyav_u:009.031_0: bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśavarṣāṇi kālagatasya/
S01divyav_u:009.032_0: asti kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ paralokāt punarāgacchan? bhadramukha, eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:009.033_0: bhadramukha, yadi na śraddadhāsi, sa tava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:010.001_2: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādeśaya/
S01divyav_u:010.002_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāya gacchet/
S01divyav_u:010.003_1: paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:010.007_0: sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya/
S01divyav_u:010.007_1: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan? bhadramukha, eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:010.009_0: sa cāaha--bhadramukha, sacennābhiśraddadhāsi, tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:010.010_1: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:010.011_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:010.013_0: paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:010.014_2: upasaṃkramya kathayati--bhagini, dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:010.016_1: sā kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, mama mātāpitrordvādaśa varṣāṇi kālagatayoḥ/
S01divyav_u:010.017_0: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan? sa kathayati--eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:010.018_1: sa kathayati--bhagini, sacennābhiśraddadhāsi, tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:010.020_1: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:010.022_0: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:010.023_0: paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:010.024_1: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti,
S01divyav_u:010.026_1: syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
S01divyav_u:011.001_0: tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
S01divyav_u:011.006_1: sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.007_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:011.008_0: ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām,
S01divyav_u:011.012_2: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.014_1: te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:011.015_1: te yathādhigatamārocayanti, uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.017_1: atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:011.017_2: te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.021_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.021_1: ekānte niṣadya yathādhigatamārocayanti, uttare ca paripṛcchanti/
S01divyav_u:011.023_2: arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:011.025_0: athāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanam yāvattāvat paryupāsyāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocan--dṛṣṭo 'smābhirupādhyāyaḥ paryupāsitaśca/
S01divyav_u:011.027_2: draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.027_3: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:011.029_0_0: athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:011.029_0_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ
S01divyav_u:011.032_0: gacchāmi upādhyāya, rūpakāyenāpi taṃ bhagavantaṃ drakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:012.001_0: durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās tadyathā audumbarapuṣpam/
S01divyav_u:012.002_0: asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
S01divyav_u:012.003_0: pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukam/
S01divyav_u:012.004_1: tatrāsmābhiḥ kathaṃ pratipattavyam? kharā bhūmī gokaṇṭakā dhānāḥ/
S01divyav_u:012.005_0: asmākamaparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma gocarma cchāgacarma/
S01divyav_u:012.006_0: tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:012.007_0: evamevāsmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣvidamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:012.008_1: bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:012.009_0: adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:012.010_0: athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:012.012_1: athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:012.014_0: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
S01divyav_u:012.015_0: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:012.016_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:012.019_1: athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:012.021_0: tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
S01divyav_u:012.022_0: atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:012.023_0: athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:012.025_0: atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:012.028_0_0: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya
S01divyav_u:012.031_0: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:012.032_1: atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat[13]--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:013.001_0: saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:013.002_0: atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.003_0: athāyuṣmāñcchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:013.004_0: ekāntasthito bhagavantamidamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākāyāyanaḥ prativasati,
S01divyav_u:013.005_0: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:013.006_0: pañca ca praśnāti vistareṇoccārayitavyāni yathāpūrvamuktāni yāvat kasya naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:013.008_1: sadā snātaḥ, ekapalāśike upānahe dhārayitavye na dvipuṭāṃ na tripuṭām/
S01divyav_u:013.009_0: sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavati, tāṃ tyaktvā punar navā grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:013.010_0: bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni na kasyacinnaiḥsargikāṇi/
S01divyav_u:013.011_0: āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu vinayadharapañcamenopasampadam,
S01divyav_u:013.011_1: tatra katamo 'ntaḥ katamaḥ pratyantah? pūrveṇopāli puṇḍavardhanaṃ nāma nagaram,
S01divyav_u:013.015_0: paścimena sthūṇopasthūṇakau brāmaṇagrāmakau, so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.015_1: uttareṇa uśīragiriḥ so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ//
S01divyav_u:013.017_0: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtamiti vistaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.017_1: bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvam yāvat kāśyapo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ śāstā loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.019_0: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ dvau jāyāpatikau/
S01divyav_u:013.020_0: yadā kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣu nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:013.020_1: tasya rājñā kṛkinā catūratnamayaṃ caityaṃ kāritaṃ samantādyojanamuccatvena/
S01divyav_u:013.022_0: tena tatra khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyā uttiṣṭhante,
S01divyav_u:013.023_0: yadā kṛkī rājā kālagataḥ, tasya putraḥ sujāto nāṃnā sa rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.025_0: so 'mātyānāmantrayate--kiṃkāraṇamasmākaṃ bhavadbhiḥ stokakarapratyāyā upanāmitāh? kimasmākaṃ vijite karapratyāyā nottiṣṭhante? te kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:013.028_0: yadi devo 'nujānīyāt, te vayaṃ tān karapratyāyān samucchindāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:013.028_1: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yanmama pitrā kṛtam, devakṛtaṃ na tu brahmakṛtaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:013.029_1: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā svayameva te karapratyāyā notthāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:013.032_0: tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau tiṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.001_2: sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/
S01divyav_u:014.003_1: na tena rājñāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskārakaraṇāya kiṃcit prajñāptam? tau kathayatah--prajñāptam/
S01divyav_u:014.004_0: ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.005_1: tasya putraḥ sujāto nāma, sa rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.008_0: amba tāta anayā karṇikayāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskāraṃ kurutamiti/
S01divyav_u:014.009_1: taistāṃ vikrīya tasmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭitapratisaṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.010_1: athāpareṇa samayena sārthavāhaḥ paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.012_0: sa prasādajātaḥ pṛcchati--amba tāta yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃciduddhārikṛtam/
S01divyav_u:014.014_0: tena prasādajātena yattatrāvaśiṣṭam aparaṃ ca dattvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam/
S01divyav_u:014.016_1: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.017_0: yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:014.017_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.019_0: ahamanena kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:014.022_0: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:014.024_0_0: bhikṣava ūcuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo
S01divyav_u:014.024_0_1: vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭāh? bhagavānāha--yadanena māturantike kharavākkarma
S01divyav_u:014.024_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭā iti/
S01divyav_u:015.001_1: tena khalu samayena sūrpārake nagare nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:015.004_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:015.004_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:015.005_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:015.006_0: tasya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:015.007_0: jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārako bhavasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:015.008_0: bhūyo 'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:015.010_1: yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavo gṛhapatir glānaṃ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:015.013_0: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ svāminamadhyupekṣeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:015.014_0: sā vaidyasakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--ārya jānīṣe tvaṃ bhavaṃ gṛhapatim? jāne,
S01divyav_u:015.016_0: sa kathayati--dārike tvameva kathayasi--sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti/
S01divyav_u:015.017_0: atha kastasyopasthānaṃ karoti? sā kathayati--ahamasyopasthānaṃ karomi/
S01divyav_u:015.021_1: yat kiṃcidahaṃ jīvitaḥ, sarvaṃ tava prabhāvāt/
S01divyav_u:015.022_1: sā kathayati--svāmin, yadi me parituṣṭo 'si, bhavatu me tvayā sārdhaṃ samāgama iti/
S01divyav_u:015.023_0: sa kathayati--āryaputra, dūramapi paramapi gatvā dāsyevāham,
S01divyav_u:015.023_1: yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:015.026_0: tenāvaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā abhihitā--yadā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā mamārocayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:015.026_1: sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī/
S01divyav_u:015.027_1: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṃ paricāritam/
S01divyav_u:015.028_1: yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:015.029_0: sā tvaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:015.030_0: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśīrṣaḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:015.031_1: tasminneva divase bhavasya gṛhapaterbhūyasyā mātrayā sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāḥ paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.002_0: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat yāvatpūrṇeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:016.003_0: pūrṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṃsadhātībhyāṃ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam/
S01divyav_u:016.004_0_0: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
S01divyav_u:016.004_0_1: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:016.006_0: aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.007_0: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.008_0: te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṃraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.009_0: tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.009_1: sa putrairdṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaśca--tāta, kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:016.010_0: sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:016.011_0: te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.012_1: kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmīti? bhavilena ratnakarṇikā pinaddhā/
S01divyav_u:016.013_0: sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
S01divyav_u:016.015_1: teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.020_0: pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.020_1: pūrṇo 'pi pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta, mamāpi kalyatāmāvārīsamutthitaṃ dravyamiti/
S01divyav_u:016.022_0: kiṃ tava kalyate? sa kathayati--tāta kalyatām/
S01divyav_u:016.023_0: kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṃ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:016.024_0: bhavo gṛhapatiḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--puṇyamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yenehaiva sthiteneyatsuvarṇaṃ samupārjitamiti/
S01divyav_u:016.029_2: sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, dṛṣṭo vah? tāta dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:017.003_0: durnyasto bhidyate mantraḥ prītirbhidyate lobhataḥ//2// iti//
S01divyav_u:017.004_2: sa tenoktah--putra, na kadācit tvayā pūrṇo moktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:017.008_1: tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:017.009_0: tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati, tadā tadadhīnāḥ prāṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:017.011_1: yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:017.012_0: te kathayanti--tvamatraivāvāryāṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru, vayameva gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:017.016_1: yadā te upasthāya prakrāntā bhavanti, tadā tāsāṃ divasaparivyayaṃ dadāti/
S01divyav_u:017.018_0: tāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati, yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kuleṣvaiśvacaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
S01divyav_u:017.019_0: bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:017.019_1: sā kālaṃ jñātvā gacchati, śīghraṃ labhate/
S01divyav_u:017.022_1: yadā tasyā dārikā gatā bhavati, tadā labhyate/
S01divyav_u:017.023_1: tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
S01divyav_u:017.024_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:017.026_1: śobhanaṃ pūrṇena pratipālitā tvamiti? sā kathayati--yathā bhrātrā putreṇa veti/
S01divyav_u:017.027_0: te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:017.030_1: anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭitā/
S01divyav_u:017.032_0: te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah--dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṃ kāśikavastrāṇi[18] dīyante,
S01divyav_u:018.001_1: kimetadeva bhaviṣyati? nūnaṃ kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭiteti/
S01divyav_u:018.004_2: tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:018.005_0: tau parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutah--sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam, gṛhaṃ bhājayāmeti/
S01divyav_u:018.007_1: ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:018.008_0: yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca grahīṣyati,
S01divyav_u:018.010_1: tathāpi vayaṃ śknumo gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum,
S01divyav_u:018.011_0: tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:018.012_1: sa kathayati--suparīkṣitaṃ kartavyam, gṛhabhedikāḥ striyo bhavantīti/
S01divyav_u:018.015_0: ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:018.016_0: sa kathayati--pūrṇasya pratyaṃśaṃ nānuprayacchatha? tau kathayatah--dāsīputraḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:018.016_1: kastasya pratyaṃśaṃ dadyāt? api tu sa evāsmābhirbhājitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:018.017_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ pitrā abhihitah--sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya iti/
S01divyav_u:018.018_0: gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati--evaṃ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi/
S01divyav_u:018.019_0: yasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṃ gatvā kathayati--jyeṣṭhabhavike nirgaccha/
S01divyav_u:018.021_1: yasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, so 'pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṃ gatvā kathayati--pūrṇaka avatareti/
S01divyav_u:018.023_0: yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṃ jñātigṛhaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:018.025_2: dārakāṇāṃ pūrvabhikṣikāpi nāsti? pūrṇaḥ kathayati--kimahaṃ jāne yuṣmākaṃ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:018.027_0: yadi mayā jñātamabhaviṣyat, mayā anekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ saṃhāritā abhaviṣyan/
S01divyav_u:018.029_1: anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:018.030_0: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--bhoḥ puruṣa, kasmādevaṃ vepase? sa kathayati--ahamapi na jāne/
S01divyav_u:018.031_0: mayā cāyaṃ bhāraka utkṣipto bhavati, mama cedṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:019.001_0: sa tenābhihitah--bho puruṣa, kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? pañcabhiḥ kārṣāpaṇaśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:019.002_0: tena taṃ kāṣṭhabhāraṃ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṃ gatvā karapatrikayā catasraḥ khaṇḍikāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:019.004_0: uktaṃ ca--enaṃ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya,
S01divyav_u:019.005_2: kiṃ prajñayāpi paribhraṣṭah? pakvamānayeti pācanaṃ preṣitam/
S01divyav_u:019.010_2: te pūrṇasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa āha--asti/
S01divyav_u:019.011_0: te ūcuh--kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? sa āha--kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa/
S01divyav_u:019.012_0: taiḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhītvā rājñaḥ pralepo dattaḥ, svasthībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:019.013_0: rājā saṃlakṣayati--kīdṛśo 'sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṃ nāsti/
S01divyav_u:019.014_1: sa dūtena gatvā uktah--pūrṇa, devastvāṃ śabdāpayatīti/
S01divyav_u:019.015_0: sa vicārayitumārabdhah--kimarthaṃ māṃ rājā śabdāpayati? sa saṃlakṣayati--gośīrṣacandanenāsau rājā svasthībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:019.017_0: sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:019.022_2: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate 'paribhūto vaseyamiti/
S01divyav_u:019.023_0: rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā--bhavantaḥ, adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṃ pūrṇasyeti/
S01divyav_u:019.024_0: yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:019.025_0: vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidasmākaṃ samastānāṃ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:019.027_1: anye kathayanti--kiṃ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti/
S01divyav_u:019.028_1: tena śrutaṃ mahāsamudrāt pañca vaṇikchatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptānīti/
S01divyav_u:019.030_1: pṛcchati--bhavataḥ, kimidaṃ dravyamiti? te kathayanti--idaṃ cedaṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:019.031_0: kiṃ mūlyam? te kathayanti--sārthavāha, dūramapi paramapi gatvā tvameva praṣṭavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:020.002_2: tato vaṇiggrāmeṇāvacarakāḥ puruṣāḥ preṣitāh--paśyata kiṃ dravyamiti/
S01divyav_u:020.003_0: tairgatvā pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ dravyam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:020.005_2: te kathayanti--yattenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tad yūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:020.008_2: yātenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tadyūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:020.010_1: sa tairāhūyoktah--pūrṇa vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidekākinā grahītavyam/
S01divyav_u:020.011_2: yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṃ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā? yuṣmābhireva kriyākāraḥ kṛto yūyameva pālayata/
S01divyav_u:020.013_0: tato vaṇiggrāmeṇa saṃjātāmarṣeṇa ṣaṣṭeḥ kārṣāpaṇānāmarthāyātape dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:020.015_1: kathayati rājā--bhavantaḥ, kasyārthe yuṣmābhiḥ pūrṇa ātape vidhāritah? te kathayanti--deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṃ grahītavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:020.017_1: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--deva, samanuyujyantām yadaibhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahamebhiḥ śabdito mama bhrātā vā? te kathayanti--deva neti/
S01divyav_u:020.019_0: rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, śobhanaṃ pūrṇaḥ kathayati--sa tairvrīḍitairmuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:020.020_0: tena vaṇiggrāma āhūyoktah--bhavantaḥ, mamāmukena dravyeṇa prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:020.023_1: te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṃbhūya tasya niveśanaṃ gatvā dvāri sthitvā tairdūtaḥ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:020.027_0: pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṃ vaṇijyaṃ dattamavaśiṣṭaṃ svagṛhaṃ praveśitam/
S01divyav_u:020.028_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ śakyamavaśyāyabindunā kumbhaṃ pūrayitum? mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:020.029_0: tena sūrpārake nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ saurpārakīyā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:020.030_1: yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṃ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatviti/
S01divyav_u:020.032_1: tataḥ pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanah[21] pañcavaṇikśataparivāro mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.002_2: pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:021.003_0: śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.004_0: te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.005_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṃsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṃ vāramavataran? te kathayanti--pūrṇa,
S01divyav_u:021.009_0: te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:021.012_0: sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:021.013_0: te kathayanti--asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.016_0: kutra bhavantaḥ sa bhagavānetarhi viharati? sārthavāha, śrāvstyāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:021.017_0: sa taṃ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.017_1: bhrātāsya bhavilaḥ saṃlakṣayati--parikhinno 'yaṃ mahāsamudragamanena, niveśo 'sya kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:021.018_0: sa tenoktah--bhrātaḥ, kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṃ prārthayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:021.020_1: sa kathayati--yadāsmākaṃ gṛhe vārtā nāsti, tadā na pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.021_1: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--bhrātaḥ, tadānīṃ na śobhate, idānīṃ tu yuktam/
S01divyav_u:021.023_2: nyāyopārjitaṃ te prabhūtaṃ dhanamasti, eṣāṃ tu tava bhrātṛrṇāmanyāyoparjitam/
S01divyav_u:021.024_0: yadyete kathayanti ekadhye vasāmeti, na vastavyam/
S01divyav_u:021.026_2: pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:021.028_0: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ jalayānena khinna idānīṃ sthalayānenāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.030_1: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ pradhānapuruṣamasatkāreṇa praveśayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:021.031_0: sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:021.032_1: kimāgamanaprayojanam? apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:022.002_0: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:022.003_2: yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:022.005_0: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛḥpatiḥ pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:022.006_0: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:022.008_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:022.009_0: nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:022.010_0: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:022.011_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:022.014_0: tato bhagavān pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamāmantrayate--ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:022.014_1: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrurvarṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvāsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:022.017_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:022.019_0: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena//4//
S01divyav_u:022.022_0_0: ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena
S01divyav_u:022.022_0_1: dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvaiko vyapakṛṣṭo
S01divyav_u:022.024_0: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
S01divyav_u:022.024_1_1: pravrajayeyam--kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ
S01divyav_u:022.027_1: sādhu khalu tvaṃ pūrṇa yastvamevaṃ vadasi--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu pūrvavadyāvannāparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
S01divyav_u:022.029_0: tena hi pūrṇa śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye//
S01divyav_u:022.031_0: santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni/
S01divyav_u:023.003_2: ghrāṇavijñeyā gandhāḥ, jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ, kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni, manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.006_1: santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate/
S01divyav_u:023.008_0: anena tvaṃ pūrṇa mayā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.008_1_0: kutrecchasi vastuṃ kutrecchasi vāsaṃ kalpayitum? anenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena
S01divyav_u:023.008_1_1: codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṃ
S01divyav_u:023.010_0: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.011_0: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:023.011_1: tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:023.011_2: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:023.011_4: ye māṃ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā
S01divyav_u:023.017_0: no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:023.017_1: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.018_0: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.018_1: tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.018_2: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:023.018_4: ye māṃ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:023.018_5: no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:023.022_0: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.023_0: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.023_1: tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.023_2: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:023.023_4: ye māṃ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:023.023_5: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayanti/
S01divyav_u:023.027_0: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:023.027_1: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.027_2: tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:023.027_3: tasya me evaṃ bhaviṣyati--santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante,
S01divyav_u:024.002_0: sādhu sādhu pūrṇa, śakyastvaṃ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
S01divyav_u:024.003_0: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa, mukto mocaya, tīrṇastāraya, āśvasta āśvasaya, parinirvṛtaḥ parinirvāpayeti//
S01divyav_u:024.005_0: athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.006_0: athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:024.007_0: śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.008_0: yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṃ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ janapadānanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.010_0: athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:024.011_2: sa saṃlakṣayati--amaṅgalo 'yaṃ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.015_0: yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṃ mṛgāḥ saṃgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṃ narāḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.017_0: dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe udarasya pāpakalile dūrādihābhyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.019_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ pravrajita īdṛśena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.020_0: tato 'syāyuṣmatā pūrṇena dharmo deśyitaḥ, śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeśeṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.023_0: tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.024_0: traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:024.025_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.028_1: tau kathayatah--śrīrvā bhavatu kālakarṇī vā, āgaccha ekadhye prativasāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:024.030_0: tau kathayatah--tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṃ bhuñjāno vikatthase/
S01divyav_u:025.001_1: karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yattat śrūyate gośīrṣacandanavanamiti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:025.002_1: tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ maheśvarasya yakṣasya parigraho 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:025.004_0: adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ/
S01divyav_u:025.005_0: dṛṣṭvā ca yena maheśvaro yakṣaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:025.006_0: upasaṃkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat--yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti/
S01divyav_u:025.007_0: yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:025.007_1: atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṃ samitimasamitiṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣo mahāntaṃ kālikāvātabhayaṃ saṃjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ tena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:025.009_0: karṇadhāreṇārocitam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah--yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti,
S01divyav_u:025.010_0: kiṃ manyadhvamiti? tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:025.014_0: vyasanamatibhayaṃ vayaṃ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no 'dya nāthāḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:025.025_1: tairekasvareṇa sarvairevaṃ nādo muktah--namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāya,
S01divyav_u:025.026_0: atha yā devatā āyuṣmatī pūrṇe 'bhiprasannā, sā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:025.029_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake 'ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:025.031_0: atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati--pūrvam yat kiṃcidvahanaṃ kālikāvātena spṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:025.032_0_0: idānīṃ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah [26]sumerupratyāhata iva pratinivṛttah? sa itaścāmutaśca
S01divyav_u:025.032_0_1: pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:026.003_0: kiṃ māmeva viheṭhayasi? yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:026.004_0: maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati--ārya idaṃ gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ rājñaścakaravartino 'rthāya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:026.005_0: kiṃ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṃ varaṃ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato 'rhan samyaksambuddha? kim ārya bhagavāṃl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.007_1: tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṃ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.010_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati--yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:026.011_1: ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato 'rthāya candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:026.012_0: tena teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ ratnaiḥ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.013_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṃ māpayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.013_2: kiṃ divase divase pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhṇīdhvamāhosvit gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam? te kathayanti--ārya gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam/
S01divyav_u:026.015_0: yāvat alpīyasā kālena candanamālaḥ prāsādaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.017_0: yattatra saṃkalikā cūrṇaṃ cāvaśiṣṭam, tat piṣṭvā tatraiva pralepo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:026.018_0: te ca bhrātara parasparaṃ sarve kṣamitā uktāśca--buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojayata/
S01divyav_u:026.022_3_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhiruhya jetavanābhimukhaṃ sthitvā ubhe jānumaṇḍale
S01divyav_u:026.022_3_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣiptvā dhūpaṃ saṃcārya ārāmikena ca sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ
S01divyav_u:026.027_0: anāthabhūtān prasamīkṣya sādho kṛtvā kṛpāmāgamanaṃ kuruṣva//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:026.029_0: tatastāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā jetavane gatvā sthitāni dūupo 'bhrakūṭavadudakaṃ vaidūryaśalākāvat/
S01divyav_u:026.031_0: sa kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kuto bhagavan nimantraṇamāgatam? sūrpārakāt ānanda nagarāt/
S01divyav_u:026.032_0: kiyaddūre bhadanta sūrpārakaṃ nagaram? sātirekam ānanda [27]yojanaśatam/
S01divyav_u:027.001_0: gacchāmah? ānanda, bhikṣūnārocaya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śvaḥ sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktum,
S01divyav_u:027.002_0: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:027.004_0: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāvimuktas tasyāmeva pariṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:027.010_0: ṛddhibhiryatra gantavyaṃ tūṣṇī tvaṃ bhava pūrṇaka//10// iti//
S01divyav_u:027.011_2: tasyaitadabhavat--yena mayā sakalaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ charditaṃ tyaktaṃ pratiniḥsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:027.012_0: tena vīryamāsthāya ṛddhimutpādya yāvadāyuṣmānānandas tṛtīyasthavirasya śalākāṃ na dadāti,
S01divyav_u:027.012_1: tāvat tena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:027.015_0: vapuṣmattayā śrutena vā na balātkāraguṇaiśca gautama/
S01divyav_u:027.018_0: jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā hi bhavanti madvidhāḥ//12// iti//
S01divyav_u:027.019_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ caityaśalākāgrahaṇe/
S01divyav_u:027.020_0: tatprathamataḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇatām yaduta pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ/
S01divyav_u:027.021_0: kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā--praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ vivṛtapāpairiti,
S01divyav_u:027.023_0: yo vo yasyā ṛddherlābhī, tena tayā tatra sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:027.023_1: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:027.023_2: bhagavānevamāha--kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyamiti pūrvavat yāvat gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:027.029_0: pratyekamekaikasmin dvāre paramayā vibhūtyā rājaputrā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:027.029_1: mūladvāre ca mahatā rājānubhāvena sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:027.031_2: kiṃ bhagavānāgatah? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--mahārāja [28]patracārikā haritacārikā bhājanacārikāścaite,
S01divyav_u:028.002_1: kiṃ bhagavānāgatah? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--mahārāja na bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:028.002_2: api tu khalu sthavirasthavirā eva te bhikṣava iti/
S01divyav_u:028.007_0: anye toyadharā ivāmbaratale vidyullatālaṃkṛtā ṛddhyā devapurīmiva pramuditā gantuṃ samabhyudyatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:028.010_0: āsane nirmitāścaike paśya ṛddhimatāṃ balam//14// iti//
S01divyav_u:028.011_0: tato bhagavān bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:028.012_0: yāvad bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṃ sābhisaṃskāraṃ pādo nyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:028.012_1: ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātah--iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati saṃcalati saṃpracalati/
S01divyav_u:028.018_0: tato bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭā yayā jambudvīpo vilīnakanakāvabhāsaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:028.019_1: idaṃ kim? sa kathayati--mahārāja bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭeti/
S01divyav_u:028.021_0: tato bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchāntaiḥ sārdhaṃ sūrpārakābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:028.022_1: sā bakulaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataśchāyāṃ kurvantī pṛṣṭataḥ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:028.023_0: tasyā bhagavatā āśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:028.023_1: yāṃ śrutvā tayā devatayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:028.029_0_0: dharmataiṣā--na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścittasya kalyatāṃ janayati aputrasya
S01divyav_u:028.029_0_1: ca putralābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathopacitakuśalamūlahetukasya
S01divyav_u:028.031_0: tato bhagavāṃstāsāṃ vinayakālamavekṣya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya [29]prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.001_0: tā api bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.001_1: tato bhagavatā tāsāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā yāvat srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:029.003_0_0: tā dṛṣṭasatyās trirudānamudānayanti--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā
S01divyav_u:029.003_0_1: kṛtaṃ na rājñā neṣṭasvajanabandhuvargeṇa na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyad
S01divyav_u:029.005_0: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitā vayaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu atikrāntātikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.006_0: etā vayaṃ bhagavataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:029.007_1: tata utthāyāsanāt yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--aho bata bhagavānasmākaṃ kiṃcidatra prayacchet yatra vayaṃ kārāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.010_0: tatastayā jetavananivāsinyā tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ sā bakulaśākhāropitā/
S01divyav_u:029.010_1: bhagavāṃścoktah--bhagavan, ahamasmin stūpe kārāṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:029.012_1: kecit bakulamedhīti, yamadyāpi caityavandakā bhikavo vandante/
S01divyav_u:029.015_0: te tena madena mattā na kiṃcinmanyante/
S01divyav_u:029.016_1: salilaṃ śoṣitam, haritaśāḍvalaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sthaṇḍilāni pātitāni/
S01divyav_u:029.017_0: tataste ṛṣayaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.018_1: te kathayanti--bhagavaṃstvaṃ dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetramiha praviṣṭo 'smākaṃ cedṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:029.021_1: tato bhagavatā ṛddhiḥ prasrabdhā, yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam/
S01divyav_u:029.022_0: tato bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:029.024_0: tato yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:029.026_1: tataste bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:029.027_0: bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathena avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.029_0: ehīti coktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:029.031_0: sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//15//
S01divyav_u:030.002_0: yasteṣām ṛṣiravavādakaḥ sa kathayati--bhagavan, mayā anena veṣeṇa mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.003_0: tato bhagavān pañcabhirṛṣiśataiḥ pūrvakaiśca pañcabhirbhikṣuḥśatairardhacandrākāropagūḍhastat eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa musalakaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.005_0: tena khalu samayena musalake parvate vakkalī nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:030.006_0: adrākṣīt sa ṛṣirbhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavat yāvat samantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:030.010_1: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:030.012_0_0: tato bhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
S01divyav_u:030.012_0_1: bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavat yāvat bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājito yāvadevaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:030.014_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śraddhādhimuktānām yaduta vakkalī bhikṣuriti/
S01divyav_u:030.015_0: tato bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛto vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi kurvan sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.016_0: bhagvān saṃlakṣayati--yadi ekena dvāreṇa praviśāmi, apareṣāṃ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam/
S01divyav_u:030.017_1: tata ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā madhye sūrpārakasya nagarasyāvatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.018_0: tataḥ sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī te ca saptadaśa putrāḥ svakasvakena parivāreṇa yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:030.020_0: tato bhagavānanekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno yena candanamālaḥ prāsādas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.022_0: sa janakāyo bhagavantamapaśyaṃś candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ bhettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:030.022_1: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi candanamālaḥ prāsādo bhetsyate, dātṛrṇāṃ puṇyāntarāyo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:030.024_1: tato bhagavatā tasyāḥ pariṣad āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:030.026_2: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścit sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:030.030_0: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:030.031_0: atha dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya āsanāni prajñāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:030.031_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālam [31]manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:031.001_0: tena khalu samayena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau mahāsamudre prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:031.001_1: tau saṃlakṣayatah--bhagavān sūrpārake nagare dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:031.002_1: tatastau pañcanāgaśataparivārau pañcanadīśatāni saṃjanya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:031.004_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--imau kṛṣṇagautamau nāgarājau yadi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramāgamiṣyataḥ,
S01divyav_u:031.006_0: tatkasya hetoh? pañca me maudgalyāyana ātyayikapiṇḍapātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:031.007_0: katame pañca? āgantukasya gamikasya glānasya glānopasthāyakasyopadhivārikasya ca/
S01divyav_u:031.008_0: atha bhagavān maudgalyāyanasahāyo yena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:031.010_0: tau kathayatah--tādṛśena bhadanta prasādena vayamāgatā yanna śakyamasmābhiḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi prāṇinaḥ pīḍāmutpādayituṃ prāgeva sūrpārakanagaranivāsino janakāyasyeti/
S01divyav_u:031.012_0: tato bhagavatā kṛṣṇagautamakayor nāgarājayostādṛśo dharmo yaṃ śrutvā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau,
S01divyav_u:031.014_0: ekaiko nāgaḥ saṃlakṣayati--aho bata bhagavān mama pānīyaṃ pibatu iti/
S01divyav_u:031.015_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayti--yadi ekasyeiva pānīyaṃ pāsyāmi, eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam/
S01divyav_u:031.017_0: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yatra pañcānāṃ nadīśatānāṃ saṃbhedastatrodakasya pātrapūramādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:031.020_1_1: bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau citrasya
S01divyav_u:031.022_0: ekenāṃśena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇavarṣaśataṃ paricaret,
S01divyav_u:031.022_1: yadvā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvarta iti,
S01divyav_u:031.022_3: neyatā putreṇa mātāpitaroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:031.025_0: yastu asāvaśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:031.025_1: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasampadi, matsariṇaṃ tyāgasampadi, duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:031.025_2: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:031.028_0: mayā ca mātur na kaścidupakāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:031.028_1: yadahaṃ samanvāhareyaṃ kutra me mātā upapanneti/
S01divyav_u:031.029_0: samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttaḥ paśyati marīcike lokadhātau upapannā/
S01divyav_u:031.031_0: yannvahametamarthaṃ bhagavato nivedayeyamiti bhagavantamidamavocat--uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pūrvam--duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau iti/
S01divyav_u:031.032_0: tanmama mātā marīcike lokadhātau upapannā, [32]sā ca bhagavato vineyā/
S01divyav_u:032.001_1: bhagavān kathayati--maudgalyāyana, kasya ṛddhyā gacchāmah? bhagavan madīyayā/
S01divyav_u:032.002_0: tato bhagavānāyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sumerumūrdhni pādān sthāpayantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:032.004_0: adrākṣīt sā bhadrakanyā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:032.004_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sasambhramāt tatsakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--cirādbata putrakaṃ paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:032.006_1: kathamasya mātā bhavatīti? āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:032.008_0: tato bhagavatā tasyā bhadrakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:032.008_1: yāṃ śrutvā tayā bhadrakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśaulaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:032.010_0: sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati pūrvavat yāvat pratiṣṭhāpitā devamanuṣyeṣu/
S01divyav_u:032.013_0: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaṃ ca mayopalabdham//16//
S01divyav_u:032.015_0: prāptaṃ ca kāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇā ca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//17//
S01divyav_u:032.018_1: eṣāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:032.019_0: upāsikāṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāmabhiprasannām/
S01divyav_u:032.021_0_0: atha sā bhadrakanyā bhagavantamāyuṣmantaṃ ca mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:032.021_0_1: śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:032.021_0_2: bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhātahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:032.024_1: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pātragrāhakaḥ pātraṃ niryātayati/
S01divyav_u:032.027_1: maudgalyāyanastato vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati--kiṃ nāmeyaṃ bhagavann ṛddhih? manojavā maudgalyāyana/
S01divyav_u:032.028_0: na mayā bhadanta vijñātamevaṃ gambhīramevaṃ gambhīrā buddhadharmā iti/
S01divyav_u:032.029_0: yadi vijñātamabhaviṣyat, tilaśo 'pi me saṃcūrṇitaśarīreṇānuttarāyāḥ samyaksambodheścittaṃ vyāvartitamabhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:032.031_0: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā pūrṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:032.031_1: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena [33]dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:032.031_2_0: pravrajya ca sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? bhagavānāha--pūrṇena bhikṣavo
S01divyav_u:032.031_2_1: bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitāani
S01divyav_u:033.003_1: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:033.003_2: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:033.008_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//19//
S01divyav_u:033.009_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo
S01divyav_u:033.009_0_1: nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S01divyav_u:033.015_0: tena tīvreṇa paryavasthānena kharavākkarma niścāritam--kasya dāsīputrasyopadhivāra iti/
S01divyav_u:033.017_0_0: yadā asya paryavasthānaṃ vigataṃ tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--jānīṣe
S01divyav_u:033.017_0_1: tvaṃ ko 'hamiti? sa kathayati--jāne tvaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajito
S01divyav_u:033.018_0: sa kathayati--yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajya caraṇīyaṃ tatkṛtamahaṃ sakalabandhanābaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:033.021_1: yattena naraka upapadya dāsīputreṇa bhavitavyam, tannarake nopapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:033.022_0: pañca tu janmaśatāni dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:033.022_1: yāvadetarhyapi carame bhave dāsyā eva kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:033.023_0: yat saṃghasyopasthānaṃ kṛtam, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:033.024_0: yattatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:033.024_1: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:033.025_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:033.027_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:034.002_0: yadā rājñā bhāgadhena ajātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa naukramo mātāpitrormāpitastadā vaiśālakairlicchavibhirbhagavato 'rthe naukramo māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:034.003_0: nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--vayaṃ vinipatitaśarīrā yannu vayaṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa bhagavantaṃ nadī{dīm} gaṅgāmuttārayema iti/
S01divyav_u:034.005_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ gantum yo yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava utsahate rājño māgadhasyājātaśatrorvaidehīputrasya nausaṃkrameṇa nadīgaṅgāmuttartum,
S01divyav_u:034.005_1: sa tena taratu, yo vā bhikṣavo vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ nausaṃkrameṇa,
S01divyav_u:034.007_0: ahamapi āyuṣmatā ānandena bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa nadīṃ gaṅgāmuttariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:034.010_0: bhagavānapi āyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇottīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:034.012_0: ye tarantyarṇavaṃ saraḥ setuṃ kṛtvā visṛjya palvalāni/
S01divyav_u:034.013_0: kolaṃ hi janāḥ prabandhitā uttīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:034.017_0: chittveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:034.018_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--icchasi tvamānanda yo 'sau yūya ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasraṃ tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedho nānāratnavicitro vitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:034.022_0: tato bhagavatā cakrasvatikanandyāvartena jālāvanaddhenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānāmāśvāsanakareṇa pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:034.024_0: nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭeti? yāvat paśyanti yūyaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ/
S01divyav_u:034.025_1: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ārohapariṇāhaṃ nimittaṃ bhikṣavo yūpasya gṛhṇīta,
S01divyav_u:034.027_0: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta bhikṣavo yūpaṃ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:034.028_0: kiṃ tāvat vītararāgatvādāhosvit paryupāsitapūrvatvāt? tadyadi tāvad vītarāgatvāt,
S01divyav_u:035.001_0: [35]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājābhūta praṇādo nāma śakrasya devendrasya vayasyakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.001_1: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamudito 'hamaputraśca/
S01divyav_u:035.003_1: kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati--kauśila,
S01divyav_u:035.006_0: yadi kaścit cyavanadharmā devaputro bhaviṣyati, tatte putratve samādāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:035.007_0: dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi saṃkliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:035.007_1: amlānāni mālyāni mlāyante, daurgandhaṃ mukhānniścarati, ubhābhyāṃ kakṣābhyāṃ svedaḥ pragharati,
S01divyav_u:035.010_0: sa śakreṇa devendreṇoktah--mārṣa, praṇādasya rājño 'grāmahiṣyāḥ kukṣau pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhāṇeti/
S01divyav_u:035.012_0: mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:035.014_1: yasminneva divase pratisaṃdhirgṛhītā, tasmin divase mahājanakāyena praṇādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.015_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:035.016_0: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.017_0: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:035.018_0: jñātaya ūcuh--yasminneva divase 'yaṃ dārako mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:035.019_0: yasminneva divase jātastasminneva divase mahājanakāyena nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.020_0: tasmāt bhavatu dārakasya mahāpraṇāda iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:035.021_1: mahāpraṇādo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāṃsaṃdhātrībhyāṃ dvāghyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyām/
S01divyav_u:035.023_0: so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarṇpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.025_0: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:035.026_0: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paṇḍitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:035.027_0: sa yāni tāni rāajñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāsatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni,
S01divyav_u:035.027_1_0: tadyathā--hastiśikṣāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śare dhanuṣi prayāṇe niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:035.027_1_1: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe yaṣṭibandhe padabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:035.032_0: dharmatā khalu na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat tāto jīvati/
S01divyav_u:036.001_1: sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.002_0: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ samādāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.003_0: mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:036.004_0: sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.004_1: dvirapi śakreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ putratve samādāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.005_0: mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:036.006_0: sa kathayati--kauśika, vayaṃ rājānaḥ pramattā iti ratibahulāḥ kṣaṇād vismarāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.007_0: kiṃcittvamasmākaṃ cihnaṃ sthāpaya, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā dānāni dāsyāmaḥ, puṇyāni kārayiṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:036.008_0: na ca śakyate vinā nimittena puṇyaṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:036.008_1: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa viśvakarmaṇo devaputrasyājñā dattā--gaccha tvaṃ viśvakarman rājño mahāpraṇādasya niveśane/
S01divyav_u:036.010_0: ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasreṇa tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedhaṃ nānāratnavicitraṃ sarvasauvarṇamiti/
S01divyav_u:036.011_0: tato viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa mahāpraṇādasya rājño niveśane divyo maṇḍalavāṭo nirmito yūpaścocchritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.013_0: tasya mātulo 'śoko nāma yūpasya paricārako vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.014_0: tato yūpadarśanodyuktaḥ sarva eva jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
S01divyav_u:036.016_3: jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
S01divyav_u:036.019_2: tato 'pyasau janakāyaḥ svapathyadanamādāya bhuktvā yūpaṃ nirīkṣamāṇastiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:036.022_1: amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, janakāyaḥ svapathyadanamādāya bhuktvā yūpaṃ nīrīkṣamāṇastiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:036.024_0: tato rājñā mahāpraṇādena dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā sa yūpo nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāmāplāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.025_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māpraṇādasyāśoko nāma mātulaḥ, eṣa evāsau bhaddālī bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.027_0: kutra bhadanta asau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati? bhaviṣyanti bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'dhvani aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.028_0: aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śaṅkho nāma rājā bhaviṣyati samyamanī cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:036.030_0: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:036.031_0: pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:037.001_0: śaṅkhasya rājño brahmāyur nāma brāhmaṇaḥ purohito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:037.002_1: sā maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā putraṃ janayiṣyati maitreyaṃ nāma/
S01divyav_u:037.008_0: enaṃ ca yūpamādāya śaṅkhasya rājña upanāmayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:037.010_0: tataste māṇavakāstam yūpaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ chittvā bhājayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:037.011_0: tato maitreyo māṇavakastasya yūpasyānityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃvegena vanaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:037.011_2: tasminneva divase maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā anuttaraṃ jñānamadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:037.013_0: tasya maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddha iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:037.014_0: śaṅkho 'pi rājā aśītikoṭṭarājasahasraparivāro maitreyaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajiṣyati/
