S01divyav_u:037.017_0: tato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'śītibhikṣukoṭiparivāro yena gurupādakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:037.019_0_0: yato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ kāśyapasya bhikṣoravikopitamasthisaṃghātaṃ dakṣiṇena
S01divyav_u:037.019_0_1: pāṇinā gṛhītvā vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati--yo 'sau
S01divyav_u:037.019_0_2: bhikṣavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannastasyāyaṃ śrāvakaḥ
S01divyav_u:037.025_1: yaṃ ca saṃvegamāpatsyante, tatrāsau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati//
S01divyav_u:037.027_0: ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo dvayo ratnayoryugapalloke prādurbhāvāya? bhagavānāha--praṇidhānavaśāt/
S01divyav_u:037.029_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:037.031_1: uttarāpathe dhanasaṃmato nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:038.001_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena vāsavasya rājñaḥ putro jāto ratnapratyuptayā śikhayā/
S01divyav_u:038.002_0: tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā ratnaśikhīti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:038.003_0: yasminneva divase vanaṃ saṃśritastasminneva divase 'nuttaraṃ jñānamadhigatam/
S01divyav_u:038.005_1: kasyacidanyasyāpi rājño rājyamevamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:038.008_0: atīva śasyasampattirbhavati yathā asmākamiti? madhyadeśād vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāyottarāpathaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.009_0: te kathayanti--asti deva madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā iti/
S01divyav_u:038.011_1: tato dhanasaṃmato rājā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.013_0: aśrauṣīdvāsavo rājā--dhanasaṃmato rājā catruaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:038.014_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ so 'pi caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ patikāyaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.016_0: atha ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastayorvinayakālaṃ jñātvā nadyā gaṅgāyāstīre rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.017_1: dharmatā khalu yadā buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:038.017_2: tasmin samaye śakrabrahmādayo devā bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:038.019_0: atha śakrabrahmādayo devā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.020_0: upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.021_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaramātyān pṛcchati--kimayaṃ bhavanto vāsavasya rājño vijite mahānudārāvabhāsah? te kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:038.021_2: vāsavasya rājño vijite mahānudārāvabhāsah? te kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:038.021_3: vāsavasya rājño vijite ratnaśikhī nāma samyaksambuddhah utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.025_3: tasyāhaṃ kīdṛśamanarthaṃ kariṣyāmi? tena tasya dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.027_2: puṇyamaheśākhyastvam, yasya vijite dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddho 'yam/
S01divyav_u:038.029_0: kiṃ tu kaṇṭhāśleṣaṃ te datvā gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:038.031_0: upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:038.032_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo vāsavo rājā ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat--[39]mama bhadanta dhanasaṃmatena rājñā saṃdiṣṭam--priyavayasaya āgaccha,
S01divyav_u:039.002_2: tatra mayā kathaṃ pratipattavyam? ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--gaccha mahārāja,
S01divyav_u:039.004_0: bhagavan, kiṃ mayā tasya pādayor nipatitavyam? mahārāja, balaśreṣṭhā hi rājānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.005_0: atha vāsavo rājā ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.007_0: tato dhanasaṃmatena rājñā kaṇḍhe śleṣaṃ dattvā viśvāsamutpādya preṣitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:039.008_0: atha vāsavo rājā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.008_1: upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.009_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo vāsavo rājā ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat--kasya bhadanta sarve rājānaḥ pādayor nipatanti? rājño mahārāja cakravartinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.011_0_0: atha vāsavo rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena ratnaśikhī tathāgataḥ
S01divyav_u:039.011_0_2: me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
S01divyav_u:039.013_0_0: atha vāsavo rājā tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya
S01divyav_u:039.013_0_1: āsanāni prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena
S01divyav_u:039.013_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam, yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
S01divyav_u:039.016_0: atha ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājño vāsavasya bhaktabhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.018_1: atha rājā vāsavo ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:039.020_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ samatarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:039.020_0_1: ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ pādayor
S01divyav_u:039.020_0_2: nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--anenāhaṃ bhadanta kuśalamūlena rājā syāṃ cakravartīti/
S01divyav_u:039.023_1: tato ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddho vāsavaṃ rājānamidamavocat--bhaviṣyasi mahārāja aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śaṅkho nāma rājā cakravartīti/
S01divyav_u:039.025_0: dhanasaṃmato rājā kolāhalaśabdaṃ śrutvā amātyān pṛcchati--kimeṣa bhavanto vāsavasya rājño vijite kolāhalaśabdaḥ śrūyate iti? tairāgamya niveditam--deva,
S01divyav_u:039.025_1: ratnaśikhinā samyaksambuddhena vāsavo rājā cakravartirājye vyākṛta iti janakāyo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.028_1: atha dhanasaṃmato rājā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.029_0: upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:039.030_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo dhanasaṃmato rājā ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat--kasya bhadanta sarve cakravartinaḥ pādayor nipatanti? tathāgatasya mahārāja arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya/
S01divyav_u:039.032_0_0: atha dhanasaṃmato rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenāñjalim[40]
S01divyav_u:039.032_0_1: praṇamya ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe
S01divyav_u:040.002_0: adhivāsayati ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddho dhanasaṃmatasya rājño 'pi tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:040.003_0_0: atha dhanasaṃmato rājā ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:040.003_0_1: ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikāt
S01divyav_u:040.006_0_0: atha dhanasaṃmato rājā tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:040.006_0_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya
S01divyav_u:040.006_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam, yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
S01divyav_u:040.009_0: atha ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena dhanasaṃmatasya rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:040.011_0_0: atha dhanasaṃmato rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ tatpramukhaṃ
S01divyav_u:040.011_0_1: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati
S01divyav_u:040.013_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:040.013_0_1: ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ pādayor
S01divyav_u:040.013_0_2: nipatya sarvamimaṃ lokaṃ maitreṇāṃśena sphuritvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumarabdhah--anenāhaṃ
S01divyav_u:040.013_0_3: kuśalamūlena śāstā loke bhaveyaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti/
S01divyav_u:040.016_0: ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahārāja aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyakasmbuddha iti/
S01divyav_u:041.002_1: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya nyagrodhikāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:041.003_0_0: adrākṣīt sā brāhmaṇadārikā bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:041.005_0: sahadarśanādasyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ sa bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaścakravartikulād rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pravrajita idānīṃ bhikṣāmaṭate/
S01divyav_u:041.007_0: tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam,
S01divyav_u:041.008_0: tato bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyāḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:041.009_0: jānāti me bhagavāṃścetasā cittamiti viditvā tīvreṇa prasādena bhagavate saktubhikṣāṃ dattavatī/
S01divyav_u:041.010_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:041.013_0_0: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ
S01divyav_u:041.013_0_1: pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahava huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmamavīciparyantān
S01divyav_u:041.013_0_2: narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti,
S01divyav_u:041.016_0: tenānugatāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ, te pratiprasrabhyante/
S01divyav_u:041.017_0: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavantam itaścyutā āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:041.019_0: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:041.020_0: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
S01divyav_u:041.022_0_0: yā upariṣṭādgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājikān devān gatvā trāyastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitān
S01divyav_u:041.022_0_1: nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino devān brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ
S01divyav_u:041.022_0_3: puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabhṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśānakaniṣṭhaparyantān devān gatvā
S01divyav_u:042.001_0: [42]atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:042.008_1: yadi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe 'ntardhīyante//
S01divyav_u:042.010_0: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyorṇāyāmantarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:042.014_0: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantāt divākareṇodayatā yathaiva//3//
S01divyav_u:042.021_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:042.027_0: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//6// iti/
S01divyav_u:042.029_1: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:043.001_0: asāvānanda brāhmaṇadārikā anena kuśalamūlena trayodaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:043.002_0: kiṃ tarhi devāṃśca manuṣyāṃśca saṃvācyasaṃsṛtya paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścima ātmabhāvapratilambhe suparṇihito nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:043.004_0: sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā brāhmaṇadārikā prasādajātayā bhagavate saktubhikṣā pratipāditā,
S01divyav_u:043.006_1: tena śrutaṃ mama patnyā śramaṇāya gautamāya saktubhikṣā pratipāditā,
S01divyav_u:043.006_2: sā ca śramaṇena gautamena pratyekāyāṃ bodhau vyākṛtā iti/
S01divyav_u:043.008_1: bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya bhagavantamidamavocat--agamadbhavān gautamo 'smākaṃ niveśanam? agamaṃ brāhmaṇa/
S01divyav_u:043.010_0: satyaṃ bhavate tayā mama patnyā saktubhikṣā pratipāditā,
S01divyav_u:043.010_1: sā ca tvayā pratyekāyāṃ bodhau vyākṛtā iti? satyaṃ brāhmaṇa/
S01divyav_u:043.011_1: kathaṃ nāma tvametarhi saktubhikṣāhetoḥ saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ saṃbhāṣase,
S01divyav_u:043.011_2: kaste śraddhāsyati iyatpramāṇasya bījasyetat phalamiti? tena hi brāhmaṇa tvameva prakṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:043.014_0: kiṃ manyase brāhmaṇa asti kaścittvayā āścaryādbhuto dharmo dṛṣṭah? tiṣṭhantu tāvat bho gautama anye āścaryādbhutā dharmāḥ/
S01divyav_u:043.015_0: yo mayā asyāmeva nyagrodhikāyāmāścaryādbhuto dharmo dṛṣṭaḥ, sa tāvacchrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:043.016_0: asyāṃ bho gautama nyagrodhikāyāṃ pūrveṇa nyagrodho vṛkṣo yasya nāṃneyaṃ nyagrodhikā,
S01divyav_u:043.016_1: tasyādhastāt pañca śakaṭaśatāni asaṃsaktāni tiṣṭhanti anyonyāsambādhamānāni/
S01divyav_u:043.018_0: kiyatpramāṇaṃ tasya nyagrodhasya phalam? kiyat tāvat? kedāramātram/
S01divyav_u:043.020_1: kaste śraddhāsyati iyatpramāṇasya bījasyāyaṃ mahāvṛkṣo nirvṛtta iti? śraddadhātu me bhavān gautamo mā vā/
S01divyav_u:043.022_0: tāvadbho gautama nirupahataṃ snigdhamadhuramṛttikāpradeśaṃ bījaṃ ca navasāraṃ sukhāropitam/
S01divyav_u:043.023_0: kālena ca kālaṃ devo vṛṣyate, tenāyaṃ mahānyagrodhavṛkṣo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:043.025_0: yathā kṣetre ca bījena pratyakṣastvamiha dvija/
S01divyav_u:043.027_0: yathā tvayā brāhmaṇa dṛṣametadalpaṃ ca bījaṃ sumahāṃśca vṛkṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:043.029_0: evaṃ mayā brāhmaṇa dṛṣṭametat alpaṃ ca bījaṃ mahatī ca saṃpat//8// iti//
S01divyav_u:043.031_0: tato bhagavatā mukhāt jihvāṃ nir namayya sarvaṃ mukhamaṇḍalamācchāditam yāvat keśaparyantamupādāya,
S01divyav_u:043.031_1: sa ca brāhmaṇo 'bhihitah--kiṃ manyase brāhmaṇa yasya mukhāt jihvāṃ niścārya sarvam [44]mukhamaṇḍalamācchādayati,
S01divyav_u:043.031_2: api tvasau cakravartirājyaśatasahasrahetorapi saṃprajānan mṛṣāvadāṃ bhāṣeta? no bho gautama/
S01divyav_u:044.007_1: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:044.007_2: yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam--atikrānto 'haṃ bhadanta atikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:044.010_0: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:044.010_1: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:044.011_0: atha sa brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:045.002_1_0: anyatamo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:045.002_1_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva parvataṃ samantato bhadrakaṃ
S01divyav_u:045.006_0: devātidevo naradamyasārathis tīrṇo 'si pāraṃ bhavasāgarasya//1// iti//
S01divyav_u:045.009_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:045.021_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:045.027_0: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//5// iti//
S01divyav_u:045.029_1: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:045.030_0: dṛṣṭaste ānanda brāhmaṇo yena tathāgato gāthayā abhiṣṭutah?[46] dṛṣṭo bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:046.001_0: asau anena kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpaṃ vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:046.002_0: kiṃ tu devāṃśca manuṣyāṃśca gatvā saṃsṛtya paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe stavārho nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:046.003_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya
S01divyav_u:046.003_0_1: bhadanta anena brāhmaṇena bhagavānekayā gāthayā stuto bhagavatā ca pratyekāyāṃ bodhau
S01divyav_u:046.006_0: tacchṛṇu{ta}, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru{ta}, bhāṣiṣye//
S01divyav_u:046.008_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:046.010_1: gaccha, asya rājñaḥ kaccidanukūlaṃ bhāṣitaṃ kṛtvā kadācit kiṃcit śītatrāṇaṃ saṃpadyata iti/
S01divyav_u:046.012_1: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvadrājānaṃ stunomi āhosvid hastināgamiti/
S01divyav_u:046.017_0: lakṣe praśasto 'si mahāgajendra varṇapramāṇena surūparūpa//6// iti//
S01divyav_u:046.020_0: yo me gajendro dayito manāpaḥ prītiprado dṛṣṭiharo narāṇām/
S01divyav_u:046.022_0: taṃ bhāṣase varṇapadāni tasya dadāmi te grāmavarāṇi pañca//7// iti//
S01divyav_u:046.024_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau hastināgaḥ, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:046.025_0: tadāpyahamanenaikayā gāthayā stutaḥ, mayā cāyaṃ pañcagrāmavareṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:046.025_1: etarhi anenaikagāthayā stutaḥ, mayāpi cāyaṃ pratyekabodhau vyākṛta iti//
S01divyav_u:047.002_2: sa ca rūpayauvanaśrutamanuprāpto na mamāsti kaścit tulya ityatīva vikatthate/
S01divyav_u:047.003_0: bhagavāṃścānyatamasmin pradeśe purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:047.004_0: aśrauṣīdindro nāma brāhmaṇah--śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrughnāmanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:047.005_0: tasyaitadabhavat--śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrūyate 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika iti/
S01divyav_u:047.007_0_0: sa nirgato yāvat paśyati bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā
S01divyav_u:047.009_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ cāpi śramaṇo gautamo mamāntikādabhirūpataraḥ, noccatara iti/
S01divyav_u:047.013_0: api tu na tvayā śrutaṃ sasurāsurajagadanavalokitamūrdhāno buddhā bhagavanta iti? api tu yadīpsasi tathāgatasya śarīrapramāṇaṃ draṣṭum,
S01divyav_u:047.015_1: indro brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadasyāścaryaṃ na kadācinmayā śrutam, gacchāmi paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:047.019_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:047.020_0: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:047.020_1: yathaindreṇa brāhmaṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:047.023_0: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:047.023_1: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:047.024_0: abhiprasanno 'thendro brāhmaṇa utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt,
S01divyav_u:047.027_0: tatastena viviktāvakāśe mahatā satkāreṇāsau yaṣṭirucchrāpitā, mahaśca prajñapitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:047.028_0: anyairapi brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kuśalamadhiṣṭhānāya bhavatviti viditvā kulā baddhā(?)/
S01divyav_u:047.029_0: indreṇa brāhmaṇena yaṣṭyā mahaḥ prajñapita iti indramaha indramaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:047.032_0_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaih [48]samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā
S01divyav_u:048.002_0: dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamamupetyābhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:048.003_1: tat ko 'sau upāyaḥ syāt yena me karmaparihāṇir na syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti/
S01divyav_u:048.006_0: tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenaivābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantamiti/
S01divyav_u:048.007_3: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:048.010_0: tatkasya hetoh? asminnānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopito 'sthisaṃghātastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:048.011_0: athāyuṣmānānando laghuladhveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:048.012_0: evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:048.014_2: etasya sugata samayaḥ, yaṃ bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet/
S01divyav_u:048.017_2: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:048.017_3: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:048.019_0: nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikacittamutpāditamiti? paśyanti--kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:048.021_1: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--udgṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:048.023_0: rājñā prasenajitā śrutaṃ bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātaṃ samucchritamiti/
S01divyav_u:048.024_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sahāntaḥpureṇa kumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:048.025_0_0: evaṃ virūḍhakaḥ, anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ, ṛṣidattaḥ purāṇasthapitaḥ, viśākhā mṛgāramātā,
S01divyav_u:048.025_0_1: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ
S01divyav_u:048.027_1: taiḥ śrutam--anatarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāturavikopita iti/
S01divyav_u:048.029_0: śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:048.030_0: evaṃ ca cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:048.031_0: atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:049.003_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//1//
S01divyav_u:049.005_0: anyatamena upāsakena tasmin pradeśe mṛttikāpiṇḍo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:049.005_1: evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya tāvadiyat puṇyamākhyātaṃ bhagavatā anyatra/
S01divyav_u:049.006_0: mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃstasyāpi cetasā cittamājñāya bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:049.008_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:049.012_2: evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyat puṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:049.012_3: asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:049.016_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:049.020_0: aparaistatra mālāvihāraḥ kṛtaḥ, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--muktapuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:049.021_0: asmākaṃ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:049.023_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:049.025_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//4//
S01divyav_u:049.027_0: aparaistatra pradīpamālā dattā, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--mālāvihārasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:049.028_0: asmākaṃ pradīpadānasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:050.003_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//5//
S01divyav_u:050.005_1: evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--pradīpasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:050.006_0: asmākaṃ gandhābhiṣekasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:050.008_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:050.010_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6//
S01divyav_u:050.012_1: evaṃ ca ... cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:050.019_0: tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:050.021_2: kaiścinmūrdhāgatāni, kaiścinmūrdhānaḥ, kaiściduṣṇagatānyāsāditāni, kaiścit satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayaḥ,
S01divyav_u:050.025_0: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt, atra mahaṃ prajñāyeyam/
S01divyav_u:051.002_0: atha bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:051.003_0: aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih--bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:051.005_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:051.006_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:051.007_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:051.008_0_0: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:051.008_0_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhuktena sārdhaṃ
S01divyav_u:051.011_0_1: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaniveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:051.013_0: upasaṃkramya dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--na tāvadbhoḥ puruṣa tīrthyānāṃ praveśo dātavyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:051.016_0_0: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:051.016_0_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo
S01divyav_u:051.016_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:051.018_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:051.020_1: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:051.022_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:051.022_0_1: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:051.029_0: ato dauvārikena uktah--ārya tiṣṭha, mā pravekṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:051.030_0: kasyārthāya? anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ājñā dattā--mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi,
S01divyav_u:051.031_1: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:051.031_2: yanmāṃ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya[52] iti na jānante/
S01divyav_u:052.001_0: gacchāmi, kṛpaṇajanasyānugrahaṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:052.001_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--adya mayā kasyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:052.002_0: yāvadanyatamā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhidrutā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati/
S01divyav_u:052.004_0: tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaścittaprāsādikaḥ śāntena īryāpathena/
S01divyav_u:052.005_0: sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā, yena me iyamevamrūpā samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:052.005_1: yadi āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikādanukampāmupādāya ācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, ahamasmai dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:052.007_0: tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam,
S01divyav_u:052.009_3: saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā na cchoritaḥ, api tu na paribhokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:052.010_0: athāyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva pratyakṣamanyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam/
S01divyav_u:052.012_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpi āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā paribhuktam,
S01divyav_u:052.014_0: tasyā atīva audbilyamutpannam--mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīta iti/
S01divyav_u:052.015_0: tata āyuṣmatī mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ gatā tuṣite devanikāye upapannā/
S01divyav_u:052.016_0: sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī cittamabhiprasādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā/
S01divyav_u:052.018_1: tiryak ca pretaṃ ca manuṣyāṃścāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāvanna paśyati/
S01divyav_u:052.019_0: tathā hyadhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate no tūpariṣṭāt/
S01divyav_u:052.027_0: atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--ime ca tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyāpuṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati,
S01divyav_u:052.028_0: ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśanena puṇyānāṃ svapuṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ kasmāt dānāni na dadāmi,
S01divyav_u:052.028_1: puṇyāni vā na karomi? ayamāryo mahākāśyapo dīnānāthakṛpaṇavanīpakānukampī/
S01divyav_u:052.031_0: avacīravicīrakaṃ kākābhilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinimārya udūḍhaśiraskaḥ saṇaśāṭikānivāsitaḥ sphaṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vāyitumārabdhah[53]/
S01divyav_u:053.001_0: śacī api devakanyā kuvindanaryā veśadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ kartumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:053.001_1: pārśve cāsyā divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:053.003_0: duḥkhitako 'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāditam/
S01divyav_u:053.007_0: suviruddhamiti kṛtvā jāto me hṛdi saṃśayaḥ//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:053.008_0: dharmatā hyeṣā--asamanvāhṛtya arhatāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
S01divyav_u:053.009_2: yasya te bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla ārūḍho yathāpi tattathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena/
S01divyav_u:053.011_0: ārya mahākāśyapa kiṃ duḥkhitajanasyāntarāyaṃ karomi? ime tāvat manuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:053.012_0: ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī eva puṇyānāṃ kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi? nanu coktaṃ bhagavatā--
S01divyav_u:053.016_0: tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:053.017_0: atha śakro devendra ākāśasthaścāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya piṇḍapātaṃ carato divyayā sudhayā pātraṃ pūrayati/
S01divyav_u:053.021_0: sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ,
S01divyav_u:053.021_1: sā ca tuṣite devanikāye upapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:053.022_0: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena śrutam--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:053.024_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:053.025_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
S01divyav_u:053.025_1: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:053.027_0_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:053.030_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:053.031_0_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastāmeva rātriṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:053.031_0_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni [54]prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo
S01divyav_u:053.031_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:054.002_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:054.004_1: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:054.006_0: anyatamaśca kroḍamallako vṛddhānte cittamabhiprasādayaṃstiṣṭhati--ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadarśīm eva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhāpito 'tṛpta eva puṇyairdānāni dadāti,
S01divyav_u:054.008_0_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā
S01divyav_u:054.008_0_1: praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:054.008_0_2: viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt niṣaṇṇo
S01divyav_u:054.011_2: āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti? rājā saṃlakṣayati--māṃ bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte/
S01divyav_u:054.013_0: ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatu iti/
S01divyav_u:054.014_0: tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:054.015_1: tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:054.017_1: te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti? rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:054.017_3: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:054.017_4: kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmāmādiśatīti? tatraiko vṛddho 'mātyaḥ kathayati--alpotsuko bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:054.020_0: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
S01divyav_u:054.021_0: taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati upārdhaṃ bhūmau iti/
S01divyav_u:054.023_0: amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
S01divyav_u:054.024_0: upārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati, upārdhaṃ bhūmau/
S01divyav_u:054.025_0: tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
S01divyav_u:054.027_0: kimarthaṃ na dīyate? kimanenāparibhogaṃ choritena iti/
S01divyav_u:054.027_1: tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayitum yathā pūrvam/
S01divyav_u:054.028_0: tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:054.030_0: tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā--
S01divyav_u:054.032_0: paśyasi(?) phalaṃ hi rūṣkikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāyāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:055.001_0: [55]athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:055.003_0: bhagavānāha--icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ,
S01divyav_u:055.005_0: ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet,
S01divyav_u:055.008_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:055.008_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:055.013_1: tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣatu,
S01divyav_u:055.015_1: sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:055.016_0: tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:055.017_0: gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
S01divyav_u:055.018_0: sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
S01divyav_u:055.018_1: sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:055.018_2: tāvat preṣyamanuṣyāya dadāmi? adya tāvat tiṣṭhatu,
S01divyav_u:055.020_0: tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:055.022_2: sa kathayati--amba, asti kiṃcinmṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭam? sā kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:055.026_0: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:055.028_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā, yena me īdṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:055.029_0: yadyayaṃ mamāntikādalavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, ahamasmai dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:055.030_0: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:055.032_0: tatastena tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāṣapiṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā//
S01divyav_u:056.001_1: eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:056.002_1: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān,
S01divyav_u:056.002_3: tenaiva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:056.007_0: paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
S01divyav_u:056.008_0: sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/
S01divyav_u:056.010_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:056.010_1: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:056.012_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:056.012_1_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
S01divyav_u:056.015_0: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:056.015_1: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsyaṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:056.017_0: tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/
S01divyav_u:056.018_0: tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:056.019_1: śrutvā ca punaḥ pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:056.020_0: aparaiḥ samākhyātam--rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhapramukho bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:056.020_2: tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātumiti/
S01divyav_u:056.022_0: tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti,
S01divyav_u:056.024_0: yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:056.024_1: tayā khaṇḍamallake tailasya stokam yācayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya bhagavataścaṅkrame dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:056.025_0: pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:056.025_1: evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/
S01divyav_u:056.028_1: śuddhodanaḥ pitā, mātā mahāmāyā, rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:056.031_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/
S01divyav_u:056.032_0: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃlakṣayati--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:057.001_1: tataścīvarakarṇikena, tato vyajanena, tathāpi na śaknoti nirvāpayitum/
S01divyav_u:057.003_0: sa kathayati--bhagavan, mama buddhirutpanā--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:057.006_1: te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastagataścīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:057.007_0: tathā hi--ayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:057.008_0: api tu ānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:057.009_1: ānando bhikṣurupāsakaḥ, śuddhodanaḥ pitā, mahāmāyā mātā, kapilavastu nagaram, rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:058.002_0_0: buddho bhavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme satkṛto gurukṛto
S01divyav_u:058.002_0_1: mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ paurairbrāhmaṇairgṛhapatibhiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ
S01divyav_u:058.005_0: tatra khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavānupagto jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:058.006_0: atha tadaiva pravāraṇāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ saṃbahulāḥ śrtāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:058.007_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānto niṣaṇṇāh
S01divyav_u:058.008_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:058.010_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:058.011_1: śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:058.012_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:058.013_0: saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇija āyuṣmānānando dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:058.015_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:058.016_0_0: atha te vaṇija utthāyāsanebhyah ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmānānandastenānñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:058.016_0_1: praṇamya āyuṣmantamānandamidamavocan -- kiṃcitte āryānanda śrutaṃ varṣoṣito bhagavān
S01divyav_u:058.016_1: yadvayaṃ tadyātrikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīmahe ? dharmatā caiṣā ṣaṇmahānagaranivāsino vaṇijo yasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gantukāmā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:058.020_0: sa kathayati -- buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kiṃ na pṛcchatha ? durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:058.021_1: mamāpi bhavanto durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:058.022_1: yadi bhadantānandasyāpi durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ,
S01divyav_u:058.022_2: kathaṃ bhadantānando jānīte 'mukāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gamiṣyatīti ? nimittena vā bhavantaḥ parikathayā vā/
S01divyav_u:058.024_0: kathaṃ nimittena ? yāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gantukāmastato 'bhimukho niṣīdati, evaṃ nimittena/
S01divyav_u:058.025_0: kathaṃ parikathayā ? teṣāṃ janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate, evaṃ parikathayā/
S01divyav_u:058.026_1: katameṣāṃ ca janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate ? magadhābhimukho bhavanto bhagavān niṣīdati,
S01divyav_u:058.028_0: katame 'ṣṭādaśa ? nāgnibhyaṃ nodakabhyaṃ na siṃhabhyaṃ na vyāghrabhyaṃ na dvīpitarakṣuparacakrabhyaṃ na caurabhayaṃ na gulmatarapaṇyātiyātrābhyaṃ na manuṣyāmanuṣyabhayam/
S01divyav_u:058.030_0: kālena ca kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante,
S01divyav_u:058.030_1: divyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante, udārāś cāvabhāsāḥ prajñnyāyante,
S01divyav_u:059.001_0: [059]atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijah āyuṣmatah ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.003_0: dhartā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvanto dhriyanto yāpayanto mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamānāḥ parānugrahapravṛttāḥ kālena kālamaraṇyacārikāṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:059.003_1: nadīcārikāṃ parvatacārikāṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ janapada cārikāṃ caranti/
S01divyav_u:059.005_0: asmiṃstvarthe buddho bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ cartukāmastadeva pravāraṇāṃ pravārayitvā āyuṣmantamānadāmāmantrayate sma -- gaccha ānanda,
S01divyav_u:059.005_1: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cāriṣyati/
S01divyav_u:059.007_0: yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ janapadacārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakarma karotu/
S01divyav_u:059.008_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati -- bhagavānāyuṣyanta itaḥ saptame divase magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:059.009_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakarma karotu/
S01divyav_u:059.011_0: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ saṃbahulaiśca śrāvastīnivāsibhirvaṇigbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.013_0: atha saṃbahulāśca śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.013_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocan -- adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān yāvacca śrāvastī yāvacca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:059.016_0: adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvastīnivāsināṃ vaṇijāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:059.017_0: atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.019_0: atha saṃprasthite buddhe bhagavati antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:059.021_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti -- gaccatu bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.022_0: ityanuvicintya sarve javena prasṛtā yena sārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.022_1: bhagavatā abhihitah -- kimetadbhavantaḥ samārabdham ? caurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smo bhadanta caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:059.023_0: nāsamākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:059.025_1: api tu sakalasya sārthasya parigaṇayya suvarṇaṃ gṛhṇīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:059.026_1: asmin sārthe ye upāsakā viṇijastaiḥ kṛtsnasya sārthasya mūlyaṃ gaṇayya caurāṇāṃ niveditam iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:059.028_0: tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ sārthaniṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavatā nidhānaṃ darśitam/
S01divyav_u:059.029_0: tatastena caurasahasreṇa sārthamūlyapramāṇaṃ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītam, avaśiṣṭaṃ tatraivāntarhitam/
S01divyav_u:059.031_1: punarapi bhagavān sārthaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃgha puraskṛto rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.001_0: [60]evaṃ dvitricatuṣpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃśca cairasahasrasakāśādāgamanagamanena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:060.002_0: saptaṃ tu cāraṃ bhagavān sārtharahito bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ śāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.003_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ saṃlapanti -- bhagavān gacchatu, bhikṣusaṃghaṃ muṣiṣyāṃḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.004_0: tatkasya hetoh ? eṣo hi bhagavān suvarṇapradaḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.005_1: bhagavatā cābhihitāh -- vatsāḥ, mama ete śrāvakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.006_0: caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva bhagavān -- vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.007_0: nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vaṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:060.008_0: tato bhagavatā caurāṇāṃ mahānidhānaṃ darśitam, evaṃ coktāh -- vatsāḥ, yāvadāptaṃ dhanaṃ gṛhṇītheti/
S01divyav_u:060.009_0: tatastena caurasahasreṇa tasmānmahānidhānādyāvadāptaṃ suvarṇamādattam, avaśiṣṭaṃ tatraivāntarhitam/
S01divyav_u:060.010_0: atha bhagavāṃstaccaurasahasram yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā tato 'nupūrveṇa rājagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:060.011_0: tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ buddhirutpannā -- yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat,
S01divyav_u:060.012_0: yannu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamasmin pradeśe bhojayema iti/
S01divyav_u:060.012_5: kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:060.012_7: ko 'pāyaniṃnaḥ, ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ, ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ, kamahamapāyād vyutthāpya svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:060.029_0: yathā hi mātā priyamekaputrakaṃ hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:060.031_0: tathaiva vaineyajanaṃ tathagato hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya saṃtatim//2//
S01divyav_u:061.003_0: vaineyavatsān bhavaduḥkhanaṣṭān vatsān praṇaṣṭaniva vatsalā gauḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:061.005_0_0: tato bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ vaineyakālamapekṣya rājagṛhādanupūrveṇa bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:061.005_0_2: mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāraḥ pūrvavat yāvanmahākaruṇayā samanvāgatas
S01divyav_u:061.009_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantamidamavodcan -- adhivāsayatu asmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
S01divyav_u:061.011_1: atha caurasahasraṃ bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikān prakrāntam//
S01divyav_u:061.013_0: atha taccaurasahasraṃ tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñnapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya,
S01divyav_u:061.013_2: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyase/
S01divyav_u:061.015_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya caurasahasrasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:061.017_0: atha taccaurasahasraṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya candanodakena pādau prakṣālayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:061.018_0: atha bhagavān prakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñnapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:061.019_0_0: niṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena
S01divyav_u:061.019_0_1: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ
S01divyav_u:061.019_1: atha bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ viditvā dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñnātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:061.019_2: yāṃ śrutvā tena caurasahasreṇa tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñnānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:061.024_0_0: dṛṣṭasatyāśca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na
S01divyav_u:061.024_0_1: rājñnā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair neṣṭair na svajanabandhuvargeṇa
S01divyav_u:061.025_1: pratiṣṭhāpitā devamanuṣyeṣu, paryantīkṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ, ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ,
S01divyav_u:061.027_0: labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:061.028_1: tato bhagavatā brahmeṇa svareṇābhihitāh -- eta vatsāḥ, carata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:061.029_0_0: vācāvasāne bhagavato muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgāḥ samaloṣṭakānñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā
S01divyav_u:061.031_0: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:062.001_0_1: -- paśya bhadanta bhagavatā idaṃ caurasahasraṃ saptavāraṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe
S01divyav_u:062.003_1: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani mayā asyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśādanekabhāṇḍasahasraḥ sārtho niṣkrītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:062.004_0_1: badaradvīpayātrāṃ varṣaśatena sādhayitvā etadeva caurasahasramārabhya kṛtsno jāmbudvīpaḥ
S01divyav_u:062.007_0_0: tacchruṇuta -- bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminneva jambudvīpe vārāṇasyāṃ
S01divyav_u:062.007_0_1: nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati sma ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:062.010_1: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ priyaseno nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:062.012_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:062.013_0: atha anyatama udārapuṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvo 'nyatamasmāt praṇītāddevanikāyāccayutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:062.015_1: kālaṃ jānāti ṛtuṃ jānāti, garbhamavakrāntaṃ jānāti, yasyāḥ sakāśādgarbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti,
S01divyav_u:062.017_0: saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:062.018_0: sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati -- diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva, āpannasattvāsmi saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:062.019_0: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:062.020_0: so 'pyāttamanāttamanā udānamudānayati -- apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:062.022_1: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmuddiśya dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśet -- idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:062.024_0_0: āpannasattvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati -- uṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ
S01divyav_u:062.024_0_1: śīte śītopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñnaptairāhārair nātiśītair nātyuṣṇair nātitiktair nātyamlair
S01divyav_u:062.028_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:062.029_0: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāso dṛḍhakaṭhinaśarīro mahānagnabalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:062.031_0_0: tasya jñnātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatirātriṃdivasāni tasya
S01divyav_u:062.031_0_1: jātasya jāto mahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti -- kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
S01divyav_u:063.001_1: supriyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhya upanyasto dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:063.003_0: so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhurunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiṣcottaptottapairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.006_0: nikṣepe hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ puruṣaparīkṣāyāṃ strīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:063.007_0_1: sarvabhūtarutajñnaḥ sarvagatigatijñnah uddhaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paramatīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ
S01divyav_u:063.009_0: sa yāni tāni rājñnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni,
S01divyav_u:063.009_1_0: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarudhanuḥṣu upayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:063.009_1_1: tomaragrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:063.013_1: dharmatā caiṣā -- na tāvat putrasya nāma nirgacchati yāvat pitā dhriyate/
S01divyav_u:063.018_1: kālagate priyasene sārthavāhe brahmadattena kāśirājñnā supriyo mahāsārthavāhatve 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.019_0: tena sārthavāhabhūtena iyamevamrūpā mahāpratijñnā kṛtā -- sarvattvā mayā dhanena saṃtarpayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.021_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- alpaṃ ca deyaṃ bahavaśca yācakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.022_1: yannvahaṃ sāmudram yānapātraṃ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatareyaṃ dhanahārikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.023_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ samudānīya pañcamātrairvaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.024_0: tato 'nupūrveṇa ratnadvīpaṃ gatvā ratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrāduttīrya sthalajairvahitrairbhāṇḍamāropya vārāṇasyabhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.027_0: supriyeṇa ca sarvāhenāvalokyābhihitāh -- kimetadbhavantaḥ samārabdham? caurāḥ kathayanti -- sārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:063.028_0: sārthavāhaḥ kathayati mamaiṣa bhavantaḥ sārthaḥ saṃniśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.029_0: nārhanti bhavanto muṣitum/ evamuktāścaurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smaḥ sārthavāhacaurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:063.030_0: nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:063.031_0: teṣāṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sārthasya mūlyaṃ bhavanto gaṇyatām/
S01divyav_u:063.032_1: tataste vaṇijaḥ parasparaṃ mūlyaṃ gaṇayitvā caurāṇāṃ nivedayanti[64] -- iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:064.001_0: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena bhāṇḍaniṣkrayārthe svaṃ dravyamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:064.002_1: evaṃ dvistriścatuḥpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃs tasyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśāt supriyeṇa sārthavāhena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:064.003_0: yāvat saptaṃ tu vāraṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāho mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:064.006_0: supriyeṇa ca sārthavāhenāvalokyābhihitāh -- supriyo 'haṃ bhavantaḥ sārthavāhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:064.006_1: caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva mahāsārthavāha vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:064.007_0: nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyaṃ na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:064.008_1: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena pūrvikāṃ pratijñnāmanusmṛtya dṛḍhapratijñnena tasya caurasahasrasya bhāṇḍamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:064.009_0: supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- ime caurā labdhaṃ labdhamarthajātasaṃnicayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:064.010_0: mayā ca mahatī pratijñnā kṛtā sarvasattvā dhanena mayā saṃtarpayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:064.011_0: so 'hamimaṃ caurasahasraṃ na śaknomi dhanena saṃtarpayitum/
S01divyav_u:064.011_1: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvān dhanena saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:064.013_0_1: lokahitārthamabhyudgatasya anyatarā maheśākhyā devatā upasaṃkramya samāśvāsayati
S01divyav_u:064.015_1: asti khalu mahāsārthavāha asminneva jambudvīpe badaradvīpo nāma mahāpattano 'manuṣyāvacarito maheśākhyamanuṣyādhiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:064.016_0: santi tasmin badaradvīpe pradhānāni ratnāni sarvasattvavicitramanorathaparipūrakāṇi/
S01divyav_u:064.017_0: yadi mahāsārthavāho badaradvīpayātrāṃ sādhayet, evamimāṃ mahatīṃ pratijñnāṃ pratinistareta/
S01divyav_u:064.018_0: iyaṃ hi mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi dustarā, prageva manuṣyabhūtasya/
S01divyav_u:064.019_1: na ca śakitā supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena sā devatā praṣṭum -- katarasyāṃ diśi badaradvīipaḥ kathaṃ vā tatra gamyata iti/
S01divyav_u:064.021_0: atha supriyasya sātrthavāhasya suptapratibuddhasya etadabhavat -- aho bata me sā devatā punarapi darśayet,
S01divyav_u:064.021_1: diśaṃ copāyaṃ ca vyapadiśed badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:064.023_0_0: atha sā devatā tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasya dṛḍhodārapratijñnasyodāravīryaparākramanāmanikṣiptotsāhatāṃ
S01divyav_u:064.023_0_1: viditvā upasaṃkramya evamāha -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha khedamāpadyasva/
S01divyav_u:064.025_0: asti khalu mahāsārthavāha paścime digbhāge panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikramya sapta mahāparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:064.026_0_1: śaṅkhanābhī ca nīlodastārakākṣaśca parvatau nīlagrīva eva ca vairambhā tāmrāṭavī
S01divyav_u:064.026_0_2: vemṇugulmaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ kṣāranadī triśaṅkuh ayaskilamaṣṭādaśavakro
S01divyav_u:064.026_0_3: nadīślakṣṇa eva ca dhūmanetramudakaṃ saptaśīviṣaparvatā nadī bhavati paścimā/
S01divyav_u:064.030_0: anulomapratilome mahāsamudre manuṣyānavacarite anulomapratilomā vāyavo vānti/
S01divyav_u:064.031_0: tatra yo 'sau puruṣo bhavati maheśākhyo maheśākhyadevatāparigṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:064.031_1: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya anulomapratilomamahāsamudramavatarati[65]/
S01divyav_u:065.001_0: sa yanmāsena gacchati, tadekena divasena pratyāhriyate/
S01divyav_u:065.003_0: anulomapratilomaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya anulomapratilomo nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.005_0_0: sa vīryabalenātmānaṃ saṃdhārya tasmādeva mahāparvatādamoghāṃ nāmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya
S01divyav_u:065.005_0_1: gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anulomapratilomaṃ nāma mahāparvatamabhiniṣkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:065.007_0: sacedetaṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhate, nāsya saṃmoho bhavati, svastikṣemeṇātikramatyanulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvatam/
S01divyav_u:065.008_0: sacedevaṃ vidhiṃ vā nānutiṣṭhati auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate,
S01divyav_u:065.010_0: anulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvataṃ samatikramya āvarto nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.011_0: tatra vairambhakā vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ bhrāmyate/
S01divyav_u:065.011_2: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena kāyabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya āvartaṃ mahāsamudramavarati/
S01divyav_u:065.015_1: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe panñcame ṣaṣṭhe āvarte saptakṛtvo bhrāmayitvā nirudhyate,
S01divyav_u:065.018_0: tatra śaṅkho nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharo mahābalo mahākāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.019_0: tasyopariṣṭādyojanamātre śaṅkhanābhī nāmauṣadhī divā dhūmāyate rātrau prajvalati/
S01divyav_u:065.020_1: sa khalu nāgo divā svapiti rātrau carati/
S01divyav_u:065.020_2: tatra tena puruṣeṇa divā sukhasuptasya nāgasya ātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhibalena mantrabalena puṇyabalena śaṅkhanābhī auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:065.022_0: gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya āvartaḥ parvato 'dhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.023_0: sacedetāṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhati, svastikṣemeṇātikrāmati āvartaṃ parvatamaviheṭhitaḥ śaṅkhanābhena rākṣasena/
S01divyav_u:065.024_1: auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ śaṅkhanābho rākṣasaḥ panñcatvamāpādayati/
S01divyav_u:065.026_1: nīlode mahāsamudre tārākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raktanetraḥ pradīptaśiroruho vikṛtacaraṇadaśananayanaḥ parvatāyatakukṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.027_0: sacet svapiti, vivṛtānyasya netrāṇi bhavanti, tadyathā acirodito bhāskaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.028_0: audārikāścāsya āśvāsapraśvāsā gurugurukāḥ pravartante yathā meghasya garjato 'śanyāṃ ca sphūrjatyāṃ śabdaḥ/
S01divyav_u:065.030_1_0: tatra tena puruṣeṇa tasmādeva samudrakūlānmahāmakarināmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya gṛhya
S01divyav_u:065.030_1_1: netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya mahānataṃ plavamāsthāya suptaṃ tārākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:066.001_1: auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ tārākṣo dakarākṣasa ojaṃ vā ghaṭṭayati,
S01divyav_u:066.001_2: cittaṃ vā kṣipati, sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati/
S01divyav_u:066.003_0: nīlodaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya nīlodo nāma mahāparvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.003_1: tatra nīlagrīvo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati panñcaśataparivāra ugratejā raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.005_0: apīdānīmanimiṣaṃ paśyato netrāṇi vyābādhayate, mūrcchāṃ ca saṃjanayati/
S01divyav_u:066.007_1: sa khalu nāgo dṛṣṭiviṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣo 'pi sparśaviṣo 'pi daṃṣṭrāviṣo 'pi/
S01divyav_u:066.008_1: yaḥ khalu tena dhūmena mṛgo vā pakṣī vā spṛśyate, sa panñcatvamāpadyate/
S01divyav_u:066.009_0: tatra tena puruṣeṇa śiraḥsnātenopoṣitena maitrāyatā karuṇāyatā avyāpannena cittenātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:066.010_0: netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anena vidhinā jānatānuṣṭhitena nīlodaḥ parvato 'bhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.011_0: timiraṃ na bhaviṣyati, mūrcchā ca na bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:066.012_2: auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ nīlagrīvo rākṣasaḥ panñcatvamāpādayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:066.014_0: nīlodaṃ parvataṃ samatikramya vairambho nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.014_1: vairambhe mahāsamudre vairambhā nāma vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ kṣobhyate,
S01divyav_u:066.016_0: tamutsṛjya uttareṇa vairambhasya mahāsamudrasya mahatī tāmrāṭavī anekayojanāyāmavistārā/
S01divyav_u:066.018_0: tatra tāmrākṣo nāma ajagaraḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paramadurgandhaḥ panñcayojanāyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.019_1: yadā svapiti, tadā asya yojanaṃ sāmantakena lālāsya spharitvā/
S01divyav_u:066.020_0: tiṣṭhati, yadā jāgarti, alpāsya lālā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:066.022_1: tāṃ gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya suptaṃ tāmrākṣamajagaraṃ viditvā auṣadhībalena mantrabalena vā ajagarabhavanasamīpena gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:066.024_0: sacedetāṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhati, svastikṣemābhyāmatikramya aviheṭhitastāmrākṣeṇājagareṇa tataḥ paścānmūlaphalāni bhakṣayatā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:066.026_0: tatra tena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭaiḥ pādau baddhvā tān parvatān vīryabalena laṅghayitvā sapta kṣāranadyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.027_1: tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā abhiruhyātikramitavyā aspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:066.028_1: sapta kṣāranadīḥ samatikramya triśaṅkur nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.029_0: triśaṅkau parvate triśaṅkavo nāma kaṇṭakāstīkṣṇāḥ sutīkṣṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:066.030_0: tatastena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭairvetrapāśaiḥ pādau baddhvā atikaramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:066.031_1: tatra tena puruṣeṇa śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā atikramitavyamaspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:067.001_0: yathā triśaṅkuḥ parvataḥ, evaṃ triśaṅkukā nāma nadī/
S01divyav_u:067.003_1: asya na kiṃcit nistaraṇamanyatra vṛkṣāgrād vṛkṣamadhiruhya gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:067.004_0: aṣṭādaśavakraṃ parvatamatikramya aṣṭādaśavakrikā nāma nādī grāhamakarākulā saṃvṛtā ca/
S01divyav_u:067.007_2: ślakṣṇaṃ parvatamatikramya ślakṣṇā nāma nadī grāhamakarākulā/
S01divyav_u:067.009_1: ślakṣṇāṃ nadīmatikramya dhūmanetro nāma parvato dhūmāyate saṃdhūmāyate/
S01divyav_u:067.010_0: yena khalu tena dhūmena mṛgā vā pakṣiṇo vā spṛśyante, panñcatvamāpadyante/
S01divyav_u:067.012_0: guhāṃ samanviṣya tenātra guhādvāramauṣadhibalena mantrabalena ca moktavyam/
S01divyav_u:067.012_1: sā ca khalu guhā āśīviṣaparipūrṇā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:067.013_0: te khalu āśīviṣā dṛṣṭiviṣā api, sparśaviṣā api/
S01divyav_u:067.015_0: tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ saṃjīvanī nāmauṣadhī jyotīrasaśca maṇirdīpaprabhāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:067.016_0: tāmauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā saśīrṣapādaṃ samālabhya tāṃ cauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā guhā praveṣṭavyā/
S01divyav_u:067.016_1: auṣadhībalena mantrabalena auṣadhīprabhāvāccāśīviṣāḥ kāye na kramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:067.021_0: tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā māṃsapeśyā ātmānamācchādya adhiroḍhavyam/
S01divyav_u:067.022_0: tatastā āśīviṣā māṃsagandhena pārāt pāraṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:067.022_1: saptāśīviṣamatikramya mahān sudhāvadātaḥ parvataḥ, uccaśca pragṛhītaśca/
S01divyav_u:067.023_0: so 'dhiroḍhavyas tatra drakṣyasi mahāntaṃ sauvarṇabhūmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvṛkṣopaśobhitam/
S01divyav_u:067.024_0: rohitakāñ janapadān ṛddhāṃśca kṣemāṃśca subhikṣāṃśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃśca/
S01divyav_u:067.025_0_0: rohitakaṃ ca mahānagaraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ saptayojanavistṛtaṃ saptaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ
S01divyav_u:067.027_0_0: vīṇā vallikā mahatī sughoṣakaiḥ śrotrābhirāmaiśca gītadhvanibhiranuparataprayogaṃ
S01divyav_u:067.030_0_0: yatra maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ prativasati abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto
S01divyav_u:067.030_0_1: medhāvī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
S01divyav_u:068.001_0: sa te badaradvīpamahāpattanasya pravṛttimākhyāsyati, nimittāni, ca darśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:068.002_0: yathoktaṃ ca vidhimanuṣṭhāsyasi, na ca khedamāpatsyase/
S01divyav_u:068.002_1: evaṃ mahāsārthavāha paramaduṣkarakāraka imāṃ sumerumalayamandarasadṛśīṃ dṛḍhāṃ pratijñnāṃ nistariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:068.003_0: iyaṃ ca mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi duṣkarā, prāgeva manuṣyabhūtānām//
S01divyav_u:068.005_1_0: atha supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ suptapratibuddho devatāvacanaṃ śrutvā paramavismayamāpannaścintayati
S01divyav_u:068.007_0: yadi tāvat sādhitā, duṣkarakārikā iyaṃ devatā/
S01divyav_u:068.009_1: athavā yadyapyahaṃ lokahitārthe pratipadyeyam, saphalo me pariśramaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:068.012_2: kasmādahaṃ na sādhayiṣyāmītyanuvicintya supriyo mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhapratijñno dṛḍhavīryaparākramo 'nikṣiptotsāha udārapuṇyavipākamaheśākhyo/
S01divyav_u:068.014_0_1: mahatā vīryabalena ekākī advitīyavyavasāyo yathopadiṣṭāni panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni
S01divyav_u:068.016_0_0: sapta mahāparvatān, sapta mahānadyo vistareṇa sarvāṇi saṃkaṭāni yathoktena vidhinā
S01divyav_u:068.016_0_1: mūlakandaphalāhāro guṇavati phalake baddhvā paripūrṇairdvādaśabhirvarṣai rohitakaṃ
S01divyav_u:068.018_0: udyāne sthitvā anyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate -- kaścidbhoḥ puruṣa asmin rohitake mahānagare magho nāma sārthavāhaḥ prarivasati? sa evamāha -- asti bhoḥ puruṣa/
S01divyav_u:068.020_1: atha supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyaitadabhavat -- mā haiva magho mahāsārthavāho 'dṛṣṭa eva kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:068.021_0: ko me vyapadeśaṃ kariṣyati tasya badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti viditvā tvaritatvaritam yena maghasya sārthavāhasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:068.023_0: sa dvāre nivāryate, na labhate praveśaṃ mahāsārthavāhadarśanāya/
S01divyav_u:068.024_0: dharmatā khalu kuśalā bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu/
S01divyav_u:068.025_0_0: adrakṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāho 'riṣṭādhyāyeṣu viditavṛttāntah -- maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ
S01divyav_u:068.025_0_1: ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā supriyo mahāsārtahvāho 'dhītya vaidyamatāni
S01divyav_u:068.029_0: dākṣyadākṣiṇyacāturyamādhuryopetamupasthānakarmaṇi satputra iva pitaraṃ bhaktyā gauraveṇa śuśrūṣate/
S01divyav_u:068.030_0: tato maghasya sārthavāhasya kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūdyāpanīyataraṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:068.031_1_0: atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ pratilabdhasaṃjñnaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat
S01divyav_u:068.031_1_1: -- kuto bhavāñ jñnānavijñnānasampanno 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto
S01divyav_u:068.031_1_3: sarvabhūtarutajñna iṅgitajñna? kiṃ jātyā bhavān? kiṃgotrah? kena vā kāraṇena amanuṣyāvacaritaṃ
S01divyav_u:068.031_1_4: deśamabhyāgatah? evamūktaḥ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:069.004_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya sārthavāhāya jātikulagotrāgamanaprayojanaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma,
S01divyav_u:069.004_1: paraṃ cainaṃ vijñnāpayati -- sārvāhānubhāvādahaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:069.007_0_0: atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyāśrutapūrvāṃ parahitārthamabhyudyatāṃ
S01divyav_u:069.007_0_1: dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ śrutvā paramavismayajāto 'nimiṣadṛṣṭiḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya supriyaṃ
S01divyav_u:069.009_1: yo nāma bhavāñ jambudvīpādamanuṣyāvacaritaṃ parvatasamudranadyottaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ihāgataḥ,
S01divyav_u:069.011_0: devaṃ tadbhavantaṃ paśyāmi devānyatamaṃ vā manuṣyaveṣadhāriṇam/
S01divyav_u:069.012_1: api tu ahaṃ mahāvyādhinā grasto mumūrṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:069.013_0: api tu ko bhavato 'rthe parahitārthe 'bhyudyatasyātmaparityāgamapi na kuryāt? tena hi vatsa kṣipraṃ maṅgalapotaṃ samudānaya,
S01divyav_u:069.014_0: evaṃ sārthavāheti supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya mahāsārthavāhāya pratiśrutya maṅgalapotaṃ samudānīya saṃvaraṃ cāropya yena magho mahāsārthavāhastenaopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:069.016_0: upasaṃkramya maghaṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat -- deva samudānīto maṅgalapotaḥ,
S01divyav_u:069.016_1: saṃvaraṃ cāropitam, yasyedānīṃ mahāsārthavāhaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:069.017_0_1: sabhṛtyavargeṇa ca rohitakarājñnā ca nivāryamāṇo 'pi guṇavati phalake baddhvā āśu
S01divyav_u:069.020_0: atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasya kathayati -- ahaṃ bāḍhaglāno na śakyāmi sthiyo gantum/
S01divyav_u:069.022_0: api tu asmin mahāsamudre yāvadevaṃvidhāni nimittāni bhavanti udakasya varṇasaṃsthānāni ca mama nivedayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:069.023_0: yathā anekāni yojanaśatāni gatvā adrākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:069.024_0: dṛṣṭvā punarmaghāya sārthavahāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:069.025_0: evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:069.026_0: api tu paśyasi tvaṃ dakṣiṇakena mahatsudhāparvatam yadidaṃ tasyaitadanubhāvena pānīyaṃ ranñjitam/
S01divyav_u:069.029_1: punarapi gacchan paśyati supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ śastravarṇaṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:069.030_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yat khalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- śastravarṇaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:070.003_0: evaṃ lohaparvatāstāmraparvatā rūpyaparvatāḥ suvarṇaparvatāḥ sphaṭikaparvatā vaidūryaparvatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:070.005_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:070.007_0: evemukte magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyam,
S01divyav_u:070.009_1: ye 'pyete dīpā iva dīpyante, ete 'ntargatā auṣadhyo dīpyante/
S01divyav_u:070.012_0: api tu mahāsārthavāha iyantyevāhaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasya daśa nimittāni jāne gamanaṃ prati,
S01divyav_u:070.013_0_0: evamukte supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- kadā badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyānto
S01divyav_u:070.013_0_1: bhaviṣyati? evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- mayāpi supriya badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ
S01divyav_u:070.015_0: api tu mayā śrutaṃ paurāṇānāṃ mahāsārthavāhānāmantikājjīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahallakānām -- ito jalamapahāya paścimāṃ diśaṃ sthalena gamyate/
S01divyav_u:070.017_1: tataḥ supriyāya mahāsārthavāhāya kathayati -- maraṇāntikā me vedanāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:070.018_0: etattvaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ baddhvā maccharīre śarīrapūjāṃ kuruṣva/
S01divyav_u:070.019_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ badhnāti/
S01divyav_u:070.021_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kālagataṃ viditvā sthale utthāpya śarīre śarīrapūjaṃ kṛtvā cintayati -- maṅgalapotamāruhya yāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:070.022_0: sa ca poto vāyunā vetrapāśaṃ chittvā apahṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:070.023_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścatūratnamayasya parvatasya dakṣiṇena pārśvenāṭavyāṃ sthalena saṃprasthito mūlaphalāni bhakṣayamāṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:070.025_1: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho madhunā pādau pralipyābhirūḍhaśca,
S01divyav_u:070.025_2: avatīrṇaśca, anekāni yojanāni gatvā mūlaphalāhāro gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:070.027_0: sa tatra paśyati mahāntaṃ parvatamuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:070.027_1: niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣamāṇo na labhate, na cāsya kaścinniḥsaraṇavyapadeṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:070.028_1: tatra ca parvate nīlādo nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:070.029_0: sa saṃlakṣayati -- ayaṃ bodhisattvo lokahitārthamudyataḥ parikliśyate,
S01divyav_u:070.030_0: idamanucintya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- ito mahāsārthavāha pūrveṇa yojanaṃ gatvā trīṇi parvataśṛṅgāṇyanupūrvaniṃnānyanupūrvapravaṇānyanupūrvaprāgbhārāṇi/
S01divyav_u:070.032_1: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ suptaprabuddho vetraśiṭām [71]baddhvā tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇyatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.001_0: bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsāthavāhaḥ sphaṭikaparvataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ nirālambamagamyaṃ manuṣyamātrasya/
S01divyav_u:071.002_0: na cāsyopāyaṃ paśyati taṃ parvatamabhirohaṇāyeti viditvā cintāparo 'horātramavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.003_0: tasmiṃśca parvate candraprabho nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:071.004_0: sa cintāparaṃ sārthavāhaṃ viditvā lokahitārthamabhyudyataṃ mahāyānasamprasthitaṃ prasannacittaṃ copetyāśvāsayati -- na khalu mahāsārthavahena viṣādaḥ karaṇīya iti/
S01divyav_u:071.007_1: tayā gṛhītayā nāsya kāye śastraṃ kramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:071.010_1: tatra te na śocitavyaṃ na kranditavyaṃ na paridevitavyam/
S01divyav_u:071.011_0: atha candraprabho yakṣaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ samanuśāsya tatraivāntarhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.012_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścandraprabheṇa mahāyakṣeṇa samāśvāsya ādeśitamārgo yathoktena vidhinā sphaṭikaparvatamatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.014_0: bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sauvarṇaṃ mahānagaramārāmasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:071.016_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarudyānaṃ gatvā cintayati -- yadyapyahaṃ nagaramadrākṣam, tadapi śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:071.017_0: kadā badaradvīpasya mahāpattanasyāgamanāyādhvā bhaviṣyatīti viditvā śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.017_1: atha sā pūrvadevatā supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ durmanasaṃ viditvā rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaya uṣasaṃkramya samāśvāsya utkarṣayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:071.021_1: indriyāṇi ca gopayitavyāni cakṣurādīni, kāyagatā smṛtirbhāvayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:071.022_1_0: tataścatasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prasādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ
S01divyav_u:071.025_0: tāstvāmatyarthamupalālayanti, evaṃ ca vakṣyanti -- etu mahāsārthavāhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.025_2: apatikānāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇamaparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:071.027_0: imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni,
S01divyav_u:071.030_0: tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:071.031_0: tatra te tāsu mātṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā, bhaginīsaṃjñnā duhitṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:071.032_0: daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā vigarhitavyāḥ, daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃvarṇayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:072.002_2: tatastvayā nipuṇaṃ praṣṭavyāh -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:072.005_1: yāvaccaturthakinnaranagaraprāptasya te dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti tāsāṃ pūrvikānāmantikādabhirūpatarāśca darśanīyatarāśca prāsādikatarāścāpsarasah -- pratispardhinyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:072.009_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pramuditamanāḥ sukhapratibuddhaḥ kālyamevo 'tthāya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:072.010_1_0: tataḥ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre catasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgatā abhirūpā
S01divyav_u:072.013_3: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:072.015_0: imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni ca/
S01divyav_u:072.016_0: jāmbudvīpakāni ratnāni, tadyathāmaṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāh etāni ca/
S01divyav_u:072.018_0: tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:072.018_1: atha supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sūpasthitasmṛtiṃ tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaraṃ praveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:072.020_0: niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:072.022_0: tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:072.023_0: na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:072.024_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:072.025_0_0: tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu sārthavāha jānīyāh -- tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta
S01divyav_u:072.025_0_1: upoṣadhoṣita idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya yojanasahasraṃ sāmantakena yo yenārthī
S01divyav_u:072.025_0_2: bhavati hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā annena vā vastreṇa vā pānena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa
S01divyav_u:072.025_0_3: vā dvipādena vā catuṣpādena vā yānena vā vāhanena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā,
S01divyav_u:072.030_1_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:072.030_1_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya sauvarṇāt kinnaranagarāt
S01divyav_u:072.032_0: adrākṣīt supriyo [73]mahāsārthavāho rūpyamayaṃ kinnaranagaramārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:073.001_0: tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre'ṣṭau kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:073.004_0_0: tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kthayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:073.004_0_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya rūpyamayāt kinnaranagarāt
S01divyav_u:073.007_0: tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre ṣoḍaśa kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:073.008_0: tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāstata eva viśiṣṭataraṃ saubhāsinikaṃ trisāhasrayojanikaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:073.009_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko'nubhāva iti? kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:073.011_0: supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya tṛtīyāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:073.015_1: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trirākoṭite dvāre dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:073.018_2: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ traṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:073.020_0: imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni/
S01divyav_u:073.021_1: tadyathā -- maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:073.023_2: tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sūpasthitasmṛtistāḥ kinnarakanyā vividhairdharmapadavyanñjanaiḥ paritoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:073.025_0: tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya catūratnamayaṃ kinnaranagaramanupraveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:073.026_0: niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:073.028_0: tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:073.029_0: na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:073.030_0: tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāḥ saubhāsinikaṃ jāmbudvīpapradhānamanarghyeyamūlyamanantaguṇaprabhāvaṃ badaradvīpamāpattane sarvasvabhūtaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:073.031_0: evaṃ ca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ mahāsārthavāha maṇiratnaṃ badareṇa bhrātrā kinnararājñnā anupradattam,
S01divyav_u:074.001_0_0: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- asya ratnasya ko 'nubhāva iti? tāḥ kathayanti
S01divyav_u:074.001_0_1: -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito dhvajāgre
S01divyav_u:074.001_0_2: baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ karaṇīyam -- śṛṇvantu bhavanto
S01divyav_u:074.001_1_0: yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena
S01divyav_u:074.001_1_1: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena
S01divyav_u:074.001_1_2: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu,
S01divyav_u:074.008_0: ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:074.008_1: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato vā,
S01divyav_u:074.008_2: ītayopadravo vā, upasargo vā, anāvṛṣṭirvā durbhikṣabhayāni vā,
S01divyav_u:074.008_3: asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:074.012_0: iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:074.015_1: api tu yena tvaṃ pathenāgataḥ, amanuṣyāstāvat, pralayaṃ gaccheyuḥ prāgeva manuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:074.016_0: anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
S01divyav_u:074.017_0: tacchṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
S01divyav_u:074.018_0: tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:074.019_0: sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
S01divyav_u:074.020_0: tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:074.022_0: sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:074.023_2: tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ caturaṅgulaparyavanaddham/
S01divyav_u:074.025_0: yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati -- kaḥ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:074.025_1: kaḥ pāragāmī, kaṃ pāraṃ nayāmi, svastikṣemābhyāṃ jambudvīpamanuprāpayāmi,
