S01divyav_u:074.025_2: sa tvayopasaṃkramya idaṃ syādvacanīyam -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:074.025_3: māṃ pāraṃ naya, māṃ svastikṣemābhyāṃ vārāṇasīmanuprāpaya/
S01divyav_u:074.028_0_0: atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:074.028_0_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa yathoktena
S01divyav_u:074.030_1: kaḥ pāragāmī, kaṃ pāraṃ nayāmi, svastikṣemābhyāṃ jambudvīpamanuprāpayāmi? tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāno yena bālāho 'śvarājastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:075.001_0: [74]upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:075.003_1: evamukte bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:075.005_1: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:075.007_0: avatīrya supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhāśvarājapṛṣṭhādbālāhāśvarājaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:075.008_0: tato bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsa -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:075.012_1: athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:075.013_0: aśrauṣurvārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā brahmadattaśca kāśirājah -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ svagṛhamanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:075.016_0: aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
S01divyav_u:075.017_0: srutvā ca punarupasaṃkramya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocan -- parikṣīṇadhanāḥ sma iti/
S01divyav_u:075.018_0: evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati -- gacchatu bhavantaḥ svakasvakeṣu vijiteṣu/
S01divyav_u:075.019_0: yo yenārthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa bhavati, sa tasyārthe cittamutpādayatu, vācaṃ ca niścārayatu/
S01divyav_u:075.020_1: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya vācaṃ ca niścārayati,
S01divyav_u:075.020_3: sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:075.024_0: taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:075.025_0: atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho rājābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:075.026_0_0: mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya pūrvavidhinā
S01divyav_u:075.028_0: tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni saṃpannāni/
S01divyav_u:075.030_0_0: tato 'nupūrveṇa jambudvīpaiśvaryabhūtena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ
S01divyav_u:075.030_0_1: śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:076.001_0: samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:076.003_0: upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:076.004_0_0: tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ caritvā
S01divyav_u:076.004_0_1: caturo brahmān vihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihārī brahmalokasabhāgatāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:076.007_0: bhagavanāha -- kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau supriyo nāma mahāsārthavāhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:076.007_1: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartitavān/
S01divyav_u:076.009_0: yā sā pūrvadevatā, kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho bodhisattvabhūtaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.010_0: yaścāsau magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva śāriputro bhukṣuḥ sa tena kā
S01divyav_u:076.011_0: yaścāsau nīlādo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, eṣa evānando bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.012_0: yaścāsau candraprabho yakṣaḥ, eṣa evāniruddho bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.012_1: yaścāsau lohitākṣo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.013_0: yaścāsau agnimukho nāma nāgaḥ, eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.014_0: yaścāsau bālāho 'śvarājaḥ, maitreyo boddhisattvastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:076.015_0: tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:076.017_0_1: kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:076.019_0: idānīmapi mayā anekairduṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttaraṃ jñnānamadhigamya maitrāyatā karuṇayā saptakṛtvaścaurasahasrasakāśāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:076.020_0: aparituṣṭaṃ ca caurasahasraṃ viditvā yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:077.002_1: tena khalu samayena bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ janā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti--meṇḍhako gṛhapatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī/
S01divyav_u:077.004_0: kathaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatirjñāto mahāpuṇyah? sa yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi paśyati,
S01divyav_u:077.005_1: kathaṃ meṇḍhakapatnī? sā ekasyārthāya sthālikāṃ sādhayati, śatāni sahasrāṇi ca bhuñjate/
S01divyav_u:077.006_1: kathaṃ meṇḍhakaputrah? tasya pañcaśatiko nakulako kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:077.007_0: sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā parityajati, tadā pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhati, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:077.008_1: kathaṃ meṇḍhakasnuṣā? sā ekasyārthāya gandhaṃ saṃpādayati, śatasahasrasya paryāptirbhavati/
S01divyav_u:077.010_0: kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsah? sa yadaikaṃ halasīraṃ kṛṣati, tadā sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:077.010_2: kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsī mahāpuṇyā? sā yadaikaṃ vastu rakṣati, tatsaptaguṇaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:077.011_0: yadā ekamātraṃ pratijāgarti, tadā sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyante/
S01divyav_u:077.013_0_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ
S01divyav_u:077.013_0_4: trī rātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ
S01divyav_u:077.013_2: ko vardhate, kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:077.013_3: ko 'pāyaniṃnaḥ, ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ, ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ, kamahamapāyamārgādvyutthāpya svargaphale mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S01divyav_u:077.031_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro bhadraṃkare nagare prativasati/
S01divyav_u:078.001_1: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:078.002_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:078.003_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmanto bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:078.005_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:078.006_0: evamāyuṣmanniti te bhiṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:078.008_0_0: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta
S01divyav_u:078.008_1: vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛtaḥ, siṃha iva daṃṣṭragaṇaparivāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:078.008_6: śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:078.008_13: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:078.008_18_0: stimita iva jalanidhiḥ, sajala iva jalanidhiḥ, vimada iva gajapatiḥ, sudāntairindriyairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro
S01divyav_u:078.019_0: evamanekaguṇagaṇasamanvāgato buddho bhagavāñ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:078.020_2: toṣitāni sajjanahṛdayāni, tadā bhagnaprabhāvāstīrthyāḥ pratyantān saṃśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:078.023_1: śrutvā ca punarvyathitāste parasparaṃ kathayanti--pūrvaṃ tāvadvayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena madhyadeśānnirvāsitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:078.026_1: kasyārthāya? dṛṣṭā asmābhiryuṣmākaṃ saṃpattiḥ, yāvadvipattiṃ na paśyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:078.028_0: bhavantaḥ, śramaṇo gautamaḥ kṣurāśaniṃ pātayannanekā aputrikā apatikāśca kurvannāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:078.029_0: āryāḥ, yadyevam, yasminneva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminneva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgas triyate/
S01divyav_u:078.030_1: te kathayanti--kiṃ vayaṃ na tiṣṭhāmah? na yūyamasmākaṃ śroṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:078.031_0: te kathayanti--bhadraṃkarasāmantakena sarvajanakāyamudvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsayata/
S01divyav_u:079.001_2: tatastairbhadraṃkaranagarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:079.003_0: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ bhagavato 'satkāramadhyupekṣeyam/
S01divyav_u:079.004_0: yena nāma bhagavatā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanekair duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttarajñānamadhigatam,
S01divyav_u:079.004_1: sa nāma bhagavān sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikaṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:079.009_1: cāturmahārājikā devā uktāh--yūyaṃ bhadraṃkarāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ vāsayateti/
S01divyav_u:079.013_0: tīrthyair nagarajanakāyasametairavacarakāḥ preṣitāh--gatvā paśyata kīdṛśā janapadā iti/
S01divyav_u:079.014_0: te gatāḥ paśyantyatiśayena janapadān ṛddhān sphītān/
S01divyav_u:079.014_2: na kadācidasmābhirevamrūpā janapadā ṛddhāḥ sphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti/
S01divyav_u:079.015_2: sa yuṣmānnānvāvartayiṣyatīti? kuta etat? sarvathā avalokitā bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:079.017_0: te kathayanti--āryāḥ, tiṣṭhata, kim yuṣmākaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ karoti? so 'pi pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:079.019_0: kimasau yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣāṃ cariṣyatīti? tīrthyāḥ kathayanti--samayena tiṣṭhāmo yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:079.020_0: ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
S01divyav_u:079.023_0: ten khalu samayena kapilavastuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare nagare pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:079.024_1: sā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulādrājyamapahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:079.026_0: tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam/
S01divyav_u:079.027_0: tato hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā pradīpamādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:079.027_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau śirasā vanditvā niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:079.028_0: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī catruāryasatyasamprativedhikī pūrvavadyāvaccharaṇagatāmabhiprasannāmiti/
S01divyav_u:079.030_0: atha bhagavāṃstāṃ dārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ dārike yena meṇḍhako gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrama,
S01divyav_u:079.030_2: evaṃ ca vada--gṛhapate, tvāmuddiśyāhamihāgataḥ, tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhvā sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:079.032_0: yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvam [80]pratipanna iti? yadi kathayati--gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛta iti,
S01divyav_u:079.032_1: vaktavyah--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:080.002_0: sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:080.003_0: na śaknoṣi ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ dattvā āgantumiti? evaṃ bhadanteti sā dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:080.004_0: yathāparijñātaiva kenacideva meṇḍakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:080.006_0: gṛhapate, bhagavānevamāha--tvāmevāhamuddiśyāgataḥ, tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.007_0: yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti? sa kathayati--dārike,
S01divyav_u:080.007_1: gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:080.008_0: ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
S01divyav_u:080.009_0: gṛhapate, bhagavān kathayati--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:080.010_0: sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:080.011_0: na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ datvā āgantumiti? sa saṃlakṣayati--na kaścidetajjānīte/
S01divyav_u:080.012_1: sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇān dvāre sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇadārikopadiṣṭena sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.013_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:080.014_0: tato bhagavatā meṇḍhakasya gṛhapaterāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:080.014_1: yāṃ śrutvā meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā yāvacchrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:080.016_1: kimeṣo 'pi bhadraṃkaranagaranivāsī janakāya evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhīte? bhagavānāha--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:080.016_2: tvāmāgamya bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyo lābhīte/
S01divyav_u:080.018_0: tato meṇḍhako gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.019_0: svagṛhaṃ gatvā nagaramadhye kārṣāpaṇānāṃ rāśiṃ vyavasthāpya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:080.021_0: yo draṣṭumicchati jinaṃ jitarāgadoṣaṃ nirbandhamapratisamaṃ karuṇāvadātam/
S01divyav_u:080.023_0: so 'niścareṇa hṛdayena suniścitena kṣipraṃ prayātu dhanamasya mayā pradeyam//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:080.025_0: janakāyaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, śreyaḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya darśanam? sa kathayati--śreyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.026_0: te kathayanti--yadyevam, gaṇenaivaṃ kriyākāraḥ kṛto gaṇa eva udghāṭayatu/
S01divyav_u:080.027_0: tataḥ parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭanena na śaknuvanti nirgantumiti vajrapāṇinā yakṣeṇa vineyajanānukampayā vajraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.029_1: kānicit kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:080.030_0: te gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purato niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:080.031_1: atha baghavāṃstāṃ parṣadamabhyavagāhya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣadyānekasattvasaṃtānakuśalamūlasamāropikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
S01divyav_u:081.003_1: sa kathayati--bhagavan, kimakāle kalpate? bhagavānāha--dhṛtaguḍaśarkarāpānakāni ceti/
S01divyav_u:081.004_0: tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā śilpina āhūya uktāh--bhagavato 'kālakhādyakāni śīghraṃ sajjīkuruteti/
S01divyav_u:081.006_1: tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'kālakhādyakairakālapānakaiśca saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:081.007_0: tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ karvaṭanivāsinaṃ janakāyam yathābhavyatayā vinīya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:082.002_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:082.002_0_1: bhadanta meṇḍhakena meṇḍhakapatnyā meṇḍhakaputreṇa meṇḍhakasnuṣayā meṇḍhakadāsena
S01divyav_u:082.002_0_2: meṇḍhakadāsyā karma kṛtam yena ṣaḍabhijñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:082.002_2: bhagavāṃścaibhirārāgito na virāgita iti? bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:082.007_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:082.007_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:082.011_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//1//
S01divyav_u:082.012_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
S01divyav_u:082.012_0_1: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskarogāpagataṃ
S01divyav_u:082.015_0: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā/
S01divyav_u:082.016_0: trividhaṃ durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati--cañcu śvetāsthi śalākāvṛtti ca/
S01divyav_u:082.016_1: tatra cañcu ucyate--samudgake tasmin manuṣyā bījāni prakṣipya anāgate sattvāpekṣayā sathāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:082.017_0: mṛtā nāma anena te bījakāyaṃ kariṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:082.018_1: śvetāsthi nāma durbhikṣam--tasmin kāle manuṣyā asthīnyupasaṃhṛtya tāvat kvāthayanti,
S01divyav_u:082.020_1: śalākāvṛttir nāma--tasmin kāle manuṣyāḥ khalu bilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayā ākṛṣya bahudakasthālyāṃ kvāthayitvā pibanti/
S01divyav_u:082.022_0: tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ/
S01divyav_u:082.023_0: naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛtti durbhikṣaṃ cañcu śvetāsthi ca/
S01divyav_u:082.024_0: yeṣāṃ vo dvādaśavarṣikaṃ bhaktamasti, taiḥ sthātavyam/
S01divyav_u:082.026_0: tasminśca samaye vārāṇasyāmanyatamo gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaparivāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:082.027_1: bhaviṣyati me saparivārāṇāṃ me saparivārāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti? sa kathayati--ārya bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:082.030_0: tatastena gṛhapatinā kośakoṣṭhāgarāṇi śodhayitvā dhānyaprastha upasaṃhṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:082.031_1: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:083.001_0: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.002_1: sa ca pratyekabuddho 'nupūrveṇa piṇḍapātamaṭaṃs tasya gṛhapatir niveśanamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.004_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadapyahaṃ parityajya niyataṃ prāṇairviyokṣye/
S01divyav_u:083.005_1: tena bhāryā abhihitā--bhadre, yo mama pratyaṃśastamahamasmai pravrajitāyānuprayacchāmīti/
S01divyav_u:083.006_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--mama svāmī na paribhuṅkte, kathamahaṃ paribhokṣya iti/
S01divyav_u:083.007_1: evaṃ putreṇa snuṣayā dāsena dāsyā ca vicārya svasvapratyaṃśāḥ parityaktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.008_0: tatastaiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.009_0: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā, na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:083.009_1: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja upari vihāyasamudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.011_0: te mūlanikṛttā iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:083.012_0: gṛhapatiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.012_1: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:083.014_0: patnī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.014_2: sā śatenāpi paribhujyeta, sahasreṇāpi, na parikṣayaṃ gacchet, yāvanmayā prayogo 'pratipraśrabdhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.018_0: putraḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.018_2: yadi ca śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:083.018_3: pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhet, mā parikṣayaṃ gacchet--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:083.022_0: snuṣā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.022_2: śataṃ vā gandhaṃ ghrāsyati, taṃ na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvanmayā apratipraśrabdham--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:083.025_0: dāsaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.025_2: sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭāḥ syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:083.028_0: dāsī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:083.028_2: sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyeran--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:083.031_0: sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampayā ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā rājakulasyopariṣṭāt saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:084.001_1: tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyopari cchāyā nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:084.004_1: tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvatpūrṇāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:084.005_0: sa patnīmāmantrayate--mama tāvat praṇidhānaṃ pūrṇam, yuṣmākamapīdānīṃ paśyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:084.006_0: tato dāsyā dhānyānāmekāṃ mātrāmārabdhā parikarmayitum, sapta mātrāḥ saṃpannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:084.008_0: tathaiva putrasya snuṣāyā dāsasya praṇidhiḥ siddhā/
S01divyav_u:084.009_0: tato gṛhapatinā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ vārāṇasyām--yo bhavanto 'nnenārthī, sa āgacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:084.010_2: kathayati--kimeṣa bhavanta uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti? amātyaiḥ samākhyātam--deva,
S01divyav_u:084.012_0: rājā tamāhūya kathayati--yadā eva lokaḥ kālagataḥ, tadā tvayā kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitānīti/
S01divyav_u:084.013_0: deva, kasya kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitāni? api tu adyaiva me bījamuptamadyaiva phaladāyakamiti/
S01divyav_u:084.014_0: rājā pṛcchati--yathā katham? sa etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇārocayati/
S01divyav_u:084.015_0: rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, tvayā asau mahātmā piṇḍakena pratipāditah? deva mayaiva pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:084.019_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatisnuṣā gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī,
S01divyav_u:084.019_1: ayameva meṇḍhako gṛḥpatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca/
S01divyav_u:084.021_0: yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:084.021_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍ mahāpuṇyā jātāḥ,
S01divyav_u:084.022_0: ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:084.023_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:084.025_0: tasmāttarhi evaṃ śikṣitavyam, yadekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:085.002_1_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ
S01divyav_u:085.006_0_0: tena khalu samayena vaiśālikā licchavaya idamevamrūpaṃ kriyākāramakārṣuh--pañcadaśyāṃ
S01divyav_u:085.006_0_1: bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā
S01divyav_u:085.008_0: tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṃ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum/
S01divyav_u:085.009_0: tamenaṃ mahājanakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho māṃsārthī kathayati--śīghramenaṃ vṛṣaṃ ghātaya,
S01divyav_u:085.010_0: sa kathayati--evaṃ kariṣyāmi, kiṃ tu muhūrtamudīkṣadhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:085.011_0: tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṃ vaco duruktaṃ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto nirīkṣate,
S01divyav_u:085.014_0: bhagavāṃśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat/
S01divyav_u:085.015_0_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:085.019_1: atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:085.021_0: upasaṃkramyobhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau jihvayā nileḍhumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:085.022_0: sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:085.022_1: tato bhagavāṃstaṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ goghātakamidamavocat--kuruṣva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṃ sātmyam/
S01divyav_u:085.024_2: tatkasya hetoh? mayā eṣa bahunā mūlyena krītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:085.026_1: atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati--aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti/
S01divyav_u:085.028_0: sahacittotpādādbhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasratrayamādāya bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt/
S01divyav_u:085.029_0: atha bhagavāñ śakraṃ devendramidamavocat--anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṃ mūlyam/
S01divyav_u:085.030_1: atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṃ vṛṣamūlyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṃ govṛṣaṃ bandhanānmuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:085.032_0: śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:086.001_0_0: [86]atha govṛṣo gatapratyāgataprāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā bhagavatyabhiprasanno bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:086.001_0_1: triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayamāno
S01divyav_u:086.003_0: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:086.006_0_0: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
S01divyav_u:086.006_0_1: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye
S01divyav_u:086.009_0: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:086.010_0: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:086.011_0: api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti/
S01divyav_u:086.012_0: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:086.013_0_1: nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān
S01divyav_u:086.013_0_3: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyantān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:086.022_0: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:086.023_0: tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:086.031_0: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:087.008_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:087.014_0: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrā staṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//6// iti//
S01divyav_u:087.016_1: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:087.017_0: dṛṣṭaste ānanda ayaṃ govṛṣah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:087.017_1: eṣa ānanda govṛṣastathāgatasyāntike prasannacittaḥ saptame divase kālaṃ kṛtvā cātrumahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate/
S01divyav_u:087.023_1: tadanayā saṃtatyā navanavatikalpasahasrāṇi vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:087.024_0_0: tataḥ kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya paścime bhave paścime nikete samucchraye
S01divyav_u:087.024_0_1: paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyatvaṃ pratilabhya rājā bhaviṣyati aśokavarṇo nāma
S01divyav_u:087.027_1: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:087.028_0: pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇā parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:087.031_0: so 'pareṇa samayena dānāni datvā cakravartirājyamapahāya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi .
S01divyav_u:087.031_1: ..ṣamyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
S01divyav_u:087.033_0: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kiṃ bhadanta anena govṛṣeṇa karma kṛtam yena tiryagyonāvupapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:087.033_1_0: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena divyamānuṣasukhamanubhūya [88]pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:087.033_1_1: bhagavānāha--anenaiva ānanda govṛṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni
S01divyav_u:088.003_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hyānanda karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:088.003_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:088.007_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
S01divyav_u:088.008_0_0: bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksambuddho loka
S01divyav_u:088.008_0_1: udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:088.010_0: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmupaniśritya viharati, anyatamasmin vanaṣaṇḍe/
S01divyav_u:088.011_0: sarve ca vītarāgā vigatadveṣā vigatamohā yāvat pañcamātrāṇi dhūrtakaśatāni tena tenāhiṇḍyamānāni taṃ pradeśamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:088.013_0: teṣāmetadabhavat--ete hi pravrajitā mahātmānah īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
S01divyav_u:088.013_1: yadyeṣāṃ jīvitopacchedaṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ, na bhūya etasmin pradeśe svasthairvihartavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:088.017_1: sa kathayati--aghātayitvā etān kutaḥ kṣema iti? taiste jīvitādvyaparopitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:088.019_0: yadbhūyasā tu narakeṣu tiryagyonau upapannāśca santo nityaṃ śastreṇa praghātitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:088.020_0: tatra yo 'sau caurasteṣāṃ samādāpakaḥ, sa evāyaṃ govṛṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:088.020_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:088.021_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhūya pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:088.023_0: evaṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāṃ cittaprasādo 'pyacintyavipākaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ praṇidhānam/
S01divyav_u:088.024_0: tasmāttarhi ānanda evaṃ śikṣitavyam yatstokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātramapi tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmariṣyāmītyevaṃ te ānanda śikṣitavyam/
S01divyav_u:088.026_0: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṃ purastādgāthā bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:088.029_0: āpanno hi paraṃ kṛcchraṃ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:088.030_0: vyākṛtaśca bhave divye pratyekaśca jino hyasau//9// iti//
S01divyav_u:089.002_0_0: sa bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito
S01divyav_u:089.002_0_1: rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairyakṣairasurairgaruḍaiḥ
S01divyav_u:089.002_0_4: saśrāvakasaṃgho divyānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavānanupalipto viharati padmapatramivāmbhasā/
S01divyav_u:089.007_0: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare ṣaṭ pūrṇādyāḥ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñamāninaḥ prativasanti sma/
S01divyav_u:089.009_0_0: atha ṣaṇṇāṃ pūrṇādīnāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam
S01divyav_u:089.009_0_1: evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ -- yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--yadā śramaṇo
S01divyav_u:089.009_1: tadā vayaṃ satkṛtāścābhūvan gurukṛtāśca mānitāśca pūjitāśca rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ naigamānāṃ jānapadānāṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
S01divyav_u:089.014_0: yadā tu śramaṇo gautamo loke utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:089.014_1: tadā śramaṇo gautamaḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ janapadānāṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
S01divyav_u:089.017_0: asmākaṃ ca lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:089.018_1: arhati jñāvādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:089.019_0: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautamo 'nuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:089.021_1: ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:089.023_0: upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:089.024_0: tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:089.024_1: atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya prākrāntam,
S01divyav_u:089.026_1_0: iti viditvā pūraṇavadātmānamabhinirmāya upari vihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi
S01divyav_u:089.026_1_1: kṛtvā maskariṇaṃ gośālīputramāmantrayate--yatkhalu maskariñ jānīyāh--ahaṃ riddhimāñ
S01divyav_u:089.029_0: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:089.030_0: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, ahaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:089.032_0: ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, ahaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo [90]gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:090.002_0: upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, ahamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:090.003_0: tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:090.004_0: atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya parākrāntam,
S01divyav_u:090.005_1_0: iti viditvā maskarivadātmānamabhinirmāya upari vihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavidyotanavarṣaṇaprātihāryāṇi
S01divyav_u:090.005_1_1: kṛtvā saṃjayinaṃ vairaṭṭīputramāmantrayate--yatkhalu saṃjayiñ jānīyāh--ahaṃ riddhimāñ
S01divyav_u:090.008_0: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:090.009_0: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, ahaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:090.011_1: ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, ahaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:090.013_0: upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, ahamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:090.014_0: tatra me bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:090.016_0: pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāraḥ sarvajñajñānino yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāman/
S01divyav_u:090.017_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--vayam ṛddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:090.018_1: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:090.019_0: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:090.021_2: ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:090.023_0: upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:090.024_0: tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:090.025_0_0: evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastīrthyānidamavocat--yūyamapi śavā bhūtvā
S01divyav_u:090.025_0_1: bhagavatā sārdhaṃ riddhiṃ prārabhadhve? atha pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñānajñānino
S01divyav_u:090.025_0_2: 'rdhamārge rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ vijñāpayanti--vayaṃ smo deva riddhimanto
S01divyav_u:090.029_0: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:090.030_0: yāvat tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:090.031_0: evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastāṃstīrthikaparivrājakānidamavocat--yadyevaṃ trirapyetamarthaṃ vijñāpayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:090.032_0: atha tīrthyānāmetadabhavat--ayaṃ rājā [91]māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:091.002_1: tatra vayaṃ gatvā śramaṇaṃ gautamamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihārye āhvayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:091.004_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṣipram/
S01divyav_u:091.005_0: bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojaya, yatrāhamadhiruhya bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramiṣyāmi paryupāsanāyai/
S01divyav_u:091.006_0: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:091.007_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:091.008_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya rājagṛhānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:091.010_0: tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:091.011_0: antarā rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamadrākṣīt/
S01divyav_u:091.012_0: tadantarā pañca kakudānyapanīya tadyathā--uṣṇīṣaṃ chatraṃ khaḍgamaṇiṃ vālavyajanaṃ citre copānahau,
S01divyav_u:091.013_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:091.014_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:091.015_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:091.016_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:091.019_0_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ
S01divyav_u:091.019_0_1: hitāya prāṇinām? devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--śrutapūrvaṃ bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ
S01divyav_u:091.021_0: bhagavato jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--śrāvastyāṃ pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti/
S01divyav_u:091.024_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:091.025_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:091.026_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:091.026_1: sa cīvarāṇi dhāvatu sīvyatu rañjayatu iti/
S01divyav_u:091.028_0_0: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta
S01divyav_u:091.028_0_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:091.028_0_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṭagaṇaparivṛto rājahaṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:091.028_0_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto[92]
S01divyav_u:091.028_0_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:091.028_1_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:091.028_1_1: virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:091.028_1_2: vemacitra ivāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva
S01divyav_u:091.028_2_0: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimiva iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
S01divyav_u:091.028_2_2: bhikṣusaṃghena ca puraskṛto yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.007_0: anekaiśca devatāśatasahasrairanugamyamāno 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:092.010_0: aśrauṣustīrthyāḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrāvastīṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:092.011_0: te śrāvastīṃ gatvā rājānaṃ prasenajitkauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīthāh--vayam ṛddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.013_0: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:092.013_1: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:092.015_2: ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:092.015_3: vayaṃ taddviguṇaṃ tattriguṇamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.017_0: upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.018_0: tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:092.019_0: evamukte rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--āgamayantu tāvadbhavanto yāvadahaṃ bhagavantamavalokayāmi/
S01divyav_u:092.020_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa/
S01divyav_u:092.022_1: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā prasenajit kauśalastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.024_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:092.025_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya śrāvastyā niryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:092.027_0: tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatārya pādābhyāmeva ārāmaṃ praviśya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.028_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:092.029_0: ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--ime bhadanta tīrthyā bhagavantamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryeṇāhvayante/
S01divyav_u:092.030_0: vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:092.032_0_0: evamukte bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--nāhaṃ mahārāja [93]evaṃ
S01divyav_u:092.032_0_1: śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi evam yūyaṃ bhikṣava āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmuttare
S01divyav_u:093.002_0: api tu ahamevaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi--praticchannakalyāṇā bhikṣavo viharata vivṛtapāpā iti/
S01divyav_u:093.003_0: dvirapi trirapi rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:093.005_2: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatām yaduta daśāvaśyakariṇīyāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:093.007_0: na tāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti yāvanna buddho buddhaṃ vyākaroti,
S01divyav_u:093.007_1: yāvanna dvitīyena sattvenāparivartyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:093.007_4: sīmābandhaḥ kṛto bhavati, śrāvakayugamagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:093.007_6: anavatapte mahāsarasi śrāvakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūrvikā karmaplotirvyākṛtā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:093.012_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--avaśyakaraṇīyametattathāgateneti viditvā rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:093.013_0: itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato mahājanapratyakṣamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:093.014_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt,
S01divyav_u:093.016_0_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--katarasmin pradeśe pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ
S01divyav_u:093.016_0_1: vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti? devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--antarā bhadanta śrāvastīmantarā
S01divyav_u:093.016_0_2: ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhermahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya
S01divyav_u:093.019_0: bhagavato 'pi jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:093.020_0: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:093.021_0_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--katamasmin
S01divyav_u:093.021_0_1: bhadanta pradeśe prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ kārayāmi? antarā ca mahārāja śrāvastīmantarā
S01divyav_u:093.023_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:093.026_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--itaḥ saptame divase bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:093.027_1: atha vā niṣpalāyiṣyati, atha vā pakṣaparyeṣaṇaṃ kartukāmah? teṣāmetadabhavat--na hyeva śramaṇo gautamo niṣpalāyiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:093.031_1: iti viditvā raktākṣo nāma parivrājaka indrajālābhijñaḥ sa āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:093.032_1: evaṃ cāhuh--[94]yatkhalu raktākṣa jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.001_0: sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:094.004_1: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.006_0: sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśāyiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:094.010_0: atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena te ṛṣayastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.011_1: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautama ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.012_0: sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:094.015_0: tena khalu samayena subhadro nāma parivrājakaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.016_0: atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena subhadraḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.017_1: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu subhadra jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.018_0: sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:094.020_1: subhadreṇābhihitam--na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yadyuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.021_0: tatkasya hetoh? mama tāvat kuśinagaryāmāvāso 'navatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.022_0: śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputro nāma śiṣyastasya cundo nāma śrāmaṇerakastasyāpi tatraivānavatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.024_0: na tathānavataptakāyikā devatā api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya/
S01divyav_u:094.025_1: ihāhaṃ kuśinagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya anavataptaṃ mahāsarasaṃ gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:094.026_0: tasya mamānavataptakāyikā devatā anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamuddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:094.027_1: tasyānavataptakāyikā devatā pāṃśukūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyenātmānaṃ siñcati/
S01divyav_u:094.029_0: na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yacchramaṇo gautamo riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:094.030_0: evamahaṃ jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:095.001_0: [95]atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālo nāṃnā bhrātā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.003_0: anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:095.004_2: tai rājñe niveditam--yatkhalu deva jānīthāḥ--kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṃ prārthitam/
S01divyav_u:095.007_0: evaṃ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.008_0: sa ārtasvaraṃ krandate, duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ devanāṃ vedayate/
S01divyav_u:095.010_0: kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ kurudhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:095.012_0: atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat--kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ māṃ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:095.014_0: imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
S01divyav_u:095.018_1: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā tenopasaṃkrāma/
S01divyav_u:095.020_0_0: upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ vada--ye
S01divyav_u:095.020_0_1: kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino
S01divyav_u:095.023_0: ye kecid dharmā asaṃskṛtā vā saṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.025_0: anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:095.025_1: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.027_0: upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
S01divyav_u:095.029_0: ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.030_0: ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā, tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:095.031_0: anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:095.032_0: sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam,
S01divyav_u:095.032_1: [96]yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:096.001_0: kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṃvegena anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:096.003_0: yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:096.004_0: atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.006_0: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah .
S01divyav_u:096.009_0: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanaṃ yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo 'ntarāt sarvo 'sau pradeśo 'pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.013_0: atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:096.014_0: śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:096.015_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaśataparivāro 'nekasahasraparivāro 'nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.019_0: niṣadya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--ete vayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.020_0: kutra etarhi śramaṇo gautamah? tena bhavanto muhūrtamāgamayata/
S01divyav_u:096.021_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavamāmantrayate--ehi tvamuttara,
S01divyav_u:096.023_0: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha,
S01divyav_u:096.023_1: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:096.024_0: evaṃ ca vada--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:096.025_0: evaṃ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.026_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:096.027_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate,
S01divyav_u:096.027_1: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātraṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:096.030_0: sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalastvaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:096.030_1: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:097.002_0: adrākṣīdrājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavakamupari vihāyasā āgacchatam/
S01divyav_u:097.002_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:097.004_1_0: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kenaitad vidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ
S01divyav_u:097.004_1_1: samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte 'rgaḍacchidreṇārciṣo nirgatya bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:097.007_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--eṣa idānīṃ mahārāja śramaṇasya gautamasya prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:097.009_1: atha so 'gniraspṛṣṭa eva vāriṇā sarvaprātihāryamaṇḍapamadagdhvā svayameva nirvṛto yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:097.010_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:097.013_0: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
S01divyav_u:097.015_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:097.017_0: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭā yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:097.019_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:097.021_1: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena vā gautamena? gaṇḍakenārāmikenottarakauravād dvīpāt karṇikāravṛkṣamādāya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasyāgrataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:097.023_0: ratnakenāpyārāmikena gandhamādanādaśokavṛkṣamānīya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:097.024_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:097.026_1: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāreṇa pṛthivyāṃ pādau nyastau/
S01divyav_u:097.028_1: ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampati prakampati saṃprakampati/
S01divyav_u:098.001_1: gaganatalasthā devatā bhagavata upariṣṭāddivyānyutpalāni kṣipanti padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi,
S01divyav_u:098.005_0: atha teṣām ṛṣīṇāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ saṃvṛtta iti/
S01divyav_u:098.005_1: teṣāmetadabhavat--nūnamasmākaṃ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūto bhaviṣyatīti viditvā pañca ṛṣiśatāni śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:098.008_0_0: adrākṣuste ṛṣayo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:098.008_0_1: mūrtimantamiva dharmaṃ havyāvasiktamiva hutavahaṃ kāñcanabhājanasthamiva pradīpaṃ
S01divyav_u:098.010_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punar na tathā dvādaśavarṣe 'bhyastaśamatho yogācārasya cittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:098.010_1: aputrasya vā putraḥ pratilambho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathā tatprathamatapūrvabuddhāropitakuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:098.014_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:098.014_1: ekāntasthitāste ṛṣayo bhagavantamidamavocan--labhemahi vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:098.016_1: te bhagavatā brāhmeṇa svareṇāhūtāḥ--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:098.017_0: sahābhidhānānmuṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:098.021_0: satya(dyaḥ) praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//2//
S01divyav_u:098.023_0_0: atha bhagavān divyamānuṣyeṇa pūjāsatkāreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhannarhatparivāro
S01divyav_u:098.023_0_1: saptabhiśca nikāyaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto mahatā ca janaughena yena prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:098.025_1: bhagavataḥ kāyādraśmayo nirgatya sarvaṃ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:098.026_0_0: atha lūhasudatto gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:098.026_0_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko
S01divyav_u:098.028_0: ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:098.030_1: na tvaṃ gṛhapate ebhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ, api tvahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:098.032_0: sthānametadvidyate yattīrthyā evaṃ vadeyuḥ--nāsti śramaṇasya gautamasyottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam[99]/
S01divyav_u:099.004_0: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:099.005_0: ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:099.008_0: api tu na tvaṃ tīrthyair riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:099.008_1: ahameṣāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:099.011_1_0: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate
S01divyav_u:099.011_1_1: uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām? atha rājā prasenajit kauśala
S01divyav_u:099.011_1_2: utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S01divyav_u:099.011_1_3: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat--ahaṃ bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe
S01divyav_u:099.017_2_0: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte svasminnāsane 'ntarhitaḥ
S01divyav_u:099.017_2_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayati tadyathā--caṃkramyate
S01divyav_u:099.020_1: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhānyarcīṃṣi kāyānniścaranti tadyathā nīlapītāni lohitānyavadātāni mañjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni/
S01divyav_u:099.022_0: adhaḥkāyaṃ prajvālayati, uparimāt kāyācchītalā vāridhārāḥ syandante/
S01divyav_u:099.023_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśīti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:099.024_0: niṣadya bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--iyaṃ mahārāja tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakasādhāraṇā ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:099.026_0_0: tatra bhagavān dvirapi rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate
S01divyav_u:099.026_0_1: 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām? atha
S01divyav_u:099.026_0_2: rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:099.026_0_3: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--ahaṃ
S01divyav_u:099.032_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadi laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:099.032_2: antaśaḥ kuntapipīliko 'pi prāṇī bhagavatah cetasi cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:100.001_2_0: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrāvakāṇām? atha śakrabrahmādīnāṃ devānāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā
S01divyav_u:100.004_0: atha śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
S01divyav_u:100.004_1: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkuñcayet, evameva śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ca devaloke 'ntarhitāni,
S01divyav_u:100.006_0: atha brahmādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:100.008_0: śakrādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīktya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:100.009_0: nandopanandābhyāṃ nāgarājābhyāṃ bhagavata upanāmitaṃ nirmitaṃ sahasrapatraṃ śakaṭacakramātraṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ ratnadaṇḍaṃ padmam/
S01divyav_u:100.010_0: bhagavāṃśca padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:100.012_2: evaṃ bhagavatā buddhapiṇḍī nirmitā yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya buddhā bhagavanto parṣannirmitam(?)/
S01divyav_u:100.013_1: kecit tiṣṭhanti, kecinniṣīdanti, kecicchāyāṃ kalpayanti, tejodhātumapi samāpadyante, jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:100.021_0: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā sarvaloko 'nāvṛtamadrākṣīdbuddhāvataṃsakaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya antato bāladārakā api,
S01divyav_u:100.021_1: yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:100.024_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tāvat pratigṛhṇīta bhikṣavo 'nupūrve sthitāyā buddhapiṇḍyā nimittam/
S01divyav_u:100.025_2: atha bhagavāṃstam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:100.029_0: virocana udgate tu vairavyārto(?) bhavati na cāvabhāsate//5//
S01divyav_u:100.031_0: saṃbuddhāvabhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsate na cāsya śrāvakaḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:100.032_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:101.001_0: dvirapi prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:101.002_1: evamukte tīrthyā anyonyaṃ vighaṭṭayanta evāhuḥ--tvamuttiṣṭha tvamuttiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:101.004_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pāñciko mahāsenāpatistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:101.005_0: atha pāñcikasya yakṣasenāpateretadabhavat--ciramapi te ime mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ viheṭhayiṣyanti bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti viditvā tumulaṃ vātavarṣaṃ saṃjanayya mahāntamutsṛṣṭavān/
S01divyav_u:101.006_0: tumulena vātavarṣeṇa tīrthyāṇāṃ maṇḍapā adarśanapathe kṣiptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:101.007_0: tīrthyā hyaśanivarṣeṇa bādhyamānā diśo digbhyo vicalanti/
S01divyav_u:101.009_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāni/
S01divyav_u:101.009_1: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā tasyāṃ parṣadyekavāribindur na patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:101.010_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇānyanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇyudānamudānayanti--aho buddhaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho saṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:101.012_0: pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā tīrthyā abhihitāh--ete yūyaṃ mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchadhvaṃ dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:101.013_0: te niṣpalāyamānāḥ kathayanti--ete vayaṃ parvataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:101.016_0: bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:101.020_0: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:101.026_1: iti viditvā niṣpalāyan kathayati--aham yuṣmākaṃ śāsanasarvasvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:101.028_0: yaduta antavāmllokaḥ, anantaḥ, antavāṃścānantavāṃśca, naivāntavānnānantavān, sa jīvastaccharīramanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramiti/
S01divyav_u:101.029_0: te kalahajātā viharanti bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādamāpannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:102.006_0: gamanāya me samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ kāyasya me balavīryam {na?} kiṃcit/
S01divyav_u:102.008_0: spṛṣṭāśca bhāvāḥ sukhaduḥkhate me anāvṛtaṃ jñānamihārhatām//12//
S01divyav_u:102.012_0: ācakṣva me dūṣika etamarthaṃ śītodakā kutra sā puṣkiriṇī//13//
S01divyav_u:102.015_0: eṣā khalu śītā puṣkiriṇī nalinī ca virājati toyadhārā/
S01divyav_u:102.017_0: śramaṇādhama hīnāsatpuruṣa tvamimāṃ nanu paśyasi puṣkariṇīm//14//
S01divyav_u:102.020_0: na tvaṃ naro nāpi ca nārikā tvaṃ śmaśrūṇi ca te nāsti na ca stanau tava/
S01divyav_u:102.022_0: bhinnasvaro 'si na ca cakravākah evaṃ bhavān vātahato nirucyate//15//
S01divyav_u:102.024_0: atha pūraṇo nirgrantho vālukāghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā śītikāyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:102.026_0: atha te nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ mṛgayamāṇāḥ pratimārge gaṇikāṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchanti--bhadre,
S01divyav_u:102.026_1: kaṃcit tvamadrākṣīrgacchantamiha pūraṇaṃ dharmaśāṭapraticchannaṃ kaṭacchavratabhojanam? gaṇikā prāha--
S01divyav_u:102.033_0: kathaṃ sa buddhimān bhavati puruṣo vyañjanānvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:102.034_0: lokasya paśyato yo 'yaṃ grāme carati nagnakaḥ//18//
S01divyav_u:103.003_0: atha te nirgranthā yena śītikā puṣkiriṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:103.003_1: adrākṣuste nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ kāśyapaṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ mṛtam/
S01divyav_u:103.004_0: kālagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ puṣkiriṇyā uddhṛtya ekānte chorayitvā prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:103.006_0: bhagavatā buddhanirmāṇo nirmito dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:103.007_0: dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto nirmitena sārdhaṃ niścayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:103.007_1: yaṃ khalu śrāvako nirmitamabhinirmimīte, yadi śrāvako bhāṣate, nirmito 'pi bhāṣate/
S01divyav_u:103.012_0: bhagavān nirmitaṃ praśnaṃ pṛcchati, bhagavān vyākaroti/
S01divyav_u:103.014_0: bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathā abhiprasannasya āśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ ca dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:103.014_1: yathā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni kaiściduṣma(?)gatānyadhigatāni mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmāḥ/
S01divyav_u:103.019_0: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:103.020_0: atha bhagavāṃstāṃ parṣadaṃ buddhaniṃnāṃ dharmapravaṇāṃ saṃghaprāgbhārāṃ vyavasthāpyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:103.022_0: dhanyāste puruṣā loke ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:104.002_0: buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:104.002_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śiśumāragirau bodho nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhāno mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:104.005_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:104.005_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:104.006_2: vaidyaprajñaptaiścāhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:104.008_0: hārārdhahārabhūṣitagātrā apsareva nandanavanacāriṇī mañcānmañcaṃ pīṭhātpīṭhamanavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmim/
S01divyav_u:104.010_0: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:104.010_1: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:104.011_0: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prādādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:104.012_0: tasyāstrīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā varṇasaṃsthānaviśeṣānurūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyapasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:104.013_0: sā dhātryaṅkagatā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā saripimaṇḍenānyaiśca cottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:104.015_0: yadā mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadā rūpiṇī yauvanānurūpayā ācāravihāraceṣṭayā devakanyeva tadgṛhamavabhāsamānā sugṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantarjanasya ca prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:104.016_0: tasyāstādṛśīṃ vibhūtiṃ śrutvā nānādeśanivāsrājaputrā amātyaputrā gṛhapatiputrā dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhiputrāḥ sārthavāhaputrāśca bhāryārtham yācanakān preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:104.018_0: yathā yathā cāsau prāthyate, tathā tathā bodho gṛhapatiḥ sutarāṃ prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:104.019_1: na śilpena, nāpyādhipatyena, kiṃ tu yo mama kulaśīlena vā dhanena vā sadṛśo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:104.021_0: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutam yathā śiśumāragirau bodho gṛhapatistasya duhitā evaṃ rūpayauvanasamuditā,
S01divyav_u:104.021_1: sā nānādeśanivāsināṃ rājāmātyagṛhapatidhanināṃ śreṣṭhisārthavāhaputrāṇāmarthāya prārthyata iti/
S01divyav_u:104.023_0: śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ahamapi tāvat tāṃ putrasyārthāya prārthayāmi/
S01divyav_u:104.024_0: kadācid bodho gṛhapatirdadyāditi viditvā tasyā yācanakāḥ preṣitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:104.024_1: bodhena gṛhapatinā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ samudācāradhanasampadaṃ ca vicārya dattā/
S01divyav_u:104.025_0: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā mahatā śrīsamudayena putrasya pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:104.026_0: yāvat punarapi bodhasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:104.028_0: tena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, paśyata kasya prabhāvānmamānarthaśatāni prādurbhūtāni/
S01divyav_u:104.029_0: naimittikā vicāryaikamatenāhuh--gṛhapate, ya eṣa tava patnyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ, asyaiṣa prabhāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:104.031_0: iti śrutvā bodho gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:105.002_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--ka etāni śṛṇoti? udyānaṃ gatvā tiṣṭhāmīti viditvā tena pauruṣeyā uktāh--yadi me kaścinmahānanartha utpadyate,
S01divyav_u:105.002_1: sa śrāvayitavyo nānya ityuktvā udyānaṃ gatvā avasthito yāvadasyāsau patnī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:105.005_1: anyatamaḥ puruṣastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:105.006_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yathāyaṃ tvaritatvaritamāgacchati, nūnaṃ mahānanarthaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:105.008_0: sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, yadyapi me putro 'narhaśatānyutpādya jātaḥ, tathāpi svāgatamasyeti/
S01divyav_u:105.009_0: tadanantarameva dvitīyapuruṣastathaiva tvaritatvaritamaśruparyākulekṣaṇo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:105.010_1: kiṃ tvaritatvaritamāgacchasīti? sa bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhaḥ karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:105.014_0: atha tasya jñātayo lokadharmānuvṛttyā avajñāpūrvakena nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayitumārabdhāh--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:105.015_1: apare kathayanti--yena bodhasya gṛhapateḥ kukṣigatenaivānekadhanasamuditaṃ gṛhaṃ nidhanamupanītam,
S01divyav_u:105.015_2: tasya kīdṛśaṃ kulasadṛśaṃ nāma vyavasthāpyate? api tu ayaṃ pitrā jātamātraḥ svāgatavādena samudācaritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:105.015_3: tasmādasya svāgata iti nāma bhavatu iti/
S01divyav_u:105.018_2: tathā tathā bodhasya gṛhapaterdhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:105.022_0: ye 'pyasya pauruṣeyāḥ paṇyamādāya deśāntaragatā mahāsamudram yāvattīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:105.026_0: kecidbodhasya gṛhapateḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ śrutvā tatraiva avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:105.027_0: jñātīnāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ, kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecit tatraivāvasthitāḥ svāgatasya vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:105.028_1: kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecidanyāśrayeṇa tatraivāvasthitāḥ santaḥ svāgatasya nāmāpi na gṛhṇanti/
S01divyav_u:105.030_0: kiṃ tu bodhasyaikā purāṇavṛddhā dāsī kṛtajñatayā svāgatasyopasthānaṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:105.031_1: sā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyam[106] paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:106.001_1: tajjijñāsyāmi tāvat kasyāpuṇyenāyamupaplavaḥ, kiṃ svāgatasya āhosvinmameti/
S01divyav_u:106.002_0: tayā svāgatasya nāṃnā sthālyāṃ taṇḍulān prakṣipya bhaktārtham yojitā vinaṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.003_0: tata ātmano nāṃnā tathaiva yojitāḥ, śobhanaṃ bhaktaṃ saṃpannam/
S01divyav_u:106.004_1: etamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:106.006_1: kṛtaḥ sthāsyāmīti? atra prāptakālaṃ sarvathā yāvat prāṇaviyogo na bhavati tāvanniṣpalāyeyem/
S01divyav_u:106.007_0: iti viditvā yattatra kiṃcit sāramasti, tamādāya niṣpalāyitā/
S01divyav_u:106.008_0: tasmiñ śūnye gṛhe śvānaḥ praviśya kalahaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.009_0: sa śvānakalahaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhe śvānaḥ kaliṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:106.010_1: sa tatra praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:106.012_0: tataḥ svāgato bhojanavelāṃ jñātvā lekhaśālāyāḥ svagṛhamāgato bhoktumiti yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:106.015_2: sa teṣāṃ sakāśaṃ gato yāvattatra kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.016_0: te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:106.019_0: apare kathayanti--nāyaṃ svāgatāḥ, kiṃ tu durāgataḥ, imamāgamyāsmākaṃ kaliḥ prādurbhūta iti/
S01divyav_u:106.021_0: tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.021_1: te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthikāḥ praviśanti, tatra nirbhartsyante niṣkāsyante ca/
S01divyav_u:106.023_1: vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.024_0_0: idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
S01divyav_u:106.024_0_1: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ
S01divyav_u:106.028_0: tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.030_0: ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.030_1: tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:106.031_0: te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau/
S01divyav_u:107.001_0: tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:107.001_1: ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena vayaṃ riktahastā rikmallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:107.003_0: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:107.004_0: atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:107.005_0: tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti? sa kathayati--tāta,
S01divyav_u:107.006_0: sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:107.006_1: tau tava mātāpitarau kālagatau? te jñātayah? sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:107.011_0: ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:107.015_1: sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na gacchasi? tāta,
S01divyav_u:107.015_3: tatrānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ, tasya putreṇa tava bhaginī pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:107.019_1: tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau, karmavipākena vismṛtau/
S01divyav_u:107.021_1: yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ vaismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:107.023_0: yāvat te sārthakāḥ kaliṃ kartumārabdhāḥ, balīvardā yoddhumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:107.024_2: te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:107.026_1: sārthavāhastaṃ kolāhalaśabdaṃ śrutvā nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ, yāvat paśyati taṃ niṣkāsyamānam/
S01divyav_u:107.027_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mā enaṃ niṣkāsayata, mamaiṣa vayasyaputro bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:107.028_0: te kathayanti--sārthavāha, yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:107.028_1: kathaṃ tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmah? sarvathā tvaṃ sārthasya svāmī/
S01divyav_u:107.029_0: yadyeṣa gacchati, vayaṃ na gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:107.031_0: tvaṃ paścādvāsoddhātikayā gaccha, ahaṃ tavārthe āhāraṃ sthāpayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:107.031_1: sa mātāpitṛviyogapratispardhinā pūrvakarmāparādhaprabhāveṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃtāpitamanāḥ sāśrukaṇṭhastūṣṇīmavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:108.001_2: sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati,
S01divyav_u:108.002_0: tatra yaṃ bhūmau sthāpayati, sa śṛgālairanyaiścatuṣpādaurbhakṣyate/
S01divyav_u:108.003_0: yaṃ vṛkṣaśākhāsu, sa pakṣibhiḥ śākhāmṛgaiśca bhakṣyate/
S01divyav_u:108.004_1: asthānamanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'samprāpte viśeṣādhigame so 'ntarā kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:108.006_0: yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī kumbhamādāya gatā/
S01divyav_u:108.007_2: tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti? sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:108.009_0: sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ praṣṭumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:108.011_0: te jñātayah? sa kathayati--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:108.011_1: kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:108.012_1: kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecit tatraivānyānāśrityāvasthitā vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:108.014_1: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:108.019_0: sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:108.020_1: kīdṛśena paṇyeneti? sā kathayati--kuto 'sya paṇyam? daṇḍamasya haste mallakaśceti/
S01divyav_u:108.021_1: kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:108.023_1: sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni,
S01divyav_u:108.023_2: kathayati ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:108.029_0: sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
S01divyav_u:108.032_0: te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti, pādena ghaṭṭayanti/
S01divyav_u:108.032_1: sa yadi prativibudhyate[109], tamevaṃ vadanti--bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:108.032_2: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante? te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti,
S01divyav_u:109.003_2: sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?) prāvṛtyāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.005_1: tasyāsau dārikā punaḥ preṣitā--dārike gaccha, cirayatyasau, paśya kimarthaṃ nāgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:109.006_0: sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:109.007_0: sā tvaritatvaritaṃ gatā tasyāḥ kathayati--ārye, muṣitastenaiva veṣeṇa tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:109.008_0: sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:109.008_1: yadi tamiha praveśayāmi, sthānametadvidyate yanmayāpi śvaśuragṛhamanayena vyasanamāpatsyate/
S01divyav_u:109.011_2: te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthinaḥ praviśanti, tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca/
S01divyav_u:109.013_1: vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.014_0_0: idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti? tatraike
S01divyav_u:109.014_0_1: kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā
S01divyav_u:109.017_1: tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataḥ, te tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.019_0: ye riktahastā riktamallakā āgatāḥ, te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.020_0: teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataḥ, te tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.020_1: te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.021_0: tau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau, te tvanye pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.022_0: te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:109.022_1: ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.024_1: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:109.026_0: tena dauvārikāṇāmājñā dattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
S01divyav_u:109.027_1: kroḍamallakā ye tasya gṛhaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtāste sarve saṃnipatitāḥ praveṣṭumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:109.029_0: kathayanti--bhoḥ puruṣa, asmākameva nāṃnā ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiriti/
S01divyav_u:109.030_0: tat kimidamiti kṛtvā asmān vidhārayasīti? sa kathayati--gṛhapatinā ājñādattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
S01divyav_u:110.001_0: taṃ paśyata mā atrāryā durāgata āgato bhavediti/
S01divyav_u:110.001_1: te samanveṣṭitumārabdhā yāvat paśyantyekasmin pradeśe nilīyāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:110.002_0: tatastaiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtah--ayaṃ bhavantaḥ sa durāgato nilīnastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:110.003_0: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān datvā niṣkāsitastīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāro dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:110.005_0: tatastairhastapādeṣu gṛhītvā saṃkārakūṭe kṣiptah--durāgata atra tiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:110.006_0: yāvadbhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:110.008_0_1: malinajīrṇavāsonivasitaṃ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiśca vraṇaiścākīrṇaiḥ,
S01divyav_u:110.010_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarvabhavopapattibhyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:110.011_0: tṛpyata sarvabhavopapattyupakaraṇebhyaḥ, yatra nāma caramabhavikasya sattvasyeyamavasthā/
S01divyav_u:110.011_1: tatra bhagavāṃs taṃ svāgatamāmantrayate--ākāṅkṣase vatsa pātraśeṣam? bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:110.016_0_0: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā praṇītena
S01divyav_u:110.016_0_1: khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:110.016_0_2: dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:110.020_1: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītumārabdho yāvat paśyati tatra pātraśeṣaṃ na saṃsthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:110.022_1: sa kathayati--na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācidājñā pratyūḍhapūrveti/
S01divyav_u:110.023_0: kiṃ kṛtam? svāgatasya pātraśeṣaṃ na sthāpitamiti/
S01divyav_u:110.024_1: api tu svāgatasyaiva tāni karmāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam/
S01divyav_u:110.027_0: svāgatasya tadapi vismṛtam yadbhagavatā pratijñātam--tava pātraśeṣaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:110.028_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--ko 'pyayaṃ puṇyakarmā bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā samanvāhṛtaḥ śabdata iti/
S01divyav_u:110.029_0: bhagavan svāgata ityuktvā anekaiḥ prativacanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:110.030_1: bhagavānāha--gaccha ānanda, gatvā kathaya--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
S01divyav_u:110.031_0: āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvoccaiḥ śabdairuktah--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
