S01divyav_u:111.003_0: teṣāṃ sarvajña nātho 'si ye hi tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:111.004_0: teṣāṃ svāgatamāryāṇām ye ca te śāsane ratāḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:111.006_0: śocyaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ śokaśalyasamarpitaḥ//3// iti/
S01divyav_u:111.009_0: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadyapyahaṃ bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:111.011_1: yadi tvaṃ sumerumātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudrasadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase,
S01divyav_u:111.013_0: tena tāvad bhuktam yāvat tṛpta iti/
S01divyav_u:111.014_1: vatsa, yadyevamapaścimaṃ kavalaṃ gṛhāṇa, antardhāsyatyeṣa pātra iti/
S01divyav_u:111.016_0: caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvo bhagavantaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ pṛṣṭataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:111.017_0: yāvadbhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:111.017_1: so 'pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:111.019_0: iti viditvā svāgatamāmantrayate--vatsa sbāgata, santi te kārṣāpaṇāh? na santi bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:111.020_1: vastrāntaṃ nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau/
S01divyav_u:111.021_1: vatsa gaccha, gaṇḍakasyārāmikasya sakāśānnīlotpalāni gṛhītvā āgaccheti/
S01divyav_u:111.023_2: iti viditvā saparuṣaṃ kathayati--durāgata, kimarthaṃ rvamihāgacchasīti/
S01divyav_u:111.025_0: nīlotpalairasti kāryaṃ me tathānyair nāpi paṅkajaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:111.028_0: ehyehi yadi dūto 'si tasya śāntātmano muneḥ/
S01divyav_u:112.003_3: sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:112.005_0: tatastaṃ bhagavānāha--vatsa, kiṃ na pravrajasīti? sa kathayati--pravrajāmi bhagavanniti/
S01divyav_u:112.006_0_0: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
S01divyav_u:112.008_0: arhan saṃvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:112.011_0: so 'rhattvaṃ prāpto vimuktisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:112.015_0: āgato 'smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyaṃ tavottamam//7//
S01divyav_u:112.018_0: ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca kāṅkṣatām/
S01divyav_u:112.019_0: śreṣṭhā kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ sadā sevā hitaiṣiṇām//9// iti/
S01divyav_u:112.020_0: yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:112.020_1: tadā sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--śramaṇena gautamenāsau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:112.021_1: te 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivādayanti--śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evamāha--sāmantaprāsādikaṃ me śāsanamiti/
S01divyav_u:112.023_0: atra kiṃ sāmantaprāsādikamityasya yatredānīṃ durāgataprabhṛtayo 'pi kroḍamallakāḥ pravrajantīti? atrāntare nāsti kiṃcidbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāmajñātamadṛṣṭamaviditamavijñātam/
S01divyav_u:112.024_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhyo mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayate/
S01divyav_u:112.025_0: tadguṇodbhāvanamasya kartavyam, kutra kartavyam? yatraiva patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:112.026_0: iti jñātvā ānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:112.027_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu cārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu iti/
S01divyav_u:112.028_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmanto bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:112.029_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_0: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_2: prāsādikah [113]prasādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṛgaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_5: deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:112.031_0_6: koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:112.031_1_0: sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva
S01divyav_u:112.031_1_1: kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpakṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:112.031_2_0: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimati iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
S01divyav_u:112.031_2_3: jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhir vaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
S01divyav_u:112.031_2_5: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena yena śuśumāragiristenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:113.014_1: aśrauṣuḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śuśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ śuśumāragirau viharati bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāva iti/
S01divyav_u:113.016_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃghāt saṃghaṃ pūgātpūgaṃ saṃgamya śuśumāragirer niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:113.017_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:113.018_0: śuśumāragirīyakān brāhamaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:113.019_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:113.020_0_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena
S01divyav_u:113.023_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:113.025_0_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayastāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:113.025_0_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
S01divyav_u:113.025_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:113.028_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:113.030_1: śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayanti saṃpravārayanti/
S01divyav_u:113.032_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena [114]bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:113.032_0_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:114.002_0: atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:114.004_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm//
S01divyav_u:114.005_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta nānādeśeṣu nānādhiṣṭhāneṣu te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāśca vinītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.006_0: ayaṃ bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo 'smākamavairāṇāṃ vairī asapatnānāṃ sapatno 'drugdhānāṃ drugdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.010_1: atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.011_0: atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.012_1: bhikṣūṇāmevamārocaya, śalākāṃ cāraya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate aśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinetum,
S01divyav_u:114.014_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣusaṃghasyārocayitvā buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe śalākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.015_1: sthavirā bhikṣavaḥ samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttāh--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā iti? paśyantyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kartukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.017_1: āyuṣmān svāgataḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā sthavirasthaviraiśca bhikṣubhiriti? paśyati mama guṇodbhāvanāṃ kartukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.019_1: tenārdhāsanaṃ muktvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:114.021_0: pṛcchati buddho bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandam--katareṇānanda bhikṣuṇā śalākā gṛhīteti? sa kathayati--svāgatena bhadanteti/
S01divyav_u:114.023_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān svāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.026_2: tathāpi me te romāpi neñjayituṃ samarthāḥ syuḥ,
S01divyav_u:114.029_0: athāyuṣmān svāgatastasyā eva rātreratyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:114.030_0: śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yenāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114.031_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimanene śramaṇakena mama mṛtipravṛttir yena me bhavanamāgacchatīti? punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--[115]āganturayam,
S01divyav_u:115.001_0_0: athāyuṣmān svāgatastasya hradaṃ gatvā pātracīvaramekāntamupasaṃkṣipya pādau prakṣālya
S01divyav_u:115.001_0_1: hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ parisrāvya jīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktakṛtyaṃ
S01divyav_u:115.004_1: tena pātraṃ pakṣālya tatpātrodakaṃ tasmin hrade prakṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:115.005_2: bhuñjāno 'pyupekṣitaḥ, anena mama bhavane ucchiṣṭodakaṃ choritam/
S01divyav_u:115.007_1: uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya āyuṣmataḥ svāgatasyopari cakrakaṇapaparaśubhindipālādīni praharaṇāni kṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:115.010_1: tadapi divyāni puṣpāṇi māndārakāṇi bhūtvā kāye nipatitumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:115.015_1_0: iti tatrāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya krodhasyānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya ṛddhyanubhāvena
S01divyav_u:115.015_1_1: mahānavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃbhrāntāh
S01divyav_u:115.017_0: kathayanti--eṣa bhavanto bhagavānaśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinayati, āgacchata paśyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:115.019_1: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāmabhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānām yaduta svāgato bhikṣuriti/
S01divyav_u:115.021_0: yadāśvatīrthiko nāgo vigatamadadarpaḥ kṣīṇapraharaṇaśca saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā niṣpalāyitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:115.022_1: aśvatīrthako nāgo yām yāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
S01divyav_u:115.022_2: tāṃ tāṃ diśamādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ saṃprajvalitāmekajvālībhūtāṃ paśyati/
S01divyav_u:115.023_0: sa itaścāmutaśca nairmāṇikenāgninā paryākulīkṛto 'trāṇaḥ sarvamaśāntaṃ paśyati nānyatrāyuṣmata eva svāgatasya samīpaṃ śāntaṃ śītibhūtam/
S01divyav_u:115.026_0: kiṃ māṃ viheṭhayasīti? sa kathayati--jarādharmā nāhaṃ tvāṃ viheṭhayāmi,
S01divyav_u:115.027_0: yadi mayā evaṃvidhā guṇagaṇā nādhigatā abhaviṣyan, adyāhaṃ tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛto 'bhaviṣyamiti/
S01divyav_u:115.030_0: sa kathayati--bhadanta svāgata, śobhanam, evaṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:115.031_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:115.032_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgato bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ so 'śvatīrthiko[116] nāga iti/
S01divyav_u:116.002_0: sa tvametarhi hataprahataniviṣṭaḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena jīvikāṃ kalpayasi/
S01divyav_u:116.003_0: itaścyutasya te kā gatirbhaviṣyati, kā upapattiḥ, ko 'bhisamparāyah? iti/
S01divyav_u:116.004_0: sa kathayati--bhagavan, ājñāpaya, kiṃ mayā karaṇīyamiti/
S01divyav_u:116.006_1: śikṣāpadāni ca gṛhṇāmi, adyāgreṇa ca śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmabhayamanuprayacchāmīti/
S01divyav_u:116.008_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prabhūtamabhisāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.009_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.009_1_1: bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo vinītah? bhagavānāha--na mayā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'śvatīrthako
S01divyav_u:116.012_0: katamena bhadanta? ihanivāsinaiva bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇa/
S01divyav_u:116.014_1_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena
S01divyav_u:116.018_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.020_0: śuśumāragirau anyatamo brāhmaṇa ahituṇḍiko bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.021_0: sa rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena hastimadhyasyopari viśvāsikaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.022_1: tena śrutam yathā svāgatena bhikṣuṇā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇāśvatīrthiko nāgo vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:116.024_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.025_0: sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryasvāgata śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:116.028_1: yadā śrāvastīgato bhavasi, tadā mama gṛhe tatprathamataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:116.030_0: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śuśumāragirau vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:116.032_0: aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikām[117] carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:117.001_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.002_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.003_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:117.004_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:117.005_0_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ
S01divyav_u:117.008_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.010_0: aśrauṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikāṃ carannihānuprāpta ihaiva viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāma iti/
S01divyav_u:117.011_1: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:117.013_0: atha sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaḥ svāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.014_0_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:117.014_0_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo
S01divyav_u:117.014_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:117.017_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.018_0: tenāpi brāhmaṇenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.019_0: āyuṣmānapi svāgataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya yena tasya brāhmaṇasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.021_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgatastena brāhmaṇena praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.021_1: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--āryeṇa svāgatena praṇīta āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:117.023_0: iti viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--ārya, praṇītaste āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.026_0: tato dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ śrāvastīvīthīṃ kiliñjacchannām/
S01divyav_u:117.027_0: sa tāmatikrānta ātapena spṛṣṭo madyakṣiptaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:117.028_0: bhagavatā suparṇikā kuṭir nirmitā--maitaṃ kaścid dṛṣṭvā śāsane 'prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:117.029_0: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:117.030_0: anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:117.032_0: atha bhagavānanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā [118]saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:118.002_0: atha bhagavāṃstān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ayaṃ sa bhikṣavaḥ svāgato bhikṣuryenāśvatrīrthiko nāgastāvaccaṇḍo vinītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:118.003_0: kimidānīmeṣa śakto durbhuktasyāpi viṣamapanetum? no bhadanta iti/
S01divyav_u:118.004_1: tasmānna bhikṣuṇā madyaṃ pātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:118.006_0: tato bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamādāya vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:118.007_0: niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--māṃ bho bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśya bhavadbhirmadyamapeyamadeyamantataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi/
S01divyav_u:118.009_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:118.009_0_1: bhadanta āyuṣmatā svāgatena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye kule mahādhane mahābhoge jātah?
S01divyav_u:118.009_0_2: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena kroḍamallako jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:118.009_1: durāgata iti ca saṃjñā saṃvṛttā? kiṃ karma kṛtam yena bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:118.009_2_0: tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāṃ cāgratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭah? bhagavānāha--svāgatenaiva bhikṣavo
S01divyav_u:118.009_2_1: bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:118.015_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:118.015_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:118.019_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//10//
S01divyav_u:118.020_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:118.022_0: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:118.027_0: tena gṛhapatinā bhūyasā paryavasthitena sa mahātmāa svayameva grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:118.031_0: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara mahādakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:118.032_1: tena tasya [119]pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:119.002_0: yattūpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:119.005_0: bhagavānāha--kiṃ kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatireva,
S01divyav_u:119.005_1: asau svāgato bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:119.006_0: yadanena pratyekabuddhe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:119.007_0: yadapakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, tena pañcajanmaśatāni kroḍamallako jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:119.008_0: yatpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:119.009_0: ahamanena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:119.010_0: bhūyo 'pi kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe pravrajito babhūva/
S01divyav_u:119.011_1: sa bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:119.012_0: tatrānena yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cāritam, na ca kaścidguṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:119.013_0: sa maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare dakṣiṇīye yādavāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:119.013_2_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro māṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi
S01divyav_u:119.013_2_1: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha
S01divyav_u:119.017_0: yathā mām upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:119.017_1: evaṃ māmapi sa bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ śākyādhirājo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagraṃ nirdiśediti/
S01divyav_u:119.020_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:119.022_0: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmaṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:120.002_0: dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputraysa pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi kliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:120.002_1: amlānāni mālyāni mlāyanti, daurgandhaṃ kāyena niṣkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:120.002_3: cyavanadharmā devaputraḥ sva āsane dhṛtiṃ na labhate/
S01divyav_u:120.003_2_0: hā puṣkariṇī, hā vāpī, hā caitraratha, hā pāruṣyaka, hā nandanavana, hā miśrakāvana,
S01divyav_u:120.003_2_1: hā pāriyātraka, hā puṇḍukambalaśilā, hā devasabhā, hā sudarśana, iti karuṇakaruṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:120.009_0: upasaṃkramya taṃ devaputramidamavocat--hā kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartase,
S01divyav_u:120.009_2_0: hā puṣkiriṇī, hā vāpī, hā caitraratha, hā pāruṣyaka, hā nandanavana, hā miśrakāvana,
S01divyav_u:120.009_2_1: hā pāriyātraka, hā pāṇḍukambalaśilā, hā devasabhā, hā sudarśana iti karuṇakaruṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:120.009_2_2: paridevase? evamukte devaputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika
S01divyav_u:120.009_2_3: divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkaryāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:120.014_0: tatra mayā bahūni varṣāṇyuccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:120.014_1: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kāruṇyatayā taṃ devaputramidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa,
S01divyav_u:120.016_0: atha sa devaputrastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhīto maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:120.019_0: atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ//
S01divyav_u:120.021_0: dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
S01divyav_u:120.021_1: atha śakro devānāmindrastaṃ devaputramavalokayati--kimasau devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/
S01divyav_u:120.025_1: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kutūhalajāto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:120.026_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:120.026_1_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ śakro devānāmindro bhagavantamidamavocat--ihāhaṃ bhadanta adrākṣamanyatamaṃ
S01divyav_u:120.026_1_1: devaputraṃ cyavanadharmāṇaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartamānaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ ca paridevamānam--hā
S01divyav_u:120.029_0_0: tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ śocasi paridevase krandasi urasi
S01divyav_u:120.029_0_1: tāḍayasi saṃmohāpadyasa iti? sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamapahāya itaḥ
S01divyav_u:120.029_0_2: saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:120.031_0: tatra mayā [121]bahūni varṣāṇi uccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:121.001_0: tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:121.003_0: sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:121.005_0: kutrāsau bhadanta devaputra upapannah? bhagavānāha--tuṣitā nāma kauśika devāḥ sarvakāmasamṛddhayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:121.006_1: atha śakro devānāmindra āttamānāstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:121.008_0: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.010_0: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.012_0: ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.014_0: atha bhagavāñ śakrasya devānāmindrasya bhāṣitamanusaṃvarṇayannevamāha--evametat kauśika, evametat/
S01divyav_u:121.016_0: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.018_0: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.020_0: ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:121.022_0_0: atha śakro devānāmindro bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā
S01divyav_u:121.022_0_1: vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalikṛtasampuṭo bhagavantaṃ namasyamānastatraivāntarhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:122.002_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatāṃ keśanakhastūpā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:122.002_3: tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṃ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti,
S01divyav_u:122.005_0_0: tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṃs tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmaraṃścittamabhiprasādayati--ityapi
S01divyav_u:122.005_0_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:122.009_0: atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:122.010_0: adrākṣīdbhagavāṃstaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam/
S01divyav_u:122.011_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:122.012_0: anena bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho 'śītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā yāvatyo vālukāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:122.014_0: atha teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat--puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṃ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:122.016_1: atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:122.017_0_0: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anavarāgro
S01divyav_u:122.020_0: āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papraccha--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti,
S01divyav_u:122.020_1: kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyati? nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike/
S01divyav_u:122.023_0: tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:123.002_1: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau pratilabdhau/
S01divyav_u:123.003_0: tena niveśanaṃ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṃ ca śikṣāpitau/
S01divyav_u:123.004_0: tayoścāyuṣmānānando 'bhīkṣṇamāgatya caturāryasatyasamprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti--yaduta idaṃ duḥkham,
S01divyav_u:123.004_1: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ, iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi/
S01divyav_u:123.007_0: teṣāṃ kālānukālamupasaṃkrāmatāṃ tābhyāṃ śukaśāvakābhyāṃ nāmāni parijñātāni/
S01divyav_u:123.009_0: dṛṣṭvā antarjanamāmantrayatah--eṣa bhadantaḥ sthaviraḥ śāriputra āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:123.010_0: evamāyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ kāśyapaṃ raivatamāyuṣmantamānandaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayatah--eṣo 'smākamācāryānanda āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:123.012_1: adrāṣṭāṃ tau śukaśāvakau bhagavantaṃ dūrādevāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittamatyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam/
S01divyav_u:123.016_0: atha bhagavāṃstayoranugrahārthaṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:123.016_1: niṣadya bhagavatā śukaśāvakau caturāryasatyasamprativedhikayā dharmadeśanayā śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau/
S01divyav_u:123.018_0: atha bhagavāñ śukaśāvakau antarjanaṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:123.019_0: tau cāntarjanasya viharataḥ pramādavihāriṇau biḍālena prāṇinā gṛhītau/
S01divyav_u:123.020_0: vihvalavadanau cchidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:123.020_1: namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāyetyuktvā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau/
S01divyav_u:123.023_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetupratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:123.024_0: ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇe? evametadānanda, evametat/
S01divyav_u:123.025_0: nāhetupratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:123.026_0: dṛṣṭau tvayā ānanda tau śukaśāvakau? dṛṣṭau bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:123.026_1: tau ānanda śukaśāvakau mama samanantaraprakrāntasya biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitād vyaparopitau/
S01divyav_u:123.027_0: tau buddhadharmasaṃghāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau//
S01divyav_u:123.029_0: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan/
S01divyav_u:123.030_0: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya pracaranto 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:123.030_1: namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāyeti biḍālena prāṇinā vyaparopitau[124] iti/
S01divyav_u:124.001_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:124.002_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:124.003_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantamidamavocan--iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavad yāvadanāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane dvau śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:124.003_1: namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāyeti kurvāṇau biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitādvyaparopitau iti/
S01divyav_u:124.006_0: tayorbhadanta kā gatiḥ, kopapattiḥ, ko 'bhisamparāyah? bhagavānāha--tau bhikṣavaḥ śukaśāvakau tasya śaraṇagamanasya vipākena ṣaṭtriṃśatkṛtvaścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyete,
S01divyav_u:124.006_3_0: 124.009 tatastāvat ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu sattvā vyapasaṃsṛtya paścime bhave paścime
S01divyav_u:124.006_3_1: nikete paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labdhvā pratyekāṃ bodhimabhisambhotsyete,
S01divyav_u:124.011_0: evaṃ hi bhikṣavo mahāphalaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ mahānuśaṃsakam,
S01divyav_u:124.012_0: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam yanno dharmaśravaṇābhiratā bhaviṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.002_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām/
S01divyav_u:125.003_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:125.004_0: vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya yena cāpālacaityaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.006_0_1: saptāmrakam {bahupatrakam} gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhurānikṣepanaṃ mallānāṃ makuṭabandhanaṃ
S01divyav_u:125.008_1: yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:125.008_2: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:125.010_0: tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.011_0: ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:125.012_0_1: caityaṃ saptāmrakaṃ bahupatrakaṃ gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhuranikṣepanaṃ mallānāṃ
S01divyav_u:125.014_1: yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:125.014_2: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:125.016_0: tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.016_1: ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:125.017_1_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--sphūṭo 'bhavadānando bhikṣurmāreṇa pāpīyasā yatredānīm
S01divyav_u:125.017_1_1: yāvat trirapi audārike avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkriyamāṇe na śaknoti tannimittamājñātum
S01divyav_u:125.021_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagvataḥ pratiśrutya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya/
S01divyav_u:125.024_0: kasmāt tvaṃ pāpīyann evaṃ vadasi--parinirvātu bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:125.024_1: parinirvāṇakālasamayaḥ sugatasya? eko 'yaṃ bhadanta samayah--bhagavānurubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle 'cirābhisambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.026_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavantamevaṃ vadāmi--parinirvātu bhagavān, parinirvāṇakālasamayaḥ sugatasya/
S01divyav_u:125.027_1: yāvanna me śrāvakāḥ piṇḍatā bhaviṣyanti vyaktā vinītā viśāradāḥ,
S01divyav_u:125.027_3: alaṃ svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā uapāsikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:125.030_0: vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyanti bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
S01divyav_u:125.031_0: etarhi bhadanta bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ paṇḍitā vyaktā vinītā viśāradā alamutpannotpannānāṃ parapravāditāṃ sahadharmeṇa [126]nigrahītāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:125.031_1: svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā upāsikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:126.002_0: vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
S01divyav_u:126.004_1: nicirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayānnirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:126.005_0: atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--parinirvāsyate bata śramaṇo gautamaḥ//
S01divyav_u:126.006_0: iti viditvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudita udagraḥ prītisaumanasyajātastatraivāntarhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:126.007_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--kastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ vaineyah? supriyo gandharvarājā subhadraśca parivrājakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:126.008_0: tayostrayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādindriyaparipāko bhaviṣyati sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:126.009_0: śakyaṃ śrāvakavaineyastathāgatena vinayituṃ na tu tathāgatavaineyaḥ śrāvakeṇa//
S01divyav_u:126.010_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--yannvahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyam yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsṛjeyam/
S01divyav_u:126.011_0: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsraṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:126.014_0: samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu ṣaṇnimittāni prādurbhūtānipuṣpavṛkṣaḥ śīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:126.014_1: ratnavṛkṣāḥ śīrṇāḥ, ābharaṇavṛkṣāḥ śīrṇāḥ, bhavanasahasrāṇi prakampitāni,
S01divyav_u:126.016_0: atha bhagavāṃstasmāt samādhervyutthāya tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:126.020_0: samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikaṃ prakrāntā darśanāya vandanāya/
S01divyav_u:126.021_0: bhagavatā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekairdevatāśatasahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:126.024_1: samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāroṣvanekā nāgayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā bhagavato darśanāya/
S01divyav_u:126.026_0: bhagavatā teṣāmevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekair nāgayakṣagandharvakinnarairmahoragaiḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni yāvat svabhavanamanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:126.028_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthād/
S01divyav_u:126.029_0: ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya? aṣṭau ime ānanda aṣṭau pratyayā mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:126.032_0: bhavatyānanda samayo yadākāśe yadākāśe viṣamā [127]vāyavo vānti,
S01divyav_u:126.032_1: āpaḥ kṣobhayanti, āpaḥ kṣubdhāḥ pṛthivīṃ cālayanti/
S01divyav_u:127.001_0: ayamānanda prathamo hetuḥ prathamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.005_1: ayaṃ dvitīyo heturdvitīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.008_0: yā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatrāmū sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.008_1: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:127.010_0: tatra ye sattvā upapannāḥ, te tayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānante--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.012_0: ayamānanda tṛtīyo hetustṛtīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.013_0: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣer niṣkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:127.013_1: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:127.014_0: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.014_1: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:127.016_0: tatra ye sattvā upapannāḥ, te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.018_0: ayamānanda caturtho hetuścaturthaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.020_0: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.020_1: tā pi tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:127.023_0: tatra ye sattvā upapannāḥ, te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.024_0: ayamānanda pañcamo hetuḥ pañcamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.025_0: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye tathāgatastriparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ parivartayati,
S01divyav_u:127.027_0: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.027_1: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:127.029_0: tatra ye sattvā upapannāḥ, te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:127.031_0: ayamānanda ṣaṣṭho hetuḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:127.032_1: atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.003_0: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayāa ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.003_1: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:128.005_0: tatra ye sattvā upapannāḥ, te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.006_0: ayamānanda saptamo hetuḥ saptamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:128.007_0: punaraparamānanda nacirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:128.008_0: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.008_2: sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena yatremau sūryacandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.008_3: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:128.012_0: tatra ye sattvā, upapannāḥ, te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.014_0: ayamānanda aṣṭamo heturaṣṭamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya//
S01divyav_u:128.015_0: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yathā khalvahaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bhāsitasyārthamājānāmi,
S01divyav_u:128.015_1: ihaiva bhagavatā jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuhasaṃskārā utsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:128.017_1: etarhi ānanda tathāgatena jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārā utsṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:128.018_0: saṃmukhaṃ me bhadanta bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītam--yasya kasyaciccatvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:128.020_0: bhagavatā bhadanta catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:128.021_0: ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:128.021_1: tiṣṭhatu bhagavān kalpam, tiṣṭhatu sugataḥ kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:128.022_0: tavaivānanda aparādhastavaiva duṣkṛtam yastvaṃ tathāyatasya yāvat trirapyaudāre avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkṛte na śaknoṣi tannimittaṃ pratiśrāvayitum,
S01divyav_u:128.024_0: kimanyasya ānanda bhāṣeta tathāgatastāṃ vācam yā syād dvidhā? no bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:128.025_0: sādhu sādhu ānanda, asthānametadānanda anavakāśo yat tathāgatastāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta yā syāddvidhā/
S01divyav_u:128.026_0: gaccha tvamānanda, yāvanto bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
S01divyav_u:128.027_1: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
S01divyav_u:128.029_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:128.030_0: ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
S01divyav_u:129.001_1: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anityā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇo yāvadalameva bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārān saṃskaritumalam/
S01divyav_u:129.003_1: etarhi vā me 'tyayādye te dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:129.003_3_0: te bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā grāhayitavyā
S01divyav_u:129.003_3_1: yathaiva tatra brahmacaryaṃ virasthitikaṃ syādbahujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ
S01divyav_u:129.006_0: etarhi bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:129.006_2_0: ye bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpay tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā
S01divyav_u:129.011_0: ime te bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:129.011_2_0: bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā yathaitadbrahmacaryaṃ
S01divyav_u:129.014_1: bhagavān vaiśālīvanamabhisaran dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayati/
S01divyav_u:129.015_0: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetvapratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena nāgāvalokitamavalokayanti/
S01divyav_u:129.017_0: ko bhadanta hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo nāgāvalokitasya? evametadānanda, evametat/
S01divyav_u:129.018_0: nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayanti/
S01divyav_u:129.024_1: yadā ha bhagavatā vāg bhāṣitā idamapaścimakaṃ vaiśālyā darśanam,
S01divyav_u:129.026_0: sthavirānandaḥ kathayati--na bhagavannameghenaiva varṣāsu pravṛṣṭah? bhagavānāha--vaiśālivananivāsinībhirdaivatairmama viyogādaśrupātaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:129.027_0: tā api devatā(?) vaiśālyāṃ śabdo niścāritah--bhagavān parinirvāṇāya gacchati,
S01divyav_u:129.029_0: devatānāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavatsakāśamupasaṃkrāntāni/
S01divyav_u:129.030_0: bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā evaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:130.002_1: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:130.003_0: sthavirānandaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavantamidamavocat--paśya bhadanta yāvat tvam/
S01divyav_u:130.004_0: bhagavatā parinirvāṇāya prasthitenānekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
S01divyav_u:130.010_2_0: atra ānanda kimāścaryaṃ mayā etarhi sarvajñena sarvākārajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
S01divyav_u:130.012_0_1: yanmayā maraṇāntikayā vedanayā spṛṣṭena evaṃvidhā parikarmakathā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:130.012_2: ṛṣayaḥ pravrajitvā catvāro brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kalpavṛndaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.017_1: upoṣadhasya rājño mūrdhni piṭṭako jāto mṛduḥ sumṛduḥ, tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā/
S01divyav_u:130.019_0: kumāro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.020_2: mūrdhato jāto mūrdhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:130.021_0: māṃ dhaya māṃ dhaya māndhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:130.022_0: māndhātasya kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.026_0: tairamātyaiḥ punaḥ saṃdeśo visarjitah--pitā te kāladharmaṇā samyuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.027_1: kiṃ bhūyo 'haṃ gacchāmīti? tato bhūyaḥ saṃdeśo 'bhyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.028_1: sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, ihaiva rājyābhiṣeka āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:130.029_0: tataste amātyaiḥ kathayanti--ratnaśilayā deva prayojanaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:130.030_0: tasya ca divaukaso nāma yakṣaḥ purojavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:130.031_0: yadā ratnaśilā ānītā, tataste amātyā bhūyaḥ kathayanti--deva śrīparyaṅkenātra prayojanaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:131.001_0: sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, ihaivādhiṣṭhānamāgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:131.004_1: sa kathayati--mama manuṣyāḥ paṭṭaṃ bandhiṣyanti? yadi dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate,
S01divyav_u:131.005_2: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:131.007_0: pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarupiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:131.009_0: tatra vanakhaṇḍe prabhūtāḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāśca prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:131.010_0: te ca pakṣiṇo 'vatīryamāṇā avatīryamāṇāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:131.011_1: yadā teṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni, tataste pādoddhārakeṇa prasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:131.012_0: sa ca rājā janapadānanusaṃsārya paśyati pādoddhārakeṇa gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:131.013_0: yataste 'mātyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--kasmāt pādoddhārakeṇa gacchanti? paścāt te 'mātyāḥ kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:131.013_1: śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānānīti eteṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni/
S01divyav_u:131.014_0: tato rājñā abhihitam--evaṃvidhā api ṛṣayo bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:131.014_1: yeṣāṃ sattvānāmantike nāstyanukampā? tato rājñā amātyāḥ saṃdiṣṭāh--gacchantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:131.014_2: ṛṣīṇāmevaṃ vadantu--tatra gacchata yatrāhaṃ na vasayā(sā?)mīti/
S01divyav_u:131.020_1: cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya pṛthak pṛthagutkāḥ śilpasthānakarmasthānāni māpayitum/
S01divyav_u:131.021_0: cintakā ime tulakā upaparīkṣakā iti mantrajā mantrajā iti saṃjñā/
S01divyav_u:131.022_1: yataḥ sa rājā paśyati janapadānanusaṃsāryākṛṣyān karmāntān kurvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:131.023_0: yato rājñā abhihitam--kimete manuṣyāḥ kurvanti? tatastairamātyai rājā abhihitah--ete deva manuṣyāḥ śāsyādīni kṛṣanti,
S01divyav_u:131.025_0: yataśca sa rājā kathayati--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kṛṣiṣyanti? tatastenoktam--aptāviṃśatibījajātīnāṃ devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:131.027_0: rājñā mūrdhātena janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāh--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? tairabhihitam--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:131.028_1: bhūyo 'pi ca rājñā mūrdhātena janapadānanusaṃsārya tena pṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:131.029_0: tato rājñā abhihitam--kimete manuṣyāḥ kurvanti? tairamātyairabhihitam--deva,
S01divyav_u:131.031_0: tato rājñā tenoktam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ karpāsavātān māpayiṣyantīti karpāsameva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:131.032_0: sahacittotpādādeva[132] rājño mūrdhātasya karpāsāneva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.001_1: kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:132.003_0: sa rājā kathayati--kimete manuṣyāḥ karvanti? tairamātyairabhihitam--deva sūtreṇa prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:132.004_0: tato rājñā abhihitam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kartiṣyanti? sūtrameva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:132.004_1: sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya sūtrameva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.005_0: sa ca rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? yataste kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:132.006_1: sa rājā kathayati--kimete manuṣyāḥ kurvanti? tairamātyairabhihitam--deva,
S01divyav_u:132.008_0: yato rājā saṃlakṣayati--mama rājye manuṣyā vastrāṇi vāpayiṣyante? vastrāṇyeva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:132.009_0: sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya vastrāṇyeva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.009_1: sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:132.010_0: yataḥ sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--manuṣyā mama puṇyānāṃ prabhāvaṃ na jānanti/
S01divyav_u:132.011_1: asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
S01divyav_u:132.012_0: santi me sapta ratnāni, tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:132.014_0: pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:132.015_0: aho bata me 'ntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patet, ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatet/
S01divyav_u:132.015_1: sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasyāntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ vṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:132.016_0: ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatito yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtapuṇyasya kṛtakuśalasya svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.018_0: yataḥ sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:132.019_0: yato rājā sa rājā kathayati--kṣuṇṇā bhavanto yadi yuṣmābhiḥ pūrvamevābhihitamabhaviṣyaddevasya puṇyānīti,
S01divyav_u:132.020_0: api tu yo yuṣmākaṃ ratnairarthī, sa yāvadīpsitāni ratnāni gṛhṇātu//
S01divyav_u:132.022_0: tasya tatra mūrdhātasya rājño mahārājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.023_0: sa rājñā mūrdhātenoktah--asti kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam yadvayamājñāpayema? yataḥ paścāddivaukasenābhihitah--asti deva pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ,
S01divyav_u:132.025_1: atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
S01divyav_u:132.027_0: asti me sapta ratnāni tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:132.028_0: pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:132.029_1: śrūyate atha khalu pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:132.030_1: sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhāta uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:133.001_1_0: bhūyaḥ sa rājā divaukasam yakṣamāmantrayati--asti divaukasaṃ kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam?
S01divyav_u:133.001_1_1: divaukasa āha--asti deva aparagodānīyaṃ nāma dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca
S01divyav_u:133.004_1: atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
S01divyav_u:133.005_1: pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:133.006_0: vṛṣṭaṃ me saptāhamantaḥpure hiraṇyavarṣam yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtakuśalasya svapuṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:133.008_0: śrūyate aparagodānīyaṃ nāma dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:133.009_1: sahacittopādādeva rājā māndhātā uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:133.012_1: yataḥ sa rājā māndhātā divaukasam yakṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti kaścidanyadvīpo nājñāpitah? āgato 'smi pūrvān/
S01divyav_u:133.014_0: kiṃ cāpi te manuṣyā amamā aparigrahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:133.014_1: yannu devo gatvā svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāset/
S01divyav_u:133.015_0: atha rājño māndhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:133.016_1: pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:133.018_2: yannvahaṃ tatrāpi gatvā svaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāseyam/
S01divyav_u:133.019_0: sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhātā sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ saptaratnapurojava uparivihāyasenābhyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:133.021_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punardivaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate sma--kimetaddivaukasa citropacitrān vṛkṣānāpīḍakajātān/
S01divyav_u:133.024_1: śrutvā ca punā rājā māndhātā amātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaścitropacitrān vṛkṣānāpīḍakajātān? evaṃ deva/
S01divyav_u:133.026_0: ete grāmaṇya uttarakauravāṇāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā yata uttarakauravā manuṣyāḥ kalpadūṣyāṇi prāvaranti/
S01divyav_u:133.027_1_0: adrākṣīdrājā māndhātā sumerupārśvenānuyāyañ śvetaśvetaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam? etaddeva
S01divyav_u:133.027_1_1: uttarakauravakāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmakṛṣṭoptaṃ taṇḍulaphalaśālim yata uttarakauravakā manuṣyā
S01divyav_u:133.032_1: samanuśāsti rājā māndhātā uttarakurau dvīpe svakam [134]bhaṭabalāgram/
S01divyav_u:134.001_0: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.001_1: atha rājā māndhātā divaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate--asti kiṃcidanyadvīpamanājñāpitamiti? nāsti deva/
S01divyav_u:134.002_0: śrūyante devāstrāyastriṃśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.004_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:134.006_0: pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:134.008_1: śrūyante devāstrāyaṃstriśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.010_0: sahacittotpādādeva rājā māndhātā uparivihāyasamabhyudgataḥ sārdhamaṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ saptaratnapurojavaḥ putrasahasraparivṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.012_0: atha rājā nimiṃdhare parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
S01divyav_u:134.012_1: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.013_0: nimiṃdharāt parvatāt vinatake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
S01divyav_u:134.013_1: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.015_0: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.015_1: aśvakarṇagirerapi parvatāt sudarśane parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
S01divyav_u:134.016_0: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.017_0: sudarśanāt parvatāt khadirake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
S01divyav_u:134.017_1: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.018_1: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.020_0: tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.027_0: atha rājā tasmiñ śāsane 'bhyāgataḥ kathayati--kenaitadviṣkambhitaṃ bhaṭabalāgram? tenoktam--ṛṣibhirdeva taṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam/
S01divyav_u:134.028_0: paścād rājñā abhihitam--kimeṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ sarvaṃ priyamiti? pariṇāyakaratnenoktam--jaṭā ṛṣīṇāṃ sarveṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:134.029_0: tato rājñā abhihitam--ṛṣīṇāṃ jaṭāḥ śīryantām, mama ca bhaṭabalāgraṃ vihāyasā gacchatu/
S01divyav_u:134.030_0: teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ, rājñaśca mūrdhātasya bhaṭabalāgraṃ vihāyasena prasthitam/
S01divyav_u:134.031_0_0: sumeruḥ parvatarājā aśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhito
S01divyav_u:135.003_0: tasya mūrdhni devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram/
S01divyav_u:135.003_1: devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ pañca rakṣāḥ sthāpitāh--udakaniśritā nāgāḥ,
S01divyav_u:135.006_1: tenoktam--kenaitadbhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam? te kathayanti--deva, udakaniśritair nāgaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:135.007_0: rājā kathayati--tiryañco mama yudhyanti? tena hyudakaniśritā eva me nāgāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
S01divyav_u:135.009_1: yato nāgaistaiḥ karoṭapāṇibhirdevaiḥ sārdhaṃ miśribhāvaṃ gatvā punastadbalāgraṃ stambhitam/
S01divyav_u:135.012_0: rājā mūdhātaḥ kathayati--ete 'pyeva me karoṭapāṇayo devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
S01divyav_u:135.013_0: paścāt teṣāṃ nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ dhāvatāṃ mālādhārā devāḥ saṃprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:135.013_1: mālādhārairdevaiste pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ bhavanto dhāvatah? te kathayanti--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:135.016_0: rājā kathayati--mālādhārā devāḥ purojavā me bhavantu/
S01divyav_u:135.017_0: yato mālādhārā devāstair nāgairdevaiśca sārdhaṃ mūrdhātasyāgrataḥ pradhāvitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:135.018_1: sadāmattairdevaiḥ pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ bhavanto dhāvatah? tair nāgaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devairabhihitāh--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:135.019_0: yato bhūyaḥ sadāmattairdevaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devair nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ miśrībhāvaṃ kṛtvā bhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam/
S01divyav_u:135.021_0: tenoktam--kimetadbhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam? te kathayanti--ete deva sadāmattā devāḥ/
S01divyav_u:135.022_0: rājñā abhihitam--sadāmattā eva me devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
S01divyav_u:135.022_1: yataḥ sadāmattā devāstaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair nāgaiścāgrataḥ pradhāvitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:135.024_0: tairuktam--kimetadbhavanto dhāvatah? yato nāgādibhirdevairagrato 'nuyāyibhirabhihitāh--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:135.029_0_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punardivaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate--kimetaddivaukasa nīlanīlā vanarājirmegharājirivonnatā?
S01divyav_u:135.029_0_1: eṣā deva devānāṃ pārijātako nāma kovidāro yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikān
S01divyav_u:135.029_0_2: māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtās trīḍanti ramante paricārayanti/
S01divyav_u:135.032_0: devo 'pyatra gatvā divyaih [136]pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtas trīḍatu ramatāṃ paricārayatu/
S01divyav_u:136.001_0: śrutvā ca punā rājā mūrdhāto 'mātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājiṃ megharājimivonnatām? evaṃ deva/
S01divyav_u:136.003_0_0: eṣa devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ pārijātakaḥ kovidāro yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikān
S01divyav_u:136.003_0_1: māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti/
S01divyav_u:136.005_0: yūyamapi grāmaṇyo 'tra gatvā divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍata ramata paricārayata/
S01divyav_u:136.007_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punardivaukasam yakṣamāmantrayate--kimetaddivaukasa śvetaśvetamabhrakūṭamivonnatam? eṣā deva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā,
S01divyav_u:136.007_1: yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca mahārājānaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti tulayanti upaparīkṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:136.010_1: śrutvā ca punaramātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ śvetaśvetamabhrakūṭamivonnatam? evaṃ deva/
S01divyav_u:136.011_0_0: eṣā trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca mahārājānaḥ
S01divyav_u:136.011_0_1: saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti tulayanti
S01divyav_u:136.014_0_0: devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaramardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena
S01divyav_u:136.014_0_1: ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇi vistareṇa samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa daśayojanasahasrāṇi
S01divyav_u:136.016_1: teṣu prākāreṣu caturvidhāḥ ṣo(kho)ḍakā māpitāḥ suvarṇamayā rūpyamayā vaiḍūryamayā sphaṭikamayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:136.018_1: sudarśananagare 'bhyantare bhūmibhāgo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaścitraḥ sucitra ekaikacitradhātuśatena mṛduḥ sumṛdus tadyathā tulapicurvā/
S01divyav_u:136.020_1: prakṣipte pāde avanamatyutkṣipte pāde unnamati divyairmandāravaiḥ puṣpairjānumātreṇa oghena saṃstīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:136.022_1: dvāre dvāre pañcaśatāni nīlavāsasām yakṣāṇāṃ sthāpitāni saṃnaddhāni santi citrakalāpāni yāvadeva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmārakṣaṇārthamatyarthaṃ śobhanārtham/
S01divyav_u:136.024_0_0: sudarśanasya nagarasya vīthyah ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena vistareṇa dvādaśa
S01divyav_u:136.028_1: tāḥ puṣkiriṇyaḥ pūrṇāḥ śītalena vāriṇā kṣaudrakalpenāmbunā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā vividhairjalajaiḥ śakunakairvalgusvarairmanojñasvaraiḥ kāmarūpibhir nikūjatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:136.030_0: sāmantake vividhāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ sujātāḥ susaṃsthitā āpīḍakajātāḥ,
S01divyav_u:136.030_1: tadyathā dakṣeṇa mālākāreṇa vā mālākārāntevāsinā vā mālā vā agrasthitāvataṃsakāni vā suracitāni/
S01divyav_u:137.001_0: sudarśane nagare caturvidhāḥ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.003_0: yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādāddhaste prādurbhavanti/
S01divyav_u:137.004_0: caturvidhā ābharaṇavṛkṣā hastopagāḥ pādopagā guhyāḥ prakāśitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.005_0: yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād haste prādurbhavanti/
S01divyav_u:137.006_1: yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād haste prādurbhavanti/
S01divyav_u:137.007_0: caturvidhāpi ca sudhā, nīlā pītā lohitā avadātā/
S01divyav_u:137.008_0: yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād dhaste prādurbhavanti/
S01divyav_u:137.009_0: gṛhāḥ kūṭāgārā harmyāḥ prāsādā svāsanakā avalokanakā saṃkramaṇakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.010_1: yatra trāyastriṃśāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti, svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavanti/
S01divyav_u:137.011_0: devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā devasabhā trīṇi yojanaśatānyāyāmena trīṇi yojanaśatāni vistareṇa samantaparikṣepeṇa navayojanaśatāni abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sphaṭikamayī,
S01divyav_u:137.015_0: teṣāmeva devānāṃ sarvānte mūrdhātasya rājña āsanaṃ prajñaptam/
S01divyav_u:137.017_0: tatra ye puṇyamaheśākhyāḥ sattvā anupūrveṇa praviṣṭāh avaśiṣṭā bahiḥ sthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.017_1: yataḥ sa rājā mūrdhātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yānyetānyāsanāni prajñaptakāni,
S01divyav_u:137.019_0: atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate/
S01divyav_u:137.021_1: na khalu rājño mūrdhātasya śakrasya devānāmindrasyaikāsane niṣaṇṇayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo vā,
S01divyav_u:137.021_2: abhiprāyo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā, yaduta ārohapariṇāhau varṇapuṣkalatā svaraguptyā svaragupteḥ,
S01divyav_u:137.024_0: rājño mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāścakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.024_1: tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:137.025_0: tatra yadyasurāḥ parājayante, paścādasurapuryāṃ dvārāṇi badhnanti/
S01divyav_u:137.027_0: yato rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānāmuktam--kimetadbhavanto 'tīva saṃbhramajātā devāh? trāyastriṃśairuktam--etairasurairasmākaṃ pañca rakṣā bhagnāḥ,
S01divyav_u:137.029_0: yato mūrdhātena rājñā uktam--ātmapuruṣāḥ, ānayantu bhavanto dhanuḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.031_1: taṃ śrutvā asurā kathayanti--kasyaiṣa guṇaśabdah? taiḥ śrutam--rājño mūrdhātasyaiṣa guṇaśabdaḥ/
S01divyav_u:137.032_1: paścādrājā mūrdhāto nirgatastasmādevanagarāt [138]teṣāṃ devānāmasurairbhagnakānāṃ svaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃnahya/
S01divyav_u:138.001_0: dharmatā ca punareṣāṃ devāsurāṇām yudhyatāṃ rathā vaihāyasena tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:138.002_0: teṣāmanyonyaṃ na kasyacidadhiko vā hīno vā/
S01divyav_u:138.003_0: paścāt te 'surāḥ kathayanti--ka eṣo 'smākamuparivihāyasamabhyudgatah? yatastaiḥ śrutam--manuṣyarājā eṣa mūrdhāto nāma/
S01divyav_u:138.004_0: paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/
S01divyav_u:138.005_0: jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:138.006_0: paścādrājā mūrdhātaḥ kathayati--kasya jayah? yato 'mātyāḥ kathayanti devasya jayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:138.007_0: sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--ahameva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sakāśādabhyadhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:138.008_1: asti me sapta ratnāni, asti me sahasraṃ putrāṇām, vṛṣṭaṃ me 'ntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣam,
S01divyav_u:138.012_0: aho batāhaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:138.013_0: sahacittotpādādrājā mūrdhātastasmāt ṛddhitaḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt/
S01divyav_u:138.014_2: atha rājño mūrdhātasyāmātyagaṇamahāmātyā rājyakartāro mantrasahajīvino yena rājā mūrdhātastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:138.016_0_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ mūrdhātamidamavocan--bhaviṣyanti khalu devasyātyayāt paścimā
S01divyav_u:138.016_0_1: janapadāh? paripṛṣṭavantah--rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye kiṃ vyākṛtam? saced vo
S01divyav_u:138.016_0_2: grāmṇyo mamātyayāt kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet--kiṃ bhavanto rājñā mūrdhātena
S01divyav_u:138.016_1: teṣāmidaṃ syādvacanīyām--rājā bhavanto mūrdhāto ratnaiḥ samanvāgato 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:138.019_0: catasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhī ṛddhibhiścaturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:138.028_0: yaḥ prekṣati duḥkhamitonidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:138.030_0: loke hi śalyamupādhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet//7//
S01divyav_u:139.001_0: [139]yadā ca punastena janakāyena śrutaṃ rājā mūrdhāto glāno maraṇāvasthita iti,
S01divyav_u:139.001_1: tataste 'mātyā janapadāścānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājānaṃ mūrdhātamupasaṃkramya darśanāya/
S01divyav_u:139.002_0: yatastena rājñā tasya janasya tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā--kāmeṣvādīnavakathā gṛhāśramapadasyādīnavo bhāṣitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:139.002_1: tathā kāmo jugupsito yathā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmantike pravrajya gṛhāśramapadānyapahāya vanaṃ saṃśritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:139.002_2: ṛṣibhiḥ pravrajitvā catvāri brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:139.006_0: yāvacca jambudvīpe yāvacca pūrvavidehe dvīpe yāvaccāparagodānīye dvīpe yāvaccottarakuruṣu yāvacca saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu yāvacca devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍaḥ,
S01divyav_u:139.009_0: śakrasya bhikṣavo devānāmindrasyāyuṣaḥ prāmāṇam yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣamekaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmekarātriṃdivasam/
S01divyav_u:139.009_1: 139.011ṭena rātriṃdivasena triṃśadrātrakena māsena dvādaśamāsena saṃvatsareṇa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam/
S01divyav_u:139.012_0: tadbhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣalakṣāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca varṣasahasrāṇi//
S01divyav_u:139.014_1: evaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpāditam--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate,
S01divyav_u:139.014_2: kāśyapo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:139.016_0_0: yasmin khalvānanda samaye rājño mūrdhātasyaivaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpannam--yannvahaṃ śakraṃ
S01divyav_u:139.016_0_1: devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
S01divyav_u:139.016_1: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhastena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:139.020_0: yo 'sau rājā mūrdhātaḥ, ahamevānanda tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:139.021_0_0: tatra tāvanmayā ānanda sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena aparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa
S01divyav_u:139.021_0_1: maraṇakālasamaye tāvadevaṃvidhā parikathā kṛtā yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya
S01divyav_u:139.021_0_2: ṛṣibhyaḥ pravrajitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ vyapahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokamupapāditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:139.024_0: idānīṃ sarvajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena nirvāṇāya saṃprasthitena tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:139.028_0: anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi yeṣāṃ kecitsrotāpattiphale vyavasthāpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:139.028_1: kecit sakṛdāgāmiphale, kecidanāgāmiphale, kaiścit pravrajitvā^rhattvaṃ prāptam,
S01divyav_u:139.028_2: kaiścit śrāvakabodhau, kaiścit pratyekabodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpāditāni,
S01divyav_u:140.001_0_1: bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāni rājñā mūrdhātena yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena sahacittotpādādeva
S01divyav_u:140.004_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani sarvābhibhūr nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃl loke utpanno
S01divyav_u:140.004_0_1: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:140.006_1: tatra viṣaye dharmatā--yā aciroḍhā dārikā bhartari pravahaṇakena pratipradīyate,
S01divyav_u:140.006_2: sā catūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakīrya baddhakā svāmine pradīyate/
S01divyav_u:140.008_1: sa ca śreṣṭhidārakaścatūratnamayāni puṣpāṇi pratigṛhya yānamadhiruhya śvaśuragṛhamanuprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:140.009_0: tasya gacchato 'bhimukhaṃ sarvābhibhūḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ carannanupūrveṇābhyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:140.011_0: yato 'sau prasādīkṛtacetā yānādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ taiścatūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakiriti/
S01divyav_u:140.012_0: tāni sarvābhibhuvā samyaksambuddhenādhiṣṭhitāni tathā yathā śakaṭacakramātrāṇyabhinirvṛttāni/
S01divyav_u:140.015_0: anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:140.017_0: tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān atāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//8//
S01divyav_u:140.021_0: praṇidhiśca me tatra kṛtā udārā ākāṅkṣatā vā idamagrabodhim//9//
S01divyav_u:140.023_0: tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me prāpta hi me bodhiḥ śivā anuttarā/
S01divyav_u:140.025_0: vṛṣṭaṃ ca saptāhahiraṇyavarṣaṃ mūrdhātasya rājño mahābalasya//10//
S01divyav_u:140.027_0: tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me nagaramapi sauvarṇakāñcanaṃ babhūva mahāsudarśanasya ramaṇīyā kuśāvatī nāma purī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:140.029_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśaṃ
S01divyav_u:140.029_0_1: bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
S01divyav_u:141.001_0: [141]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.002_0: atha sa vipaśyī samyaksabuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.003_0: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt/
S01divyav_u:141.004_1: bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.005_0: prasādajātena tasya mudgānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā pātre prakṣiptā/
S01divyav_u:141.006_0: tato mudgāścatvāraḥ pātre patitāḥ, ekaḥ kaṇṭakamāhatya bhūmau patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.006_1: avaśiṣṭaṃ naivaṃ saṃprāptaṃ pātram, asamprāptā eva bhūmau patitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.009_0: anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.011_0: tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān na tāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//11/
S01divyav_u:141.013_0: bhagavānāha--yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:141.013_1: yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya prasādajātena mudgānāṃ muṣṭiḥ pātre pakṣiptā,
S01divyav_u:141.013_2: tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau patitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:141.013_3: tasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:141.017_0: sacedbhikṣavaḥ sa mudgaḥ pātre patito 'bhaviṣyanna bhūmau,
S01divyav_u:141.017_1: sthāanametadvidyate yaddeveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritamabhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:141.018_0: yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik tena kālena tena samayena, sa eṣa rājā mūrdhātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:141.019_0: yo mūrdhāto rājā, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:141.020_0: yasmādevaṃ buddhe bhagavati mahākāruṇike kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhavanti mahānuśaṃśā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārikā iti,
S01divyav_u:141.021_0: kiṃ karaṇīyam? buddhe dharme saṃghe kārāḥ karaṇīyāḥ samyakpraṇidhānāni ca karaṇīyānīti//
S01divyav_u:142.003_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:142.004_0: tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahāsamudrataṭamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:142.006_0: yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:142.007_0: paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:142.008_0: yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:142.008_2: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:142.010_0: ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam,
S01divyav_u:142.010_1: kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm,
S01divyav_u:142.014_0: evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:142.016_1: yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
S01divyav_u:142.018_0: tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:142.018_1: santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:142.018_2: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ kālikāvātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:142.021_1: yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ parityaktum,
S01divyav_u:142.023_1: taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ, kecidavaśiṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:142.025_0: paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:142.025_1: tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
S01divyav_u:142.027_1: sa taṃ pradeśamanuprāptānāṃ karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ,
S01divyav_u:142.029_0: tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:142.029_1: tāḥ puruṣaṃ labdhvā tathopalāṃstāḍayanti, yathā atraivānayena vyasanamāpadyate/
S01divyav_u:142.031_0: tāni yo bhakṣayati, sa sapta rātriṃdivasān suptastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:142.031_1: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
S01divyav_u:142.031_2: tāvadvidhān viparītān vāyūnutpādayanti yairvahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadakṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:143.001_1: prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:143.003_0: vahanaṃ pūryitvā te 'nukūlaṃ jambudvīpābhimukhena vāyunā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.004_0: mahāsamudre ca tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃmiśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.006_0: tṛtīye skandhe pañcadaśayojanaśatikā ātmabhāvāḥ, ṣoḍaśayojanaśatikā yāvadekaviṃśatikā ātmabhāvāḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.007_0: tatra ca mahāsamudre tā matsyajātayaḥ parasparānyonyabhakṣaṇaparāḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.008_0: ye prathamāyāṃ bhūmau avasthitāḥ, te dvitīyabhūmisthairbhakṣyante/
S01divyav_u:143.009_0: tatra timiṃgilo nāma matsyāstṛtīyādudakaskandadhādabhyudgamya uparimandakaskandhamādāya carati/
S01divyav_u:143.010_1: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāsamudrāt pānīyaṃ mahatā vegenākṣiptaṃ mukhadvāram yato dhāvati/
S01divyav_u:143.012_0: tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva, tadyathā--parvato nabhaḥpramāṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.013_0: akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/
S01divyav_u:143.014_1: tanmahārṇavarūpamupadhārya cintayituṃ pravṛttāh--kimetadbhavanta ādityadvayasyodayanam? teṣāmevaṃ cintayatāṃ tadvahanaṃ tasya mukhadvāram yato vegenopahartumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:143.016_0: teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ kalpasaṃvartanyāṃ samudāgamiṣyantīti,
S01divyav_u:143.018_0: yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti,
S01divyav_u:143.022_0: paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/
S01divyav_u:143.024_1: tadidānīṃ bhavadbhiḥ kiṃ karaṇīyam? yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
S01divyav_u:143.025_0: yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:143.028_0: naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/
S01divyav_u:143.029_0: tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
S01divyav_u:143.031_0: kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:143.031_1: sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.001_0: bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
S01divyav_u:144.002_0: śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
S01divyav_u:144.003_0: tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno viklavībhūtaśca--buddho bata loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.004_0: na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/
S01divyav_u:144.005_0: sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:144.006_0: yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
S01divyav_u:144.007_0: tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
S01divyav_u:144.009_0: atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīmanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.010_0: te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:144.012_0: yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.012_1: te tāni ratnāni saṃgṛhya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.013_0: anupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ kathayanti--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:144.013_1_0: asmākaṃ samudre yānapātreṇāvatīrṇānāṃ timiṃgilagrāheṇa tasmin yānapāre 'pahriyamāṇe
S01divyav_u:144.013_1_1: jīvitavināśe pratyupasthite bhagavataḥ smaraṇaparāyaṇānāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt mahāgrāhamukhādvinirmuktam,
S01divyav_u:144.013_2: tato vayaṃ bhagavan saṃsiddhayānapārāḥ kṣemasvastinā ihāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.016_0: dharmatā caiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgacchanti, tasya tadgamyaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:144.018_2: kiṃ tathāgatasya bhūyaḥ prākṛtaratnaiḥ karaṇīyam? yadi cecchata asmacchāsane vatsāḥ pravrajitum,
S01divyav_u:144.020_0: yataste saṃlakṣayanti vaṇijah--yadasmākaṃ kiṃcit jīvitam, tatsarvaṃ buddhasya bhagavatastejasā/
S01divyav_u:144.021_0: yadvayametāni ratnāni tyaktvā bhagavato 'ntike pravrajema iti/
S01divyav_u:144.022_0: paścāt te tāni ratnāni mātāpitṛbhyaḥ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakaramitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyo yathānyāyataḥ saṃvibhajya pravrajitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:144.024_0: yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśāni karmāṇi bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:144.024_2: yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena bhagavānārāgito na virāgitah? bhagavānāha--
S01divyav_u:144.027_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho loka utpanno 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:144.027_1: tasya ca śāsane eta eva ca pravrajitā abhūvan/
S01divyav_u:144.028_0: tatra pravrajya ca na kaścit tadrūpo guṇagaṇo 'dhigato nānyatra sabrahmacāriṇāmuddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:144.029_0: maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantah--yadasmābhiḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksambuddhamāsādyoddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:144.029_2: asya karmaṇo vipākena vayam yo 'sau anāgato 'dhvani kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena śākyamuninarmā samyaksambuddho vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:145.001_0: [145]bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañcabhikṣuśatānyatīte 'dhvanyāsan kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitāni,
S01divyav_u:145.002_0: tadā caiṣāmindriyāṇi paripācitāni, etarhi arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:145.003_0: yaścāsau mahāsamudre timistimiṃgilo nāma matsyo buddhaśabdaṃ śrutvā anāhāratāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:145.007_0: yatra ca vikṣiptaṃ tatrāpi samīpe nāgasyaiva bhavanam/
S01divyav_u:145.008_1: evaṃ kṣiptena pāramparyeṇa tat kalevaraṃ mahāsamudrataṭaṃ samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:145.009_1: taccānekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālaśvāpadādyaiḥ pakṣibhistatsamucchritaiśca kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇamasthikaraṅkajīrṇamāsaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ vyavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:145.011_0: asyāṃ ca śrāvastyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya yadā patnī antarvartinī saṃvṛttā,
S01divyav_u:145.011_1: tadeva tasyā garbhotpādādatīva kṣudduḥkhena pīḍyamānayā gṛhasvāmyabhihitah--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:145.013_0: tasyā evaṃ vadantyā gṛhasvāminoktam--bhadre, yadasmadgṛhe 'nnapānaṃ tatsarvamabhyavaharasva/
S01divyav_u:145.014_1: sā ca tadannapānaṃ sarvamabhyavahṛtya naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:145.018_0_0: kimetadbhavantaḥ syāt--asyāḥ sattvamudare utpannam yasyotpādānnaiva tṛptimupayāti?
S01divyav_u:145.018_0_1: yataḥ sa brāhmaṇo naimittakānāṃ darśayitvā saṃśayanirṇayanārthaṃ vaidyādīn bhūtatantravidaśca--paśyantu
S01divyav_u:145.018_1: iyaṃ brāhmaṇī kiṃ mahatā rogeṇābhibhūtā syādatha bhūtagrahāviṣṭā syādanyadvā syādrūpaṃ maraṇaliṅgamanenopasaṃkrameṇa pratyupasthitā syāt/
S01divyav_u:145.022_2_1: kālādārabhya tavaivaṃvidhā dīptāgnitā samutpannā? tayā abhihitam--garbhalambhasamakālameva
S01divyav_u:145.025_0: yato naimittakavaidyacikitsakairabhihitam--nāsyāḥ kaścidanyastadrūpo rogo nāpi bhūtagrahāveśo bādhākara utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:145.029_0: tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya sā brāhmaṇī vinītakṣudduḥkhā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:145.029_1: sa dārako jātamātra eva atyarthaṃ bubhukṣayopapīḍyate/
S01divyav_u:145.030_0: tasya bubhukṣayā pīḍyamānasya mātā stanaṃ dātuṃ pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:145.031_0: sa ca dārakaḥ stanaṃ pītvāpi sarvaṃ naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:145.031_1: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayā ca brāhmaṇyā tiraskṛtaprātiveśyasvajanayuvatyaścābhyarthya stanaṃ tasya dārakasya dāpayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.001_0: [146]sa ca dārakaḥ sarvāsāmapi stanaṃ pītvā naiva tṛptimabhyupagacchate/
S01divyav_u:146.001_1: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayārthe chagalikā kṛtvā/
S01divyav_u:146.002_0: sa dārakastasyā api cchagalikāyāḥ kṣīraṃ pītvā janikāyāśca stanaṃ naiva tṛpyate/
S01divyav_u:146.003_0: tatra kālena kālaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaśca piṇḍapātaṃ praviṣya parikathāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:146.004_0: sa dārakastāṃ parikathāṃ śrutvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ na roditi,
S01divyav_u:146.005_0: pratyavāsṛteṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇīṣu ca punaḥ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayamāno rohituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.007_0: sa ca dārako 'nupūrveṇa māsārdharmāsādīnāmatyayādbhuñjāno naiva kadācidannapānasya tṛpyati/
S01divyav_u:146.008_0: yadā ca viśiṣṭe vasasi sthitaḥ, tadā tasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhakṣabhājanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:146.009_1: gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣāṃ paryaṭitvā āhārakṛtyaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:146.010_0: yataḥ sa dārako bhaikṣabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryaṭati/
S01divyav_u:146.010_1: paryaṭanneva ca bhuktvā bhuktvā atṛpyamāna eva gṛhamāgacchati/
