S01divyav_u:146.011_0: yato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ mayā karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena na kadācit vitṛpyamāna āhāramārāgayāmi? sa viṣaṇṇacetāścintayituṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ tāvadagnipraveśaṃ karomi,
S01divyav_u:146.011_1: uta jalapraveśamatha taṭaprapātaṃ karomi? sa evaṃ cintayā sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.014_1: tasya tenoktam--kiṃ cintāpara evaṃ tiṣṭhasi? gaccha tvam/
S01divyav_u:146.015_2: tatra ca tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ kariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:146.016_0: akuśalāśca te dharmā ye 'sminnapi janmani saṃcitā bhaviṣyanti, te tanvībhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:146.018_0: atha sa mahātmā upāsakena codito jetavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.018_1: jetavanaṃ gatvā tatra bhikṣūn pāṭhasvādhyāyamanasikārodyuktān dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.021_1: yataḥ sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sakāśādanujñāṃ mārgituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.024_0: tatra ca bhikṣūṇāṃ kadācit piṇḍapāto bhavati, kadācit nimantraṇaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:146.024_1: sa ca yasmin divase piṇḍapāto bhavati,
S01divyav_u:146.024_2: tatropādhyāyenocyate--vatsa, kiṃ tṛpto 'si uta na? sa upādhyāyasya kathayati--nāsti tṛptiḥ/
S01divyav_u:146.026_0: yata upādhyāyenāsya saṃlakṣitah--taruṇavayasā pravrajito dīptāgnitayā na tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:146.027_0: sa ātmīyādapi piṇḍapatāt tasya saṃvibhāgaṃ prārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:146.028_0: punaśca pṛcchati--vatsa, kimidānīṃ tṛpto 'si? atha sa tamupādhyāyaṃ vadati--na tṛpto 'smi/
S01divyav_u:146.029_0: yata upādhyāyastaṃ śrutvā sapremān bhikṣūnanyāṃśca sārdhavihāriṇaḥ prārabdho vaktum/
S01divyav_u:146.030_0: yataḥ samānopādhyāyaiḥ samānācāryairanyaiśca sapremakairbhikṣubhirupasaṃhāra ārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:146.031_1: yadā ca nimantraṇaṃ bhavati, tadāpi te tathaiva tasyopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:146.032_0: dānapatirapi viditvā yadyadadhikaṃ tattadasmai datvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:147.001_0: [147]atha pānakaṃ bhavati tadapi tathaiva yadadhikaṃ bhavati tattasyānupradīyate/
S01divyav_u:147.001_1: tasya ca yataḥ pravrajitasya na kadācidannapānena kukṣiḥ pūṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.002_0: tena khalu samayena anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.003_0: bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamantargṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya/
S01divyav_u:147.005_1: tena caivamupalabdham yo 'saṃviditameva buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayati sa sahasaiva bhogairabhyudgacchati/
S01divyav_u:147.007_0: sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti vihāraṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.009_0: sa paśyati tasmiñ jetavane bhikṣava eva na santi/
S01divyav_u:147.010_1: kva gatā bhikṣavah? sa kathayati--antargṛhe upanimantritāḥ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.011_0: sa gṛhapatistacchutvā durmanā vyavasthitah--kaṣṭam, evamasmākaṃ viphalaḥ pariśramo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.012_0: saṃcintya ca tasya dharmaruceḥ kathayati--ārya, bhakṣa tvamapi tāvat/
S01divyav_u:147.012_1: sa kathayati--yadi te mahātman parityaktaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:147.013_0: tatastena gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣayitvā yenāhāreṇaikasya bhikṣoḥ paryāptaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:147.013_1: tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā taṃ dharmaruciṃ pariveṣayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.016_0: tena ucyate--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:147.016_1: tatastena gṛhapatinā bhūyastasmāt śakaṭādyena bhikṣudvayasyāhāreṇa paryāptaṃ syāt,
S01divyav_u:147.019_0: tenoktam--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:147.020_0: yatastasmācchakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā trayāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.021_1: pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:147.022_0: yataḥ sa gṛhapatistasmādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā yena caturṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.023_1: pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? bhūyaḥ sa kathayati--yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:147.026_0: vistareṇa yāvaddaśānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmannapānena paryāptaṃ syāt, tāvad bhuktvā naiva tṛpyate/
S01divyav_u:147.027_0: yataḥ śrūyate pañcabhir nīlavāsaso yakṣaśatairjetavanamaśūnyamiti teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeva anyatamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.028_0: iti saṃcintya garbharūpāṇi gṛhe 'nupraveśayituṃ pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva,
S01divyav_u:147.029_0: sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:147.032_0_0: sa gṛhapatistvaritatvaritaṃ pariveṣayitvā niravaśeṣatastadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattvā
S01divyav_u:148.002_0: tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.003_1: tasya dharmarucer na kadācidyato jātasya kuṣkiṃ pūrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.004_0: tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.005_1: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:148.007_0: na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.007_2: tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:148.009_0: yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:148.010_0: kiṃ bhagavan manuṣyo 'tha vā amanuṣyah? bhagavatābhihitam--gṛhapate, bhikṣuḥ sa dharmarucir nāṃnā/
S01divyav_u:148.011_0: prāmodyamutpādaya, adya sa tvadīyenānnapānnena tṛpto 'rhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati//
S01divyav_u:148.012_1_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ko 'sau dānapatirbhaviṣyati yo 'sau dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa
S01divyav_u:148.012_1_1: pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati? yato 'sya bhagavatā abhihitam--dṛṣṭastvayā dharmaruce
S01divyav_u:148.014_1: yato bhagavānāha--gṛhāṇa madīyaṃ cīvarakarṇikam, paścāt te 'haṃ mahāsamudraṃ darśayāmi/
S01divyav_u:148.015_1: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.017_0: yasmiṃścāsya sthāne timitimiṃgilabhūtasyāsthaśakalā tiṣṭhati, tatra nītvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.019_0: kimetat kāṣṭhaṃ syādathāsthiśakalā, atha phalakinī syāt/
S01divyav_u:148.020_2: sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ śramamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.022_0: tasyaitadabhavat--nāhamasya vyaktiṃ jñāsyāmi kimetaditi, na ca paryantamāsādayiṣye/
S01divyav_u:148.023_0: yato 'sau bhagavato 'ntikaṃ gatvā bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ tadbhagavan? nāhaṃ tasya vyaktimupalabhāmi/
S01divyav_u:148.025_0: sa kathayati--bhagavan, evaṃvidho 'sau sattvo yasyedṛśī asthiśakalā? bhagavatoktam--tṛpyasva dharmaruce bhavebhyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:148.026_1: dharmarucistaṃ śrutvā bhagavadvaco vyākulitacetāḥ kathayati--mamaiṣedṛśī asthiśakalā? tasyoktam--eṣā dharmaruce tavāsthiśakalā/
S01divyav_u:148.028_1: yato 'sya bhagavatā avavādo dattah--dharmaruce, idaṃ cedaṃ manasikuru/
S01divyav_u:148.029_0: ityuktvā bhagavān vitatapakṣa iva rājahaṃsa ṛddhyā jetavanamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148.030_0: atha dharmarucinā cintayatā manasikāramanutiṣṭhatā uṣmagatānyutpāditāni murdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaḥ/
S01divyav_u:149.003_0: samanvāhartumātmanaḥ pūrvajātiṃ pravṛttah--kuto hyahaṃ cyutaḥ, kutropapanna iti/
S01divyav_u:149.006_0: sa evaṃ saṃlakṣya duṣkarakārako bata me bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:149.007_0: yadi ca bhagavatā mamaivaikasyārthe 'nuttarā samyaksambodhiradhigatā syāt,
S01divyav_u:149.009_1: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:149.011_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat/
S01divyav_u:149.012_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavatā abhihitah--cirasya dharmaruce? dharmaricirāha--cirasya bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:149.015_0_0: yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--bhagavan
S01divyav_u:149.015_0_1: dharmarucirihaiva śrāvastyāṃ jāto 'sminneva jetavane pravrajito na kutaścidāgato
S01divyav_u:149.018_0: kiṃ saṃdhāya bhagavān kathayati? evamukte bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--na bhikṣavaḥ pratyutpannaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi/
S01divyav_u:149.019_2: icchatha bhikṣavo 'sya dharmaruceḥ pūrvikāṃ karmaplotimārabhya dhārmikathāṃ śrotum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ,
S01divyav_u:149.019_3: etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān dharmarucimārabhya bhikṣūṇāṃ dhārmikathāṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:149.023_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prathame 'saṃkhyeye kṣemaṃkaro nāma tathāgato
S01divyav_u:149.023_0_1: loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S01divyav_u:149.025_1: tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ kṣemo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:149.026_0: tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamo vaṇikśreṣṭhī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:149.027_0: tenāsau kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ traimāsān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:149.028_1: bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya tasmācca ratnānyānīya saṃghe pañcavārṣikaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:149.029_0: evaṃ saṃcintya bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣvanupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:149.031_0: asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.001_1: sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt tīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.002_0: uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.003_0: sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih? tairuktam--jānīmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.004_0: sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah? te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.007_0_0: tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto
S01divyav_u:150.007_0_1: jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti? tairuktah--te 'pi vaśino bhikṣavaḥ
S01divyav_u:150.009_0: saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:150.010_0: tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.010_1: asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:150.011_0: tairuktam--asti, kṣemeṇa rājñā alpeśākhyaṃ caityaṃ pratiṣṭhapitam/
S01divyav_u:150.012_0: tasya etadabhavat--etaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksambuddham uddiśyānītam/
S01divyav_u:150.013_1: yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:150.015_2: ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:150.017_0: tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin,
S01divyav_u:150.019_1: idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.020_1: sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:150.021_0: te kathayanti--yadyasmākaṃ na dāsyasi, na vayaṃ tava kāmakāraṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.022_1: teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:150.023_0: atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
S01divyav_u:150.023_1: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:150.025_0: evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti,
S01divyav_u:150.026_0: evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.027_0: nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:150.027_1: ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:150.027_2: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
S01divyav_u:150.029_0: yadi yūyamatra kiṃcid vighnaṃ kariṣyatha, ahaṃ vo mahatā daṇḍenānuśāsayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:150.030_0: te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:150.030_1_0: yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva garbhasaṃsthaṃ syāt
S01divyav_u:150.030_1_1: tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā catvāri
S01divyav_u:150.032_0: yāvadanupūrveṇa[151] prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:151.001_0: tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare pratipāditā/
S01divyav_u:151.004_0: tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivamutpannam--nātra kaścididānīṃ prahariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:151.005_1: tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:151.008_2: tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
S01divyav_u:151.010_0: vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
S01divyav_u:151.013_1: ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:151.014_1: yadi ca dakṣiṇo vāyurvāti, dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ gandhena taccaityamaṅgaṇaṃ cāsya sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:151.016_0: evaṃ paścimena vāyunā, anupūrveṇāpi ca vāyunā/
S01divyav_u:151.016_1: vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:151.018_0_0: sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate?
S01divyav_u:151.018_0_1: yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa
S01divyav_u:151.020_0: sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ samudānayitum/
S01divyav_u:151.021_0_0: tato 'sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ sahasrayodhī tasyāpi
S01divyav_u:151.021_0_1: varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ na śaktaḥ
S01divyav_u:151.023_0: tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam/
S01divyav_u:151.024_0: yataḥ sahasrayodhyāha--tvayā punarmahāśreṣṭhin katamasyāṃ bodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? tena mahāśreṣṭhinoktam--anuttarasyāṃ bodhau cittamutpāditam/
S01divyav_u:151.026_0: sahasrayodhyāha--yadi tvayā anuttarasyāṃ bodhau cittamutpāditam, ahaṃ tavaiva śrāvakaḥ syām/
S01divyav_u:151.028_0: kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
S01divyav_u:151.029_0: sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ karoti--
S01divyav_u:151.030_0: anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:152.001_1: ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
S01divyav_u:152.002_0: yo 'sau sahasrayodhī, eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:152.005_0: dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:152.006_0: atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran dvīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:152.007_0: dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:152.009_0: tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:152.010_0: tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:152.010_2: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:152.012_0: tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
S01divyav_u:152.012_2: sauvarṇā sapātrī, catūratnamayī śayyā, pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni, kanyā ca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā/
S01divyav_u:152.014_0: tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:152.017_0: tābhyāṃ ca śrutaṃ vāsavena rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni yajñāvasāne samudānītāni,
S01divyav_u:152.017_1: yo brāhmaṇaḥ svādhyāyasampanno bhaviṣyati sa lapsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:152.019_0: ko 'smākaṃ tatra bahuśrutatamo vā svādhyāyatamo bhaviṣyatīti saṃcintya yena vāsavasya rājño mahānagaraṃ tena saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:152.020_1: yau etau dvau māṇavakau āgacchataḥ sumatiśca matiśca, anayordvayoḥ sumateretatpradānaṃ dada/
S01divyav_u:152.021_0: yadevaṃ dvau māṇakakau āgacchataḥ sumitaśca matiśca, anayordvayoḥ sumateretatpradānaṃ dada/
S01divyav_u:152.021_1: 152.021.yadevaṃ mahārāja tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:152.023_0: sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--nūnametau mahātmānau yeṣāmāmarthāya devatā apyārocayanti/
S01divyav_u:152.024_0: yato 'sau rājā paśyati māṇavakau dūrata evāgacchantau agrasanamībhiruhyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:152.025_0: yato rājā vāsavastyau sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ pṛcchati--bhavān sumati? tenoktam--aham/
S01divyav_u:152.028_0: yato rājā vāsavaḥ sumatiṃ māṇavamagrāsane bhojayitvā pañca pradānāni prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:152.030_1: yataḥ sā kanyā sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ prāsādikamabhirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhā snehotpannā,
S01divyav_u:152.032_1: yataḥ sā kanyā rājñā pradānabuddhyā parityaktā [153]na punargṛhītā,
S01divyav_u:152.032_2: sumatināpi māṇavenāpratigṛhyamāṇā rājño dīpasya dīpāvatīṃ nagarīṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:153.002_0: sā tatra gatvā tadātmīyamalaṃkāraṃ śarīrādavatārya mālākārāyānuprayacchati--asyālaṃkārasya mūlyaṃ me pratidivasaṃ devasyārthe nīlotpalāni dadasva/
S01divyav_u:153.003_0: sā tenopakrameṇa tadalaṃkārikaṃ suvarṇaṃ datvā devaśuśraūṣikā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:153.004_0: sa ca māṇavakaḥ sumatistāni catvāri mahāpradānāni gṛhya upādhyāyasakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:153.006_0: tebhyaścopādhyāyastrīṇi pratigṛhṇāti, kārṣāpaṇānāṃ tu pañca śatāni tasyaiva sumaterdadāti/
S01divyav_u:153.006_1: sa ca sumatistasyāmeva rātrau daśa svapnānadrākṣīt--mahāsamudraṃ pibāmi,
S01divyav_u:153.006_2: vaihāyasena gacchāmi, imau candrādityau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi,
S01divyav_u:153.010_0: pratibuddhasyaitadabhavat--ka eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ mama vyākaraṇaṃ kariṣyati? tatra pañcābhijña ṛṣir nātidūre prativasati/
S01divyav_u:153.011_0: atha sumatirmāṇavaḥ saṃśayanirṇayanārtham ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:153.012_0: sumatistasya ṛṣeḥ pratisaṃmodanaṃ kṛtvā svapnānākhyāyāha--kuruṣva me eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ nirṇayam/
S01divyav_u:153.013_2: tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:153.015_0: atha vāsavo rājā tasya dīpasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya aśītyamātyasahasraparivṛto dīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:153.016_0: tena ca dīpena rājñā saptamāddivasāddīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśaṃ kariṣyāmīti sarvaviṣayādhiṣṭhānāñca sarvapuṣpāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:153.018_0: tatra ca yasmin divase rājñā dīpena tasya dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśa ārabdhaḥ kartum,
S01divyav_u:153.020_1: sā ca devopasthāyikā dārikā mālākārasakāśaṃ gatā--prayaccha me nīlotpalāni, devārcanaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:153.022_0: mālākāra āha--adya rājñā sarvapuṣpāṇi gṛhītāni dīpaṃkaranagarapraveśasyārthe/
S01divyav_u:153.022_1: sā kathayati--gacchata, punarapi tatra puṣkiriṇyām yadi matpuṇyair nīlotpalapadmamanuddhṛtamāsādyeta/
S01divyav_u:153.023_0: tatra puṣkiriṇyāṃ sumateḥ puṇyānubhāvāt sapta nīlapadmāni prādurbhūtāni/
S01divyav_u:153.024_0: yataḥ sa mālākāro gataḥ, sa tāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:153.027_2: yataḥ sā dārikā kathayati--madīyaiḥ puṇyairetāni prādurbhūtāni, prayacchoddhṛtāni mama/
S01divyav_u:153.028_0: mālākāraḥ kathayati--kathametāni praveśakāni bhaviṣyantyasaṃviditaṃ rājakulasya? dārikā āha--uddharatu bhavān/
S01divyav_u:153.030_1: tena mālākāreṇaivaṃ śrutvā tasyā dārikayāstānyuddhṛtya anupradattāni/
S01divyav_u:153.031_0: sā tāni gṛhītvā udakakumbhe prakṣipya tatkumbhamudakasya pūrayitvā adhiṣṭhānaṃ gatā prasthitā/
S01divyav_u:153.032_1: tasyaitadabhavat--kathamahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam [154]dṛṣṭvā na pūjayāmi? sa mālākāragṛhāṇyanvāhiṇḍati sarvapuṣpānveṣaṇaparaḥ,
S01divyav_u:154.003_1: sā ca dārikā tasmādudyānāt tasya sumatermāṇavasyābhimukhamāgatā/
S01divyav_u:154.005_0: yatastāni sumatirdṛṣṭvā tasyā dārikāyāḥ kathayati--prayaccha mamaitāni padmāni/
S01divyav_u:154.006_1: sā dārikā tasya sumateḥ kathayati--tadā necchasi māṃ pratigṛhītum/
S01divyav_u:154.008_0: evamuktvā taṃ sumatiṃ māṇavamuvāca--kimebhiḥ kariṣyasi? sumatirāha--buddhaṃ bhagavantamarcayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:154.009_0: paścāddārikā kathayati--kiṃ mama kārṣāpaṇaiḥ kṛtyam? evamahaṃ buddhāya dāsye,
S01divyav_u:154.009_1: yadi tvameṣāṃ padmānāṃ pradānaphalena mamāpi jātyāṃ jātyāṃ patnīmicchasi,
S01divyav_u:154.009_2: asya dānasya pradānakāle yadyevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ karoṣi--jātyāṃ jātyāṃ mama bhāryā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:154.011_0: sumatirāha--vayaṃ dānābhiratāḥ svagarbharūpaparityāgaṃ svamāṃsaparityāgaṃ ca kurmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:154.012_0: tataḥ sā dārikā sumateḥ kathayati--tvamevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kuru,
S01divyav_u:154.013_0: evamukte tayā dārikayā tasya sumateḥ pañca padmānyanupradattāni, ātmanā dve gṛhīte/
S01divyav_u:154.016_0: tatra te 'haṃ bhavet patnī nityaṃ sahadharmacāriṇī//2//
S01divyav_u:154.020_0: sa ca rājā śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītvā dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:154.021_1: evameva vāsavo rājā amātyaiḥ saha pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:154.021_2: dīpo rājā bhagavato buddhasya pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati--bhagavan, adhiṣṭhānaṃ praviśa/
S01divyav_u:154.023_0: sa ca rājā dīpaḥ śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:154.024_1: bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā ekaikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ bhagavataśchatraṃ dhārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:154.026_0: tatra bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāra indrakīle pādo vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:154.027_1: tadaiva samanantarakālaṃ pṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā--calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā,
S01divyav_u:154.028_0: dharmatā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadendrakīle sābhisaṃskāreṇa pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:154.028_10: madhuraṃ nikūjanti, aneritāni vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraśabdān niścārayanti,
S01divyav_u:154.028_14: divyānyutpalāni kṣipanti, padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagurucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni mandāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
S01divyav_u:155.009_0: tatra ca dīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi puṣpairdhūpairgandhaiśca kārāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:155.010_0: te 'pi ca sumatiśca dārikā ca yena dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhastenānugacchanti padmāni gṛhya/
S01divyav_u:155.011_0: te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
S01divyav_u:155.012_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--bahutaraṃ sumatirmāṇavo 'smānmahājanakāyāt puṇyaprasavaṃ kariṣyati iti/
S01divyav_u:155.014_1: labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:155.015_0: prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
S01divyav_u:155.016_0: tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni,
S01divyav_u:155.018_0: tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
S01divyav_u:155.018_1: tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:155.019_0: tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:155.020_0: paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:155.021_0: tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato bhagavataḥ purato gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:155.024_0: tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:155.025_0: tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:155.025_2: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:155.027_0: paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatirmāṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
S01divyav_u:155.030_0: śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
S01divyav_u:156.001_0: [156]yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:156.002_0: tāścāsya jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ, anyāḥ praviśiṣṭatarā jaṭāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.003_1: dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā bhavema/
S01divyav_u:156.008_0: śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
S01divyav_u:156.009_0: khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
S01divyav_u:156.013_0: yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ, tadāsya dīpena rājñā jaṭā gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.016_1: tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.017_0: tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
S01divyav_u:156.017_2: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
S01divyav_u:156.019_0: tataḥ sa matirmāṇava ucyate--ahamanuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam? sa kathayati--kṣato 'haṃ sumate māṇava/
S01divyav_u:156.021_0: sa kathayati--kathaṃ kṛtvā kṣato 'si? tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:156.021_1: tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyāmavaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.023_0: yatastasya sumatiḥ kathayati--āgacchasva, buddhasya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.024_0: tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:156.025_0: sumatinā ca pravrajya trīpi piṭakānyadhītāni, dharmeṇa parṣat saṃgṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:156.026_0: sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.028_0: bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena, sa rājā bimbisāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:156.029_0: yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena, tānyetarhyaśītirdevatāsahasrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:156.030_0: yo 'sau dīpāvatīyako janakāyaḥ, yāsau dārikā, eṣaiva sā yaśodharā/
S01divyav_u:156.030_1: yo 'sau sumatiḥ, ahameva tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartāmi/
S01divyav_u:156.031_0: yo 'sau matiḥ, eṣa eva sa dharmaruciḥ/
S01divyav_u:157.001_0: [157]etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce,
S01divyav_u:157.003_0_0: tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S01divyav_u:157.003_0_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:157.006_0: sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:157.006_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:157.007_2: sa ca gṛhapatistāṃ patnīmevamāha--jāto 'smākam ṛṇadharo dhanaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:157.009_0: sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
S01divyav_u:157.010_0: sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:157.012_1: sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam,
S01divyav_u:157.012_2: na ca me kaścijjānīyāt? tayā saṃcintyaivamadhyavasitam--evameva putrakāmahetostathā paricarāmi,
S01divyav_u:157.012_3: yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:157.016_0: tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena paṭenācchāditā/
S01divyav_u:157.016_1: tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi? sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba,
S01divyav_u:157.018_0: kleśairatīva bādhye, priyatāṃ mamotpādya manuṣyānveṣaṇaṃ kuru,
S01divyav_u:157.018_1: yo 'bhyantara eva syānna ca śaṅkanīyo janasya/
S01divyav_u:157.019_0: vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
S01divyav_u:157.021_0: katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi? tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti,
S01divyav_u:157.021_1: eṣa eva me putro bhavati, naiṣa lokasya śaṅkanīyo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:157.023_0: tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi? yuktaṃ syādanyena manuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāmanubhavitum/
S01divyav_u:157.024_0: tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate,
S01divyav_u:157.026_0: tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya pṛcchati--vatsa, taruṇo 'si rūpavāṃśca/
S01divyav_u:157.027_0_0: kiṃ pratiṣṭhito 'syārthena? tena tasyā abhihitam--kimetat? tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca
S01divyav_u:157.027_0_1: yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/
S01divyav_u:157.027_1: kimeva kāmabhogaparihīnastiṣṭhasi? vaṇigdārakastaṃ śrutvā lajjāvyapatrāpyasamlīnacetāstasyā vṛddhāyāstadvacanaṃ nādhivāsayati/
S01divyav_u:157.030_0: tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe kleśairbādhyate/
S01divyav_u:157.031_0: sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:157.031_1: kiṃ tasyāstaruṇayuvatyāḥ saṃnimitte kiṃcidabhihitam? tatah [158]sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
S01divyav_u:158.001_1: sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:158.002_1: na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.003_0: tatastena vaṇigdārakeṇa tasyā vṛddhāyā abhihitam--kutrāsmākaṃ saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati? tayā abhihitam--madīye gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:158.004_0: tenoktam--kutrāvakāśe tava gṛham? tato 'sya tayā vṛddhayā gṛhaṃ vyapadiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:158.005_0: sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--icchāpitaḥ sa vo 'yaṃ dārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.006_0: sā kathayati--kutrāvakāśe saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati? madīye gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:158.007_0: sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.008_2: sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.009_0: tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya tiṣṭhato niśikālamapratyabhijñātam/
S01divyav_u:158.010_0: rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
S01divyav_u:158.011_0: gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā pāpakenāsaddharmeṇa/
S01divyav_u:158.013_0: sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre kālāyāmeva rajanyāmavibhāvyamānarūpākṛtau svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:158.014_0: sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhāṇḍāvāriṃ gatvā kuṭumbakāryāṇi karoti/
S01divyav_u:158.015_1_0: tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa
S01divyav_u:158.015_1_2: ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmi? yannvahamasyaitat ratikrīḍākramaṃ tathāvidhaṃ krameṇa saṃvedayeyam,
S01divyav_u:158.019_0_0: iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya rajanyāḥ
S01divyav_u:158.019_0_1: kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ ca śirottarapaṭṭikāṃ
S01divyav_u:158.021_0: sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:158.022_0: ātmīyāmevopariprāvaraṇapotrīmalabhamānastatraiva tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.023_0: tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:158.024_1_0: kuto 'yaṃ śirasi prāvaraṇo 'bhyāgatah? yatastayā abhihitam--adyāpyahaṃ tavāmbā? evaṃ
S01divyav_u:158.024_1_1: cirakālaṃ tava mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā? yataḥ sa
S01divyav_u:158.024_1_2: vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:158.027_1: sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam? asmadīyaṃ vacanamupaśrutya dhīramanā bhavasva/
S01divyav_u:158.029_1: sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi saṃmohaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:158.029_2: yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam? tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe utpādayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:158.031_1: yenaivaṃ hi yathā pitā gacchati, putro 'pi tenaiva gacchati/
S01divyav_u:158.032_0: na cāsau panthā putrasyānugacchato doṣakārako [159]bhavati, evameva mātṛgrāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.001_1: yatraiva hi tīrye pitā snāti, putro 'pi tasmin snāti, na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:159.002_1: api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā asaddharmeṇābhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:159.004_0: evamasau vaṇigdārako mātrā bahuvidhairanunayavacanairvinītaśokastayā mātrā tasmin pātake 'saddharme punaḥ punaratīva saṃjātarāgaḥ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.006_1: sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--mahāntaṃ kālaṃ mama tasyāgamanamudīkṣamāṇāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.008_0: idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa cāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:159.008_1: ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam? iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:159.010_0: jājase 'smābhiridānīṃ kiṃ karaṇīyamiti? gacchasva, pitaramasamprāptameva ghātaya/
S01divyav_u:159.011_0: sa kathayati--kathamahaṃ pitaraṃ ghātayiṣye? yadā asau na prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum,
S01divyav_u:159.011_1: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo 'nuvṛttivacanairabhihitah--tasyānuvṛttivacanairucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasyādhyavasāyo jātaḥ pitṛvadhaṃ prati/
S01divyav_u:159.013_0: kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
S01divyav_u:159.015_0: ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye 'pi ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.017_1: gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva,
S01divyav_u:159.018_0: tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
S01divyav_u:159.019_0: āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ prāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.020_0: sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto 'smākaṃ putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.021_0: yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti,
S01divyav_u:159.023_1: paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:159.024_0: yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.025_0: tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
S01divyav_u:159.026_0: paścāttairiṣṭasnigdhasuhṛdbhirvaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yattattu kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:159.028_0: sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159.029_0: tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:159.029_1_0: anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ vadati--kiyatkālaṃ vayamevaṃ pracchannena krameṇa ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmah?
S01divyav_u:159.029_1_1: yannu vayamasmāddeśādanyadeśāntaraṃ gatvā prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti
S01divyav_u:159.032_0: tatastau gṛhaṃ tyaktvā [160]mitrasvajanasambandhivargānapahāya purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca gṛhya anyaviṣayāntaraṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:160.002_0: tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:160.003_0: yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tamadhiṣṭhānamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:160.004_0: tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ vaṇigdharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:160.005_0_0: dṛṣṭvā cārogyayitvā cābhibhāṣyoktah--mātuste kuśalam? sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā
S01divyav_u:160.005_0_1: abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ
S01divyav_u:160.007_2: eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya māteti/
S01divyav_u:160.009_1: kathameṣa śakyaṃ ghātayitum? tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ gṛhamenamupanimantrayitvā bhuñjānaṃ ghātayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:160.011_0: sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa pratinirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:160.014_1: yathā yathā sevyanti, tathā tathā tṛṣṇā vṛddhimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:160.015_0: tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā jātā/
S01divyav_u:160.018_0: sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
S01divyav_u:160.018_1: tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
S01divyav_u:160.022_0: sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah? evaṃ manasi kṛtam--gacchāmi,
S01divyav_u:160.024_0: sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ kathayati--ārya, pravrajeyam/
S01divyav_u:160.025_0: tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktam--mā tāvat pitṛghātako 'si? tena bhikṣurabhihitah--asti mayā ghātitaḥ pitā/
S01divyav_u:160.026_0: tataḥ punaḥ pṛṣṭah--mā tāvanmātṛghātako 'si? tenoktam--ārya, ghātitā mayā mātā/
S01divyav_u:160.027_0: sa bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭah--mā tāvadarhadvadhaste kṛtah? tataḥ sa kathayati--arhannapi ghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:160.028_0: tatastena bhikṣuṇā abhihitah--ekaikena eṣāṃ karmāṇāmācaraṇānna pravrajyārho bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:160.030_0: tataḥ sa puruṣo 'nyasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ārya pravrajeyam/
S01divyav_u:160.032_2: sa yadā [161]dvirapi trirapi pravrajyāmāyācamāno 'pi bhikṣubhir na pravrājitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:160.032_3: tadā amarṣajātaścintayituṃ pravṛttah--yā api sarvasādhāraṇā pravrajyā,
S01divyav_u:161.003_0: tasmin vihāre 'gniṃ datvā anyatra vihāraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:161.005_0: tatrāpi vihāre bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāśca dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:161.006_0: evaṃ tasyānekān vihārān dahataḥ sarvatra śabdo visṛtah--evaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī puruṣo bhikṣubhyaḥ pravrajyāmalabhan vihārān bhikṣūṃśca dahatīti/
S01divyav_u:161.008_0: tatra ca vihāre bodhisattvajātīyo bhikṣuḥ prativasati tṛpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:161.008_1: tena śrutaṃ sa evaṃ duṣkarakarmakārī puruṣa ihāgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:161.009_0: yataḥ sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasyāsamprāptasyaiva tasmin vihāre pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:161.011_0: tatastena bhikṣuṇām uktam--āgaccha vatsa, ahaṃ te pravrājayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:161.012_0: paścāt tena bhikṣuṇā tasya puruṣasya śiro muṇḍāpayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni/
S01divyav_u:161.013_0: paścāt sa puruṣaḥ kathayati--ārya, śikṣāpadāni me 'nuprayaccha/
S01divyav_u:161.013_1: tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktah--kiṃ te śikṣāpadaiḥ prayojanam? evaṃ sarvakālaṃ vadasva--namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:161.015_0: paścāt sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasya dharmadeśanāmārabdhaḥ kartum--tvamevaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī sattvo yadi kadācidbuddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇoṣi,
S01divyav_u:161.018_0: yato bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau atīte 'dhvani bhikṣus tripiṭah āsa,
S01divyav_u:161.018_1: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:161.019_0: yo 'sau pāpakarmakārī sattvo mātāpitrarhaddhātakaḥ, eṣa eva dharmaruciḥ/
S01divyav_u:161.020_1: tadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce, sucirasya dharmaruce, suciracirasya dharmaruce/
S01divyav_u:161.021_0: yāvacca mayā bhikṣavastribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranyaiśca duṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ samudānītā,
S01divyav_u:162.002_0: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:162.002_1: rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:162.004_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:162.004_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:162.005_0: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:162.006_0: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:162.007_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:162.008_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavan, iyaṃ me patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:162.009_1: bhagavānāha--gṛhapate, putraṃ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:162.011_0: tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:162.013_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadapyasmākamekaṃ bhikṣakulam, tadapi śramaṇo gautamo 'nvāvartayati/
S01divyav_u:162.013_1: gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṃ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti/
S01divyav_u:162.014_0: sa tatra gatvā kathayati--gṛhapate, śramaṇo gautama āgata āsīt? āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:162.015_0: kiṃ tena vyākṛtam? ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā--kiṃ janayiṣyati? sa kathayati--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:162.017_0: sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṃ gṛhītvā gaṇayitumārabdhah--paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṃ tatsarvaṃ tathaiva/
S01divyav_u:162.020_0: tadatra kiṃcid saṃvarṇayitavyaṃ kiṃcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā hastau saṃparivartayati,
S01divyav_u:162.021_1: kiṃ hastausamparivartayasi mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayasīti? sa kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:162.023_0: ārya, kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ vā mṛṣā? gṛhapate, yadanenoktaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti, idaṃ satyaṃ kathayati/
S01divyav_u:162.024_2: mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṃ dhakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:162.025_0: yat kathayati--divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti, idaṃ mṛṣā/
S01divyav_u:162.026_0: gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhavan? yatkathayati--mama śāsane pravrajiṣyatīti,
S01divyav_u:162.027_0: yadā asya na bhaktaṃ na vastram, tadā niścayena śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:162.029_0: śramaṇasyaiva tāvadgautamasya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ nāsti, prāgevāsya bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:162.029_2: atra mayā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti? bhūrikaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:162.031_2: subhadraḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvathā parityājyo 'sau iti viditvā sa bhaiṣajyaṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:163.002_2: asthānametadanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'ntarāducchidya kālaṃ kariṣyati aprāpte āśravakṣaye/
S01divyav_u:163.007_1: sā tenāraṇyaṃ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā/
S01divyav_u:163.007_2: sa tāṃ pracchannaṃ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṃ prātiveśakānāṃ ca kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:163.009_1: sā tairvikrośadbhir nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:163.010_0: nirgranthaiḥ śrutam--te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā ārocayanti--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:163.012_0: śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:163.016_0_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:163.016_1: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate,
S01divyav_u:163.016_2: ko vardhate, kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:163.016_3: ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ, kamahamapāyāduddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S01divyav_u:163.029_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:163.029_2: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:163.031_0_0: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ
S01divyav_u:163.031_0_2: narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti/
S01divyav_u:164.002_0: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:164.003_1: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:164.004_0: api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvādasmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti/
S01divyav_u:164.005_0: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:164.007_0_3: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:164.016_0: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:164.028_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:165.003_0: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//7//iti/
S01divyav_u:165.005_1: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:165.006_0: gaccha ānanda, bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:165.007_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
S01divyav_u:165.008_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmantaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:165.009_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikaṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
S01divyav_u:165.010_0: evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṃśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:165.011_0_0: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta
S01divyav_u:165.011_0_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:165.011_0_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:165.011_0_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:165.011_0_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:165.011_1_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:165.011_1_1: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ
S01divyav_u:165.011_1_2: sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro
S01divyav_u:165.011_2_1: sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
S01divyav_u:165.011_2_3: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ
S01divyav_u:165.026_0: aṣṭādaśānuśaṃsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:165.028_0: rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:165.029_2: bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:165.032_0: sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nirhṛtā--mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:166.001_0: [166]sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:166.003_0: mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//8//iti
S01divyav_u:166.005_1: yadyevam, gacchāmaḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ paśyāmah? vayasya,
S01divyav_u:166.012_0: yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:166.014_0: prayānti nūnaṃ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṃ śākyamunervikurvitam//10//iti/
S01divyav_u:166.016_0: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam--bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:166.018_0: sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:166.019_0: śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--na bhagavān nirarthakaṃ śītavanaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:166.020_0: nūnaṃ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṃ kartukāmo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:166.022_0: adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṃ māgadhaśreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:166.024_0: yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṃ viniryayau rājagṛhāt sabāndhavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:166.026_0: pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati//11//iti/
S01divyav_u:166.029_0: nirgrantha bhagavantaṃ smitonmukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayanti--yathā śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:166.030_0: taiḥ subhadro gṛhapatiruktah--gṛhapate, nanvayaṃ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata iti/
S01divyav_u:166.031_0: sa kathayati--ārya yadyevam, [167]kathamatra pratipattavyamiti? te kathayanti--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:167.002_1: tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam/
S01divyav_u:167.003_1: tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṃ kumāro niṣaṇṇo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:167.004_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
S01divyav_u:167.006_0: tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhapate, gṛhāṇa kumāram/
S01divyav_u:167.007_0: te kathayanti--gṛhapate, yadi prajvalitāmetāṃ citāṃ pravekṣyasi, sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:167.008_1: tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate--gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti/
S01divyav_u:167.015_1: māsi kṣata upahato veti? sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:167.017_0: tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhāṇedānīṃ gṛhapate kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:167.019_0: te kathayanti--gṛhapate, ayaṃ sattvo 'tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:167.020_0: kiṃ bahunā? yadyevaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayasi, nīyatām/
S01divyav_u:167.020_1: te gṛhamutsādayad bhaviṣyasi, tvaṃ ca prāṇairviyujyasa iti/
S01divyav_u:167.022_0: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ bimbisāramāmantayate--gṛhāṇa mahārāja kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:167.023_0: tataḥ samantato nirīkṣya kathayati--bhagavan, kiṃ bhavatu asya dārakasya jyotiṣka iti nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:167.025_1: tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:167.027_1: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaicit sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:167.031_0: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:167.032_0_0: jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto [168]dvābhyāsaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ
S01divyav_u:167.032_0_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhāgtrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:168.002_0: so 'ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:168.004_1: tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:168.007_0: tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/
S01divyav_u:168.008_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:168.010_0: mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:168.010_1: tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:168.014_0: mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:168.015_0: sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:168.017_0: mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:168.019_1: kathaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ bhaviṣyati? kiṃ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā,
S01divyav_u:168.021_2: sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:168.022_0: kiṃ kṛtam? asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā,
S01divyav_u:168.025_2: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:168.028_1: yathaiṣa paribhāṣate, nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:168.028_2: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:168.028_4: saṃkāraṃ pātayāmaḥ, rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:169.001_1: rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:169.003_1: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/
S01divyav_u:169.007_1: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:169.007_2: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:169.008_2: evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:169.010_0: yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:169.010_1: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:169.012_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṃskrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:169.013_1: kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:169.014_0: yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:169.014_1: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣye/
S01divyav_u:169.017_1: rājā bimbisāraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, mayā ayaṃ kumāraḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:169.018_1: samayato 'haṃ muñcāmi, yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/
S01divyav_u:169.020_0: ko 'nya upasaṃkramitavya iti? sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:169.022_0: ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati/
S01divyav_u:169.024_0: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:169.024_1: tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā,
S01divyav_u:169.026_0: tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
S01divyav_u:169.028_0: subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:169.029_1: sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:169.032_0: ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā [170]śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam/
S01divyav_u:170.001_0: ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti, tasyedam yathāsukhamiti/
S01divyav_u:170.003_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punarjyotiṣkasya gṛhapateḥ kathayanti--gṛhapate, kimetaditi? tena teṣāṃ vistareṇārocitam/
S01divyav_u:170.005_1: yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:170.006_0: tairdṛṣṭvā tairapi jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭah--kimetaditi? tena tathaiva vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:170.007_0: te kathayanti--gṛhapate, kiṃ pātramātrasyārthāyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśayāmah? uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:170.010_0: āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:170.014_1: kalpate tava pātramātrasyārthāya ṛddhiṃ vidarśayitumiti? kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:170.015_1: kiṃ kriyatāmiti? etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti/
S01divyav_u:170.017_1: api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ sphaṭikamayam/
S01divyav_u:170.018_0: aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:170.022_0: api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
S01divyav_u:170.022_1: yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/
S01divyav_u:170.023_0: antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/
S01divyav_u:170.024_2: tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:170.024_3: sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?)/
S01divyav_u:170.027_0: taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:170.030_2: sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:171.001_1: tayā brāhmaṇa uktah--brāhmaṇa, asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ mūlyam/
S01divyav_u:171.002_1: yadi kaścit yācati, kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa dātavyā, no cedapattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā anyatra gantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:171.004_1: so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.007_0: śailkikāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, yatheyaṃ ghaṇṭā raṇati, nūnaṃ sārtho na nipuṇaṃ śulkitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.010_0: sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh--kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti? tairasau dvidhā kṛtvā muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.011_0: yeṣāṃ madhye sa brāhmaṇo nāsti, te 'tikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.012_0: anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:171.013_0: evaṃ tāvat dvidhākṛtāḥ, yāvat sa caiko brāhmaṇo 'vasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:171.015_0: tairasau brāhmaṇaḥ pratinivartyoktah--bho brāhmaṇa kathaya, naiva śulkaṃ dāpayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.016_0: kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:171.017_1: te paraṃ vismayamāpannāh--bhavantaḥ, īdṛśamapi devasya sānnidhyamiti/
S01divyav_u:171.018_1: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/
S01divyav_u:171.020_0: api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.021_0: sa taṃ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:171.022_1: tatrāpi tāṃ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate/
S01divyav_u:171.023_1: jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:171.025_0: jyotiṣkeṇoktah--bho brāhmaṇa, kimarthaṃ tvam apattanaṃ ghoṣayasi? gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:171.029_1: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kimetadevaṃ bhaviṣyati? jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--brāhmaṇa, tava pratyakṣīkaromi/
S01divyav_u:172.002_1: sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, maharddhikastvaṃ ṃhānubhāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:172.005_2: jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ, aparibhuktakastu snānaśāṭakaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:172.007_0: jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:172.009_2: te kathayanti--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:172.011_1: rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:172.014_0: rājā kathayati--kumāra, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:172.016_1: sa vismṛtya kathayati--deva, madīyo 'yaṃ snānaśāṭako vāyunopakṣipta ihāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:172.017_0: kumāra, tava divyamānuṣyakī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā? deva, prādurbhūtā/
S01divyav_u:172.018_0: kumāra, yadyevam, kimarthaṃ na nimantrayasi? deva, nimantrito bhava/
S01divyav_u:172.019_1: deva, yasya divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, kiṃ tena sajjīkartavyam? nanu sajjīkṛtameva, gaccheti/
S01divyav_u:172.023_2: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--deva, ayamapi na vadhūjanaḥ, kiṃ tu madhyo 'yaṃ janaḥ/
S01divyav_u:172.026_1: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--deva kasyārthe upānahau apanayasīti? sa kathayati--kumāra,
S01divyav_u:172.028_0: sa kathayati--kumāra, ime matsyā upari bhramantaḥ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:172.031_1: rājā kathayati--kumāra, kasmādayaṃ vadhūjano roditi? deva nāyaṃ roditi,
S01divyav_u:172.031_2: kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,
S01divyav_u:173.001_0: rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṃti/
S01divyav_u:173.002_1: amātyairajātaśatruḥ kumāro 'bhibhūtah--kumāra, devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ praviśya pramattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:173.003_1: tena gatvā uktah--deva, kimatra praviśyāvasthitah? amātyāḥ kathayanti--rājakṛtyāni rājakaraṇīyāni parihīyanta iti/
S01divyav_u:173.005_0: sa kathayati--kumāra, na śaknoṣi tvamekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum? kiṃ devo jānīte--mamaiko divasaḥ praviṣṭasaya? adya devasya saptamo divaso vartate/
S01divyav_u:173.006_0: rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya kathayati--kumāra satyam? deva satyam/
S01divyav_u:173.007_1: kumāra, kathaṃ rātrijñāyate divaso vā? deva,
S01divyav_u:173.009_0: santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti,
S01divyav_u:173.009_1: divā mlāyanti? santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti? santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti,
S01divyav_u:173.009_2: na divā? santi ye divā jvalanti,
S01divyav_u:173.009_3: na rātrau? santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti,
S01divyav_u:173.009_4: na divā? santi ye divā kūjñati,
S01divyav_u:173.013_0: yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:173.014_0: ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:173.015_0: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati--dāraka, ānaya taṃ maṇiṃ paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:173.015_1: sa muṣṭhiṃ vighāṭya kathayati--kumāra, na jāne kutra gata iti/
S01divyav_u:173.016_1: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--kumāra, kimarthamenaṃ tāḍayasi? ghapate, ahaṃ cauraḥ, eṣa mahācauraḥ/
S01divyav_u:173.018_0: sa kathayati--kumāra, na tvayā apahṛto nāpyanena, api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:173.019_0: api tu kumāra, svakaṃ te gṛham/
S01divyav_u:173.020_1: sa pratibhinnakaḥ saṃlakṣayate--yadā pituratyayādrājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā grahīṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:173.021_0: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:173.024_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:173.024_1: sa māṃ marṣayatīti kuta etat? nūnamayaṃ madgṛhamāgacchatu,
S01divyav_u:173.029_0: ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate--evamapi mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīnapahartum/
S01divyav_u:174.001_0: teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:174.002_1: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:174.003_1: tatkiṃ na me moṣiṣyata iti? purakṣobho jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:174.004_0: ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto 'nupreṣitah--muñcata mamāyaṃ khalīkāra saṃlakṣayate--yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:174.004_1: sa māṃ na praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat? sarvathā ahaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarthattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:174.009_0: atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:174.010_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:174.010_1: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhāṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:174.012_1: sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:174.016_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:174.020_1_0: tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:174.023_0: arhan saṃvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:174.025_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena citāmāropitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:174.025_2_0: bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamiti? bhagavānāha--jyotiṣkeṇaiva
S01divyav_u:174.029_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:174.029_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:175.002_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//15//
S01divyav_u:175.003_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan
S01divyav_u:175.005_0: dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve/
S01divyav_u:175.006_0_0: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
S01divyav_u:175.006_0_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
S01divyav_u:175.009_0: tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:175.010_0: sa saṃlakṣayate--bahuśo mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'ntargṛhe upanimantraya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.011_0: na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.012_0: yannvahaṃ vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:175.013_0: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.014_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:175.015_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:175.016_0_0: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:175.016_0_1: praṇamya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ
S01divyav_u:175.019_1: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.021_0: aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā--vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti/
S01divyav_u:175.023_0: śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.023_1: na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.025_1: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:175.026_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:175.027_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:175.028_0_0: atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:175.031_1: adhivāsayatu bhagavān, ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati/
S01divyav_u:175.032_0: sacet te mahārāja anaṅgaṇo [176]gṛhapatiranujānīte, evaṃ te 'hamadhivāsayāmi/
S01divyav_u:176.001_0: atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṃ nirveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:176.003_0: bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt--ahaṃ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṃ samyakasmbuddhaṃ bhojayāmi,
S01divyav_u:176.003_1: tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhojayitumiti/
S01divyav_u:176.005_0: sa kathayati--deva, mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastvatprathamata upanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:176.006_1: rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, yadyapyevam, tathāpi tvaṃ mama viṣayanivāsī/
S01divyav_u:176.007_2: tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati/
S01divyav_u:176.009_0: api tu yo bhaktottarikayā jeṣyati, so 'vaśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ bhojayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:176.010_1: tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:176.010_2: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:176.012_0: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:176.015_0: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:176.016_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:176.016_0_1: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:176.018_0: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'naṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:176.020_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:176.022_0: tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:176.022_1: amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:176.022_2: kathamahaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo 'haṃ mama viṣayanivāsinaṃ kuṭumbinaṃ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum? te kathayanti,
S01divyav_u:176.026_1: bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṃ vikretavyam/
S01divyav_u:176.027_0: yo vikrīṇīte, tena madviṣaye na vastavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:176.028_1: surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:176.029_0: bandhumān rājā pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kuta eṣa manojñagandha iti? tairvistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:176.030_1: kiṃ mama vibhavo nāstīti? amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:176.030_2: kasyārthe evaṃ kriyate? ayaṃ gṛhapatiraputro nacirāt kālaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:177.002_0: tena cittaṃ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita--tāvanme bhaktakāṣṭhamasti,
S01divyav_u:177.003_0: rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:177.004_0: amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparistiṣṭhasīti? tena vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:177.005_1: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parājayatīti/
S01divyav_u:177.006_0_0: tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā
S01divyav_u:177.011_0: tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:177.012_0: tato vismayāvarjitacittasaṃtatirvipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:177.012_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:177.014_0: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:177.017_0: bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:177.018_0: bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:177.020_0: anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:177.020_1: paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayatīti/
S01divyav_u:177.023_2: so 'pi tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śakyamanyat saṃpādayitum/
S01divyav_u:177.024_0: kiṃ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah? iti viditvā niveśanaṃ gato dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:177.029_1: iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:177.030_1: anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya--kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati bhavantaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:177.031_0: sa kathayati--brāhmaṇa, gṛhapatinā ahaṃ sthāpitah--yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:177.031_1: sa yat prāthayate[178], taddātavyaṃ na tu praveśa iti/
S01divyav_u:178.001_1: kiṃ te gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭeneti? sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, na mama kenacit prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:178.003_2: kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:178.004_1: yena taysa prayojanaṃ tat prayaccha--kiṃ tenātra praviṣṭeneti? sa kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:178.004_2: ukto mayā evaṃ kathayati--nāhaṃ kiṃcit prārthayāmi,
S01divyav_u:178.007_0: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa gṛhapatirgāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:178.009_0: na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet/
S01divyav_u:178.011_0: śakraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, kastava śokah? kathaya, ahaṃ te śokātpramocayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:178.012_0: atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:178.012_1: viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṃ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:178.013_0: atha śakro devendro devāṃstrāyastriṃśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ devaputramāmantrayate--gaccha,
S01divyav_u:178.015_0: paraṃ bhadraṃ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:178.017_0: airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:178.018_0: śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:178.019_0: bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:178.019_1: kīdṛśenāhāreṇānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatir buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ tarpayatīti? sa puruṣastatra gatastāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:178.022_3: tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:178.023_0: vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭasatyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:178.025_1: tenāsau nirgatya kṣamita uktaśca--mahārāja, praviśa svahastena pariveṣaṇaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:178.026_3: tvamevaiko 'rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayituṃ na vayaṃtī/
S01divyav_u:178.027_0_0: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirvipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamanayā vibhūtyā traimāsyaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa
S01divyav_u:178.027_0_1: saṃtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye
S01divyav_u:178.027_1: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:179.001_0: [179]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ,
S01divyav_u:179.001_1: eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:179.002_0: yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:179.002_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:179.004_0: yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:179.004_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:179.006_0: ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:179.007_0: iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:179.009_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:236_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:180.002_0_0: satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhī
S01divyav_u:180.004_0: lābhī bhagavān prabhūtānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:180.007_1_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:180.009_0: sa imaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣīṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravedayate/
S01divyav_u:180.011_0: sa dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:180.012_0: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati/
S01divyav_u:180.013_0_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ
S01divyav_u:180.013_0_1: dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya
S01divyav_u:180.016_0: na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet/
S01divyav_u:180.017_0: yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānante dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:180.019_0: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:180.021_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani rājābhūt kanakavarṇo nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā suvarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:180.022_0: rājā bhikṣavaḥ kanakavarṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:180.024_0: rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya khalu bhikṣavaḥ kanakāvatī nāma rājadhānī babhūva pūrveṇa paścimena ca dvādaśa yojayānyāmena,
S01divyav_u:180.024_1: dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta yojanāni ca vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:180.026_0: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca ramaṇīyā ca/
S01divyav_u:180.028_0: aṣṭādaśa kulakoṭī ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:180.029_0: saptapañcāśadgrāmakoṭya ṛddhāḥ sphītāḥ kṣemāḥ subhikṣā ramaṇīyā mahājanākīrṇamanuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:180.030_0: ṣaṣṭiḥ karvaṭasahasrāṇyabhūvann ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:181.001_0: [181]athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisamlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarkamudapādi--yannvahaṃ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkānagulmān muñceyam/
S01divyav_u:181.003_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapariṣadyānāmantrayate--adyāgreṇa vo grāmaṇyaḥ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkān muñcāmi,
S01divyav_u:181.005_0: tasyānenopāyena bahūni varṣāṇi rājyaṃ kārayato 'pareṇa samayena nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:181.006_0: atha brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇajñā naimittikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacariteṣu tat saṃlakṣayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:181.008_0: apasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocan--yatkhalu devo jānīyāt--nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:181.009_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇa idamevamrūpaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā aśrūṇi pravartayati--aho bata me jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:181.009_1: aho bata me jambudvīpah ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ kṣemaḥ subhikṣo ramaṇīyo bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyo nacirādeva śūnyo bhaviṣyati rahitamanuṣyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:181.012_0: atha rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya muhūrtaṃ śocitvā etadabhavat--ya ime āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ,
S01divyav_u:181.013_1: te katham yāpayiṣyanti? tasyaitadabhavat--yannvahaṃ jambudvīpādannādyaṃ saṃhareyam,
S01divyav_u:181.015_0: atha gaṇayitvā māpayeyam, māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:181.016_0: ekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayitvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ pratyarpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:181.019_0: paraṃ deveti gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:181.021_0: ekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sthāpayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:181.022_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocat--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvannādyaṃ saṃhṛtam,
S01divyav_u:181.022_1: saṃhṛtya gaṇitam, gaṇayitvā māpitam, māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamarājadhānīṣvekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sathāpitam yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:181.025_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyānāmantrayitvā etadavocat--gacchata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:181.025_2: gaṇayitvā grāmaṇyaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prayacchata/
S01divyav_u:181.027_0: paraṃ deveti saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:181.027_1: saṃgaṇya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamādau kṛtvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prajñapayanti/
S01divyav_u:181.030_1: nirgato dvādaśasya varṣasyaiko māso yāvadbahavaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jighatsitāḥ pipāsitāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:181.031_0: ten khalu punaḥ samayena sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇamanyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā mānikā bhaktasyāvaśiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:182.001_0: [182]tena khalu samayena anyatamaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito bodhisattva imāṃ sahālokadhātumanuprāpto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:182.002_0: adrākṣīd bodhisattvo 'nyatarasmin banaṣaṇḍe putraṃ mātrā sārdhaṃ vipratipadyamanam/
S01divyav_u:182.003_1: saṃkliśyanti bateme sattvāḥ, yatra hi nāma asyāmeva nava māsān kukṣau uṣitvā,
S01divyav_u:182.006_0: ka utsahata īdṛśānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritum? yannvahaṃ svake kārye pratipadyeyam/
S01divyav_u:182.008_1: paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharati yadutedaṃ rūpam,
S01divyav_u:182.011_0: sa evaṃ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharannacirādeva yatkiṃcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakamiti viditvā tatraiva pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigatavān/
