S01divyav_u:182.013_0: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho yathāprāptānavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:182.014_0: saṃsevamānasya bhavanti snehāḥ snehānvayaṃ saṃbhavatīha duḥkham/
S01divyav_u:182.018_0: atha tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasyaitadabhavat--bahūnāṃ me sattvānāmarthāya duṣkarāṇi cīrṇāni,
S01divyav_u:182.018_1: na ca kasyacit sattvasya hitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:182.019_0_0: kamadyāhamanukampeyam, kasyāhamadya piṇḍapātamāhṛtya paribhuñjīya? atha bhagavān
S01divyav_u:182.019_0_1: pratyekabuddho divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sarvāvantamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ
S01divyav_u:182.023_0: yannvahaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya niveśanāt piṇḍapātamahṛtya paribhuñjīya/
S01divyav_u:182.024_0: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddhastat eva ṛddhyā vihāyasamabhyudgamya dṛśyatā kāyena śakuniriva ṛddhyā yena kanakāvatī rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:182.025_0: tena khalu samayena rājā kanakavarṇa upariprāsādatalagato 'bhūt pañcamātrairamātyasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:182.026_0: adrākṣīdanyatamo mahāmātrastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:182.028_1: dvitīyo mahāmātra evamāha--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ, rākṣasa eva ojohāra ihāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:182.030_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇa ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ saṃparimārjya mahāmātrānāmantrayate--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:182.032_0: atha sa bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya prāsāde pratyaṣṭhāt//
S01divyav_u:183.001_0: [183]atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamutthāyāsanāt pratyudgamya pādau śirasā vanditvā prajñapta evāsane niṣīdayati/
S01divyav_u:183.002_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamidamavocat--kimartham ṛṣe ihābhyāgamanam? bhojanārthaṃ mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:183.004_1: aho dāridryam, yatra hi nāma jambudvīpaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā ekasyāpi ṛṣerasamarthaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitum/
S01divyav_u:183.005_0: atha yā kanakāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmadhyuṣitā devatā, sā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya purastādgāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:183.007_0: kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dāridryaṃ kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ tadeva dāridryam/
S01divyav_u:183.009_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--asti bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:183.009_1: mama niveśane kiṃcidbhaktam, yadahamasya ṛṣeḥ pradāsyāmi? sa evamāha--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
S01divyav_u:183.012_1: tasyaitadabhavat--yadi paribhokṣye, yadi vā na paribhokṣye, avaśyaṃ mayā kālaḥ kartavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:183.013_1_0: kathaṃ nāmehedṛśa ṛṣiḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā mama niveśane 'dya yathādhautena pātreṇa
S01divyav_u:183.013_1_1: nirgamiṣyati? atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyān saṃnipātyaivamavocat--anumodata
S01divyav_u:183.016_0: anena kuśalamūlena sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:183.017_0_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇastasya maharṣestat pātraṃ gṛhītvā ekāṃ mānikāṃ bhaktasya pātre
S01divyav_u:183.017_0_1: prakṣipya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ nipatya tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasya
S01divyav_u:183.019_0: dharmatā punarbhagavatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ kāyikī dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:183.020_0: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāntikāt piṇḍapātramādāya tat eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:183.022_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tāvadanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇo 'sthāt,
S01divyav_u:183.023_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyānāmantrayate--gacchata grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni niveśanāni/
S01divyav_u:183.024_0: mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:183.025_1: tadā vayaṃ devena sārdhaṃ krīḍatā ramatā kathaṃ punarvayamidānīṃ devaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye parityakṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:183.028_0: mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:183.029_0: evamuktā gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyāḥ prarudanto 'śrūṇi pravartayanto 'śrūṇi saṃparimārjya yena rājā kanakavarṇastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:183.030_0: upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pādau śirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaitadūcuh--kṣantavyaṃ te yadasmābhiḥ kiṃcidaparāddham/
S01divyav_u:184.001_0: [184]tadyathā tena bhagavatā pratyekabuddhena sa piṇḍapātraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:184.001_1: atha tasminneva kṣaṇe samantāccatasṛṣu dikṣu catvāryabhrapaṭalāni vyutthitāni,
S01divyav_u:184.003_0: atha tasminneva divase dvitīye 'rdhabhāge vividhasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya varṣaṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:184.004_1: idamevamrūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ mūlakhādanīyaṃ skandhakhādanīyaṃ patrakhādanīyaṃ puṣpakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ tilakhādanīyaṃ khaṇḍaśarkaraguḍakhādanīyaṃ piṣṭakhādanīyam/
S01divyav_u:184.006_0: atha rājā kanakavarṇo hṛṣṭatuṣṭah udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapārṣadyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:184.010_0: atha dvitīye divase saptāhaṃ dhānyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti,
S01divyav_u:184.011_4: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya/
S01divyav_u:184.013_0: sarvasya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyānubhāvena jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedo babhūva//
S01divyav_u:184.015_0: syāt khalu bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:184.016_1: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:184.017_1: sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--apīdānīm yo 'sau apaścimakaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:184.019_0: na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:184.020_0: yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānate dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--yathā ahaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:184.020_2: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādattaṃ tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:184.024_0: na naśyate pūrvakṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ na naśyate sevanaṃ piṇḍatānām/
S01divyav_u:184.026_0: na naśyate āryajaneṣu bhāṣitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati//3//
S01divyav_u:184.029_0: asti caitasya vipāko avaśya dāsyate phalam//4//
S01divyav_u:184.030_1: āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayaḥ sarvāvatī ca parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan/
S01divyav_u:185.002_0: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:185.002_1: ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcārikāṃ carituṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:185.007_0: yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:185.010_0: evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:185.011_0: tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca/
S01divyav_u:185.014_0: sa kathayati--ācaritaṃ bhadanta āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcarikāṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:185.018_0: yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:185.021_0: evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:185.023_0: ayaṃ bhadanta heturayaṃ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:185.024_0: na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā/
S01divyav_u:185.026_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:185.027_0: bhagavānāha--pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:185.028_0: tatrādhastāt narakāḥ kartavyāḥ, tiryañcaḥ pretāśca, upariṣṭāt devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:185.029_1: madhye rāgadveṣamohāḥ kartavyāḥ, rāgaḥ pārāvatākāreṇa, dveṣo bhujaṅgākāreṇa, mohaḥ sūkarākāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:185.031_0: anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:185.033_0: sarvamanityatayā grastaṃ kartavyam, gāthādvayaṃ ca lekhayitavyam--
S01divyav_u:186.005_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:186.007_0: bhagavānāha--dvārakoṣṭhake bhikṣuruddeṣṭavyo ya āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayati/
S01divyav_u:186.008_1: te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi/
S01divyav_u:186.009_0: te ātmanā na jānate, kutaḥ punarāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayiṣyanti? bhagavānāha--pratibalo bhikṣuruddeṣṭavya iti/
S01divyav_u:186.012_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:186.012_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:186.013_0: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:186.015_1: sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṃ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:186.017_1: tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:186.018_0: sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṃ veṇuvanaṃ gato vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitam/
S01divyav_u:186.019_1: etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:186.021_0_0: ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti? sa kathayati--ete
S01divyav_u:186.021_0_1: prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpikā
S01divyav_u:186.024_0: tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:186.026_0: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? duḥkhānyanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni pratyanubhavanti/
S01divyav_u:186.028_1: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:186.030_0: tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti/
S01divyav_u:186.031_1: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni sukhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:186.031_2: ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt [187]kāmamithyācārānmṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādanabhidhyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:187.002_0: tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:187.004_0: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:187.004_1: ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:187.006_0: ārya, āsāṃ pañcānāṃ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretāśca, etā mahyaṃ na rocante/
S01divyav_u:187.007_0: ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete/
S01divyav_u:187.008_0: tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh? bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:187.008_1: svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme ājñāmārāgayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:187.010_1: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:187.011_0: katamāni pañca? āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:187.012_0: yeṣāmahaṃ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṃgamaḥ,
S01divyav_u:187.012_1: teṣāṃ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṃsyaśceti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:187.014_0: anuttaram yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:187.015_0: anuttaraṃ vā yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato 'nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:187.017_1: kiṃ tatra pravrajyāyāṃ kriyate? bhadramukha, yāvajjīvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caryate/
S01divyav_u:187.018_1: anyo 'sti upāyah? bhadramukha, asti, upāsako bhava/
S01divyav_u:187.022_0: ārya, kiyadbhiḥ kārṣāpaṇairbuddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojyate? bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:187.024_1: tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitaṃ dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:187.025_0: tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:187.028_1: āsāṃ mama tisro gatayo nābhipretāḥ, dve abhiprete/
S01divyav_u:187.031_1: putra, mayā tvaṃ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:187.032_0: kuto me pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāṃ vibhavah? amba, yadi [188]nāsti, bhṛtikayā karma karomi/
S01divyav_u:188.002_2: sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.003_0: brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'nyān bhṛtakapuruṣān gṛhṇanti, taṃ na kaścit pṛcchati/
S01divyav_u:188.004_0: sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.004_1: sa mātrā pṛṣṭah--putra, kṛtaṃ te bhṛtikayā karma? amba, kiṃ karomi? na māṃ kaścit pṛcchati/
S01divyav_u:188.006_0: yadyavaśyaṃ tvayā bhṛtikayā karma kartavyam, īdṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā tiṣṭha/
S01divyav_u:188.007_2: so 'parasmin divase tādṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.009_1: tena taṃ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.010_0: sa kathayati--gṛhapate, ahamapi bhṛtikayā karma karomīti/
S01divyav_u:188.010_1: gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, tvaṃ sukumāraḥ, na śakṣyasi bhṛtikayā karma kartum/
S01divyav_u:188.011_0: tāt, kiṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsi, āhosvit paścāt?/
S01divyav_u:188.013_1: adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:188.014_0: na śakṣyati, na dāsyāmīti viditvā kathayati--putra āgaccha, gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:188.019_1: teṃs teṣāṃ tādṛśī lokākhyānakathā prastutā, yāṃ śrutvā te bhṛtakapuruṣā ākṣiptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.020_0: tasyātisvareṇa gacchato 'nupadaṃ gacchanti, mā lokākhyāyikāṃ na śroṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:188.022_0: so 'dhiṣṭhāyakapuruṣaṃ pṛcchati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvayā apare bhṛtakā gṛhītāh? ārya, na gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.023_0: atha kasmādadya dviguṇaṃ karma kṛtam? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/
S01divyav_u:188.024_0: śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṃ bhṛtiṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.025_0: sa kathayati--tāt, kiṃ dvidaivasikāṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsīti? sa kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:188.025_1: na dvidaivasikāṃ dadāmi, api tu prasanno 'haṃ prasannādhikāraṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:188.026_0: sa kathayati--tāt, yadi tvaṃ mamābhiprasannaḥ, yāvat tava gṛhe karma kartavyaṃ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu/
S01divyav_u:188.028_2: tadā asau dārako bhṛtiṃ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante/
S01divyav_u:188.029_1: sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, kiṃ rodiṣi? māsi mayā kiṃcit vyaṃsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.030_0: tāt, mahātmā tvam, kiṃ māṃ vyaṃsayiṣyasi? api tu ahameva mandabhāgyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:188.031_0: mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:189.001_0: punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:189.002_2: putra, abhiśraddadhāsi tvaṃ bhagavatah? tāt abhiśraddadhe/
S01divyav_u:189.004_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.004_2: mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmītyamukasya gṛhapaterbhṛtikayā karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:189.007_1: bhagavan kim? āha--vatsa gṛhāṇa, śrāddhaḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.007_2: bhagavan, mā deveṣu nopapatsye? vatsa upapatsyase, gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:189.008_0: sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena sa gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.009_0: upasaṃkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.011_2: sā kathayati--putra, na mama bhāṇḍopaskaro na śayanāsanam/
S01divyav_u:189.013_2: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--tvayaiva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāani/
S01divyav_u:189.014_0: asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
S01divyav_u:189.016_0: gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:189.018_0: sthāpayitvā kārṣāpaṇān gaccha, śvo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantraya/
S01divyav_u:189.019_0: sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.020_0: upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati--so 'haṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:189.021_1: atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:189.023_0: tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
S01divyav_u:189.024_0: sukumārī gomayakārṣī dattā, āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā, udakamaṇayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.025_0: tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:189.025_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
S01divyav_u:189.026_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.027_0: ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti? apare kathayanti--amukena gṛhapatiputreṇeti/
S01divyav_u:189.029_0: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--nandopananda, bhṛtakapuruṣaḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:189.029_1: kimasau dāsyati? gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
S01divyav_u:189.031_2: bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:190.001_0: atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:190.002_0: satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān/
S01divyav_u:190.003_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:190.006_0: atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:190.008_0: atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:190.009_0: rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:190.010_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam,
S01divyav_u:190.012_0: kathayanti--gṛhapate, tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:190.014_0: na mamaitadbhaktam, api tu tasyaitadgṛhapatiputrasya bhaktam/
S01divyav_u:190.014_2: te tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayanti--gṛhapatiputra, dīyatāmasmākaṃ bhuktaśeṣam yadasti/
S01divyav_u:190.016_2: te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:190.019_0: anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/
S01divyav_u:190.020_0: te pṛcchanti--katarasyāyaṃ gṛhapateḥ putrah? amukasya sārthavāhasya/
S01divyav_u:190.021_1: śakyaṃ bahubhirekaḥ samuddhartum, na tveva ekena bahavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:190.022_0: tadayaṃ paṭakaṃ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam, so 'smin paṭake 'nuprayacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:190.023_0: te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:190.025_0: sa kathayati--tāt, na mayā mūlyena dattamiti/
S01divyav_u:190.025_1: sārthavāhaḥ kathayati--putra, na vayaṃ tava mūlyaṃ prayachāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:190.026_0: yadi ca mūlyaṃ gaṇyate, ekena ratnenedṛśānāṃ bhaktānāmanekāni śatāni saṃvidyante/
S01divyav_u:190.027_0: kiṃ tu vayaṃ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti/
S01divyav_u:190.027_1: sa kathayati--tāt, mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti/
S01divyav_u:190.029_0: yadi grahīṣyāmi, sthānametadvidyate yaddeveṣu nopapatsye? sārthavāhah--putra,
S01divyav_u:190.031_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:190.031_2: mayā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam [191]tadviṇijāṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:191.001_1: kiṃ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti? bhagavānāha--yadi prasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurvanti,
S01divyav_u:191.002_0: bhagavan, mā deveṣu notpapatsye? bhagavānāha--vatsa, puṣpametat, phalamanyadbhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:191.003_0: tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni//
S01divyav_u:191.005_1: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--bhavantaḥ, śreṣṭhī kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:191.006_0: kaṃ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣañcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti/
S01divyav_u:191.007_0: apare kathayanti--kathamasmābhirjñātavyamiti? te kathayanti--nānāvarṇāni bījāni pakkakumbhe prakṣipāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:191.009_1: ārocitaṃ ca--bhavantaḥ, ya ekavarṇāni bījāni etasmāt kumbhāduddharet, sa śreṣṭhyabhiṣicyate/
S01divyav_u:191.010_0: yasya vaḥ śreṣṭhitvamabhipretaṃ ca, uddharatu iti/
S01divyav_u:191.013_1: kathamenaṃ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcāma iti? apare kathayanti--punarapi tāvat jijñāsāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:191.016_1: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:191.017_1: tena tasya sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:191.018_1: sahasaivaṃ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:191.020_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat, sarvāsau buddhaṃ bhagavantamāgamya/
S01divyav_u:191.021_0: yannvahaṃ punarapi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam/
S01divyav_u:191.022_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:191.022_1: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:191.024_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:191.025_0_0: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:191.025_0_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ
S01divyav_u:191.027_0: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:191.028_0_0: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:191.028_0_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo
S01divyav_u:191.028_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:191.031_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:192.001_0: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:192.002_0_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:192.002_0_1: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:192.005_0: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:192.005_1: yāṃ śrutvā sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:192.007_0_0: sa dṛṣṭasatyastrirudānamudānayati--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā neṣṭena
S01divyav_u:192.007_0_1: na svajanabandhuvargeṇa na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatā
S01divyav_u:192.011_1: eṣo 'haṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:192.012_0: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetamabhiprasannamiti/
S01divyav_u:192.012_1: atha bhagavān sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:192.015_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:192.015_2: satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti? bhagavānāha--sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:192.019_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante,
S01divyav_u:192.019_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:192.024_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//3//
S01divyav_u:192.025_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:192.027_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:192.027_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:192.028_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:192.029_1: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:192.031_0_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
S01divyav_u:193.001_0: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasyā/
S01divyav_u:193.004_2: adrākṣīt sa gṛhapatistaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ kāyaprāsādikaṃ ca śānteneryāpathenodyānaṃ praviśantam/
S01divyav_u:193.007_2: sa gṛhapatiḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--ārya, kiṃ nivartase tvam? piṇḍakenārthī/
S01divyav_u:193.010_0: so 'pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:193.011_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateranyatarakarvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:193.011_1: sa patnīmāmantrayate--bhadre, mamāmuṣmin karvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:193.013_1: aparasmin divase sā gṛhapatnī kālyamevotthāya tadarthamannapānaṃ sādhayitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:193.014_0: sā putreṇocyate--amba, kasyārthe 'nnapānaṃ sādhyata iti? sā kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:193.016_0: sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati--amba, kimarthaṃ bhṛtikayā karma kṛtvā na bhuṅkta iti? sā kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:193.018_2: patnīmāmantrayate--bhadre, kṛtaste tasya piṇḍakenāvighātah? āryaputra kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:193.019_0: kiṃ tu anena dārakeṇa tasyāntike kharāvāgniścāritā/
S01divyav_u:193.020_0: sa kathayati--bhadre, kiṃ kathayati? tayā vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:193.021_0: gacchāmi, taṃ mahātmānaṃ kṣamāpayāmi--mā atyantameva kṣato bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:193.022_0: iti viditvā taṃ dārakamādāya yena pratyekabuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:193.024_0: tat kimatra kāraṇamiti? asamanvāhṛtya śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
S01divyav_u:193.025_2: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:193.026_0: sa tasyānukampārthaṃ vitatapakṣa hava haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:193.028_0: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ saputraḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:193.028_1: tataḥ sa dāraka āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--avatara avatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:193.030_1: sa gṛhapatiputrastīvreṇāśayena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:194.003_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau gṛhapatiputraḥ, eṣa evāsau sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:194.004_0: yadanena pratyekabuddhasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā, tena pañca janmaśatāni bhṛtakapuruṣo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:194.005_1: yat punastasyaivāntike cittamabhiprasādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tena sahasaiva bhogairabhivṛddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:194.006_1: ahaṃ cānena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:194.007_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:194.009_0: tasmāttarhi ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:194.010_1: (iyaṃ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṃ vinaye śikṣāpadam/?)
S01divyav_u:195.002_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavān bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśābhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:195.003_0: tatra bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:195.003_1: yāvadāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:195.005_0_0: atredānīṃ bhikṣavaḥ kimāścaryam yadetarhi śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū vigatarāgau
S01divyav_u:195.005_0_3: buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:195.009_0_1: cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ kṛtvā kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloka upapannau,
S01divyav_u:195.013_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma nagarī rājadhānī abhūt,
S01divyav_u:195.013_1: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
S01divyav_u:195.014_0_0: dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena dvādaśayojanāni vistareṇa caturasrā caturdvārā suvibhaktā
S01divyav_u:195.018_0: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmagurugandhāścandanagandhāścūrṇagandhāḥ sarvakālikāśca kusumagandhā nānāvātasamīritā atiramaṇīyā vīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vāyavo vāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:195.019_0: hastyaśvarathapattibalakāyasampannā yugyayānopaśobhitā vistīrṇātiramaṇīyavīthīmahāpathā ucchritavicitradhvajapatākā toraṇagavākṣārdhacandrāvanaddhā amarālaya iva śobhate/
S01divyav_u:195.025_0_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmanyataraṃ maṇigarbhaṃ nāma rājodyānaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣaviṭapopaśobhitaṃ
S01divyav_u:195.027_1_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ rājādhānyāṃ rājābhūccandraprabho nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko
S01divyav_u:195.029_1: na ca maṇirvā pradīpo vā ulkā vā purastāt nīyate,
S01divyav_u:195.029_2: api tu svakāt kāyāt rājñaścandraprabhasya prabhā niścaranti tadyathā candramaṇḍalādraśmayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:195.032_0: anena kāraṇena rājñaścandraprabhasya candraprabha iti saṃjñā babhūva//
S01divyav_u:196.001_0: [196]tena khalu samayenāsmiñ jambudvīpe 'ṣḍaṣaṣṭinagarasahasrāṇi babhūvurbhadraśilārājadhānīprabhukhāni ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:196.002_0: apīdānīṃ jambudvīpakā akarā abhūvann aśulkā atarapaṇyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.004_0: tena khalu samayena catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇamabhūt/
S01divyav_u:196.005_0: rājā candraprabho bodhisattvo 'bhūt sarvaṃdadaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca/
S01divyav_u:196.006_1: tena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nirgatya bahirdhā nagarasya caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu catvāro catvāro mahāyajñavāṭā māpitāśchatradhvajayūpapatākātyucchritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.011_0: kumārāḥ kumārikāśca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāḥ kṛtvā pradānāni dīyante/
S01divyav_u:196.014_1: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.015_1: yathā asmiñ jambudvīpe ekamanuṣyo 'pi padbhyāṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:196.016_0: sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā hastipṛṣṭhaiśca caturaśvayuktaiśca rathairuparisuvarṇamayai rūpyamayaiścātapatrairudyānenodyānaṃ grāmeṇa grāmamanuvicaranti sma/
S01divyav_u:196.018_0: tato rājñaścandraprabhasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ punarme itvareṇa dānena pradattena? yannvaham yādṛśānyeva mama vastrālaṃkārāṇyābharaṇāni,
S01divyav_u:196.018_2: yat sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā krīḍeyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.022_0: rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvanti rājārhāṇi vastrāṇyalaṃkārāṇi maulayaḥ paṭṭāścānupradattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:196.022_1: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā maulidharāḥ paṭṭadharāśca saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.023_0: yā rājñaścandraprabhasyākṛtistādṛśā eva sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.024_0: tato rājñā candraprabheṇāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--sarve bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā,
S01divyav_u:196.026_0: atha jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ śrutvā sarva eva rājakrīḍayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:196.029_0_0: tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājalīlayā krīḍatām yaśca vīṇāveṇupaṇavasughoṣakavallarībherīmṛdaṅgapaṭahaśabdo
S01divyav_u:196.029_0_1: yaścāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu tālavaṃśanirghoṣo yaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:196.029_1: tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanādito 'bhūt tadyathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmabhyantaraṃ devaputam [197]nṛttagītavāditaśabdena nirnāditam/
S01divyav_u:197.001_0: evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpavāsināṃ janakāyastena gītavāditaśabdena ekāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:197.002_0: tena khalu samayena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvāsaptatirayutakoṭīśatāni manuṣyāṇāṃ prativasanti sma/
S01divyav_u:197.004_0: teṣāṃ rājā candraprabha ṛṣṭo babhūva priyo manāpaśca/
S01divyav_u:197.004_1: apīdānīṃ varṇākṛtiliṅgasthairyamasya nirīkṣamāṇā na tṛptimupayānti sma/
S01divyav_u:197.005_0: yasmiṃśca samaye rājā candraprabho mahāyajñavāṭaṃ gacchati,
S01divyav_u:197.005_2: evaṃ cāhuh--devagarbho batāyaṃ rājā candraptabha iha jamudvīpe rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:197.007_0: na khalu manuṣyā īdṛgvarṇasaṃsthānā yādṛśā devasya candraprabhasyeti/
S01divyav_u:197.008_1: tena tena strīsahasrāṇyavalokayanti--dhanyāstāḥ striyo yāsāmeṣa bharteti/
S01divyav_u:197.011_0: vyaktau paṇḍitau medhāvinau guṇaiśca sarvāmātyamaṇḍalaprativiśiṣṭau sarvādhikṛtau rājaparikarṣakau rājaparipālakau/
S01divyav_u:197.013_0: mahācandraścāgrāmātyo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ jambudvīpakān manuṣyān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayati--imān bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartatheti/
S01divyav_u:197.014_0: yādṛśī ca rājñaścakravartino 'vavādānuśāsanī, tādṛśī mahācandrasyāmātyasyāvavādānuśāsanī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:197.016_0: mahācandrasyāgrāmātyasya rājā candraprabha iṣṭaścābhūt priyaśca manāapaśca/
S01divyav_u:197.018_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya dhūmavarṇaiḥ piśācairmaulirapanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:197.019_1: abhūcchaṅkitatvam, abhūdromaharṣah--mā haiva devasya candraprabhasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet/
S01divyav_u:197.021_0: tasya buddhirutpannā--na mayā rājñaścandraprabhasya svapno nivedayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:197.022_0: api tu ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgāraṃ praveśya sthāpayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:197.023_0: yadi nāma kaściddevasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet, tamenamebhī ratnamayaiḥ śirobhiḥ pralobhayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:197.024_0: iti viditvā ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgareṣu prakṣipya sthāpitavān/
S01divyav_u:197.025_0: apareṇa samayena mahīdhareṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--sarvaratnamayaḥ potaścandraprabhasya kulasthaḥ śataśo viśīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:197.026_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya rājyacyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarasya cāntarāya iti/
S01divyav_u:197.027_0: tena brāhmaṇā ye naimittikā vipaścikāścāhūya uktāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:197.028_0: tatastairbrāhmaṇair naimittikairvipaścikaiśca samākhyātam--yādṛśo 'yaṃ tvayā svapno dṛṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:197.030_1_0: tato mahīdharo 'grāmātyaḥ svapnanirdeśaṃ śrutvā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--atikṣipraṃ
S01divyav_u:197.032_0: athāpareṇa samayenārdhatrayodaśābhiramātyasahasraih[198] svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu yajñavāṭeṣu karoṭapāṇibhiryakṣaiścachatradhvajapatākāḥ pātitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:198.002_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignāh--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalamāgacchet,
S01divyav_u:198.002_1: mā haiva asmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogaḥ,
S01divyav_u:198.005_1: tena śrutvā aṣṭaṣaṣṭinagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--rājalīlayā bhavantaḥ sarve jambudvīpakā mānuṣyāḥ krīḍantu yāvadahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:198.007_0: kim yuṣmākaṃ māyopamaiḥ svapnopamaiścintitaih? rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śrutvā sarva eva jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājalīlayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:198.010_0: tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājakrīḍayā krīḍatām yaśca rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S01divyav_u:198.013_1: evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyastena gītaśabdenaikāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:198.016_0: tena khalu samayena gandhamādane parvate raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma indrajālavidhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:198.017_0: aśrauṣīdraudrākṣo brāhmaṇo bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ candraprabho nāma rājā sarvaṃdado 'smītyātmānaṃ pratijānīte/
S01divyav_u:198.018_1: tasyaitadabhavat--yadi tāvat sarvadado bhaviṣyati, mama śiro dāsyati/
S01divyav_u:198.019_0: api tu duṣkarametadasthānamanavakāśo yadevamiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpamuttamāṅgaṃ parityakṣyati yaduta śīrṣam,
S01divyav_u:198.021_1: atha gandhamādananivāsinī devatā vikroṣṭumārabdhā--hā kaṣṭaṃ rajñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya mahākāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ pratyupasthitamiti/
S01divyav_u:198.024_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ nātidūre pañcābhijño ṛṣiḥ praivasati viśvāmitro nāṃnā pañcaśataparivāro maitrātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:198.026_0: atha sa ṛṣiḥ sarvajambudvīpamākulaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṇavakānāmantrayate--yatkhalu māṇavakā jānīta sarvajambudvīpa etarhyākulākulo dhūmāndhakāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:198.027_0: sūryācandramasau evamahānubhāvau na bhāsato na tapato na virocataḥ/
S01divyav_u:198.029_0: rodanti kinnaragaṇā vanadevatāśca dhikkāramutsṛjanti devagaṇā pi na sthuḥ/
S01divyav_u:198.031_0: candro na bhāti na vibhāti sahasraraśmir naiva vādyavāditaravo 'pi niśāmyate 'tra//1//
S01divyav_u:199.001_0: [199]ete hi pādapagaṇāḥ phalapuṣpanaddhā bhūmau patanti pavanairapi cālitāni/
S01divyav_u:199.003_0: saṃśrūyate dhvanirayaṃ ca yathātibhīmo vyakto bhaviṣyati pure vyasanaṃ mahāntam//2//
S01divyav_u:199.005_0: ete bhadraśilānivāsaniratāḥ sarve saduḥkhā janā atyantapratiśokaśalyavihatāḥ praspandakaṇṭhānanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:199.007_0: etāścandranibhānanā yuvatayo rodanti veśmottame sarve ca prarudanti tīvrakaruṇāḥ santaḥ śmaśāne yathā/
S01divyav_u:199.009_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ puranivāsijanāḥ samagrāḥ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ manasi duḥkhamidaṃ vahanti/
S01divyav_u:199.013_0: ete payodā vinadantyatoyā jalāśrayāḥ śokamamī vrajanti/
S01divyav_u:199.015_0: bhuvorivāmbhasi ca bālasamīraṇāstā vātāḥ pravānti ca kharā rajasā vimiśrāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:199.019_0: api tu khalu māṇavakā rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ na bhūyo manojñaḥ svaro niścarati/
S01divyav_u:199.021_1: tato nagaravivāsinī devatā raudrākṣaṃ brahmaṇaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā yena rājā candraprabhāstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:199.022_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--adya devasya yācanaka āgamiṣyati hiṃsako viheṭhako 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī/
S01divyav_u:199.025_0: atha rājā candraprabhaḥ śiroyācanakamupaśrutya pramuditamanā vismayotphalladṛṣṭirdevatāmuvāca--gaccha devate,
S01divyav_u:199.027_0: atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ viditvā duḥkhinī durmanaskā vipratisāriṇī tatraivāntarhitā/
S01divyav_u:199.030_1: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa praviśan devatayā nivāritah--gaccha pāpabrāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:200.003_0: yāvadetat prakaraṇaṃ rājñā candraprabheṇa śrutam--yācanako me nagaradvāre devatayā vidhāryate iti/
S01divyav_u:200.004_0: śrutvā ca punarmahācandramagrāmātyamāmantrayate--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--yācanako me nagaradvāri devatayā vidhāryate/
S01divyav_u:200.005_1: evaṃ deveti mahācandro 'grāmātyo rājñaścandraprabhasya pratiśrutya nagaradvāraṃ gatvā tāṃ devatāmuvāca--yatkhalu devate jānīyāh--praviśatveṣa brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:200.007_0_0: tato nagaranivāsinī devatā mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--eṣa
S01divyav_u:200.007_0_1: brāhmaṇo raudracitto niṣkāruṇiko rājñaścandraprabhasya vināśārthaṃ bhadraśilāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:200.009_0: kimanena durātmanā praveśitena? eṣa mayā devate upāyaścintito yenāyaṃ brāhmaṇo na prabhaviṣyati devasya śiro grahītumiti/
S01divyav_u:200.011_0: atha mahācandro 'grāmātyo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya nagaraṃ praviśya ratnadharānājñāpayati--ānīyantāṃ bhavanto ratnamayāni śirāṃsi/
S01divyav_u:200.013_1: bhāṇḍāgārikai ratnamayānāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ rājadvāre rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:200.014_0: mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena raudrākṣasya ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇyupadarśitāni--pratigṛhṇa tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa prabhūtāni ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇi/
S01divyav_u:200.015_0: yāvadāptaṃ ca te hiraṇyasuvarṇamanuprayacchāmi, yena te putrapautrāṇāṃ jīvikā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:200.016_0: kiṃ te devasya śīrṣeṇa majjāśiṅghāṇakavasādipūrṇeneti? evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--na ratnamayairme śirobhiḥ prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:200.018_1: api tvahamasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya sarvaṃdadasya sakāśamāgataḥ śiraso 'rthāya/
S01divyav_u:200.019_0: evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparau vyavasthitau--kimidānīṃ prāptakālamiti/
S01divyav_u:200.020_0: athaitadvṛttāntamupaśrutya rājā candraprabho mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau dūreṇa prakrośyaitadavocat--ānīyatāmeṣa matsamīpam/
S01divyav_u:200.022_0_0: evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau sāśrudurdinavadanau karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevamānau
S01divyav_u:200.022_1: adyāsmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogo visamyogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:200.025_0: iti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:200.025_1: atha rājā candraprabhaḥ paramatyāgaprativiśiṣṭaṃ tyāgaṃ parityakukāmo dūrata eva taṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:200.027_0: atha raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo yena rājā candraprabhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:200.028_0: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--
S01divyav_u:200.029_0: dharme sthito 'si vimale śubhabuddhisattva sarvajñatāmabhilaṣan hṛdayena sādho/
S01divyav_u:200.031_0: mahyaṃ śiraḥ sṛja mahākaruṇāgracetā mahyaṃ dadasva mama toṣakaro bhavādya//7//
S01divyav_u:201.001_0_1: pramuditamanāḥ prītivisphāritākṣo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--hantedaṃ brāhmaṇa śiro
S01divyav_u:201.004_0: priyo yathā yadyapi caikaputrakastathāpi me kharpamidaṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:201.006_0: tvaccintitānāṃ phalamastu śīghraṃ śiraḥpradānāddhi labheya bodhim//8//
S01divyav_u:201.008_1: yadā ca rājā candraprabheṇa śiraso maulirapanītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:201.008_2: tatsamanantarameva sarveṣāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maulayaḥ patitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:201.010_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ caturdiśamulkāpātā diśodāhāśca prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:201.010_1: nagaradevatābhiśca śabdo niścāritah--asya rājñaścandraprabhasya pāpabrāhmaṇo śiraśchetsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:201.011_0_2: puruṣā deva ya evamatyadbhutarūpadarśanaṃ vā drakṣyantīri/
S01divyav_u:201.014_0_0: tau abhimukhamudvīkṣyamāṇau rājani candraprabhe cittamabhiprasādya raudrākṣe ca brāhmaṇe
S01divyav_u:201.014_0_1: maitryacittamutpādya nāvāṃ śakṣyāmo nirupamaguṇādhārāsya devasyānityatāṃ draṣṭumiti
S01divyav_u:201.016_1_0: rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā tāṃ ca nagaranivāsinīnāṃ devatānāmārtadhvanimupaśrutya
S01divyav_u:201.016_1_1: bhaumā yakṣā antarikṣacarāśca yakṣāḥ krinditumārabdhāh--hā kaṣṭamidānīṃ rājñaścandraprabhasya
S01divyav_u:201.019_1: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇastaṃ mahājanakāyamavekṣya śiro grahītum/
S01divyav_u:201.021_0: yadi ca te śiraḥ parityaktam, ekāntaṃ gacchāva iti/
S01divyav_u:201.022_0: evamukte rājā candraprabho raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamavocat--evaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kriyatām/
S01divyav_u:201.023_0: ṛddhyantāṃ tava saṃkalpāḥ, paripūryantāṃ manorathā iti/
S01divyav_u:201.023_1: atha rājā candraprabho rājā āsanādutthāya tīkṣaṇamasimādāya yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:201.024_0: atha rājā candraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vikrośamānāni pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:201.026_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ samāśvāsayannāha--apramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmoṣviti/
S01divyav_u:201.027_0: saṃkṣepeṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:201.028_0: samanantarapraviṣṭasya rājñaścandraprabhasya maṇiratnagarbha udyāne bhadraśilāyāṃ chatrāṇi dhvajapatākāśca yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenāvanāmitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:201.029_0: tato rājā candraprabho maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya dvāraṃ pidhāya taṃ taṃ raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--pratigṛhyatāṃ brāhmaṇa mamottamāṅgamiti/
S01divyav_u:201.031_0: evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ candraprabhamuvāca--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi devasya śiraśchettumiti/
S01divyav_u:202.003_0_1: mahājanavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya śiraśchetsyasīti? tato rājā candraprabha udyānadevatā
S01divyav_u:202.006_0: tatkasya hetoh? bhūtapūrvaṃ devatā mamottamāṅgam yācanakasya devatāyā antarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:202.007_1: tatkasya detoh? yadi tayā devatayā antarāyo na kṛto 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:202.008_0: ataśca tvāmahamevaṃ bravīmi--mā me tvamuttamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:202.009_0: asminneva te maṇiratnagarbha udyāne mayā sahasraśaḥ śiraḥparityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:202.010_0: tasmāt tvaṃ devate mamottamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ mā kuru/
S01divyav_u:202.011_0: eṣa eva devate sa pṛṣṭhībhūto maitreyo yo vyāghryā ātmānaṃ parityajya catvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena śiraḥparityāgenāvapṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:202.013_0: atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya maharddhitāmavetya tasmin rājani paraṃ prasādaṃ pravedayantī tūṣṇīmavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:202.014_0: atha rājā candraprabhaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:202.014_3: asmiṃs tyāgaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgam yena cāhaṃ satyena svaśiraḥ parityajāmi,
S01divyav_u:202.014_4_0: na rājyārthāya na svargārthāya na bhogārthāya na śakratvāya na brahmatvāya na cakravartivijayāya
S01divyav_u:202.014_4_1: nānyatra kathamahamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhya adāntān sattvān damayeyam,
S01divyav_u:202.014_5: aśāntāñ śamayeyam, atīrṇāṃstārayeyam, amuktān mocayeyam, anāśvastānāśvāsayeyam, aparinirvṛtān parinirvāpayeyam/
S01divyav_u:202.020_0: anena satyena satyavacanena saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:202.020_2: asya ca maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya madhye mahān stūpaḥ syāt sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:202.022_0: ye ca sattvāḥ śāntakāyā mahācaityaṃ vanditukāmā gaccheyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:202.022_1: te taṃ sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaṃ dhātuparaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśrāntā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:202.023_0: parinirvṛtasyāpi mama caityeṣu, janakāyā āgatya kārāṃ kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyāṇā bhaveyuriti/
S01divyav_u:202.024_0: evaṃ samyak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃścampakavṛkṣe śikhāṃ baddhvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--āgaccha mahābrāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:202.027_0: tato rājā candraprabha ātmanaḥ kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca saṃjanya tasmiṃśca brāhmaṇe karuṇāsahagataṃ maitracittamutpādya śiraśichattvā raudrākṣāya brāhmaṇāya niryātitavān/
S01divyav_u:202.028_0: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā atikramya brahmalokaṃ praṇītatvācchubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:202.029_0: samanantaraparityakte rājñā candraprabheṇa śirasi ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus triḥ kampitaḥ saṃkampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:202.031_1: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni [203]māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01divyav_u:203.003_2: eke bāhubhiḥ prakrośanti, kāścit prakīrṇakeśyo rudanti/
S01divyav_u:203.005_0: tata ekatyāstasminneva pradeśe sthitvā dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā śubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannā rājñaścandraprabhasya sabhāgatāyām/
S01divyav_u:203.006_0: apare dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā bhāsvare devanikāye upapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:203.008_0: aparaiḥ saṃnipātya rājñaścandraprabhasya śarīraṃ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiścitāṃ citvā,
S01divyav_u:203.010_1: gandhairmālyairdhūpairdīpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candraprabhe rājani svacittamabhiprasādya kālagatāḥ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:203.012_0: yaiśca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, sarve te svargamokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttā iti//
S01divyav_u:203.013_0: syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyā sā tena kālena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
S01divyav_u:203.014_1: tatkasya hetoh? eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:203.015_0: syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣuvaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma rājābhūditi/
S01divyav_u:203.017_1: tatkasya hetoh? ahameva tena kālena tena samayena rājā candraprabho babhūva/
S01divyav_u:203.018_0: syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūditi/
S01divyav_u:203.019_1: tatkasya hetoh? eṣa eva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:203.020_0: syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena samayena mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau babhūvaturiti/
S01divyav_u:203.022_0: tatkasya hetoh? etāveva mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau babhūvatuḥ/
S01divyav_u:203.023_0: tadāpyetau tatprathamataḥ kālagatau, na tveva putṛmaraṇamārāgitavantau iti//
S01divyav_u:204.002_1: ayaṃ tāvat khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayati--amī bhikṣavo dharmakathikā yuṃktamutkamuktapratibhānāḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.003_0: kasmānnaitānadhyeṣayasi? sa tairabhihitah--mahalla, kiṃ tvayā adhigatam? sa kathayati--ekottarikā/
S01divyav_u:204.004_0: te kathayanti--tvaṃ tāvanmahalla khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayasi/
S01divyav_u:204.006_1: yūyaṃ kasyārthe na deśayata? kimahaṃ nivārayāmīti? te kathayanti--nandopananda,
S01divyav_u:204.008_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi me utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kariṣyanti, nāgabhavane 'pyahamavakāśaṃ na lapsye/
S01divyav_u:204.009_0: sa teṣāṃ śayitakānāṃ taṃ vihāramantarhāpayitvā mahāsamudraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.010_0: nandopananda, uttiṣṭha siṃhāsanaṃ prajñāpaya, dharmaṃ deśayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.010_1: te kathayanti--ko 'pyasau devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhagavatyabhiprasanno buddhe dharme saṃghe kārān kurvan,
S01divyav_u:204.012_1: bhagavānāha--yo 'sau bhikṣavo nirmito yadi ṣaḍvargikairbhikṣubhir na viheṭhito 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:204.014_1: anadhīṣṭo dharmaṃ deśayati, tasmānna bhikṣuṇā^nadhīṣṭena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.017_0: śrāvastyāṃ buddharakṣito nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.018_0: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:204.018_1: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:204.020_0: tena sa gṛhapatiḥ sapatnīkaḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratikṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.020_1: apareṇa samayena sā tasya patnī āpannasattvā savṛttā/
S01divyav_u:204.021_0: āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya ca vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tat kulamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.022_0: sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--nāstyāryaśāriputrasya kaścit paścācchramaṇah? sa kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:204.022_1: kimasmākaṃ kāśadhānādvā kuśadhānādvā paścācchramaṇā bhavanti? api tu ye bhavadvidhānāṃ sakāśāllabhyante,
S01divyav_u:204.025_0: buddharakṣito gṛhapatih--ārya, mama patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:204.025_1: yadi putraṃ janayiṣyati, tamahamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:204.027_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām {atyayāt} prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:204.027_1: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204.029_0_0: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ
S01divyav_u:204.029_0_1: kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārako buddharakṣitasya
S01divyav_u:204.031_2: tasminneva divase pañcānāṃ vaṇikśatānāṃ pañca putraśatāni jātāni/
S01divyav_u:205.001_0: saṃgharakṣito dāraka unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.003_0: yadā mahān samṛttaḥ, tadā āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tatkulamupasaṃkramya nimittamupadarśayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.004_1: ajāta eva tvaṃ mayā āryaśāriputrasya paścācchramaṇo datta iti/
S01divyav_u:205.006_0: caramabhavikaḥ sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa pravrājita upasampādita āgamacatuṣṭayaṃ ca grāhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:205.007_0_0: athāpareṇa samayena tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:205.009_0: te kathayati--bhavantaḥ, ayamasmākamāryasaṃgharakṣito vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.010_2: ārya saṃgharakṣita, tvamasmākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.015_0: eṣo 'pyasmābhiḥ sārdhamavataratu, asmākaṃ mahāsamudramadhyagatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:205.020_0: tatra bhagavān saṃgharakṣitamāmantrayate--gaccha saṃgharakṣita, bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā bhavitavyam/
S01divyav_u:205.023_0: atha tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayanāni śakṭairbhārairmūḍhaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:205.025_0: te nipuṇataḥ samudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudramavatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.027_0: te devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāh--yo 'smin mahāsamudre devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā prativasati,
S01divyav_u:205.029_0: te kathayati--āryasaṃgharakṣito 'smākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanako bhadantaśāriputreṇānupradattako bhagavatānuparītakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.030_0: śreyo 'smākamanenaiva sārdhaṃ kālatriyā, na tvena vayaṃ saṃgharakṣitaṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205.032_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kiṃ kathayante? kathayanti--ārya saṃgharakṣita mahāsamudrācchabdo [206]niścaritah--āryasaṃgharakṣitamasmākamanuprayacchatheti/
S01divyav_u:206.003_1: na tveva vayamārya saṃgharakṣita tvāṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.004_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamitīdaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:206.005_0: sa pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā ātmānaṃ mahāsamudre prakṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.006_1: te kathayanti--āryasaṃgharakṣita kiṃ karoṣi, āryasaṃgharakṣita kiṃ karoṣīti/
S01divyav_u:206.008_0: ārya saṃgharakṣita, iyaṃ vipaśyitaḥ samyaksambuddhasya gandhakuṭī/
S01divyav_u:206.008_1: iyaṃ śikhino viśvabhuvaḥ krakucchandasya kanakamuneḥ kāśyapasyeyaṃ bhagavato gandhakuṭī/
S01divyav_u:206.009_0: ārya saṃgharakṣita, bhagavataḥ sūtraṃ mātṛkā ca devamanuṣyeṣu pratiṣṭhitam/
S01divyav_u:206.010_1: aho bata, āryaḥ saṃghāṃ rakṣita ihāpyāgamacatuṣṭayaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet/
S01divyav_u:206.015_0: sa eva teṣāmekaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.016_0: ārya uttiṣṭha, dantakāṣṭha, dantakāṣṭhaṃ visarjaya, bhagavato maṇḍalakamāmārjaya,
S01divyav_u:206.018_1: kiṃ dhārayiṣyanti āhosvinnadhārayiṣyanti? sa kathayati--smṛtimattakā hyete dhārayiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:206.019_0: sa kathayati--ārya, ko doṣah? sarve hyete 'gauravā apratīśāḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.021_0: tvamevaikaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.023_0: yastāvadayaṃ cakṣuṣī nimīlayitvoddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, ayaṃ dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.023_1: yo 'pyayaṃ pṛṣṣṭhatomukha uddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, eṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.024_0: yo 'pyeṣa dūrataḥ sthitvoddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, eṣo 'pi sparśaviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.025_1: sa bhīta utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206.026_0: sa kathayati--ārya, kasmāt tvamutpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttah? sa kathayati--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:206.028_0: sacet yuṣmākamanyatamo 'nyatamaṃ prakupyeta, māṃ nāmāvaśeṣaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:206.029_0: api tu icchasi tvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gantum? bhadramukha, icchāmi/
S01divyav_u:207.001_1: te 'nupūrveṇa samudratīraṃ gatvā sarve te vaṇijaḥ śayitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:207.005_0: asecanakā darśanena buddhaśca bhagavatāṃ varaḥ//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:207.007_1: te kathayanti prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām--kutrāyaṃ saṃgharakṣitah? tatraika evamāhuh--purastādgacchati/
S01divyav_u:207.010_2: āryasaṃgharakṣito bhavanto maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yaḥ samudramadhye na kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:207.011_0: sa idānīṃ kālaṃ kariṣyati? sthānametadvidyate yadasau agrata eva yāsyati/
S01divyav_u:207.013_0: āyuṣmānapi saṃgharakṣitaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanasamaye sūryāṃśubhistāḍitaḥ pratibuddho yāvanna kiṃcitpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:207.017_1: viśrāmayitvā vihāraṃ praveśito yāvat paśyati śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtāṃ praṇītaṃ cāhāramupahṛtam/
S01divyav_u:207.020_1: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, muṅkṣva, ādīnavo 'tra bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:207.023_1: taistāvadayomudgaraiḥ parasparamārtasvaraṃ krandadbhiḥ śirāṃsi bhagnāni, yāvat kālādakālībhūtam/
S01divyav_u:207.024_0: tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:207.026_0: ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? bhadanta saṃgharakṣita,
S01divyav_u:207.029_0: te vayaṃ bhaktāgre raṇamutpādayitvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:207.030_0: sādhu saṃgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghamadhye raṇamutpādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:207.031_0: mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ//
S01divyav_u:208.001_1: yāvat paśyati dvitīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavedikājālavātāyanaparikṣiptaṃ gavakṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ bhikṣūṃśca suprāvṛtān supraticchannāñ śāntāñ śānteryāpathe vyavasthitān/
S01divyav_u:208.004_1: śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ kṛtvā praṇītaṃ cāhāraṃ samanvāhṛtya sa tairuktah--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita muṅkṣva/
S01divyav_u:208.007_1: tairātasvaraṃ krandadbhistāvadayorasena parasparamātmā sikto yāvat kāladakālībhūtam/
S01divyav_u:208.008_0: tataḥ paścāt punarapi sa teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.009_0: te ca bhikṣavaḥ punarapi śāntāḥ śānteryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.009_2: kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṃgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:208.013_0: saṃghasya ca snehalābhe saṃpanne āgantukā bhikṣava āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.013_1: tairasmābhiranāryaparigṛhītairevaṃ cittamutpāditam--na tāvadbhojayiṣyāmo yāvadete āgantukā bhikṣavo na prakrāntā bhaviṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:208.017_0: sādhu bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmāraocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:208.017_1: mā asya evamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:208.020_0_0: sa saṃprasthito yāvat paśyati tṛtīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavidikājālavātāyanagavākṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ
S01divyav_u:208.022_0: sa tena vihāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhmāyitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.023_0: tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śāntaśānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.024_1: kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṃgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:208.026_1: kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita vayaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:208.030_0: sa tatraiva sthito yāvat tasyānisaṅgena(?) punarapi bahavaḥ śīlavanto bhikṣava āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:208.031_1: tairasmābhiramarṣajātaiḥ śuṣkāni kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāni tṛṇāni śuṣkāni gomayāni upasaṃhṛtya tasmin vihāro 'gnirdagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:209.001_0: [209]te vayaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣān pudgalān dagdhvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:209.002_1: sādhu bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ sabrahmacāriṇāmantike praduṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:209.002_2: mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhagino bhavino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇaḥ kāśyapīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:209.006_0_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃprasthito yāvat sattvānadrakṣīt stambhākārān kuḍyākārān
S01divyav_u:209.006_0_1: vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārān rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārānudūkhalākārān
S01divyav_u:209.010_1: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kriyākāraṃ tāvat kurmah--bahubollakāḥ śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:209.014_0: kathayati--kim yuṣmākaṃ pratiśrayaṃ na dīyate? api tu yuṣmākaṃ doṣo 'sti/
S01divyav_u:209.015_0: samayenāhaṃ bhavataḥ pratiśrayaṃ dāsye, sacet kiṃcinna mantrayasi/
S01divyav_u:209.017_1: āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena sā kuṭikā siktā saṃmṛṣṭā saṃmārjitā sukumārīṃ gomayakāsiṃ cānupradattā/
S01divyav_u:209.018_1: te kathayati--bhadanta, śucyapi mārjantyete śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:209.019_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bahiḥ kuṭikāyāḥ pādau prakṣālya kuṭikāṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupashtāpya/
S01divyav_u:209.021_1: sā rātryāḥ prathame yāme yenāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:209.023_0: na paśyasi mayā triyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham,
S01divyav_u:209.026_0: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham? kiṃ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi? sā saṃlakṣayati--śrāntakāyo 'yam,
S01divyav_u:209.029_1: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham? kiṃ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi? sā kathayati--ārya saṃgharakṣita,
S01divyav_u:209.031_1: api tu nanūktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:209.032_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śobhanaṃ kathayati--sacet sa niṣkāsayiṣyati, [210]gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:210.003_0: na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅko nānāśanaṃ sthaṇḍalaśāyikā vā/
S01divyav_u:210.007_0: alaṃkṛtaścāpi careta dharmaṃ dāntendrayaḥ śāntaḥ samyato brahmacārī/
S01divyav_u:210.009_0: sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇa sa bhikṣuḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:210.011_2: ityeka upasaṃkrānto dvitīyastṛtīyo yāvat sarve upasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:210.012_0: tathā tayā devatayā adhiṣṭhitam, yathā parasparaṃ na paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:210.016_0: kurvantu maitrīṃ satataṃ prajāsu divā ca rātrau ca carantu dharmam//4// iti/
S01divyav_u:210.021_2: te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ kathayanti--labhemo vayaṃ bhadanta saṃgharakṣita svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:210.024_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ kathayati--yadyevam, āgacchatha, bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:210.024_3: āhosvit tvadīyayā? āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ebhirmadīyenāvavādenaivaṃvidhā guṇagaṇā aghigatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:210.027_1: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:210.029_1: sthānāsthānakuśalo bhavati, aparapratibaddhā cāsya bhavati avavādānuśāsanīti/
S01divyav_u:211.001_0: te āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitenābhihitāh--bhavantaḥ, gṛhṇīdhvaṃ madīyaṃ cīvarakarṇikam, yāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:211.003_0: athāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājastata eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:211.004_0: yāvat tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ pratisāmayanti/
S01divyav_u:211.005_2: kutra gacchasi? sa kathayati--imāni pañca kulaputraśatānyākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:211.010_0: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:211.011_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣuvaḥ saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:211.013_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:211.014_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bhagavantamidamavocat--idaṃ bhadanta kulaputrasahasramākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:211.016_1: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣuvaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:211.017_0: bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastā varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:211.020_0: ehīti caoktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:211.022_0: sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//5//
S01divyav_u:211.025_0: arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāstraidhātukavītarāgāḥ pūrvavadyāvat pūjyāśca abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:211.027_0_0: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--ihāhaṃ bhadanta sattvānadrākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:211.027_0_1: kuḍyākārān stambhākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārāan rajjvākārān
S01divyav_u:211.030_0: kasya karmaṇo vipākena? bhagavānāha--yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:212.001_0: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuḍyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.002_0: yān saṃgharakṣita sattvānādrākṣīrvṛkṣākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:212.003_0: taiḥ sāṃghikāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ paudgalikaparibhogena bhuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.004_0: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛkṣākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.004_1: yathā vṛkṣākārāḥ, evaṃ patrākārāaḥ phalākārāḥ puṣpākārāḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.005_0: yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣī rajjvākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:212.007_0: sa tasy karmaṇo saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīstapvākāram (?) kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt śrāmaṇerakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.010_1: sa taiḥ pṛṣṭah--śrāmaṇeraka, kiṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati? sa kathayati--nāstīti/
S01divyav_u:212.011_2: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena tapvākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.012_0: yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrudūkhalākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:212.014_0: sa tenoktah--śrāmaṇeraka, dadasva me khalastokaṃ kuṭṭayitvā/
S01divyav_u:212.015_3: yadi rocate, tvāmevāhamasminn udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭaye prāgeva khalastokam/
S01divyav_u:212.016_0: yattadarhato 'ntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam, sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena udūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.017_0: yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ sthālyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambbuddhasya kalpikārakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:212.018_0: te bhikṣūṇāṃ bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayamānāḥ sthālikāṃ bhañjate/
S01divyav_u:212.019_1: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.020_0: yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati,
S01divyav_u:212.020_1: sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīllābhagrāhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:212.021_0: tena yadvārṣikaṃ lābhaṃ tad dhaimantikaṃ pariṇāmitam, yaddhaimantikaṃ tadvārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:212.022_0: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati//
S01divyav_u:213.002_0_0: bhikṣuvaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kuto
S01divyav_u:213.002_0_1: bhadanta tena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā? bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvaṃ
S01divyav_u:213.002_0_2: bhikṣuvo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā
S01divyav_u:213.002_0_3: lokam utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:213.005_0: sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati--etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata/
S01divyav_u:213.007_4: kecidanavatapte mahāsarasi, kecit saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu,
S01divyav_u:213.007_5: kecit tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu gatvā dhyāyanti/
S01divyav_u:213.011_0: anyatamaśca cirajātako nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājena sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāmupariṣṭādapahriyate/
S01divyav_u:213.012_0: yāvat tena bhikṣavo dhyānādhyayanayogamanasikārayuktā viharanto dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:213.013_0: prasādajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--muktā hyete āryakā evaṃvidhād duḥkhāt/
S01divyav_u:213.014_0: cyutaḥ kālagato vārāṇasyāṃ ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:213.015_0: so 'pareṇa samayena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:213.017_2: kutra mama mātāpitarau? yāvat paśyati nāgabhavane rudantau tiṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:213.018_1: gatvā pṛcchitumārabdhah--amba tāta kasyārthe ruditah? tau kathayatah--ārya,
S01divyav_u:213.020_1: ārya, tādṛśaḥ sa duṣṭānāgo yadvayaṃ sugatigamanamapi na saṃbhāvayāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:213.021_1: pādayor nipatya kathayatah--ārya, evaṃvidhāstvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:213.023_0: ihaiva tvamāgamya divase divase bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā gaccha/
S01divyav_u:213.023_1: sa nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhuktvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:213.024_2: ayaṃ te upādhyāyaḥ kutra bhuktvā āgacchati? sa kathayati--nāhaṃ jāne/
S01divyav_u:213.025_0: te kathayanti--nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhujya pāribhujyāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:213.026_0: tvaṃ kasyārthe na gacchati? sa kathayati--ayaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yena gacchati/
S01divyav_u:213.027_0: kathamahaṃ gacchāmi? te kathayanti--yadā ayam ṛddhyā gacchati, tadā tvamasya cīvarakarṇikaṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:213.028_1: te kathayanti--bhadramukha, yadi sumeruḥ parvatarājā cīvarakarṇikamavalambate,
S01divyav_u:213.030_0: yo yasmin sthāne 'ntardhāsyati, tena tatra nimittamudgṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:213.031_1: tau upari vihāyasā [214]prakrāntau yāvat tau nāgairdṛṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:214.001_2: sa saṃlakṣayati--kasyārthe 'yamapara āsanaḥ prajñaptah? sa pratinivartya paśyati yāvat śrāmaṇerakam/
S01divyav_u:214.005_0: taistasya divyā sudhā dattā, tasyāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:214.005_2: tena tasya pātraṃ gṛhītam yāvat tatraikā odanamijya(?) vatiṣṭhate/
S01divyav_u:214.007_1: ekadhye niṣaṇṇayorasya divyā sudhā dattā, mamāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:214.008_0: sa praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:214.010_0: tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jalaṃ syanditumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:214.012_1: sa kathayati--bhadramukha, apāyā hyete, nivartaya cittam/
S01divyav_u:214.015_0: ihasthasyaiva me bhadanta pāṇibhyāṃ syandate jalam//1//
S01divyav_u:214.016_1: tatra bhikṣavastena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā//
S01divyav_u:215.002_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:215.002_1_0: yasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahābhoge kule jāto bhagavato 'ntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ
S01divyav_u:215.002_1_1: sākṣātkṛtam? evaṃ taṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam? bhagavānāha--saṃgharakṣitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ
S01divyav_u:215.005_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ nāma śāstā pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:215.008_0: anena tatra yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam, na kaścidguṇo 'dhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:215.010_0: maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:215.010_1: na kāścidguṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro nāma māṇavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāmavaśyabhāgīyakasya bhāvyatāyāṃ buddho,
S01divyav_u:215.010_2: vyākṛtaḥ, tasya śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryām/
S01divyav_u:215.014_1: te kathayanti--upādhyāya, asti kiṃcit tvayā guṇagaṇamadhigatam? sa kathayati--nāsti/
S01divyav_u:215.015_0: kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:215.016_0: te kathayanti--vayamapyupādhyāyameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ/
S01divyav_u:215.017_0: karvaṭanivāsinā janakāyena śrutaṃ glāna āryaka iti/
S01divyav_u:215.019_0: kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:215.019_1: te kathayanti--vayamapyāryameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ/
S01divyav_u:215.021_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau vaiyāvṛtyakaraḥ, eṣa evāsau saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:215.022_0: yāni tāni pañca sārdhaṃvihāriśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañcabhikṣuśatāni/
S01divyav_u:215.022_1: yo 'sau karvaṭanivāsī janakāyaḥ, etānyeva tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni/
S01divyav_u:215.023_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:215.024_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamevaṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:215.027_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākah...pūrvavat//
S01divyav_u:216.002_0: yo 'sau svamāṃsatanubhiryajanāni kṛtvā tāvacciraṃ karuṇayā jagato hitāya/
S01divyav_u:216.003_0: tasya śramasya saphalīkaraṇāya santaḥ saṃmārjitaṃ śṛṇuta sāmpratabhāṣyamāṇam//1//
S01divyav_u:216.006_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharatīti sūtraṃ vaktavyam/
S01divyav_u:216.013_0: evamanuśrūyate--yadā bhagavān parinirvāṇakālasamaye palālanāgaṃ vinīya kumbhakārīṃ caṇḍālīṃ gopālīṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:216.013_1: teṣāṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ, tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--asyāmānanda mathurāyāṃ mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya gupto nāma gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:216.015_0: tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ bhavi(kari)ṣyati/
S01divyav_u:216.017_1: te 'ṣṭādaśahastāmāyāmena dvādaśahastāṃ vistāreṇa caturaṅgalamātrābhiḥ śaṇakābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:216.018_0: eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:216.019_0: paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:216.020_1: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:216.021_0: so 'tra rurumuṇḍaparvate vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati, upaguptaṃ ca pravrājayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:216.022_0: mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau bhaviṣyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:216.024_0: etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yadidaṃ naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:216.025_0: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:216.026_1: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ/
S01divyav_u:216.028_3: sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti,
S01divyav_u:216.030_0: tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:216.030_1: sa teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:216.031_1: sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati,
S01divyav_u:217.001_0: [217]sa teṣāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati, te na pratigṛhṇanti/
S01divyav_u:217.003_0: tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ gato yatra pañca ṛṣiśatāni prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:217.007_1: yadā ca tairīryāpatho vikopito bhavati, tadā sa teṣāmagrataḥ paryaṅkaṃ badhnāti/
S01divyav_u:217.008_1: tenāpi coktam--paryaṅkena tāvanniṣīdatha, yāvat tāni pañca ṛṣiśatāni paryaṅkenopaviṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:217.009_0: te 'nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.012_0: tairyāvat sa markaṭaḥ phalamūlaiḥ paripālitaḥ, kālagatasya ca taccharīraṃ gandhakāṣṭhairdhmāpitam//
S01divyav_u:217.014_0: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda? yo 'sau pañcānāṃ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa eṣa upaguptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.015_0: tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:217.015_1: anāgate 'pyadhvani varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama atraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:217.016_0: tacca yathaivaṃ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah--yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:217.018_0: sa yāvat samanvāharati--yo 'sau tasya putra upagupto nāṃnā alakṣa.
S01divyav_u:217.018_1: ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ, yo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti,
S01divyav_u:217.018_2: kimasau utpanno 'dyāpi notpadyate? tena yāvadupāyena gupto gāndhiko bhagavacchāsane 'bhiprasāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.021_0: sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.023_0_0: yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṃ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--na khalu āryasya
S01divyav_u:217.023_0_1: kaścit paścāccchramaṇah? sthavira uvāca--jarādharmāṇāṃ kuto 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇo
S01divyav_u:217.025_0: gupto gāndhika uvāca--ārya, ahaṃ tāvadgṛhavāse parigṛddho viṣayābhirataśca/
S01divyav_u:217.026_1: api tu yo 'smākaṃ putro bhavati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.029_0: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:217.032_0: yo 'smākaṃ dvitīyaḥ putro bhaviṣyati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:217.032_1: yāvat sthavirah [218]śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti/
S01divyav_u:218.002_2: so 'pi yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamuvāca--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:218.005_1: gāndhika uvāca--ārya marṣaya, eko 'smākaṃ dravyaṃ saṃśayiṣyati, sa āryasya dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:218.007_0: yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti/
S01divyav_u:218.008_1: yāvadguptasya gāndhikasya tṛtīyaḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇamasamprāptaśca divyavarṇam/
S01divyav_u:218.009_0: tasya vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā upagupta iti nāma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:218.010_0: so 'pi yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:218.014_0: yadā tena samayaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā māreṇa sarvāvatī mathurā gandhāviṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:218.016_1: sa dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karoti, gandhān vikrīṇīte/
S01divyav_u:218.017_1: kīdṛśāste cittacetasikāḥ pravartante kliṣṭā vā akliṣṭā veti? upagupta uvāca--ārya,
S01divyav_u:218.019_1: yadi kevalaṃ cittaṃ parijñātuṃ na śakyasi,
S01divyav_u:218.020_0: tena tasya kṛṣṇikapaṭṭikā dattā pāṇḍurikā ca/
S01divyav_u:218.021_0: yadi kliṣṭaṃ cittamutpadyate, kṛṣṇikāṃ paṭṭikāṃ sthāpaya/
S01divyav_u:218.022_0: śubhāṃ manasi kuru, buddhānusmṛtiṃ ca bhāvayasveti tenāsya vyapadiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:218.025_0: yāvat dvau bhāgau pāṇḍurikāṇāṃ sthāpayati, ekaṃ kṛṣṇikānām/
S01divyav_u:218.025_1: yāvadanupūrveṇa sarvāṇyeva śuklāni cittānyutpadyante, sa pāṇḍurikāṇāmeva paṭṭikāṃ sthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:218.028_1: tasyā dāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ gatvā gandhān krīṇāti/
S01divyav_u:218.029_0: so vāsavadattayā cocyate--dārike, muṣyate sa gāndhikastvayā/
S01divyav_u:218.030_0: dārikovāca--āryaduhite, upagupto gāndhikadārako rūpasampannaścāturyamādhuryasampannaśca dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karori/
S01divyav_u:218.031_0: śrutvā ca vāsavadattāyā upaguptasakāśe sānurāgaṃ cittamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:219.002_0: tasyā buddhirutpannā--niyataṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni notsahate dātum/
S01divyav_u:219.002_1: tayā yāvaddāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ preṣitā--na mamāryaputrasakāśāt kārṣāpaṇenāpi prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:219.005_1: anyataraśca sārthavāha uttarāpathāt pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyaṃ gṛhītvā mathurāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:219.007_0: sa pañca puraṇaśatāni gṛhītvā bahūṃśca prābhṛtān vāsavadattāyāḥ sakāśāmabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:219.008_0: tato vāsavadattayā lobhākṛṣṭena taṃ śreṣṭhiputraṃ praghātayitvā^vaskare prakṣipya sārthavāhena saha ratimanubhutā/
S01divyav_u:219.010_1: vāsavadattāṃ hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne chorayantu/
S01divyav_u:219.011_0: yāvat tairvāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:219.012_0: yāvadupaguptena śrutam--vāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:219.013_0: tasya buddhirutpannā--pūrvaṃ tayā mama viṣayanimittaṃ darśanamākāṅkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:219.013_1: idānīṃ tu tasyā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca vikārtitau, idānīṃ tu tasyā darśanakāla iti/
S01divyav_u:219.017_0: mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānāṃ śreyastadāsyāstu na darśanaṃ syāt//2//
S01divyav_u:219.019_0: idānīṃ tu tasyāḥ kāle 'yaṃ draṣṭuṃ gatamānarāgaharṣāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:219.022_0: tasyāśca preṣikā pūrvaguṇānurāgāt samīpe 'vasthitā kākādīn nivārayati/
S01divyav_u:219.022_2: yasya tvayā ahaṃ sakāśaṃ punaḥ punaranupreṣitā,
S01divyav_u:219.028_0: tataḥ preṣikāmuvāca--yau hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca maccharīrādvikartitau, tau śleṣayeti/
S01divyav_u:219.029_2: tato vāsavadattā upaguptamagrataḥ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:219.029_3: yadā maccharīraṃ svasthabhūtaṃ viṣayaratyanukūlaṃ tadā mayā āryaputrasya punaḥ punardūtī visarjitā/
S01divyav_u:220.001_1: idānīṃ mama hastapādau karṇanāsau ca vikartitau, svarudhirakardama evāvasthitā/
