S01divyav_u:220.005_0: babhūva gātraṃ mama darśanakṣamaṃ tadā na dṛṣṭo 'si mayālpabhāgyayā//5//
S01divyav_u:220.007_0: etarhi kiṃ draṣṭumihāgato 'si yadā śarīraṃ mama darśanākṣamam/
S01divyav_u:220.016_0: nirīkṣyamāṇā api yatnavadbhir nāpyatra dṛṣṭāsi bhavedyathāvat//8//
S01divyav_u:220.018_0: idaṃ tu rūpaṃ tava dṛśyametat sthitaṃ svabhāve racanādviyuktam/
S01divyav_u:220.020_0: te 'paṇḍitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ye prākṛte 'smin kuṇape ramante//9//
S01divyav_u:220.024_0: śirāsahasraiśca vṛte samantāt ko nāma rajyeta itaḥ śarīre//10//
S01divyav_u:221.006_0: saṃbuddhasya tu ye vacaḥ suvacasaḥ śṛṇvanti kurvantyapi te kāmāñ śramaśokaduḥkhajananān sadbhiḥ sadā garhitān/
S01divyav_u:221.008_0: tyaktvā kāmanimittamuktamanasaḥ śānte vane nirgatāḥ pāram yānti bhavārṇavasya mahataḥ saṃśritya mārgaplavam/
S01divyav_u:221.012_0: me tvāṃ sādhuṃ samāsādya buddhasya vacanaṃ śrutam//15//
S01divyav_u:221.013_0: yāvadupaguptena vāsavadattāyā anupūrvikāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:221.014_1: tenātmīyayā dharmadeśanayā sahasatyābhisamayādanāgāmiphalaṃ vāsavadattayā ca srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam/
S01divyav_u:221.021_1: eṣāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ cetyāha--
S01divyav_u:221.024_0: tamamarabudhajanamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//17// iti//
S01divyav_u:221.025_0: yāvadupagupto vāsavadattāṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:221.026_0: devataiśca mathurāyāmārocitam--vāsavadattayā upaguptasakāśāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:221.027_0: śrutvā ca mathurāvāsatavyena janakāyena vāsavadattāyāḥ śarīre pūjā kṛtā//
S01divyav_u:221.029_0: yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca--anujānīhi upaguptaṃ pravrājayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:221.030_1: yadā na lābho na cchedo bhaviṣyati, tadā anujñāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:221.031_0: yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsinā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā [222]
S01divyav_u:222.001_1: tato gupto gāndhiko gaṇayati, tulayati, māpayati, paśyati--na lābho na cchedaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.002_0: tataḥ sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamuvāca--ayaṃ hi bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:222.004_0: tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā upagupto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanaṃ nītaḥ, upasampāditaśca/
S01divyav_u:222.006_1: tvaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:222.008_0: eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.010_1: mathurāyāṃ ca śabdo visṛtah--upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho 'dya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:222.011_1: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samāpadyāvalokayati--kathaṃ tathāgatena pariṣaṇṇā? paśyati cārdhacandrākāreṇa parṣadavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:222.013_0: yāvadavalokayati--kathaṃ tathāgatena dharmadeśanā kṛtā? paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā/
S01divyav_u:222.014_0: so 'pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.016_0: yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati--kenāyaṃ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa/
S01divyav_u:222.017_1: upagupto dharmaṃ deśayati, muktāhāraṃ ca varṣopavarṣitamiti/
S01divyav_u:222.018_0: yāvat dvitīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṃ māreṇa cāsyāṃ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:222.020_0: yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati--kenāyaṃ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa pāpīyaseti/
S01divyav_u:222.021_0: yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.022_0: upagupto dharmaṃ deśayati, muktāvarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ ca patatīti/
S01divyav_u:222.023_0: yāvat tṛtīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:222.024_1: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravāditāni, divyāścāpsaraso nāṭayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.025_0: yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṃśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.026_1: praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā/
S01divyav_u:222.028_0: tasya buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṃ vyākṣepaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:222.029_0: kimarthamayaṃ bhagavatā na vinītah? paśyati mamāyaṃ vineyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.029_1: tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṃ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.030_0: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati--kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti? paśyati--vinayakāla upasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:222.031_0: tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh--ahikṛṇapaṃ kurkurakuṇapaṃ manuṣyakuṇapam/
S01divyav_u:223.001_0: dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā--upagupto 'pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:223.005_0: bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā/
S01divyav_u:223.007_0: yatte balaṃ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato 'si/
S01divyav_u:223.011_1: paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṃ na śaśāka/
S01divyav_u:223.013_0: yadi moktuṃ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṃ svayam/
S01divyav_u:223.016_0: brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ śatakratuṃ vā dīptaṃ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:223.018_0: na kledaṃ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṃ na bhedaṃ kaṇṭhasthaṃ kuṇapamidaṃ tu yāsyatīha//21//
S01divyav_u:223.026_0: kāmaṃ mamāpi mahadasti balaṃ tathāpi nāhaṃ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:223.028_0: tejasvināṃ na khalu na jvalane 'sti kiṃ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā//24//
S01divyav_u:224.002_0: śaghrīṃ tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja yaṃ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:224.008_0: tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṃ ko nu śaknuyāt//26//
S01divyav_u:224.014_0: mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṃ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṃ śrāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:224.016_0: atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca--bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:224.016_1: kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah?
S01divyav_u:224.022_0: sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṃ tena hiṃsitaḥ//30//
S01divyav_u:224.023_0: tvayā punarahaṃ vīra tyaktvā (tu) sahajāṃ dāyām/
S01divyav_u:224.026_0: kiṃ sarṣapeṇa samatāṃ nayasīha meruṃ khadyotakena raviṃ maṇḍalinā samudram/
S01divyav_u:224.028_0: anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahākaruṇāsti saumya//32//
S01divyav_u:224.030_0: rājā āha--kiṃ punaḥ sa śuddhasattva utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:225.002_0: brūhi brūhi śrīmatastasya bhāvaṃ saṅgaṃ chettuṃ kṣāntiguptavratasya/
S01divyav_u:225.004_0: yo 'sau mohānnityamāyāsito me tenāhaṃ ca prekṣito maitryeṇaiva//34//
S01divyav_u:225.006_0: sthavira uvāca--śṛṇu saumya, tvaṃ hi bhagavatyasakṛdasakṛdavaskhalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:225.006_1: na ca buddhāvropitānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanyat prakṣālanamanyatra tathāgataprasādādeva/
S01divyav_u:225.009_0: tvaṃ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ//35//
S01divyav_u:225.010_0: nyāyenānena bhaktistava hṛdi janitā tenāgramatinā svalpāpi hyatra bhaktirbhavati matimatāṃ nirvāṇaphaladā/
S01divyav_u:225.012_0: saṃkṣepādyatkṛtaṃ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṃ prakṣālitaṃ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:225.015_0: sthāne mayā bahuvidhaṃ parikhedito 'sau prāk siddhitaśca bhuvi siddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:225.017_0: sarvaṃ ca marṣitamṛṣipravareṇa tena putrāparādha iva sānunayena pitrā//37//
S01divyav_u:225.019_0: sa buddhaprasādāpyāyitamanāḥ suciraṃ buddhaguṇānanusmṛtya sthavirasya padayor nipatyovāca--
S01divyav_u:225.020_0: anugraho paraḥ kṛtastvayā niveśitam yanmayi buddhagauravam/
S01divyav_u:225.022_0: idaṃ tu kaṇṭhavyavalambi maitryā maharṣikopābharaṇaṃ visarjaya//38//
S01divyav_u:225.024_1: māra uvāca--kaḥ samaya iti? sthavira uvāca--adyaprabhṛti bhikṣavo na viheṭhayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:225.025_1: kamaparamājñāpayasīti? sthavira uvāca--evaṃ tāvacchāsanakāryaṃ prati mamājñā/
S01divyav_u:225.029_0: trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me/
S01divyav_u:226.001_1: 226.003, priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṃ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham//39//
S01divyav_u:226.005_0: māra uvāca--tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:226.008_0: buddhānusmṛtipeśalena manasā pūjām yadi tvaṃ mayi svalpāmapyupadarśayiṣyasi vibho dagdho bhaviṣyāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:226.010_0: kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṃ soḍhuṃ praṇāmakriyāṃ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ/
S01divyav_u:226.014_0: śūraṃ vañcayituṃ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṃ bauddhaṃ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:226.016_0: kṛtvā rūpamahaṃ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṃ dehināmeṣo 'pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṃ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan/
S01divyav_u:226.018_0: atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṃ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:226.019_0: māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṃ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum/
S01divyav_u:227.005_0: sa buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā tathāpyāsaktamanāḥ saṃvṛtto yathā buddhaṃ bhagavantamahaṃ paśyāmīti vyaktamupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:227.008_0: vaktreṇābhibhavatyayaṃ hi kamalaṃ nīlotpalaṃ cakṣuṣā kāntyā puṣpavanaṃ ghanaṃ priyatayā candraṃ samāptadyutim/
S01divyav_u:227.010_0: gāmbhīryeṇa mahodadhiṃ sthiratayā meruṃ raviṃ tejasā gatyā siṃhamavekṣitena vṛṣabhaṃ varṇena cāmīkaram/
S01divyav_u:227.012_0: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā harṣaṇāpūryamāṇahṛdayo vyāpinā svareṇovāca--
S01divyav_u:227.017_0: tenedaṃ jananetrakāntamamalaṃ rūpaṃ samutthāpitam yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ripurapyabhipramuditaḥ syātkiṃ punarmadvidhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:227.019_0: saṃbuddhālambanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vismṛtya buddhasaṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa mārasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:227.020_0: atha māraḥ sasambhramo 'bravīt--evaṃ taṃ bhadanta nārhasi samayaṃ vyatikramitum/
S01divyav_u:227.021_0: sthavira uvāca--kaḥ samaya iti? māra uvāca--nanu pratijñātaṃ bhadantena--nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ praṇamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:227.024_0: na khalu na viditaṃ me yasya vādipradhāno jalavihata ivāgnir nirvṛtiṃ saṃprayātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:227.026_0: api tu nayanakāntāmākṛtiṃ tasya dṛṣṭvā tamṛṣimabhinato 'haṃ tvāṃ tu nābhyarcayāmi//48//
S01divyav_u:227.028_0: māra uvāca--kathamihāhaṃ nārcito bhavāmi, yadevaṃ māṃ praṇamasīti/
S01divyav_u:227.028_1: sthaviro 'bravīt--śrūyatām, yathā tvaṃ naiva mayā abhyarcito bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:227.028_2: na ca mayā samayātikramaḥ kṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:228.005_1: yāvaccaturthe divase māraḥ svayameva mathurāyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣitumārabdhah--yo yuṣmākaṃ svargāpavargasukhaṃ prārthayate,
S01divyav_u:228.005_3: yaiśca yuṣmābhistathāgato na dṛṣṭaste sthaviropaguptaṃ paśyantu iti/
S01divyav_u:228.011_0: svargāpavargāya ca yasya vāñchā sa śraddhayā dharmamataḥ śṛṇotu//51//
S01divyav_u:228.013_0: dṛṣṭo na yairvā dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:228.017_0: yāvanmathurāyāṃ śabdo visṛtah--sthaviropaguptena māro vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:228.017_1: śrutvā ca yadbhūyasā mathurāvāstavyo janakāyaḥ sthaviropaguptasakāśaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:228.018_0: tataḥ sthaviropagupto 'nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu siṃha iva nirbhīḥ siṃhāsanamabhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:228.020_0: māṃ prati na te śakyaṃ siṃhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum/
S01divyav_u:228.021_0: yaḥ sa siṃhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṃkocam//53//
S01divyav_u:228.022_0: siṃha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham/
S01divyav_u:228.024_0: yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:228.025_1: kaiścidanāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścit srotāapattiphalam, yāvadaṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi pravrajitāni/
S01divyav_u:228.028_0: tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:228.028_1: yadā te kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttāstadā sthaviropaguptenābhihitam--yo madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
S01divyav_u:228.031_0: tasya yāvadāsamudrāyām {pṛthivyām} śabdo visṛtah--mathurāyāmupaguptanāmā[229] avavādakānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:229.001_0_0: tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte suramanujamahoragāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvavidyādharārcitapādayugme
S01divyav_u:229.007_1: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:229.014_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:229.018_1: vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti/
S01divyav_u:229.019_0: hastinas trośanti, aśvā heṣante, ṛṣabhā garjanti, śukaśārikakokilajīvaṃjīvakabarhiṇo madhurān {śabdān} nikūjanti/
S01divyav_u:229.021_0: aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṃ śabdaṃ niścārayanti/
S01divyav_u:229.022_1: iyaṃ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṃ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:229.024_0: itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe/
S01divyav_u:229.030_0: atha buddhapraveśakālaniyataiḥ prātihāryairāvarhjitāḥ strīmanuṣyāstannagaramanilabalacalitabhinnavīcītaraṅgakṣubhitamiva mahāsamudraṃ vimuktoccanādaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:230.001_0: [230]niṃnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca/
S01divyav_u:230.002_0: andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṃ saṃvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:230.005_0: sarvaṃ ca tannagaraṃ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:230.007_0: sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṃ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham/
S01divyav_u:230.009_0: saṃprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṃ surāsuranaraṃ hi samuktabhāvam//58//
S01divyav_u:230.013_0: yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:230.018_0: dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṃśuṃ dadau jātijarāntakāya//59//
S01divyav_u:230.020_0: sa bhagavate pratipādayitvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā syām,
S01divyav_u:230.022_0: tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṃ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṃ ca buddhvā/
S01divyav_u:230.024_0: iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṃśuṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ//60//
S01divyav_u:230.026_2: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ vidarśayanti,
S01divyav_u:230.029_0: ye 'dho gacchanti, te saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti,
S01divyav_u:231.004_0: te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:231.005_0_0: ye ūrddhvato gacchanti, te cāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn
S01divyav_u:231.005_0_3: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyanteṣu deveṣu gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:231.015_0: yadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:231.022_1: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:231.027_0: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitaṃ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ//36//
S01divyav_u:231.029_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:232.004_0: api tu sahetu sapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitamupadarśayanti/
S01divyav_u:232.005_0: paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṃśvañjaliḥ prakṣiptah? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:232.006_0: ayamānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṃnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
S01divyav_u:232.010_0: astaṃgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo 'sau hyaśoka iti nāma viśālakīrtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:232.014_0: ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṃśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:232.014_1: yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṃ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ/
S01divyav_u:232.015_0: gomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkrame tathāgataścaṃkramyate, tatra gomayakārṣīṃ prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:232.016_0: yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṃ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkramati bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:232.018_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:232.021_2: pāṭaliputre nagare biṃdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:232.023_0: tena ca samayena campāyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:232.023_1: tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī/
S01divyav_u:232.024_0: sā naimittikairvyākṛtā--āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:232.026_2: sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ grahāya pāṭaliputraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:232.027_0: tena sā sarvālaṃkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā--iyaṃ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti/
S01divyav_u:232.029_1: yadi rājā anayā sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyati, asmākaṃ bhūyaścakṣuḥsampreṣaṇamapi na kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:232.031_0: sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṃ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:232.031_1: yadā [233]ārabhate rājñaḥ keśaśmaśrum, tadā rājā śete/
S01divyav_u:233.001_0: yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ tvaṃ varamicchasīti? tayā abhihitam--devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:233.002_0: rājā āha--tvaṃ nāpinī, ahaṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:233.003_0: kathaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati? sā kathayati--deva nāhaṃ nāpinī,
S01divyav_u:233.005_0: rājā kathayati--kena tvaṃ nāpitakarma śikṣāpitā? sā kathayati--antaḥpurikābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:233.008_1: tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kumārasya bhavatu nāma? sā kathayati--asya dārakasya aśokāsmi saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:233.011_2: atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṃ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṃ parivrājakamāmantrayate--upādhyāya,
S01divyav_u:233.011_3: kumārāṃstāvatparīkṣāmah--kaḥ śakyate śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṃ kārayitum? piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ nirgaccha,
S01divyav_u:233.016_1: kimahaṃ tatra gāmiṣyāmi? sā kathayati--tathāpi gaccheti/
S01divyav_u:233.018_3: kva gamiṣyasīti? aśokaḥ kathayati--rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati/
S01divyav_u:233.020_1: yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake 'bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gatvā kumārāṇāṃ madhye 'tra pṛthivyāṃ prastīrya niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:233.023_1: parīkṣa kumārān--kaḥ śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṃ kartumiti? paśyati piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ,
S01divyav_u:233.025_1: yadi kathayiṣyāmi aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti, nāsti me jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:233.027_1: āha--yasya yānaṃ śobhanaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:233.029_0: mama yānaṃ śobhanam, ahaṃ rājā bhaviṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:233.030_0: piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--deva, yasyāsanamagram, sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:234.001_0: [234]yāvadaśoko mātrocyate--ko vyākṛto rājā bhaviṣyatīti? aśokaḥ kathayati--abhedena vyākṛtam--yasya yānamagramāsanaṃ pānaṃ bhājanaṃ ceti,
S01divyav_u:234.003_0: mama hastiskandham yānaṃ pṛthivī āsanaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhājanaṃ śālyodanaṃ dadhivyañjanaṃ pānīyaṃ pānamiti/
S01divyav_u:234.005_0: tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti tasya mātaramārabdhaḥ sevitum/
S01divyav_u:234.006_0: yāvat tayocyate--upādhyāya, kataraḥ kumāro rājño bindusārasyātyayādrājā bhaviṣyatīti? āha--aśokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:234.008_1: yadā śṛṇoṣi aśoko rājā saṃvṛttāḥ, tadā āgantavyam/
S01divyav_u:234.010_0: atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṃ viruddham/
S01divyav_u:234.010_1: tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah--gaccha kumāra, takṣaśilānagaraṃ saṃnāhaya/
S01divyav_u:234.011_0: caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ dattam, yānaṃ praharaṇaṃ ca pratiṣiddham/
S01divyav_u:234.012_1: naivāsmākaṃ sainyapraharaṇam--kena vayaṃ kam yudhyāmah? tatah aśokenābhihitam--yadi nāma rājyavipākyaṃ kuśalamasti,
S01divyav_u:234.016_0: śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge śobhāṃ kṛtvā pūrṇaghaṭamādāya pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:234.017_0: pratyudgamya ca kathayanti--na vayaṃ kumārasya viruddhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:234.017_1: nāpi rājño bindusārasya, api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:234.019_2: tena tau vṛttyā saṃvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṃchindantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:234.023_0: yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṃ praviśati/
S01divyav_u:234.024_0: tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:234.025_1: yadā rājā bhaviṣyati, tadā śastraṃ pātayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:234.026_0: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:234.030_0: yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṃ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti--aśokaḥ kumāro glānībhūta iti/
S01divyav_u:234.032_1: tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṃkārairbhūṣayitvā[235] rājño bindusārasyopanītah--imaṃ tāvadrājye pratiṣṭhāpaya/
S01divyav_u:235.001_0: yadā susīma āgato bhaviṣyati, tadā taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.002_1: aśokena cābhihitam--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ bhavati, devatā mama paṭṭaṃ bandhantu/
S01divyav_u:235.003_1: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhādāgatam yāvatkālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.004_0: yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ, tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.006_0: susīmenāpi śrutam--bindusāro rājā kālagataḥ, aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.007_1: aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:235.007_2: dvitīye dvitīyaḥ, tṛtīye rādhaguptaḥ, pūrvadvāre svayameva rājā aśoko 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.009_0: rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.009_1: aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṃśunākīrṇā/
S01divyav_u:235.012_2: yadā ca susīmaḥ praghātitaḥ, tasyāpi mahānagno bhadrāyudho nāṃnā anekasahasraparivāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:235.014_0: yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:235.014_1: tenāmātyānāmabhihitam--bhavantaḥ, puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca cchittvā kaṇṭakavṛkṣān paripālayatha/
S01divyav_u:235.015_0: amātyā āhuh--devena kutra dṛṣṭam? api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca paripālayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:235.017_1: tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
S01divyav_u:235.018_0: yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.019_0: tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.020_0: tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.021_1: yāvadrājā śayitaḥ, tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.023_0: śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:235.024_0: tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:235.026_0: api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ, ye devasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṃ śodhayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:235.029_0: caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate,
S01divyav_u:235.029_1: dārakadārikāśca tāḍayati, pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṃśca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:235.031_0: caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:235.032_0: sa tairabhihitah--śakyase rājño 'śokasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṃ kartum? sa [236]āha--kṛtsnasya jambudvīpasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṃ sādhayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:236.005_1: evam yāvadrājapuruṣairabhihitah--kimarthaṃ cireṇābhyāgato 'si? tena caitatprakaraṇaṃ vistareṇārocitam/
S01divyav_u:236.008_1: sa āha--deva, varaṃ me prayaccha, yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/
S01divyav_u:236.012_1_0: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:236.012_1_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān
S01divyav_u:236.012_3: jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati/
S01divyav_u:236.016_0: evaṃ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:236.017_0_0: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:236.017_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya kvathitaṃ tāmramāsye
S01divyav_u:236.020_1_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāmavānmukhān
S01divyav_u:236.020_1_3: saṃpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi
S01divyav_u:236.025_1_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:236.025_2: aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
S01divyav_u:236.031_0_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmāvādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:237.002_1: evaṃ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum//
S01divyav_u:237.004_0: yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:237.007_0: sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:237.008_0: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:237.012_0: tenocyate--kimidaṃ bāladāraka iva rudasīti? sa bhikṣuḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:237.015_0: durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/
S01divyav_u:237.017_3: tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat/
S01divyav_u:237.018_1: sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyatamatiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:237.020_0: atha saptame divase 'śokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikāṃ kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ nirīkṣamāṇāṃ saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ cārakamanupreṣitau/
S01divyav_u:237.025_0: kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/
S01divyav_u:237.029_0: tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
S01divyav_u:238.002_1: tato bhikṣurāha--dīrghāyuḥ, mamāpi nirgatā rātriḥ, udita ādityaḥ/
S01divyav_u:238.011_0: tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:238.013_1: ) yadā tadāpi na prajvalati, tato vicārya tāṃ lohīm, paśyati taṃ bhikṣuṃ pādmasyopari paryaṅkenopaviṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:238.015_0: atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu sa bhikṣurvaineyakālamavekṣamāṇah--
S01divyav_u:238.015_1: riddhiṃ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṃ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ/
S01divyav_u:238.018_0: nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṃ haṃsa ivotpapāt//76//
S01divyav_u:238.021_0: ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca/
S01divyav_u:238.023_0: varṣañ jvalaṃścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva śailaḥ//77//
S01divyav_u:238.029_0: manuṣyatulyaṃ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya/
S01divyav_u:238.031_0: na niścayaṃ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva//79//
S01divyav_u:239.001_0: [239]tatsāmprataṃ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:239.005_2: mahājanahitārthaṃ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṃstamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:239.009_0: buddhasya putro vadatāṃ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:239.011_0: dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṃ gatenāpi śamaṃ praṇītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:239.015_1: mahārāja, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare 'śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dharmarājaḥ,
S01divyav_u:239.017_0: idaṃ ca devena narakasadṛśaṃ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante/
S01divyav_u:239.018_0: tadarhasi deva sarvasattvebhyo 'bhayapradānaṃ dātum, bhagavataśca manorathaṃ paripūrayitum/
S01divyav_u:239.022_0: nāthasya saṃpūrya manorathaṃ ca vistārikān dharmadharān kuruṣva//83//
S01divyav_u:239.024_0: atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṃ bhikṣuṃ kṣamayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:239.027_0: śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṃ ca buddhaṃ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṃ ca dharmam//84//
S01divyav_u:240.005_1: rājā āha--ko 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ praviṣṭah? caṇḍagirika uvāca--aham/
S01divyav_u:240.008_0: tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṃ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṃ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṃ gṛhītavān/
S01divyav_u:240.010_0_0: yatroddhāraṇaṃ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṃśaṃ datvā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ
S01divyav_u:240.010_0_1: dvitīyaṃ stūpaṃ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṃśca pratiṣṭhāpya
S01divyav_u:240.011_0: tato rājā nāgair nāgabhavanamavatāritaḥ, vijñaptaśca--vayamasyātraiva pūjāṃ kariṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:240.014_0: rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṃ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṃ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:240.016_0: dhātūnyetasmānnopalebhe sa rājā śraddhābhū(?) rājā cintayati yastvetatkṛtvā jagāma//86//
S01divyav_u:240.018_0: yāvadrājā caturaśītikaraṇḍasahasraṃ kārayitvā sauvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ teṣu dhātavaḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:240.019_0: evaṃ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṃ paṭṭasahasraṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ haste datvā visarjitam--āsamudrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate,
S01divyav_u:240.023_0: rājā cintayati--na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:240.024_1: vistareṇa yāvadrājñā abhihitam--yatrādhikatarā bhavanti, yatra ca nyūnatarāḥ, tatra na dātavyam//
S01divyav_u:240.026_0: yāvadrājā kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā sthavirayaśasamabhigamyovāca--ayaṃ me manorathah--ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:240.028_0: ahaṃ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:240.028_1: yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchāditam/
S01divyav_u:241.001_0: [241]tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sa hyupādāya mauryaḥ/
S01divyav_u:241.003_0: cakre stūpānāṃ śāradābhraprabhānāṃ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā sahasram//87//
S01divyav_u:241.005_0: yāvacca rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam, dhārmiko dharmarājā saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:241.007_0: āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṃ hitārthaṃ kṛtsnaṃ stūpān kārayāmāsa lokam/
S01divyav_u:241.009_0: caṇḍāśokatvaṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dharmāśokatvaṃ karmaṇā tena lebhe//88//
S01divyav_u:242.002_0: sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhaśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa ākīrṇe rahasi vā,
S01divyav_u:242.002_1: tatra śirasā pādayor nipatya vandate sma/
S01divyav_u:242.003_0: tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati/
S01divyav_u:242.004_0: sa taṃ rājānamuvāca--deva, nārhasi sarvavarṇapravrajitānāṃ praṇipātaṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:242.004_1: santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti/
S01divyav_u:242.005_1: atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivānuvāca--vividhānāṃ prāṇināṃ śirobhiḥ karyam/
S01divyav_u:242.008_0: samānīteṣu ca śiraḥsu abhihitāh--gacchata, imāni śiraṃsi mūlyena vikrīṇīdhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:242.011_0: tato yaśāmātyastasyaḥ śirasaḥ pratigrāhakamanāsādya savrīḍo rājānamupetyedamarthamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:242.015_0: śirastvidaṃ mānuṣamapraśastaṃ na gṛhyate mūlyamṛte 'pi rājan//1//
S01divyav_u:242.017_0: atha sa rājā tamamātyamuvāca--kimidamitīdaṃ mānuṣaśiro na kaścidgṛhṇātīti? amātya uvāca--jugupsitatvāditi/
S01divyav_u:242.018_0: rājābravīt--kimetadeva śiro jugupsitamāhosvit sarvamānuṣaśirāṃsīti? amātya uvāca--sarvamānuṣaśirāṃsīti/
S01divyav_u:242.019_0: rājābravīt--kimidaṃ madīyamapi śiro jugupsitamiti? sa ca bhayānnecchati tasmādbhūtārthamabhidhātum/
S01divyav_u:242.021_1: tataḥ sa rājā tamamātyaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratyādiśannimamarthamuvāca--haṃ bhoḥ,
S01divyav_u:242.021_3: yuktamidaṃ bhavataḥ, yasmāt tvaṃ bhikṣucaraṇapraṇāmaṃ māaṃ vicchandayitumicchasi?
S01divyav_u:242.024_0: vināpi mūlyairvijugupsitatvāt pratigrahītā bhuvi yasya nāsti/
S01divyav_u:242.026_0: śirastadāsādya mameha puṇyam yadyarjitaṃ kiṃ viparītamatra//2//
S01divyav_u:242.028_0: jātiṃ bhavān paśyati śākyabhikṣuṣvantargatāṃsteṣu guṇānna ceti/
S01divyav_u:243.001_0: [243]āvāhakāle 'tha vivāhakāle jāteḥ parīkṣā na tu dharmakāle/
S01divyav_u:243.003_0: dharmakriyāyā hi guṇā nimittā guṇāśca jātiṃ na vicārayanti//4//
S01divyav_u:243.007_0: cittavaśena hi puṃsāṃ kalevaraṃ nindyate 'tha satkriyate/
S01divyav_u:243.009_0: yadi guṇaparivarjito dvijātiḥ patita iti prathito 'pi yātyavajñām/
S01divyav_u:243.011_0: na tu nidhanakulodgato 'pi jantuḥ śubhaguṇayukta iti praṇamya pūjyaḥ//7//
S01divyav_u:243.014_0: kiṃ te kāruṇikasya śākyavṛṣabhasyaitadvaco na śrutaṃ prājñaiḥ sāramasārakebhya iha yannṛbhyo grahītuṃ kṣamam/
S01divyav_u:243.016_0: tasyānanyathavādino yadi ca tāmājñāṃ cikīrṣāmyahaṃ vyāhantuṃ ca bhavān yadi prayatate naitat suhṛllakṣaṇam/
S01divyav_u:243.018_0: ikṣukṣodavadujijñato bhuvi yadā kāyo mama svapsyati pratyutthānanamaskṛtāñjalipuṭakleśakriyāsvakṣamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:243.020_0: kāyenāhamanena kiṃ nu kuśalaṃ śakṣyāmi kartuṃ tadā tasmānnāryamataḥ śmaśānanidhanāt sāraṃ grahītuṃ mayā/
S01divyav_u:243.028_0: na bhavati bahu śocyam yadvadevaṃ śarīre sucaritahṛtasāre naiti śoko 'ntakāle//12//
S01divyav_u:244.001_0: [244]sucaritavimukhānāṃ garvitānām yadā tu prasabhamiha hi mṛtyuḥ kāyakumbhaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:244.003_0: dahati hṛdayameṣāṃ śokavahnistadānīṃ dadhighaṭa iva bhagne sarvaśo 'prāptasāre//13//
S01divyav_u:244.005_0: kartuṃ vighnamato na me 'rhati bhavān kāyapraṇāmaṃ prati śreṣṭho 'smītyaparīkṣako hi gaṇayan mohāndhakārāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:244.007_0: kāyam yastu parīkṣate daśabalavyāhāradīpairbudho nāsau pārthivabhṛtyayorviṣamatāṃ kāyasya saṃpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:244.009_0: tvagmāṃsāsthiśirāyakṛtprabhṛtayo bhāvā hi tulyā nṛṇāmāhāryaistu vibhūṣaṇairadhikatā kāyasya niṣpadyate/
S01divyav_u:244.011_0: etatsāramiheṣyate tu yadimaṃ niśritya kāyādhamaṃ pratyutthānanamaskṛtādikuśalaṃ prājñaiḥ samutthāpyate/
S01divyav_u:244.013_0_1: praṇāmādibhyaḥ samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ
S01divyav_u:244.013_0_2: samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ sārataratāmavekṣya
S01divyav_u:244.020_0: tatra yaśo nāṃnā saṃghasthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:244.020_1: yadā bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamaye tadā apalālaṃ nāgaṃ damayitvā kumbhakālaṃ caṇḍālīgopālīṃ ca nāgaṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:244.020_2: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate--asyāmānanda mathutāyāṃ varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya gupto nāṃnā gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:244.023_0: tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāṃnā avavādakānāmagro 'lakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:244.024_0: paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:244.025_1: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:244.026_0: etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yaduta naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:224.030_1: athādyāpi notpadyata iti? sthavira uvāca--utpannaḥ sa mahātmā/
S01divyav_u:245.001_0: [245]sarvajñalīlo hi sa śuddhasattvo dharmaṃ praṇītaṃ vadate gaṇāgre/
S01divyav_u:245.005_0: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmānupagupto 'ṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatane prativasati/
S01divyav_u:245.011_0: tato 'mātyairabhihitah--deva dūtaḥ preṣayitavyo viṣayanivāsī, sa devasya svayamevāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:245.012_0: rājā āha--nāsau asmākamarhatyabhigantum, kiṃ tu vayamevārhāmastasyābhigantum/
S01divyav_u:245.016_0: yāvadrājñā sthaviropaguptasya sakāśaṃ dūto na preṣitaḥ sthaviradarśanāyāgamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:245.017_0: sthaviropaguptaścintayati--yadi rājā āgamiṣyati, mahājanakāyasya pīḍā bhaviṣyati gocarasya ca/
S01divyav_u:245.018_1: tato rājñā sthaviropaguptasyārthe nauyānenāgamiṣyatīti yāvacca mathurām yāvacca pāṭaliputramantarānnausaṃkramo 'vasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:245.019_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājño 'śokasyānugrahārthamaṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto nāvamabhiruhya pāṭaliputramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:245.021_0: tato rājapuruṣai rājño 'śokasya niveditam--deva, diṣṭyā vardhasva/
S01divyav_u:245.026_0: śrutvā ca rājñā prītamanasā śatasahasramūlyo muktāhāraḥ svaśarīrādapanīya priyākhyāyino dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:245.031_0: svargāpavargāya ca hetubhūtaṃ sa paśyatāṃ kāruṇikopaguptam//22//
S01divyav_u:246.001_0: [246]yebhir na dṛṣṭo dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:246.005_0_0: yāvadrājñā pāṭalipurre ghaṇṭāṃ ghoṣayitvā nagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni
S01divyav_u:246.005_0_1: yojanāni gatvā sarvavādyena sarvapuṣpagandhamālyena sarvapauraiḥ sarvāmātyaiḥ saha
S01divyav_u:246.008_1: tadantaraṃ hastiskandhādavatīrya padmyāṃ nadītīramabhigamya ekaṃ pādaṃ nadītīre sthāpya dvitīyaṃ nauphalake sthaviropaguptaṃ sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya nau{saṃkramād} uttāritavān/
S01divyav_u:246.010_0_0: uttārya ca mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇopaguptasya pādayor nipatito mukhatuṇḍakena
S01divyav_u:246.010_0_1: ca pādau anuparimārjya utthāya dvau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale nikṣipya kṛtāñjaliḥ
S01divyav_u:246.013_0: yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:246.015_0: ekātapatrā pṛthivī tadā me prītir na sā yā sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//24//
S01divyav_u:246.019_0: tvadvarśanāccaiva pare 'pi śuddhyā dṛṣṭo mayādyāpratimaḥ svayambhūḥ//25//
S01divyav_u:246.022_0: śāntiṃ gate kāruṇike jinendre tvaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kuruṣe triloke/
S01divyav_u:246.028_0: vibho mamājñāṃ vada śīghramadya kartāsmi vākyaṃ śuddhasattvā//27//
S01divyav_u:247.001_0: [247]atha sthaviropagupto dakṣiṇena pāṇinā rājānaṃ śirasi parimārjayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:247.003_0: durlabhaṃ trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//28//
S01divyav_u:247.004_0: api ca mahārāja tena tena bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena tava ca mama {ca} śāsanamupanyastaṃ sattvasārathivareṇa gaṇamadhye parīttaṃ paripālyam yatnato 'smābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:247.005_0: rājā āha--sthavira, yathā ahaṃ nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā, tadevānuṣṭhīyate/
S01divyav_u:247.009_0: saṃśobhitā me pṛthivī samantādvaistārikā dhātudharāḥ kṛtāśca//29//
S01divyav_u:247.012_0: ātmā putraṃ gṛhaṃ dārān pṛthivī kośameva ca/
S01divyav_u:247.016_0: gate kāle na śocanti iṣṭam yānti surālayam//31//
S01divyav_u:247.017_0: yāvadrājā mahatā śrīsamudayena sthaviropaguptaṃ rājakule praveśayitvā sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:247.018_0: sthaviropaguptasya śarīraṃ mṛdu sumṛdu, tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā/
S01divyav_u:247.025_0: dānaṃ manāpaṃ suśubhaṃ praṇītaṃ dattaṃ mayā hyapratipudgalasya/
S01divyav_u:247.027_0: na pāṃśudānaṃ hi mayā pradattam yathā tvayādāyi tathāgatasya//33//
S01divyav_u:248.007_1: ayaṃ me manoratho ye bhagavatā buddhena pradeśā adhyuṣitāstānarceyam,
S01divyav_u:248.009_0: āha ca--ye buddhena bhagavatā pradeśā adhyuṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:248.009_1: tānarcayannahaṃ gatvā cihnāni caiva kuryāṃ paścimāṃ janatāmanukampārtham/
S01divyav_u:248.010_0: sthavira uvāca--sādhu sādhu mahārāja, śobhanaste cittotpādaḥ/
S01divyav_u:248.013_0: gatvā cihnāni teṣveva kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ//37//
S01divyav_u:248.014_0: atha rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya gandhamālyapuṣpamādāya sthaviropaguptasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:248.015_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokaṃ sarvaprathamena lumbinīvanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin mahārāja pradeśe bhagavāñ jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:248.018_0: jātamātreha sa muniḥ prakrāntaḥ saptapadaṃ bhuvi//38//
S01divyav_u:248.021_0: atha rājā sarvaśarīreṇa tatra pādayor nipatya utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:248.024_0: atha sthaviro rājñaḥ prasādavṛddhyarthamuvāca--mahārāja, kiṃ drakṣyasi tāṃ devatām?
S01divyav_u:248.025_0: yayā dṛṣṭaḥ prajāyansa vane 'smin vadatāṃ varaḥ/
S01divyav_u:248.026_0: tramamāṇaḥ padān sapta śrutā vāco yayā muneḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:248.027_1: atha sthaviropagupto yasya vṛkṣasya śākhamavalambya devī mahāmāyā prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:248.029_0: naivāsikā yā ihāśokavṛkṣe saṃbuddhadarśinī yā devakanyā/
S01divyav_u:249.001_0: [249]yāvat sā devatā svarūpeṇa sthaviropaguptasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:249.001_2: iyaṃ sā devatā, yayā dṛṣṭo bhagavāñ jāyamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.006_0: śrutvāstvayā tasya nararṣabhasya vāco manojñāḥ prathamā vane 'smin//43//
S01divyav_u:249.008_0: devatā prāha--mayā hi dṛṣṭaḥ kanakāvadātaḥ prajāyamāno dvipadapradhānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.011_0: padāni sapta kramāṇa eva śrutā ca vācamapi tasya śāstuḥ//44//
S01divyav_u:249.013_0: rājā āha--kathaya devate, kīdṛśī bhagavato jāyamānasya śrīrbabhūveti/
S01divyav_u:249.013_1: devatā prāha--na śakyaṃ mayā vāgbhiḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:249.017_0: sasāgarāntā ca mahī saśailā mahārṇavasthā iva nauścāla//45//
S01divyav_u:249.020_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ kapilavastu nivedayitvā dakṣiṇahastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyopanāmitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.021_0: taṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaśarīramasecanakadarśanaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājā sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.024_1: tato rājñā śuddhodanena bodhisattvo devatānāmapyayaṃ deva iti tena bodhisattvasya devātideva iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:249.025_0: asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo brāhmaṇānāṃ naimittikānāṃ vipaścikānāmupadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.026_0: asmin pradeśe asitena ṛṣiṇā nirdiṣṭo buddho loke bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:249.028_1: asmin pradeśe hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śaradhanurgrahe tomaragrahe 'ṅkuśagrahe kulānurūpāsu vidyāsu pāragaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.030_1: asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ ratimanubhūtavān/
S01divyav_u:249.031_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo jīrṇāturamṛtasaṃdarśanodvigno vanaṃ saṃśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:249.032_0: asmin pradeśe jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣadya viviktam [250]pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamanāśravasadṛśaṃ prathamadhyānaṃ samāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.002_0: atha pariṇate madhyāhne atikrānte bhaktakālasamaye bhaktakālasamaye anyeṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyā prācīnaniṃnā prācīnapravaṇā prācīnaprāgbhārā,
S01divyav_u:250.003_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punā rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.004_0: anena dvāreṇa bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛto 'rdharāteḥ kapilavastuno nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.005_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena cchandakasyāśvamābharaṇāni ca datvā pratinivartitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.009_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo lubdhakasakāśāt kāśikairvastraiḥ kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi grahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.014_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ cīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:250.016_0: nāyaṃ mārgo hyabhijñāya iti jñātvā samutsṛjet//48//
S01divyav_u:250.017_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena nandāyā nandabalāyāśca grāmikaduhitryoḥ sakāśāt ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ parimuktam/
S01divyav_u:250.019_0: asmin pradeśe nandāyā bhuktvā ca madhupāyasam/
S01divyav_u:250.021_0: asmin pradeśe bodhisattvaḥ kālikena nāgarājena bodhisamūlamabhigacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:250.025_0: atha rājā sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:250.028_0: atha kāliko nāgarājaḥ sthavirasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira, kimājñāpayasīti/
S01divyav_u:250.029_0: atha sthaviro rājānamuvāca--ayaṃ sa mahārāja kāliko nāgarājā yena bhagavānanena mārgeṇa bodhimūlaṃ nirgacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:251.003_0: ākhyāhi me daśabalasya guṇaikadeśaṃ tatkīdṛśī vada bhavan sugate tadānīm//52//
S01divyav_u:251.010_1_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ bodhimūlamupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:251.010_1_1: pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvena mahāmaitrīsahāyena sakalaṃ mārabalaṃ jitvā anuttarā
S01divyav_u:251.013_0: iha munivṛṣabheṇa bodhimūle namucibalaṃ vikṛtaṃ nirastamāśu/
S01divyav_u:251.017_2: atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokamuvāca--asmin pradeśe bhagavāṃś caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sakāśāccatvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇi grahāyaikaṃ pātramadhimuktam/
S01divyav_u:251.021_0: yāvat sthaviro rājānam ṛṣivadana(patana?)mupanīya dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bhagavatā triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravarjitatam/
S01divyav_u:251.026_1: asmin pradeśe rājño bimbisārasya dharmaṃ deśitam/
S01divyav_u:251.028_0: asmin pradeśe bhagavatā śakrasya devendrasya dharmo deśitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:251.030_0: asmin pradeśe bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśoṣu varṣā māturjanayitryā dharmam [252]deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛto 'vatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:252.001_0_0: vistareṇa yāvat sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ kuśinagarīmupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karatalamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:252.001_0_1: pradeśe mahārāja bhagavān sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S01divyav_u:252.008_2: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya parivirvāṇe śatasahasraṃ datvā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pādayor nipatyovāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:252.008_3: ayaṃ me mano rathah--ye ca bhagavatā śrāvakā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S01divyav_u:252.011_2: sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ jetavanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--ayaṃ mahārāja sthaviraśāriputrasya stūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:252.013_1: rājā āha--ke tasya tasya guṇā babhūvah? sthavira uvāca--sa hi dvitīyaśāstā dharmasenādhipatirdharmacakraparavartanaḥ prajñāvatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:252.023_0: tato rājā prītamanāḥ sthaviraśāradvatīputrastūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtājñaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:252.026_0: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpamupadarśannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:252.027_1: rājā āha--ke tasya guṇā babhūvuriti? sthavira uvāca--sa hi ṛddhimatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:252.027_2: yena dakṣiṇena pādāṅguṣṭhena śakrasya devendrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ prakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:253.005_0: yāvadrājā mahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:253.008_2: rājā āha--ke tasya guṇā babhūvah? sthavira uvāca--sa hi mahātmā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhutaguṇavāditāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:253.016_0: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviramahākāśyapasya stūpe datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:253.019_0: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviravatkulasya stūpaṃ darśayannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthavirabatkulasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:253.020_1: rājā āha--ke tasya guṇā babhūvuriti? sthavira uvāca--sa mahātmā alpābādhānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:253.022_1: yāvadamātyairabhihitah--deva, kimarthaṃ tulyeṣvavasthiteṣvatra kākāṇī dīyata iti? rājā āha--śrūyatāmatrābhiprāyo mama--
S01divyav_u:253.024_0: ājñāpradīpena manogṛhasthaṃ hataṃ tamo yadyapi kṛtaṃ hi tena yathā kṛtaṃ sattvahitaṃ tadanyaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:253.028_0: sā pratyāhatā tasyaiva rājñaḥ pādamūle nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:253.028_1: yāvadamātyā vismitā ūcuh--aho tasya mahātmano 'lpecchatā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:253.029_1: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthavirānandasya stūpamupadarśayannuvāca--idaṃ sthavirānandasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:253.031_0: sthavira uvāca--sa hi bhagavata upasthāyako babhuva, bahuśrutānāmagryaḥ pravacanagrāhakaśceti/
S01divyav_u:254.005_1: yāvadamātyairabhihitah--kimarthamayaṃ deva sarveṣāṃ sakāśādadhikataraṃ pūjyate? rājā āha--śrūyatāmabhiprāyah--
S01divyav_u:254.007_0: yattaccharīraṃ vadatāṃ varasya dharmātmano dharmamayaṃ viśuddham/
S01divyav_u:254.009_0: taddhāritaṃ tena viśokanāṃnā tasmādviśeṣeṇa sa pūjanīyaḥ//70//
S01divyav_u:254.015_0: yadā samudraṃ salilaṃ samudre kurvīta kaścinna hi goṣpadena/
S01divyav_u:254.019_0: atha rājā sthavirāṇāṃ stūpārcanaṃ kṛtvā sthaviropaguptasya pādayor nipatya prītimanā uvāca--
S01divyav_u:254.021_0: mānuṣyaṃ saphalīkṛtaṃ kratuśatairiṣṭena saṃprāpyate rājyaiśvaryaguṇaiścalaiśca vibhavaiḥ sāraṃ gṛhītaṃ param/
S01divyav_u:254.023_0: lokaṃ caityaśatairalaṃkṛtamidaṃ śvetābhrakūṭaprabhairasyādyāpratimasya śāsanamidaṃ kiṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ duṣkaram/
S01divyav_u:254.026_0: yāvadrājñā aśokena jātau bodhau dharmacakre parinirvāṇe ekaikaśatasahasraṃ dattam,
S01divyav_u:254.026_1: tasya bodhau viśeṣataḥ prasādo jātah--iha bhagavatānuttarā samyaksambodhirabhisambuddheti/
S01divyav_u:254.027_0: sa yāni viśeṣayuktāni ratnāni, tāni bodhiṃ preṣayati/
S01divyav_u:254.029_0: tasyā buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ rājā mayā sārdhaṃ ratimanubhavati,
S01divyav_u:254.030_0: tayā mātaṅgī vyāharitā--śakyasi tvaṃ bodhiṃ mama sapatnīṃ praghātitum? tayābhihitam--śakṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:254.031_0: yāvanmātaṅgyā bodhivṛkṣo mantraiḥ parijaptaḥ, sūtraṃ ca buddham/
S01divyav_u:254.032_1: tato rājapuruṣai rājñe niveditam--deva, bodhivṛkṣaḥ śuṣyata iti/
S01divyav_u:255.003_0: sarvajñatā cādhigatā narendra bodhidrumo 'sau nidhanaṃ prayāti//74//
S01divyav_u:255.005_0: śrutvā ca rājā mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:255.007_0: dṛṣṭvānvahaṃ taṃ drumarājamūlaṃ jānāmi dṛṣṭo 'dya mayā svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:255.009_0: nāthadrume caiva gate praṇāśaṃ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti mamāpi nāśam//59//
S01divyav_u:255.011_1: yadi bodhir na bhaviṣyati, ahaṃ devasya ratimutpādayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:255.012_0: rājā āha--na sā strī, api tu bodhivṛkṣaḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:255.013_0: tiṣyarakṣitā mātaṅgīmuvāca--śakyasi tvaṃ bodhivṛkṣam yathāpaurāṇamavasthāpitum? mātaṅgī āha--yadi tāvat prāṇāntikāvaśiṣṭā bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:255.015_0: vistareṇa yāvatayā sūtraṃ muktvā vṛkṣasāmantena khanitvā divase kṣīrakumbhasahasreṇa pāyayati/
S01divyav_u:255.016_1: tato rājapuruṣai rājñe niveditam--deva, diṣṭyā vardhasva, yathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:255.017_0: śrutvā ca prītamanā bodhivṛkṣaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:255.023_0_0: atha rājā sauvarṇarūpyavaiḍūryasphaṭikamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ sahasraṃ gandhodakena pūrayitvā
S01divyav_u:255.023_0_1: prabhūtaṃ cānnapānaṃ samudrānīya gandhamālyapuṣpasaṃcayaṃ kṛtvā snātvā āhatāni vāsāṃsi
S01divyav_u:255.027_0: samyaggatā ye sugatasya śiṣyāḥ śāntendriyā nirjitakāmadoṣāḥ/
S01divyav_u:256.005_0: vasanti kāśmīrapure suramye ye cāpi dhīrāstamasāvane 'smin/
S01divyav_u:256.007_0: mahāvane revatake raye 'ryā anugrahāryaṃ mama te 'bhyupeyuḥ//80//
S01divyav_u:256.011_0: jinasutāḥ khalu dhyānaratāḥ sadā samudayāntviha te 'dya kṛpābalāḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:256.013_0: śairīṣake ye pravare vimāne vasanti putrā vadatāṃ varasya/
S01divyav_u:256.015_0: anugrahārthaṃ mama te viśokā hyāyantu kāruṇyaniviṣṭabhāvāḥ//82//
S01divyav_u:256.019_0: evamukte ca rājñā trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃnipatitāni/
S01divyav_u:256.020_1: rājā āha--kimarthaṃ vṛddhāsanaṃ tannākramyate? tatra yaśo nāṃnā vṛddhaḥ ṣaḍabhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:256.022_1: rājā āha--asti sthavira tvatsakāśādanyo vṛddhatara iti? sthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja--
S01divyav_u:256.026_0: atha rājā kadambapuṣpavadāhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--asti kaścidbuddhadarśī bhikṣurdhriyata iti? sthavira uāca--asti mahārāja piṇḍolabharadvājo nāṃnā buddhadarśī tiṣṭhata iti/
S01divyav_u:256.028_0: rājā kathayati--sthavira, śakyaḥ so 'smābhirdraṣṭumiti? sthavira uvāca--mahārāja, idānīṃ drakṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:257.005_1: atha sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājo 'nekairarhatsahasrairardhacandrākāreṇopagūḍho rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādavatīrya vṛddhānte niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:257.008_0: adrākṣīdrājā piṇḍolabharadvājaṃ śvetapalitaśirasaṃ pralambabhrūlalāṭaṃ nigūḍhākṣitārakaṃ pratyekabuddhāśrayam/
S01divyav_u:257.009_0: dṛṣṭvā ca rājā mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājasya pādayoḥ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:257.010_0: mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādāvanuparimārjya utthāya tau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:257.012_0: yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:257.014_0: ekātaputrā pṛthaivī tadā me prītir na yā me sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//86//
S01divyav_u:257.017_0: api ca sthavira dṛṣṭaste trailokyanātho gururme bhagavān buddha iti? tataḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvāja ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ bhruvamunnāmya rājānamaśokam uvāca--
S01divyav_u:257.023_0_0: rājā āha--sthavira, kutra te bhagavān dṛṣṭaḥ, kathaṃ ceti? sthavira uvāca--yadā mahārāja
S01divyav_u:257.023_0_1: bhagavān vijitamāraparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ prathamato rājagṛhe varṣāmupagataḥ,
S01divyav_u:257.027_0: yadā rājagṛhe varṣā uṣitaḥ sa tathāgataḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:257.029_0: yathā paśyasi māṃ sākṣādevaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā miniḥ//89//
S01divyav_u:257.030_0: yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā śrāvastyāṃ tīrthyān bijayārthaṃ vijayārthaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:258.001_0: tīrthyā yadā bhagavatā kupathaprayātā ṛddhiprabhāvavidhinā khalu nirgṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:258.003_0: vikrīḍitaṃ daśabalasya tadāṃ hyudāraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tu nṛpa harṣakaraṃ prajānām//10//
S01divyav_u:258.005_0: yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā uṣitvā māturjanayitryā dharmaṃ deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare 'vatīrṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:258.005_1: ahaṃ tatkālaṃ tatraivāsam/ mayā sā devamanuṣyasampadā dṛṣṭā,
S01divyav_u:258.008_0: yadāvatīrṇo vadatāṃ variṣṭho varṣāmuṣitvā khalu devaloke/
S01divyav_u:258.010_0: tatrāpyahaṃ saṃnihito babhūva dṛṣṭo mayāsau muniragrasattvaḥ//91//
S01divyav_u:258.012_0: yadā mahārāja sumāgadhayā anāthapiṇḍadaduhitryā upanimantritaḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdham ṛddhyā puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ,
S01divyav_u:258.012_1: tadāhaṃ parvataśailaṃ grahāya gaganatalamākramya puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:258.014_0: tannimittaṃ ca me bhagavatā ājñākṣiptā--na tāvat te parinirvātavyam yāvaddharmo nāntarhita iti/
S01divyav_u:258.018_0: tadā gṛhītvārdhabalena śailaṃ jagāma tūrṇaṃ khalu puṇḍravardhanam//92//
S01divyav_u:258.020_0: ājñā tadā śākyakuloditena dattā ca me kāruṇikena tena/
S01divyav_u:258.022_0: tāvanna te nirvṛtirabhyupeyā antarhito yāvadayaṃ na dharmaḥ//93//
S01divyav_u:258.024_0: yadāpi mahārāja tvayā pūrvaṃ bālabhāvādbhagavato rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭasya saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:258.024_1_0: rādhaguptena cānumoditam, tvaṃ na bhagavatā nirdiṣṭah--ayaṃ dārako varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya
S01divyav_u:258.024_1_1: mama pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko
S01divyav_u:259.004_0: rājā āha--kiyantaḥ sthavirasya parivārāh? sthavira uvāca--
S01divyav_u:259.007_0: api ca mahārāja, kimanena saṃdehena kṛtena? pariviṣyatāṃ bhikṣusaṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:259.009_0: kiṃ tu buddhasmṛtipratibodhito 'haṃ bodhisnapanaṃ tāvat kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:259.014_0: pāṇinā vardhitamātre ca kuṇālena sarvajanakāyena hāsyaṃ muktam/
S01divyav_u:259.014_1: tato rājā hāsyaṃ muktvā kathayati--aho rādhagupta,
S01divyav_u:259.016_1: rājā āha--śatasahasratryaṃ dāsyāmītyāryasaṃghe kumbhasahasreṇa ca bodhiṃ snapayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:259.018_2: ko 'yamasmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ pratidvandvayatyalokajñah? ruṣitaṃ ca rājānamavekṣya rādhagupto rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:259.018_3: kasya śaktir narendreṇa sārdhaṃ vispardhituṃ bhavet? kuṇālo guṇavān,
S01divyav_u:259.021_1_0: kośaṃ sthāpayitvā rājyamantaḥpuramamātyagaṇamātmānaṃ ca kuṇālaṃ suvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ
S01divyav_u:259.025_0: rājyaṃ samṛddhaṃ saṃsthāpya kośamantaḥpurāṇi cāmātyagaṇaṃ ca sarvam/
S01divyav_u:259.027_0: dadāmi saṃghe guṇapātrabhūte ātmā kuṇālaṃ ca guṇopapannam//97//
S01divyav_u:259.029_0: tato rājā piṇḍolabharadvājapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayitvā bodhivṛkṣasya ca caturdiśaṃ vāraṃ baddhvā svayameva ca vāramabhiruhya caturbhiḥ kumbhasahasrairbodhisanapanaṃ kṛtavān/
S01divyav_u:259.030_0: kṛtamātre ca bodhisnapane bodhivṛkṣo yathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:260.005_0: atha rājā bodhisnapanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:260.006_1: tathā te pariveṣṭavyam yathā te kṣatir na syāditi/
S01divyav_u:260.007_0: tato rājā svahastena pariveṣaṇam yāvannavakāntaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:260.007_1: tatra dvau śrāmaṇerau saṃrañjanīyaṃ dharmaṃ samādāya vartataḥ/
S01divyav_u:260.012_0: api tu asti dvau śrāmaṇerau bālakrīḍayā krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:260.013_0: sthavira uvāca--alaṃ mahārāja, ubhau hi tau ubhayatobhāgavimuktau arhantau/
S01divyav_u:260.014_0: śrutvā ca rājñaḥ prītimanaso buddhirutpannā--tau śrāmaṇerau āgamya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ paṭenācchādayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:260.015_0: tatastau śrāmaṇerau rājño 'bhiprāyamavagamya bhūyo 'nye 'smābhiḥ svaguṇā udbhavayitavyā iti,
S01divyav_u:260.019_0: śrutvā ca rājño buddhirutpannā--mayā kevalaṃ cintitam, na tu vāgniścāritā/
S01divyav_u:260.023_0: yasyedṛśaḥ sādhujane prasādaḥ kāle tathotsāhi kṛtaṃ ca dānam//100//
S01divyav_u:260.026_0_0: tato rājā aśokaḥ pañcavārṣike paryavasite sarvabhikṣūṃs tricīvareṇācchādya catvāri
S01divyav_u:260.026_0_1: śatasahasrāṇi saṃghasyācchādanaṃ datvā pṛthivīmantaḥpuramamātyagaṇamātmānaṃ ca kuṇālaṃ
S01divyav_u:260.028_0: bhūyasā bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitamiti//
S01divyav_u:260.029_0: yasminneva divase rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam,
S01divyav_u:260.029_1: tasminneva divase rājño 'śokasya padmāvatī nāṃnā devī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:261.001_0: [261]prītiḥ parā me vipulā hyavāptā mauryasya vaṃśasya parā vibhūtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:261.003_0: dharmeṇa rājyaṃ mama kurvato hi jāto dharmavivardhano 'stu//101//
S01divyav_u:261.005_2: atha rājā kumāraṃ nirīkṣya prītamanāḥ kathayati--
S01divyav_u:261.009_0: alaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati yasya vaktraṃ saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ vibhāti//102//
S01divyav_u:261.011_0: yāvadrājā amātyānuvāca--dṛṣṭāni bhavadbhiḥ kasyedṛśāni nayanāni? amātyā ūcuh--deva,
S01divyav_u:261.011_1: manuṣyabhūtasya na dṛṣṭāni, api tu deva, asti himavati parvatarāje kuṇāle nāma pakṣī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:261.018_1: tasyordhvato yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvantyadho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:261.019_1: atha rājā kuṇālasya netrāṇi suciraṃ nirīkṣya na kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ paśyati/
S01divyav_u:261.022_0: netrānurāgeṇa sa pārthivendraḥ sutaḥ kuṇāleti tadā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:261.024_0: tato 'sya nāma prathitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tasyāryasattvasya nṛpātmajasya//104//
S01divyav_u:261.026_1: tasya kāñcanamālā nāma dārikā patnyarthe ānītā/
S01divyav_u:261.027_0: yāvadrājā aśokaḥ kuṇālena saha kurkuṭārāmaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:261.028_1: tena rājño 'bhihitam--kimarthaṃ kuṇālaḥ svakarmaṇi na niyujyate? tato rājñā abhihitah--kuṇāla,
S01divyav_u:261.030_0: tataḥ kuṇālaḥ sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kathayati--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:261.030_1: kimājñāpayasi? sthavira uvāca--cakṣuḥ kuṇāla anityamiti kuru/
S01divyav_u:262.005_0: sa ca tathā abhyāsaṃ karoti manasikāraprayuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:262.006_1: tiṣyarakṣitā ca nāṃnā aśokasyāgramahiṣā taṃ pradeśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:262.007_0: sā taṃ kuṇālamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā nayanānurāgeṇa gātreṣu pariṣvajya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:262.009_0: dṛṣṭvā tavedaṃ nayanābhirāmaṃ śrīmadvapurnetrayugaṃ ca kāntam/
S01divyav_u:262.011_0: daṃdagyate me hṛdayaṃ samantāddāvāgninā prajvalateva kakṣam//106//
S01divyav_u:262.013_0: śrutvā kuṇāla ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ karṇau pidhāya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:262.014_0: vākyaṃ na yuktaṃ tava vaktumetat sūnoḥ purastājjananī mamāsi/
S01divyav_u:262.016_0: adharmarāgaṃ parivarjayasva apāyamārgasya hi eṣa hetuḥ//107//
S01divyav_u:262.022_0: mama bhavatu maraṇaṃ mā tu sthitasya dharme viśuddhabhāvasya/
S01divyav_u:262.023_0: na tu jīvitena kāryaṃ sajjanadhikkṛtena mama//109//
S01divyav_u:262.024_0: svargasya dharmalopo yato bhavati jīvitena kiṃ tena/
S01divyav_u:262.028_2: gamiṣyasi takṣaśilānagaraṃ saṃnāmayitum? kuṇāla uvāca--paraṃ deva gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:263.003_0: snehācca yogyaṃ manasā ca buddhvā ājñāpayāmāsa vidhāya yātrām//111//
S01divyav_u:263.005_0: atha rājā aśoko nagaraśobhāṃ mārgaśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā jīrṇāturakṛpaṇānāthāṃśca mārgādapanīya ekarathe 'bhiruhya kumāreṇa saha pāṭaliputrānnirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:263.006_0: anuvrajitvā nivartamānaḥ kuṇālaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya nayanaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:263.008_0: dhanyāni tasya cakṣūṃṣi cakṣuṣmantaśca te janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:263.014_0: śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukhānukūle paśyāmi netre 'dya vinaśyamāne//113//
S01divyav_u:263.018_0: puraṃ vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati śokaparītacetāḥ//114//
S01divyav_u:263.020_1: śrutvā ca takṣaśilāpaurā ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā pūrṇakumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:263.024_1: na rājño 'śokasya, api tu duṣṭātmāno 'mātyā āgatyāsmākamapamānaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:263.029_0: kiṃ mamedṛśena jīvitena prayojanam? śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati--yadi kuṇālaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati,
S01divyav_u:263.032_1: tatastiṣyarakṣitayā vaidyānāmabhihitam--yadi kaścidīdṛśena[264] vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:264.005_0: jīvitād vyaparopya kukṣiṃ pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśayasthāne antrāyāṃ kṛmirmahān prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:264.005_1: 264.0sa yadyūrdhvaṃ gacchati tenāśucīni pragharati, athādho gacchati, adhaḥ pragharati/
S01divyav_u:264.007_0: yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattaṃ na ca mriyate/
S01divyav_u:264.008_2: etacca prakaraṇaṃ tayā rajñe niveditam--deva pālāṇḍuṃ parimuṅkṣva, svāsthyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:264.010_0: kathaṃ palāṇḍuṃ paribhakṣayāmi? devyuvāca--deva, paribhoktavyaṃ jīvitasyārthe, bhaiṣajyametat/
S01divyav_u:264.012_0: tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ te varaṃ prayacchāmi? tayā abhihitam--saptāhaṃ devo rājyaṃ prayacchatu/
S01divyav_u:264.013_0: rājā āha--ahaṃ ko bhaviṣyāmi? devyuvāca--saptāhasyātyayāddeva eva rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:264.014_1: tasyā buddhirutpannā--idānīṃ mayā asya kuṇālasya vairaṃ niryātitavyam/
S01divyav_u:264.015_0: tayā kapaṭalekho likhitastakṣaśilakānāṃ paurāṇām--kuṇālasya nayanaṃ vināśayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:264.017_0: rājā hyaśoko balavān pracaṇḍa ājñāpayattakṣaśilājanaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:264.019_0: uddhāryatāṃ locanamasya śatrormauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka eṣaḥ//116//
S01divyav_u:264.021_0: rājño 'śoksya yatra kāryamāśu pariprāpyaṃ bhavati, dantamudrayā mudrayati/
S01divyav_u:264.021_1: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñastaṃ lekhaṃ dantamudrayā mudrayiṣyāmīti rājñaḥ sakāśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:264.023_0: devī kathayati--kimidamiti? rājā kathayati--devi, svapnaṃ me 'śobhanaṃ dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:264.025_0: evaṃ dvirapi rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati--devi, svapno me na śobhano dṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:264.027_1: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekho dantamudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilāṃ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:264.028_0: yāvadrājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭaṃ dantā viśīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:264.029_0: tato rājā tasyā eva rātreratyaye naimittikānāhūya kathayati--kīdṛśa eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ vipāka iti? naimittikāḥ kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:264.031_0: dantā yasya viśīryante svapnānte prapatanti ca/
S01divyav_u:264.032_0: cakṣurbhedaṃ ca putrasya putranāśaṃ ca paśyati//117//
S01divyav_u:265.003_0: yā devatā śāsturabhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇapradhāne/
S01divyav_u:265.005_0: ye cāpi loke ṛṣayo variṣṭhā rakṣantu te 'smattanayaṃ kuṇālam//118//
S01divyav_u:265.007_1: atha takṣaśilāḥ paurajānapadā lekhadarśanāt kuṇālasya guṇavistaratuṣṭā notsahante tadaptiyaṃ niveditum/
S01divyav_u:265.008_0: ciraṃ vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭaśīlaḥ svaputrasya na marṣayati, prāgevāsmākaṃ marṣayati/
S01divyav_u:265.012_1: tataḥ kuṇālo vācayitvā kathayati--viśrabdham yathātmaprayojanaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:265.022_0: paśyānityamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti kaścid dhruve sthitaḥ//121//
S01divyav_u:265.027_0: utpāṭane 'haṃ na bibhemi saumya netradvayasyāsthiratāṃ hi paśye//123//
S01divyav_u:265.029_0: utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:265.031_0: tataḥ kuṇālastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:265.032_0: yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanamutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:266.003_0: teṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasyaiva nayanamutpāṭya haste dattam/
S01divyav_u:266.005_0: rūpāṇi kasmānna nirīkṣase tvam yathāpurā prākṛta māṃsapiṇḍa/
S01divyav_u:266.007_0: te vañcitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ātmeti ye tvāmabudhāḥ//126//
S01divyav_u:266.011_0: evaṃ pravīkṣanti sadāpramattā ye tvāṃ na te duḥkhamanuprayānti//127//
S01divyav_u:266.015_0: tataḥ kuṇālo dṛṣṭasatyastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--idānīṃ dvitīyaṃ viśrabdhaṃ nayanamutpāṭya haste datta/
S01divyav_u:266.016_0: atha kuṇālo māṃsacakṣuṣyuddhṛte prajñācakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati--
S01divyav_u:266.023_0: yāvatkuṇālena śrutam--nāyaṃ tātasyāśokasya karma, api tu tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:266.025_0: ciraṃ sukhaṃ caiva sā tiṣyanāṃnī āyurbalaṃ pālayate ca devī/
S01divyav_u:266.027_0: saṃpreṣito 'yaṃ hi yayā prayogo yasyānubhāvena kṛtaḥ svakārtham//132//
S01divyav_u:266.029_1: śrutvā ca bhartṛtayā kuṇālasamīpamupasaṃkramya parṣadamavagāhya kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ rudhirāvasiktagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau patitā/
S01divyav_u:267.001_0: [267]netrāṇi kāntāni manoharāṇi ye māṃ nirīkṣañjanayanti tuṣṭim/
S01divyav_u:267.003_0: te me vipannā hyanirīkṣaṇīyāstyajanti me prāṇasamāḥ śarīram//133//
S01divyav_u:267.007_0: karmātmakaṃ lokamidaṃ viditvā duḥkhātmakaṃ cāpi janaṃ hi matvā/
S01divyav_u:267.009_0: matvā ca lokaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ kartuṃ priye nārhasi bāṣpamokṣam//134//
S01divyav_u:267.011_0: tataḥ kuṇālo bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyā niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:267.016_0: tataḥ kuṇālo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye vīṇāṃ vādayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:267.016_1: yathā nayanānyutpāṭitāni, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam, tadanurūpaṃ hitaṃ ca gītaṃ prārabdham/
S01divyav_u:267.020_0: yadi tava bhavaduḥkhapīḍitā bhavati doṣaviniśritā matiḥ/
S01divyav_u:267.022_0: sukhamiha ca yadīcchasi dhruvaṃ tvaritamihāyatanāni saṃtyajasva//136//
S01divyav_u:267.025_0: gītaṃ kuṇālena mayi prasaktaṃ vīṇāsvaraṃ caiva śrutiścireṇa/
S01divyav_u:267.027_0: abhyāgato 'pīha gṛhaṃ nu kaṃcinna cecchati draṣṭumayaṃ kumāraḥ//137//
S01divyav_u:267.030_0: na khalveṣa kiṃ gītasya kuṇālasadṛśo dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.002_0: apratyabhijñāya ca rājānamaśokamabhigamyovāca--deva, na hyeṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.003_0: andhaka eṣa vanīpakaḥ patnyā saha devasya yānaśālāyamavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.003_1: śrutvā ca rājā saṃvignaścintayāmāsa--yathā mayā svapnānyaśobhanāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:268.006_0: svapnāntare nimittāni yathā dṛṣṭāni me purā/
S01divyav_u:268.007_0: niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuṇālasya netre vai nidhanaṃ gate//140//
S01divyav_u:268.010_0: na hi me śāmyate cetaḥ sutavyasanacintayā//141//
S01divyav_u:268.011_0: yāvat puruṣo yānaśālāṃ gatvā kuṇālamuvāca--kasya tvaṃ putraḥ, kiṃ ca nāma? kuṇālaḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:268.014_0: kṛtsneyaṃ pṛthivī yasya vaśe vartani kiṃkara//142//
S01divyav_u:268.015_0: tasya rājñastvahaṃ putraḥ kuṇāla iti viśrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.017_0: tataḥ kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha rājño 'śokasya samīpamānītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.017_1: atha rājā aśokah {paśyati} kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ vātātapaparidagdhagātraṃ rathyācolakasaṃghātapratyavareṇa vāsasā lakṣyālakṣyapracchāditakaupīnam/
S01divyav_u:268.019_0: sa tamapratyābhijñāya ākṛtimātrakaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--tvaṃ kuṇāla iti? kuṇālaḥ prāha--evaṃ deva,
S01divyav_u:268.021_0: tataḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya netroddhṛtaṃ śokaparītacetāḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.023_0: rājā hyaśokaḥ patito dharaṇyāṃ hā putraśokena hi dahyamānaḥ//144//
S01divyav_u:268.025_1: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya kuṇālamutsaṅge sthāpayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:268.027_0: tato muhūrtaṃ nṛpa āśvasitvā kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya rasāśrukaṇṭhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:268.028_0: muhuḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ pramṛjya bahūni rājā vilalāpa tatra//145//
S01divyav_u:268.030_0: netre kuṇālapratime vilokya sutaṃ kuṇāleti purā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:269.001_0: [269]tadasya netre nidhanaṃ gate te putraṃ kuṇāleti kathaṃ ca vakṣye//146//
S01divyav_u:269.004_0: kathaya kathaya sādhu putra tāvadvadanamidaṃ tava cārunetram/
S01divyav_u:269.008_0: akaruṇahṛdayena tena tāta munisadṛśasya na sādhu sādhubuddheḥ/
S01divyav_u:269.012_0: vada suvadana kṣiprametadarthaṃ vrajati śarīramidaṃ purā vināśam/
S01divyav_u:269.017_0: rājannatītaṃ khalu naiva śocyaṃ kiṃ na śrutaṃ te munivākyametat/
S01divyav_u:269.019_0: yatkarmabhiste 'pi jinā na muktāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ sudṛḍhaistathaiva//250//
S01divyav_u:269.021_0: labdhāḥ phalasthāśca pṛthagjanāśca kṛtāni kāmānyaśubhāni dehinām/
S01divyav_u:269.023_0: svayaṃkṛtānāmiha karmāṇāṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ tu vakṣyāmi parairidaṃ kṛtam//151//
S01divyav_u:269.027_0: na śastravajrāgniviṣāṇi pannagāḥ kurvanti pīḍāṃ nabhaso 'vikāriṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:269.029_0: śarīralakṣyeṇa dhṛtena pārthiva patanti duḥkhānyaśivāni dehinām//153//
S01divyav_u:269.032_0: kenoddhṛtāni nayanāni sutasya mahyaṃ ko jīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ tyajituṃ vyavastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:270.001_0: [270]śokānalo nipatito hṛdaye pracaṇḍah ācakṣva putra kasya harāmi daṇḍam//154//
S01divyav_u:270.003_0: yāvadrājñā aśokena śrutam--tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:270.005_0: kathaṃ hi dhanye na nimajjase kṣitau cchindāmi śīrṣaṃ paraśuprahāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:270.010_0: utpāṭya netre paripātayāmi gātraṃ kimasyā nakharaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:270.012_0: jīvantiśūlāmatha kārayāmi cchindāmi nāsāṃ krakacena vāsyāḥ//156//
S01divyav_u:270.014_0: kṣureṇa jihvāmatha kartayāmi viṣeṇa pūrṇāmatha ghātayiṣye/
S01divyav_u:270.020_0: anāryakarmā yadi tiṣyarakṣitā tvamāryakarmā bhava mā vadha striyam//158//
S01divyav_u:270.022_0: phalaṃ hi maitryā sadṛśaṃ na vidyate prabhostitakṣā sugatena varṇitā/
S01divyav_u:270.024_0: punaḥ praṇasya pitaraṃ kumāraḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sūnṛtavāgjagāda//159//
S01divyav_u:270.026_0: rājanna me duḥkhamalo 'sti kaścittīvrāpalāre 'pi na manyutāpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:270.028_0: manaḥ prasannam yadi me jananyām yenoddhṛte me nayane svayaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:270.030_0: tattena satyena mamāstu tāvannetradvayaṃ prāktanameva sadyaḥ//160//
S01divyav_u:270.032_1: yāvadrājñā aśokena tiṣyarakṣitā amarṣitena jatugṛhaṃ praveśayitvā dagdhā,
S01divyav_u:271.001_0_1: kuṇālena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena nayanānyutpāṭitāni? sthavira uvāca--tena
S01divyav_u:271.008_0: kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.008_2: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya tataḥ karmāvaśeṣeṇa pañca janmaśatāni tasya nayanānyutpāṭitāni/
S01divyav_u:271.011_0: kiṃ karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākenocce kule upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:271.013_0: tena hyāyucmantaḥ śrūyatām--bhūtapūrvamatīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:271.014_0: yadā krakucchandaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:271.014_1: tasya aśokena rājñā catūratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:271.016_0: yadā rājā aśokaḥ kālagataḥ, aśrāddho rājā rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.017_1: atra janakāyo gatvā viśīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śocitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.018_1: tenokrah--kimarthaṃ rudyata iti? tairabhihitam--krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpaṃ catūratnamayamāsīt,
S01divyav_u:271.020_0: tatastena ca tatra krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya kāyapramāṇikā pratimā babhūva viśīrṇā,
S01divyav_u:271.020_1: sā abhisaṃskṛtā, samyakpraṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--yādṛśaḥ krakucchandaḥ śāstā,
S01divyav_u:271.023_0: kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau śreṣṭhiputraḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.023_1: yatrānena krakucchandasya stūpamabhisaṃskṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākenoccakule upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.024_0: yatpratimā abhisaṃskṛtā, tena karmaṇo vipākena kuṇākaḥ prāsādikaḥ samṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:271.025_0: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuṇālena śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhastādṛśa eva śāstā samārāgito na virāgitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:272.002_0: yadā rājñā aśokena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:272.002_1: tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ pañcavārṣikaṃ ca kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:272.003_0: trīṇi śatasahastāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatraiko 'rhatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:272.008_1: atha rājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayena mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:272.010_1: tenābhigamya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sa ṛṣiḥ pṛṣṭah--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:272.010_2: kiyaccitraṃ te ihāraṇye prativasatah? sa uvāca--dvādaśa varṣāṇīti/
S01divyav_u:272.013_0: vītaśoka uvāca--bhagavan, kiṃ duḥkhaṃ bādhate? ṛṣiruvāca--ime mṛgā ṛtukāle saṃvasanti/
S01divyav_u:272.014_0: yadā mṛgānāṃ saṃvāso dṛṣṭo bhavati, tasmin samaye rāgeṇa paridahyāmi/
S01divyav_u:272.015_0: vītaśoka uvāca--asya kaṣṭena tapasā rāgo 'dyāpi na bādhyate,
S01divyav_u:272.016_0: kuta eṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? āha ca--
S01divyav_u:272.017_0: kaṣṭe 'smin vijane vane nivasatāṃ vāyvambumūlāśināṃ rāgo naiva jito yadīha ṛṣiṇā kālaprakarṣeṇa hi/
S01divyav_u:272.019_0: bhuktavānnaṃ sadhṛtaṃ prabhūtapiśitaṃ dadhyuttamālaṃkṛtaṃ śākyeṣvindriyanigraho yadi bhavedvindhyaḥ plavetsāgare/
S01divyav_u:272.021_0: sarvathā vañjito rājā aśoko yacchramaṇeṣu śākyaputrīyeṣu kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:272.021_1: etacca vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā upāyajño 'mātyānuvāca--ayaṃ vītaśokastīrthyābhiprasannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:272.023_0: amātyā āhuh--deva, kimājñāpayasi? rājā āha--yadā ahaṃ rājā alaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāṃ praviṣṭo bhavāmi,
S01divyav_u:272.023_1: tadā yūyaṃ vītaśokasyopāyena mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:272.025_1: yāvadrājā rājālaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:272.027_0: imaṃ tāvadrājālaṃkāraṃ pravaramauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣīdayiṣyāmah--kiṃ śobhase na veti/
S01divyav_u:272.028_0: taistadābharaṇamauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādito rājñaśca niveditam/
S01divyav_u:272.029_0: tato rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ rājālaṃkāraṃ maulipaṭṭabaddhaṃ ca siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--adhyāpyahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:272.030_1: tato rājñā abhihitam--ko 'tra? tato yāvadvadhyaghātakā nīlāmbaravasanāḥ pralambakeśā ghaṇṭāśabdapāṇayo rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:272.030_2: kimājñāpayasi? rājā āha--vītaśoko mayā parityakta iti/
S01divyav_u:273.001_1: tato 'mātyā rājñaḥ pādayor nipalyovāca--deva, marṣaya vītaśokam/
S01divyav_u:273.003_1: mama bhrātuḥ snehādasya saptāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:273.005_1: divase gate vītaśokasyāgrataḥ sthitvā ārocayanti--nirgataṃ vītaśoka ekaṃ divasam/
S01divyav_u:273.006_2: vistareṇa yāvatsaptāhadivase vītaśoko rājālaṃkāravibhūṣito rājño 'śokasya samīpamupanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:273.007_1: kañcitsugītaṃ sunṛtyaṃ suvāditamiti ? vītaśoka uvāca--na me dṛṣṭaṃ vā syācchrutaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:273.010_0: yena śrutaṃ bhavedgītaṃ nṛtyaṃ cāpi nirīkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:273.012_0: rājā āha--vītaśoka, idaṃ mayā rājyaṃ saptāhaṃ tava dattam,
S01divyav_u:273.013_0: kathaṃ tvaṃ kathayasi--naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutamiti? vītaśoka uvāca--
S01divyav_u:273.015_0: na me dṛṣṭaṃ nṛtyaṃ na ca nṛpa śruto gītaninado na me gandhā ghrātā na khalu rasā me 'dya viditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:273.017_0: na me spṛṣṭaḥ sparśaḥ kanakamaṇihārāṅgajanitaḥ samūho nārīṇāṃ maraṇaparibaddhena manasā//3//
S01divyav_u:273.019_0: striyo nṛttaṃ gītaṃ bhavaśayanānyāsanavidhirvayo rūpaṃ lakṣmīrbahuvividharatnā ca vasudhā/
S01divyav_u:273.021_0: nirānandā śūnyā mama nṛpa varaśayyā gatasukhā sthitān dṛṣṭvā dvāre vadhakapuruṣānnīlavasanān//4//
S01divyav_u:273.026_0: nādrākṣaṃ nṛpate nṛttaṃ na ca bhoktuṃ manaḥspṛhā//6//
S01divyav_u:273.029_0: rājā āha--vītaśoka, mā tāvat tavaikajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava rājaśriyaṃ prāpya harṣo notpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:273.030_0: kiṃ punarbhikṣavo janmaśatamaraṇabhayabhītāḥ sarvāṇyupapattyāyatanāni duḥkhānyanusṛtāni paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:274.001_2: śūnyagrāmabhūtānyāyatanāni, cauribhūtāni viṣayāṇi, kṛtsnaṃ ca traidhātukamanityatāgninā pradīptaṃ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:274.004_0: mā tāvadekajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava na jāyate harṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:274.008_0: teṣāṃ tu vastraśayanāsanabhojanādi mokṣo 'bhiyuktamanasāṃ janayeta saṅgam/
S01divyav_u:274.012_0: kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavedvimokṣo mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānām/
S01divyav_u:274.016_1: sa kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca--deva, eṣo 'haṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:274.020_0: budhavibudhamanujamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//12//iti/
S01divyav_u:274.021_0: atha rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--na tvaṃ mayā parityaktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:274.021_1: api tu buddhaśāsanābhiprasādārthaṃ tava mayā eṣa upāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:274.027_1: tata utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavitamuvāca--labheyāhaṃ svakhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:274.029_1: tato vītaśoko yena rājā aśokastenopasaṃkramya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva, anujānīhi mām/
S01divyav_u:274.030_0: pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikām/
S01divyav_u:275.001_0: [275]udbhrānto 'smi niraṅkuśo rājā iva vyāvartito vibhramāt tvadbuddhiprabhavāṅkuśena vidhivadbuddhopadeśairaham/
S01divyav_u:275.001_1: ekaṃ tvamarhasi me varaṃ pradarśituṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ pate lokālokavarasya śāsanavare liṅgaṃ śibhaṃ dhārayet/
S01divyav_u:275.005_0: śrutvā ca rājā sāśrukaṇṭho vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--vītaśoka, alamanena vyavasāyena/
S01divyav_u:275.006_2: āhāro bhaiṣyaṃ parakule, śayanāsanaṃ vṛkṣamūle tṛṇasaṃstaraḥ parṇasaṃstaraḥ,
S01divyav_u:275.006_3: vyābādhe khalvapi bhaiṣajyamasulabhaṃ pūtimūtraṃ ca bhojanam/
S01divyav_u:275.010_0: naiva hi jāne taṃ nūnaṃ viṣayatṛṣito 'nāyāsavihataḥ pravrajyāṃ prāptukāmo na ripuhṛtabalo naivārthakṛpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:275.012_0: duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtyuneṣṭaṃ vyasanaparigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jagadidaṃ panthānaṃ janmabhīruḥ śivamabhayamahaṃ gantuṃ vyavasitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:275.014_0: śrutvā ca rājā aśokaḥ satvaraṃ praruditumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:275.016_0: saṃsāradolāmabhiruhya lolam yadā nipāto niyataḥ prajānām/
S01divyav_u:275.018_0: kimarthamāgacchati vikriyā te sarveṇa sarvasya yadā viyogaḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:275.020_1: rājakule vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ tasya tṛṇasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛtaḥ, bhojanaṃ cāsya dattam/
S01divyav_u:275.021_0: so 'ntaḥpuraṃ paryaṭati, mahārhaṃ cāhāraṃ na labhate/
S01divyav_u:275.026_1: athāyuṣmato vītaśokasyārhattvaṃ prāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedina etadabhavat--asti khalu me--pūrvaṃ rājño 'śokasya gṛhadvāramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:275.028_0: tato dauvārikamuvāca--gaccha, rājño 'śokasya nivedaya--vītaśoko dvāri tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:275.031_1: dṛṣṭvā ca rajā aśokaḥ saṃhāsanādutthāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamānaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:276.001_0: [276]bhūteṣu saṃsargagateṣu nityaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi māṃ naiti yathā vikāram/
S01divyav_u:276.005_1: sa paśyati--āyuṣmato vītaśokasya pāṃśukūlaṃ ca cīvaraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ pātram yāvadannaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ lūhapraṇītam/
S01divyav_u:276.006_0: dṛṣṭvā ca rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:276.011_0: nirāśravam yasya mano viśālaṃ nirāmayaṃ copacitaṃ śarīram/
S01divyav_u:276.013_0: svacchandato jīvitasādhanaṃ ca nityotsavaṃ tasya manuṣyaloke//18//
S01divyav_u:276.018_0: atyuddhṛtamiva manye yaśasā pūtaṃ puramiva mahaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:276.020_0: atha rājā aśokaḥ sarvāṅgena parigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa,
S01divyav_u:276.021_0: bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātramāyuṣmato vītaśokasya purato niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:276.022_0: athāyuṣmān vītaśoko rājānamaśokaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:276.025_0: durlabhā trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//21//
S01divyav_u:276.027_0: atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pañcabhiramātyaśataiḥ parivṛto 'nekaiśca paurajanapadasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamanuvrajitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.001_0: [277]tata āyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ svaguṇānudbhāvayan paśyataḥ sarvajanakāyasya ṛddhyā vaihāyasamutpatya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.002_0: atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto gaganatalāvasaktadṛṣṭirāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:277.009_0: ṛddhyā khalvavabhartsatāḥ paramayā śrīgarvitāste vayaṃ buddhyā khalvapi nāmitāḥ śirasitāḥ prajñābhimānodayam/
S01divyav_u:277.011_0: prāptārthena phalāndhabuddhimanasaḥ saṃvejitāste vayaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa sabāṣpadurdinamukhāḥ sthāne vimuktā vayam/
S01divyav_u:277.013_0: tatrāyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu śayyāsanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.014_0: śrutvā ca rājñā aśokena bhaiṣajyamupasthāyikāśca visarjitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.014_1: tasya tena vyādhinā spṛṣṭasya śiraḥ khustamabhavat/
S01divyav_u:277.015_0: yadā ca vyādhirvigataḥ, tasya virūṭāni śirasi romāṇi/
S01divyav_u:277.017_0: tasmiṃśca samaye puṇḍravardhananagare nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:277.019_0: tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.020_0: dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā ruṣitenābhihitam--puṇḍravardhane sarve ājīvikāḥ praghātayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.021_1: tataḥ pāṭaliputre bhūyo 'nyena nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:277.022_0: śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣitena sa nirgranthopāsakaḥ sabandhuvargo gṛhaṃ praveśāyitvā agninā dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.023_0: ājñaptaṃ ca--yo me nirgranthasya śiro dāsyati, tasya dīnāraṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:277.024_1: sa cāyuṣmān vītaśoka ābhīrasya gṛhe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.025_0: tasya ca vyādhinā kliṣṭasya lūhāni cīvarāṇi, dīrghakeśanakhaśmaśruḥ/
