S01divyav_u:277.028_0: tataḥ sa ābhīro 'siṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:277.029_0: āyuṣmatā ca vītaśokena pūrvānte jñānaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:277.031_1: dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā aśokena parijñātam--viralāni cāsya śirasi romāṇi na vyaktimupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:278.003_0: yāvadrājñā abhayapradānaṃ dattam--na bhūyaḥ kaścit praghātayitavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:278.004_0_1: karma kṛtamāyuṣmatā vītaśokena yasya karmaṇo vipākena śastreṇa praghātitah? sthavira
S01divyav_u:278.004_0_2: uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu/
S01divyav_u:278.007_0: bhutapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatamo lubdho mṛgān praghātayitvā jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:278.008_1: sa tatra lubdho gatvā pāśān yantrāṃśca sthāpayitvā mṛgān praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:278.009_2: anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhastasminnudapāne āhārakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā udapānāduttīrya vṛkṣamūle paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.011_0: sa lubdha āgatya paśyati--neiva mṛgā udapānamabhyāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.013_0: tenāsiṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ praghātitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:278.014_0: kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhaḥ sa eṣa vītaśokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.014_1: yatrānena megāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahān vyādhirutpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.015_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya pañca janmaśatāni manuṣyeṣūpapannaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.018_1: arhattvaṃ ca prāptam? sthavira uvāca--kāśyape samyaksambuddhe pravrajito 'bhūt pradānaruciḥ/
S01divyav_u:278.019_0: tena dāyakadānapatayaḥ saṃghabhaktaṃ kārāpitāstarpaṇāni yavāgūpānāni nimantraṇakāni/
S01divyav_u:279.002_0: yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:279.002_1: sa bhikṣūnuvāca--kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattam? bhikṣava ūcuh--anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā/
S01divyav_u:279.004_0: rājā āha--kiyattena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam? bhikṣava ūcuh--koṭiśataṃ tena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:279.005_0: śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati--tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṃ bhagavachāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:279.007_2: bodhau, dharmacakre, parinirvāṇe ca, sarvatra śatasahasraṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:279.009_1: trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:279.010_0: kośaṃ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṃ kuṇālaṃ ca āryasaṃghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān/
S01divyav_u:279.012_2: atha rājā idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:279.013_0: tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṃśudānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:279.014_0: tadā sa rājānamaśokaṃ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:279.017_0: padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṃ kasmāt sabāṣpaṃ tava deva vaktram//1//
S01divyav_u:279.019_0: rājā āha--rādhagupta, nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi,
S01divyav_u:279.021_0: nāhaṃ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ saṃghaṃ samakṣaṃ naradevapūjitam/
S01divyav_u:279.025_0: api ca rādhagupta, ayaṃ me manoratho babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dāsyāmīti,
S01divyav_u:279.026_0: tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ kurkuṭārāmaṃ praṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:279.028_0: tasmiṃśca samaye kuṇālasya saṃpadir nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate/
S01divyav_u:280.004_1: atha rājā aśokaḥ saṃvigno 'mātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati--kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? tato 'mātya utthāyāsanādyena rājā aśokastenāñjaliṃ praṇamyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:280.008_0: dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṃ hi kiṃ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṃ śeṣaṃ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṃ mama/
S01divyav_u:280.010_0: eśvaryaṃ dhignāryamuddhatanadītoyapraveśopamaṃ martyendrasya mamāpi yatpratibhayaṃ dāridryamabhyāgatam/
S01divyav_u:280.012_0: athavā ko bhagavato vākyamanyathā kariṣyati? saṃpattayo hi sarvā vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena,
S01divyav_u:280.014_0: pratiśiṣyate 'smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā/
S01divyav_u:280.018_0: bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṃpratyaśoko nṛpah chinnāmlānaviśīrṇapatrakusumaḥ śuṣyatyaśoko yathā/
S01divyav_u:280.020_0: tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṃ puruṣamāhūyovāca--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:280.020_1: pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:280.021_0: idaṃ mamārdhāmalakaṃ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā saṃghe niryātaya/
S01divyav_u:280.022_0: madvacanācca saṃghasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā vaktavyam--jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṃ vibhava iti/
S01divyav_u:280.023_0: idaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ dānaṃ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṃghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:280.025_0: idaṃ pradānaṃ caramaṃ mamādya rājyaṃ ca taṃ caiva gataṃ svabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:280.029_0: tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṃ mama paścimam/
S01divyav_u:280.030_0: yathā saṃghagatā me 'dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet//7//
S01divyav_u:280.031_0: evaṃ deveti s puruṣo rājño 'śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṃ kurukuṭārāmaṃ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṃ saṃghe niryātayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:281.001_0: [281]ekacchatrasamucchrayāṃ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṃ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:281.003_0: bhāgyacchidramavekṣya so 'dya nṛpatiḥ svaiḥ karmābhirvañcitaḥ saṃprāpte divasakṣaye raviriva bhraṣṭaprabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:281.005_0: bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṃghāya tena khalu dattamidamāmalakasyārdhaṃ lakṣmīcāpalyacihnitam/
S01divyav_u:281.006_0: tataḥ saṃghasthaviro bhikṣūnuvāca--bhadantā bhavantaḥ, śakyamidānīṃ saṃvegamutpādayitum/
S01divyav_u:281.007_0: kutah? evaṃ hyuktaṃ bhagavatā--paravipattiḥ saṃvejanīyaṃ sthānamiti/
S01divyav_u:281.011_0: mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṃ prayacchati kilāmalakārdhametat/
S01divyav_u:281.015_0: yāvattadardhāmalakaṃ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṃghe cāritam/
S01divyav_u:281.015_2: kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? atha rādhagupto 'śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:281.017_0_0: atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṃcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṃghāya añjaliṃ kṛtvovāca--eṣa
S01divyav_u:281.017_0_1: idānīṃ mahatkośaṃ sthāpayitvā imāṃ samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ bhagavacchrāvakasaṃghe
S01divyav_u:281.022_0: dadāmyahaṃ bhūtadharāṃ samandarāṃ saṃghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam//11//
S01divyav_u:281.025_0: dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṃ na brahmaloke phalaṃ kāṅkṣāmi drutavārivegacapalaṃ prāgeva rājaśriyam/
S01divyav_u:281.027_0: dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yanme 'sti tenāpnuyāṃ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṃ nāyāti yadvikriyām/
S01divyav_u:281.029_1: tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃghe datvā kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:281.030_0: yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S01divyav_u:282.001_0: tato 'mātyairabhihitam--kimarthamiti? rādhagupta uvāca--eṣa rājño 'śokasya manorathe babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsena dānaṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:282.003_1: yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṃ niṣkrīya saṃpadī rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.005_0: so 'mātyānāmantrayate--ka uapāyaḥ syādyadasmākaṃ nāma ciraṃ tiṣṭhet? nairabhihitam--devasya ca vaṃśādaśoko nāṃnā rājā babhūveti/
S01divyav_u:282.009_0: anyaḥ kaścidupāya iti? tasya brāhmaṇapurohitaḥ pṛthagjano 'śrāddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.010_0: tenābhihitam--deva, dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāma ciraṃ sthāsyati/
S01divyav_u:282.010_1: yāvadrājā puṣyamitraścaturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhayitvā bhagavacchāsanaṃ vināśayiṣyāmīti kukkuṭārāmaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.013_0: kimicchatha stūpaṃ saṃghārāmān vā? bhikṣubhiḥ parigṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.014_0: yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṃghārāmaṃ bhikṣūṃśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.015_1: tenābhihitam--yo me śramaṇaśiro dāsyati, tasyāhaṃ dīnāraśataṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:282.019_1: tasya duhitā kṛmiśena yakṣeṇa yācyate, na cānuprayacchati--tvaṃ pāpakarmakārīti/
S01divyav_u:282.020_0: yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṃ parigrahaparipālanārthaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:282.021_0: puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?)/
S01divyav_u:282.023_1: kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṃ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:282.024_1: yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṃśaḥ samucchinnaḥ//
S01divyav_u:283.002_0: punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarasamyaksambodhiprāptaye dānāni dattāni,
S01divyav_u:283.002_1: puṇyāni kṛtāni, vīryapāramitā ca pariripūtā, anuttarā samyaksambodhir nārādhitā,
S01divyav_u:283.003_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahāraja pañcālaviṣaye rājanau babhūvatuḥ, uttarapāñcālo dakṣiṇapāñcālaśca/
S01divyav_u:283.005_0_0: tatrottarapāñcālo mahādhano nāṃnā dastināpure rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca
S01divyav_u:283.005_0_1: kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca śāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍmarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagataṃ
S01divyav_u:283.007_1: tasmiṃśca nagare mahāhrada utpalakumudapuṇḍrīkasampanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:283.008_0: tatra ca hrade janmacitrako nāṃ nāgapotaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:283.011_1: dakṣiṇapāñcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
S01divyav_u:283.013_0: adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhāramutsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:283.014_0: tato 'sau mahājanakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ svatrastaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvā uttarapāñcālasyaiva rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā prativasati/
S01divyav_u:283.015_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapāñcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadān vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:283.016_0: yāvat paśyati grāmanagarāṇi śūnyāni, udyānadevakulāni bhinnaprabhagnāni/
S01divyav_u:283.017_0: sa janakāyaḥ kva gata iti kathayati/
S01divyav_u:283.018_0: amātyāḥ kathayatnti--deva, uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:283.019_1: tataste kathayanti--deva, uttarapāñcālo rājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:283.020_0: tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagatāḥ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:283.022_1: devastu caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo nityaṃ tāḍanaghātanadhāraṇabandhananigaḍoparodha(na) rāṣṭraṃ trāsayati/
S01divyav_u:283.023_0: yato 'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpanna uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:283.024_1: ko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset? amātyā āhuh--yadi deva uttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayasi,
S01divyav_u:283.024_3: nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset/
S01divyav_u:283.029_0: yūyaṃ tathā kuruta, yathā asau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:284.002_1: teṃs tasya śasyavatī vasumatī, subhikṣānnapānaśca deśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:284.003_0: rājā āha--ko 'sau upāyaḥ syādyenāsau nāgapota ihānīyeta? amātyā āhuh--deva,
S01divyav_u:284.004_1: tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati,
S01divyav_u:284.009_1: sa kathayati--yo yuṣmākaṃ śraddhayitaḥ pratyayitaśca, tasya haste tiṣṭhatu/
S01divyav_u:284.010_2: tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:284.012_1: nimittīkṛtah--asau jñmacitro nāgapotaka etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:284.016_1: tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ, sārako halakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:284.019_1: janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt? tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:284.021_0_0: gatvā kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā
S01divyav_u:284.021_0_2: śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannā iti? sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ
S01divyav_u:284.025_0: asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:284.028_1: tasya nāgapotakasya kiṃ syāt? na śobhanaṃ syāt,
S01divyav_u:284.030_0: yo 'paharati, tasya kiṃ tvaṃ kuryāh? sa āha--jīvitādvyaparopayeyam/
S01divyav_u:284.030_1: jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
S01divyav_u:285.001_0: [285]āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:285.002_2: tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:285.003_0: tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:285.004_0: mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:285.005_0: yadyasau mantrānanupasaṃhṛtya prāṇairviyokṣyate, mṛtaṃ te 'ham yāvajjīvaṃ mantrapāśabddhaḥ syāmiti/
S01divyav_u:285.008_1: yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.010_0: tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.013_0: mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:285.015_0: tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān,
S01divyav_u:285.015_1: evaṃ cāha--tvaṃ me mātā, tvaṃ me pitā, yanmayā tvāmāgamya mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ notpannam/
S01divyav_u:285.017_1: tenāsau bhavanaṃ nītaḥ, nānāvidhena cānnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:285.019_0: asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
S01divyav_u:285.019_1: tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:285.020_1: tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
S01divyav_u:285.021_0: tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:285.022_0: tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena? tasya bhavane 'mogho nāṃ pāśastiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:285.023_0: tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.025_0: tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.025_2: tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.027_1: sa nāga āha--tavānena kiṃ prayojanam? yadā garutmatopadrutā bhavāmaḥ, tadā anenātmānaṃ rakṣāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.028_0: lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:285.031_1: ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:285.032_0: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghapāśamādāya nāgabhavanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:286.001_0: [286]yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:286.001_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
S01divyav_u:286.002_0: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
S01divyav_u:286.003_1: mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:286.008_0: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
S01divyav_u:286.009_0: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśceti/
S01divyav_u:286.010_1: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:286.011_0: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau/
S01divyav_u:286.012_0: mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
S01divyav_u:286.013_0: eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:286.015_1: katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ jānāti/
S01divyav_u:286.017_1: saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:286.018_0: saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:286.018_1: sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
S01divyav_u:286.019_1: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:286.020_0: so 'pyāttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya udānamudānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:286.023_1: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:286.027_0: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:286.028_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
S01divyav_u:286.029_0: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:287.003_0: tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
S01divyav_u:287.004_0: tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitumārabdham--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti? amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:287.006_0: sudhano dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nudatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:287.007_0: so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:287.010_0_0: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
S01divyav_u:287.010_0_1: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:287.012_0: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:287.012_1: sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni,
S01divyav_u:287.012_2_0: tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:287.012_2_1: pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:287.017_0: tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:287.017_1: trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni, haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:287.019_0: tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
S01divyav_u:287.021_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:287.022_0: tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
S01divyav_u:287.025_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ papraccha--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:287.027_0: asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā? praśāntātmā ṛṣirmandaṃ mandamuvāca--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:287.029_0: eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā himarajatatuṣāragaurāmbusampūrṇā surabhikusumapūrṇatoyā/
S01divyav_u:287.030_0: asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā pañcakinnarīśataparivārā nānāvidhasnānodvartanairāgatya snāti/
S01divyav_u:288.001_0: ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamatināmayāmi/
S01divyav_u:288.002_0: atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:288.003_0: so 'pareṇa samayena pūrṇapañcadaśyāmamoghaṃ pāśamādāya hradatīrasamīpe puṣpaphalaviṭapagahanamāśritya avadhānatatparo 'vashtitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:288.004_0: yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā snātum/
S01divyav_u:288.005_0: tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ, yena manoharā kinnarī baddhā/
S01divyav_u:288.006_0: tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:288.006_1: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto manoharāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:288.010_0: sā āha--hā hatāsmi, hā mandabhāgyā, mamodṛśīmavasthāmāptām/
S01divyav_u:288.011_0: mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
S01divyav_u:288.012_0: rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:288.013_0: lubdhakaḥ prāha--yadi tvāṃ na gṛhṇāmi, niṣpalāyase/
S01divyav_u:288.014_0: yadi na śraddadhāsi, imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:288.015_0: lubdhakaḥ kathayati--kathaṃ jāne? tayā śirasthaścūḍāmaṇirdatta uktaśca--eṣa cūḍāmaṇiryasya haste,
S01divyav_u:288.016_0: tato lubdhakenāsau cūḍāmaṇirgṛhītaḥ, pāśabaddhāṃ caināṃ saṃprashtitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:288.017_1: adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
S01divyav_u:288.018_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ ca rājakumāraḥ, iyaṃ ca paramadarśanīyā/
S01divyav_u:288.020_1: upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam,
S01divyav_u:288.021_0_0: adrākṣītsudhanakumāro manoharāṃ kinnarīmabhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S01divyav_u:288.030_0: tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho dṛḍharāgaśareṇa/
S01divyav_u:289.005_0: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sudhana indusamānvaktrāṃ prāvṛḍaghanāntaraviniścariteva vidyuta/
S01divyav_u:289.007_0: tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:289.010_0: tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
S01divyav_u:289.012_0: tatraiko rājānāṃ saṃśritaḥ, dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:289.012_1: yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ, sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.013_0: yastu sudhanaṃ kumāram, sa bhogamātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.014_0: sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye 'vasthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:289.016_0: eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.016_3: kutastaṃ purohitaṃ sthāpayiṣyatīti? yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:289.019_1: evam yāvatsapta, ye daṇḍāḥ preṣitāḥ, te 'pi hastavidhvastāḥ pratyāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.022_0: brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla iti/
S01divyav_u:289.022_1: tena rājā vijñaptah--deva, naivamasau śakyaḥ saṃnāmayitum/
S01divyav_u:289.023_0: rājā kathayati--kiṃ mayā svayaṃ gantavyam? purohitaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ devaḥ svayaṃ gacchati? ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro yuvā baladarpayuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.025_2: tato rājā kumāramāhūya kathayati--gaccha kumāra, daṇḍasahāyaḥ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmaya/
S01divyav_u:289.026_0: evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.028_0: purohitena cābhihitah--deva, sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:289.029_1: nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:289.030_0: evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisampanno 'nakapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:289.032_0: tataḥ kumāro nirgatah uktah--gaccha kumāra, sajjo balaugha iti/
S01divyav_u:290.001_1: sa kathayati--tāvadyadi evam, mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:290.003_0: pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmanāya gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:290.008_0: sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:290.009_0: anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya nātidūre 'nyataṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:290.011_1: tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:290.013_0: ko 'tra heturyenedānīṃ pratihata iti? paśyati sudhanaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:290.015_1: na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika,
S01divyav_u:290.017_0: na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
S01divyav_u:290.017_1: tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
S01divyav_u:290.019_0: tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena pāñciko 'nuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:290.023_0: tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti? te kathayanti--śīghraṃ dvārāṇi muñcata/
S01divyav_u:290.025_0: tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha, sarvathā na bhaviṣyatheti/
S01divyav_u:290.027_0: vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
S01divyav_u:290.029_1: tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:290.030_0: tena ca samāśvāsitāḥ, tadabhiprāyaśca rājabhaṭaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:291.001_0: dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam,
S01divyav_u:291.002_0: tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:291.005_0: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:291.005_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭaḥ, niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:291.007_0: iti kṛtvā kathayati--deva, na śobhanaḥ svapnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:291.008_0: kevalaṃ tu atrāsti pratikāraḥ, sa ca brāhmaṇakamantreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:291.008_1: ko 'sau pratikārah? deva, udyāne puṣkariṇī puruṣapramāṇikā kartavyā/
S01divyav_u:291.010_1: tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so 'ānenāvataritavyam,
S01divyav_u:291.014_1: purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, yadeva durlabhaṃ tadeva sulabham/
S01divyav_u:291.015_0: rājā kathayati--yathā katham? purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, nanviyaṃ manoharā kinnarī/
S01divyav_u:291.021_0: śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:291.022_0: ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
S01divyav_u:291.026_0: tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva? yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:291.027_0: tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:291.030_2: tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni, uktā ca--putrike, prāpte kāle āgantavyam/
S01divyav_u:291.032_0: tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkiriṇimavatīryottīrṇah[292]/
S01divyav_u:292.001_0: tato 'sya brāhmaṇairjihvayā pādau nilīḍhau, avasthitah--ānīyatāṃ kinnarīti ca samādiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:292.004_0: nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:292.005_2: sa na saṃpannaḥ, manoharā kinnarī niṣpalāyiteti/
S01divyav_u:292.007_0: tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etadabhavat--yadahametāmavasthāṃ prāptā,
S01divyav_u:292.008_0: yadi tena nākhyātamabhaviṣyat, nāhaṃ grahaṇagatā abhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:292.009_0: tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
S01divyav_u:292.011_1: tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:292.012_0: evaṃ ca vaktavyam--kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ, khedamāpatsyase, nirvatasveti/
S01divyav_u:292.013_0: yadi nirvāyamāṇo na riṣṭhet, tasya mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭumarhasi--kumāra,
S01divyav_u:292.013_2: tānatikramya apare trayaḥ, tānapyatikramya apare trayaḥ,
S01divyav_u:292.013_4: tasyottareṇotkalakaparvataḥ, tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:292.017_0: tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kīlakāḥ, vajrake pakṣirājena praveśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:292.018_0: ebhirupāyaiste parvatā atikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhuṅktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:292.019_0: ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:292.022_0: ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
S01divyav_u:292.028_0: yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
S01divyav_u:293.001_0: [293]raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:293.005_0: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:293.010_2: tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
S01divyav_u:293.012_0: yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:293.013_0: tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:293.014_1: uktaśca--kumāra, śivena tvamāgatah? deva, tava prasādātkarvaṭakaḥ saṃnāmitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:293.017_0: rājā kathayati--kumāra tiṣṭha, prābhṛtaṃ sahitā eva bhokṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:293.018_0: deva gacchāmi, ciraṃ dṛṣṭā me manoharā/
S01divyav_u:293.019_0: so 'navabudhyamāna evamāha--tāta, adyaiva mayā avaśyaṃ gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:293.020_2: sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
S01divyav_u:293.021_0: itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartumārabdhah--manohare manohare iti/
S01divyav_u:293.023_2: tāḥ striyaḥ kathayanti--deva, asminnantaḥpure tatpraviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ santi,
S01divyav_u:293.023_3: kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate? sa pitur nairguṇyamupaśrutya kṛtaghnatāṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:293.029_0: hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
S01divyav_u:293.030_0: manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:294.001_0: [294]saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
S01divyav_u:294.003_0: sā kathayati--putra, kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptā manohareti mayā pratimuktā/
S01divyav_u:294.003_1: amba, yathā katham? tayā yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:294.004_0: sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti? sā kathayati--
S01divyav_u:294.007_0: uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:294.008_0: sa manoharāviyogaduḥkhārtaḥ kṛcchraṃ vilalāpa, karuṇaṃ paridevate--
S01divyav_u:294.012_0: hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
S01divyav_u:294.013_0: manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:294.015_0: saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:294.017_0: tato mātrā abhihitah--putra, santyasminnantaḥpure tadviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:294.017_1_0: kimarthaṃ śokas triyata iti? kumāraḥ kathayati--kuto me ratiranuprāpyatāmiti? sa
S01divyav_u:294.017_1_1: tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasaṃtāpasaṃtaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca
S01divyav_u:294.020_0: sa halakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ pṛcchati--manoharā kutastvayā labdheti? sa kathayati--amuṣmin pradeśe ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:294.023_0: eṣa ca vṛttānto rājñā śrutah--manoharāviyogātkumāro 'tīva viklava iti/
S01divyav_u:294.024_0: tato rājñā abhihitah--kumāra, kimasi viklavah? idānīṃ tadviśiṣṭataramantaḥpuraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:294.025_0: sa kathayati--tāta, na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīya antaḥpurasthena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:294.026_1: tato rājñā nagaraprākāraśṛṅgeṣvārakṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpitāḥ, yathā kumāro na niṣkāsatīti/
S01divyav_u:294.028_0: uktaṃ ca--pañceme rātryā alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgārti/
S01divyav_u:294.029_0: strīpuruṣa utkośaḥ, ṛṇī, caurasenāpatiḥ, bhikṣuścālabdhavīrya iti/
S01divyav_u:294.030_0: atha kumārasyaitadabhavat--yadi dvāreṇa yāsyāmi, rājā dvārapālakān rakṣakāṃśca daṇḍenotsādayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:294.031_1: sa rātryā vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā[295] yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi,
S01divyav_u:294.031_2: tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvā avatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:295.003_0: bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta susārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:295.005_0: kaccitpriyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi manoharanāmadheyā//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:295.008_0: he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārirasmi/
S01divyav_u:295.010_0: dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//25//
S01divyav_u:295.012_0: sa tāmatikramya anyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram/
S01divyav_u:295.021_0: rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnirugro dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//27//
S01divyav_u:295.025_0: bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārī manohara patatrigaṇasya rājan/
S01divyav_u:296.007_0: vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//30//
S01divyav_u:296.009_0: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodya uvāca--
S01divyav_u:296.011_0: dṛṣṭā sā paripūrṇacandravadanā nīlotpalābhāsvarā rūpeṇa priyadarśanā subadanā nīlañcatabhrūlatā/
S01divyav_u:296.013_0: tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho pañcātsvasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:296.015_0: idaṃ hyavocadvacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me/
S01divyav_u:296.017_0: mahacca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ramāṃ drakṣyasi niṣcayena//32// iti/
S01divyav_u:296.019_1: kathayati ca-- kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ/
S01divyav_u:296.020_1: yadi ca nivāryamāṇo na tiṣṭhet, tasya mārgamupadeṣṭumarhasi/
S01divyav_u:296.021_0: kumāra, idaṃ ca tayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:296.021_1: tānatikramya apare trayaḥ, tānapyatikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ/
S01divyav_u:296.022_0: tatpradeśena tvayā imāni bhaiṣajyāni samudānetavyāni--tadyathā sūdayā nāmauṣadhistayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyam/
S01divyav_u:296.023_0: tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā, smṛtibalaṃ ca vardhayati/
S01divyav_u:296.024_0: vānaraḥ samudānetavyaḥ, mantramadhyetavyam, saśaraṃ dhanurgrahītavyam, maṇayo 'vabhāsātmakāh agado viṣaghātako 'yaskīlāstrayo vīṇā ca/
S01divyav_u:296.026_1: tataḥ kūlako jalapathaḥ khadiraka ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:296.028_0: tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kolakāḥ, vajrake pakṣirājena praveśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:296.029_0: ebhirupāyaiste sarve parvatāḥ samatikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhaṅktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:296.029_1: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasīrūpī piṅgalāyāṃ guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:297.007_0: yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭo tasyā nikhānayet//35//
S01divyav_u:297.012_0: raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:297.016_0: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:297.022_0: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭānauṣadhimantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:297.023_0: tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpavitvā vānaram/
S01divyav_u:297.024_1: uktaśca--alaṃ kumāra, kimanena vyavasāyena? kiṃ manoharayā? tvamekākī asahāyaḥ śirīrasaṃśayamavapsyasīti/
S01divyav_u:297.027_0: candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvo daṃṣṭrābalena balinaśca mṛgādhipasya/
S01divyav_u:297.029_0: agneśca dāvadahane kva sahāyabhāvah asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt//41//
S01divyav_u:298.001_0: [298]kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpadaṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:298.003_0: vīryaṃ bhajetsumahadūrjitasattvadṛṣṭam yatne kṛte yadi na siddhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ//42// iti/
S01divyav_u:298.005_1: anupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogeṇa vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:298.007_0: kumāro 'paśyannagaramadūraṃ śrīmadudyānopaśobhitaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopetaṃ nānāvihagasevitaṃ taḍāgadīrghikāvāpikinnaraiḥ samupāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:298.008_1: tatastāḥ sudhanakumāreṇābhihitāh--kimanena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti? tāḥ kathayanti--asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma/
S01divyav_u:298.011_0: sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ pṛcchati--kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante,
S01divyav_u:298.014_0: sā ca kinnarī abhihitā--anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:298.015_0: tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito yāvadaṅgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:298.016_1: tataḥ kinnarīṃ pṛcchati--mā tatra kaścinmanuṣyo 'bhyāgatah? sā āha--ubhyāgtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:298.018_1: tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta,
S01divyav_u:298.018_3: yenāhaṃ hṛtā, tasya tvaṃ kiṃ kuryāh? sa kathayati--tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu śikṣu kṣipeyam/
S01divyav_u:298.020_1: manoharā kathayati--tāta, manuṣyabhūtasya kuta ihāgamanam? ahamevaṃ bravīmīti/
S01divyav_u:298.022_1: tasyāhaṃ tvāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacitropakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryārthaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:298.024_0: tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaṃ kumāro divyālaṃkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:298.025_0: tato drumaḥ kinnnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśa abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prasādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:298.027_0: tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāḥ stambhā ucchritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:299.004_1: tato bodhisattvo nṛttagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatopasaṃhṛtena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇe 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ pativṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.011_0: nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ chettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.012_0: tatastāṃs tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca sūkarān bāṇena vidhya sumeruvadakampyo 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.013_1: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.015_0: tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitah--ehi kumāra,
S01divyav_u:299.015_1: pratyabhijānāsi manoharāmiti? tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumārastāṃ pratyabhijñāya gāthābhigītenoktavān--
S01divyav_u:299.018_0: yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā/
S01divyav_u:299.020_1: kinnarāḥ kathayanti--deva, ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro balavīryaparākramasamanvito manoharāyāḥ pratirūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.022_0_0: tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ kinnarābhimetena mahatā
S01divyav_u:299.022_0_1: satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena
S01divyav_u:299.022_1: eṣā te manoharā kinnarīpativṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā/
S01divyav_u:299.025_0: paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:299.027_0: so 'pareṇa samayena svadeśamanusmṛtya mātāpitṛviyogajena duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati--mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ me duḥkhaṃ bādhata iti/
S01divyav_u:299.028_0: tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:299.030_0: tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn dattvā anupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:300.001_0: tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhinā gandhaviśeṣeṇa sarvā digāmoditam/
S01divyav_u:300.004_0: tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:300.005_0: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnānyādāya pituḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:300.007_0: tato dhanena rājñā atibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:300.008_0: sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--yanmama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaścānuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:300.010_0: tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirgaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ//
S01divyav_u:300.011_0: syātkhalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro veti? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam/
S01divyav_u:300.012_0: api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:300.013_3: kiṃ tu taddānaṃ tacca vīryamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksamboderhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam/
S01divyav_u:300.016_1: āttamanasaste ca sarve lokā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
S01divyav_u:301.002_0: tatra bhagavbānāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--sma āgamaya ānanda yena śrāavastīti/
S01divyav_u:301.003_0: atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:301.004_0: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe brāhmaṇaśchinnabhakto halaṃ vāhayati, tasyārthāya dārikā peyāmādāya gatā/
S01divyav_u:301.005_1_0: dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:301.008_0: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:301.008_2: daridrasya vā nidhidarśanam, rājyābhinandano vā rājyābhiṣekaḥ,
S01divyav_u:301.010_0: sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:301.012_0: tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah--sacette brāhmaṇa parityaktā,
S01divyav_u:301.013_2: yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:301.014_0: tato bhagavatā sa brāhmaṇo 'bhihitah--cāraya mahābrāhmaṇa peyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:301.015_1: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṃghena pītā/
S01divyav_u:301.017_0: tato 'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:301.018_0: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:301.018_1: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:301.020_1: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:301.021_0: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:301.022_0_0: athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ
S01divyav_u:301.022_0_1: sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā
S01divyav_u:301.025_0: paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṃpannān/
S01divyav_u:302.004_0: tatastena brāhmaṇena parituṣṭena yaddattam, tatsauvarṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:302.005_1: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe pañcakārṣaśatānyutpāḍūtpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni laṅgalāni vāhayanti/
S01divyav_u:302.006_0: te 'pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti/
S01divyav_u:302.007_0: tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:302.010_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:302.010_1: eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:302.011_0: tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:302.011_1: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:302.016_0: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvatte 'vasthitā buddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:302.017_2: te 'pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:302.019_0: teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:302.021_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:302.021_1: bhagavataśca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? tairbalīvardapūrvakairdevaputraiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:302.021_2: yana balīvardeṣūpapannāḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti? bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām/
S01divyav_u:302.026_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:302.028_0: tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan/
S01divyav_u:302.028_1: tatraibhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:302.029_0: kiṃ tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam//
S01divyav_u:303.001_0: [303]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañca karṣakaśatāni/
S01divyav_u:303.002_0: yo 'sau vihārasvāmī, sa evāsau gṛhapatiryasyaite kārṣahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:303.002_1: yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:303.002_3: tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:303.005_1: yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:303.005_2: tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:303.007_0: te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsan/
S01divyav_u:303.009_1: yatkāśyape samyaksambuddhe brahmacaryaṃ vāsitam, tenedānīṃ devaputrabhūtaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:303.010_0: iti bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:303.013_0: tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma--āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā/
S01divyav_u:303.015_0: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraṃ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:303.016_0: dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamamupetya abhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:303.018_0: tatko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti? tasya buddhirutpannā--atrastha evābhivādanaṃ karomi/
S01divyav_u:303.020_0: tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantam/
S01divyav_u:303.023_1: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:303.024_0: tatkasya hetoh? asminn ānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopito 'sthisaṃghātastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:303.025_0: athāyuṣmānānando laghulaghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:303.027_0: evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:303.028_1: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ,
S01divyav_u:303.032_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam [304]
S01divyav_u:304.001_0: [304]cittamutpādayanti, tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikādayo 'pi prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:304.002_0: nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam? bhagavān kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:304.004_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:304.006_0: rājñā prasenajitā śrutam--bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpita iti/
S01divyav_u:304.007_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantah--pureṇa kumārauramātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajanapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:304.008_1: ṛṣidattaḥ purāṇasthapatiḥ, viśākhā mṛgaramātā, anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:304.011_0: taiḥ śrutam--antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṃghāta iti/
S01divyav_u:304.012_0: śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti//
S01divyav_u:304.013_1_0: evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha
S01divyav_u:304.016_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:304.018_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//2//
S01divyav_u:304.021_0: asya tu mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:304.023_0: śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:304.028_3: asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:305.005_0: aparaistatra mālāvihāraḥ kṛtaḥ, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--muktapuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:305.006_0: asmākaṃ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:305.008_0: śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:305.010_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//5// iti/
S01divyav_u:305.012_0: aparaistatra dīpamālā dattā, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--mālāvihārasya bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:305.013_0: asmākaṃ pradīpadānasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:305.017_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6// iti/
S01divyav_u:305.020_0: asmākaṃ gandhābhiṣekasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:305.022_0: śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:305.024_0: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:305.026_2: muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:305.026_3: āsmākaṃ chatradhvajapatākāropaṇasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:306.005_0: eṣāṃ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate/
S01divyav_u:306.008_0: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:306.014_0: tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:306.018_0: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:306.019_0: sārdhaṃ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah--toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:307.002_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:307.003_0_0: satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā rājamātrair
S01divyav_u:307.005_0: lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:307.007_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda śloko
S01divyav_u:307.007_0_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:307.010_0: sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
S01divyav_u:307.011_0: sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:307.012_0: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divyav_u:307.013_0: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
S01divyav_u:307.013_1: apīdānīm yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:307.013_3: na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:307.016_0: yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:307.016_1: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:307.016_3: utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:307.020_0: bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ priyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:307.021_0: na bhikṣava etarhi mama, yathā atīte 'pyadhvani yācanakāḥ priyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:307.023_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
S01divyav_u:307.024_0: athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum/
S01divyav_u:307.026_0: tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
S01divyav_u:307.027_0: atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
S01divyav_u:307.028_1: tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:307.028_2: dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:307.030_0: taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti, icchati ca svāni putramāṃsāni bhikṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:307.031_0: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi? sā āha--jighatsitāsmi bhagini/
S01divyav_u:308.001_0: rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā? durlabhaḥ putraśabdo lokasya/
S01divyav_u:308.002_0: na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:308.006_0: na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava ākramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:308.007_0: yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:308.008_0: atha dārakamapahāya yāsyāmi, niyataṃ dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:308.009_0_0: yathākathaṃ punarmama kurvantyā dvayorjīvitalābhaḥ syāt? tasyā etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati
S01divyav_u:308.009_0_1: saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd yamaloke 'sakṛ
S01divyav_u:308.009_0_2: nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā aṅgapratyaṅgacchedāstathānyāni
S01divyav_u:308.012_0: ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya imaṃ dārakaṃ parimocayeyam/
S01divyav_u:308.014_0: rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram? sā strī āha--astīti/
S01divyav_u:308.016_0: tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
S01divyav_u:308.017_0: saṃtarpya ca tāṃ striyametadavocat--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:308.018_0: sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:308.020_0: atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:308.021_1: strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
S01divyav_u:308.022_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam? sautāṃ prakṛtiṃ vistareṇārocayati sma/
S01divyav_u:308.023_0: ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
S01divyav_u:308.024_2: yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S01divyav_u:308.024_3: tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
S01divyav_u:308.026_0: sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau//
S01divyav_u:308.028_0: atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--atityāgo 'tityāgagauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:308.029_0: mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
S01divyav_u:308.030_0_1: suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ
S01divyav_u:308.030_1: evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām [309]rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/
S01divyav_u:309.001_0: atha śakro devānāmindra utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bhaikṣyamanvāhiṇḍan yana rūpāvatyāḥ striyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā bhaikṣyamutkrośate/
S01divyav_u:309.002_0: tato rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣamādāya yena sa brāhmaṇaveṣadharaḥ śakraḥ,
S01divyav_u:309.003_0: atha sa śakro devānāmindro rūpāvatīṃ striyametadvocat--satyaṃ te rūpāvari dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau? sā āha--ārya brāhmaṇa satyam/
S01divyav_u:309.005_0: sa tāmāh--evaṃ te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā abhūccittasya vipratisārah? sā āha--na me ubhau stanau parityajantyā abhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:309.007_0: śakra aha--atra kaḥ śraddhāsyati? rūpāvatyāha--tena hi brāhmaṇa satyavacanaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:309.008_0: yena satyena brahman satyavacanenobhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā nābhūccittasyānyathātvam,
S01divyav_u:309.008_1: nābhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ, api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau,
S01divyav_u:309.008_2: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrārthaṃ na rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ viṣayārthaṃ nānyatrāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya adāntān damayeyam,
S01divyav_u:309.008_4: tena satyena satyavacanena mama strīndriyamantardhāya puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhavet/
S01divyav_u:309.014_1: atha khalu śakro devendrastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhyudgamyodānamudānayati--rūpāvatyāḥ strīndriyamantarhitam,
S01divyav_u:309.016_0: rūpāvatyāḥ striyo rūpāvataḥ kumāra iti saṃjñā utpāditā//
S01divyav_u:309.018_0: athāpareṇa samayenopalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:309.018_1: tatra piṇḍatajātīyānāṃ mahāmātrāṇāmetadabhūt--yannu vayamutpalāvatyāṃ rāhadhānyāṃ rāhānaṃ sthāpayema/
S01divyav_u:309.020_1: te rūpāvataṃ kumāramutpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājānaṃ sthāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:309.022_0: kāyasya bhedāttasyāmevotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamasya śroṣṭhino gṛhapateragramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāvupapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:309.023_0: sā pūrṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāddārakaṃ janayati abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:309.024_0: tasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā, yayā prabhayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:309.025_0: athānyatarā strī yena sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:309.026_0: upasaṃkramya śreṣṭhinaṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāh--te dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:309.027_0: tasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā pramuktā, yayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:309.028_0_0: atha sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītasaumanasyajātas tasyā eva rātryā
S01divyav_u:309.028_0_1: atyayādye jānanti brahmaṇā lakṣaṇyā naibhittikā vaipañcikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā
S01divyav_u:309.028_1: sa tān saṃnipātya dārakamupadarśayati--yatkhalu brāhmaṇā jānīdhvam--ayamagramahiṣyā dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikāḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:309.032_0: etasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā, yayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:309.033_0: tadasya brāhmaṇā dārakasya lakṣaṇāni prekṣya [310]nāma avasthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:310.001_0: tasye ta brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇanaimittikā vipañcikā bhūmyantarīkṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacatiteṣu kovidā dārakamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:310.001_1: 310.002ṭe saṃlakṣya vadanti--te gṛhapate dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:310.003_0: asya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā yayā candraprabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:310.005_0: atha śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā visarjya candraprabhasya dārakasya catasro dhātrīranuprayacchati aṅkadhātrī maladhātrī stanadhātrī karīḍāpaṇilā dhātrī/
S01divyav_u:310.006_0: aṅkadhātrītyucyate yā dārakamaṅkena parikarṣayati, aṅkapratyaṅgāni ca saṃsthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:310.007_0: maladhātrītyucyate yā dārakaṃ snāapayati, cīvarakānmalaṃ prapātayati/
S01divyav_u:310.009_0: krūḍāpanikā dhātryucyate yāni tāni dārakāṇāṃ dakṣakāṇāṃ taruṇakānāṃ ktīḍāpanikāni bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:310.009_1_0: yadyathā--akāyikā sakāyikā vitkoḍikā(?) syapeṭārikā vaṃśaghaṭikā saṃdhāvaṇikā hastivigrahā
S01divyav_u:310.012_2: tadainaṃ mātāpitarau susnātaṃ suviliptaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā saṃbahulairdārakaiḥ parivṛttaṃ lipiṃ prāpayante/
S01divyav_u:310.014_0: tena khalu samayena tasyāṃ lipiśālāyāṃ pañcamātrakadārakaśatāni lipiṃ śikṣanti/
S01divyav_u:310.015_0: atha candraprabho dārakastān dārakānetadavocat--etaddārakā vayaṃ sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhau cittamutpādayema/
S01divyav_u:310.016_0: te āhuh--kiṃ candraprabha bodhisattvena karaṇīyam? sa āha--ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:310.017_0: katamāḥ ṣaṭ? tadyathā--dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā/
S01divyav_u:310.018_0: tadahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi, yannvahaṃ tiryagyonigatebhyo 'pi dānaṃ dadyām/
S01divyav_u:310.018_1: 310.19. sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastramādāya madhusarpiśca yenānyataraṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:310.020_0: śastreṇātmanaḥ kāyaṃ kṣaṇitvā madhusarpiṣā mrakṣayitvā tasmin sa mahāśmaśāne ātmānaṃ vadhāyotsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:310.021_0: tena ca samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamaḥ pakṣī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:310.022_0: sa candraprabhasya dārakasyāṅge sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayati, punarmuñcati/
S01divyav_u:310.023_0: dvirapi trirapi uccaṃgamaḥ prāṇī candraprabhasya dārakasya dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā punarmuñcati/
S01divyav_u:310.024_0_0: atha candraprabho dāraka uccaṃgamaṃ pakṣiṇamidamavocat--kimidaṃ pakṣi mama nayanaṃ
S01divyav_u:310.024_0_1: gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā utpāṭayitvā punaḥ pramuñcasi? sa āha--na mama candraprabha kiṃcidevāmiṣye(?)
S01divyav_u:310.026_0: taṃ manye candraprabha vārayiṣyasi? candraprabha āha--sacenmama pakṣī sahasrakṛtvo nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayatu,
S01divyav_u:310.030_1: abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikāṃ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:310.032_0: tasya mātāpitarau brāhmaprabha iti nāma sthāpitavantau/
S01divyav_u:311.001_1: sa pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakāni svayameva mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:311.002_0: yadā brahmaprabho māṇavakaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣo jātyā saṃvṛttaḥ,
S01divyav_u:311.003_0: sa āha--amba tāta, na tāvanmama niveśanena prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:311.004_0: tau āhatuh--kiṃ punastvaṃ brahmaprabha kariṣyasi? sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:311.006_0: brahmaprabhamāṇavako mātāpitroḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yenānyataradvanaṣaṇḍaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.007_0: tena khalu samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brāhmaṇarṣī prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.008_0: apaśyatāṃ brāhmaṇarṣīṃ brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:311.009_0: dṛṣṭvā ca brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakametadavocat--ehi brahmaprabha, svāgatam, mā śrānto 'si, mā klāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.010_0: kimarthamidaṃ vanaṣaṇṭamabhyāgatah? sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:311.011_0: tau āhatuh--evamastu, bhavatu, ṛddhyantāṃ saṃkalpāḥ, paripūryantāṃ manorathāḥ//
S01divyav_u:311.012_0: atha brahmaprabho māṇavako 'nyatarasmin pradeśe kuṭīṃ kārayitvā caṃkramaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptavān/
S01divyav_u:311.013_0: athāpareṇa samayena brahmaprabhasya kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:311.014_0: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca yena punastau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.014_1: upasaṃkramya tau ca brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu ṛṣī jānītām--iha me kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:311.016_0: tasyāḥ ka utsahate bhaktaṃ dātum? tau āhatuh--āvāṃ tasyā bhaktaṃ dāsyāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.017_0: athāpareṇa samayena vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā icchati svakau potakau bhakṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:311.017_1: ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhṇāti dvitīyaṃ muñcati, na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:311.018_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena tau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.019_0: upasaṃkramya punaryena tau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.020_0: upasaṃkramya dvau brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu brāhmaṇau jānītām--sā vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā svakau potakau bhakṣayitumicchati/
S01divyav_u:311.021_0: ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyaṃ muñcati na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:311.022_0: tasyāḥ ka utsahate bhaktaṃ dātum? tau āhatuh--āvāṃ tasyā bhaktaṃ dāsyāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.022_1: atha tau brahmarṣī yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:311.024_1: tayoretadabhūt--ka utsahate tiryagyonigarasyārthāya jīvitaṃ parityaktumiti? tau tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhinirgatau/
S01divyav_u:311.026_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punastau brahmarṣī etadavocat--nanu brāhmaṇau,
S01divyav_u:311.027_0_0: etatkhalu brāhmaṇau yuvayorbrāhmaṇajātyoḥ satyam? tau āhatuh--ka utsahate tiryagyonigatasyārthāya
S01divyav_u:311.029_0: atha sa brahmaprabho māṇavako yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311.031_1: atha brahmaprabhasya māṇavasyaitadabhavat--iyaṃ mama vyāghrī sāvijñānakaṃ kāyaṃ na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:311.032_1_0: tatastīkṣṇaṃ ca veṇupeśīṃ tīkṣṇāṃ gṛhītvā idamevaṃ rūpaṃ satyavacanamakarot--samanvāharantu
S01divyav_u:311.032_1_1: me ye 'smin vanaṣaṇḍe 'dhyuṣitā [312]udārā devā nāgā yakṣā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā
S01divyav_u:312.002_0: ayamahaṃ tyāgaṃ kariṣyāmi, atityāgaṃ tyāgātityāgaṃ svayaṃ galaparityāgam/
S01divyav_u:312.002_1: api tu yenāhaṃ satyena satyavacanena parityajāmi,
S01divyav_u:312.002_2: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrāthaṃ na rājacakravartiviṣayārtham,
S01divyav_u:312.002_4: atirṇāṃs tārayeyam, amuktān mocayeyam, anāśvastānāśvāsayeyam, aparinirvṛtān parinirvāpayeyam,
S01divyav_u:312.002_5: tena satyena satyavacanena mā me parityāgo niṣphalo bhūditi kṛtvā svayameva galaṃ chittvā tasyā vyāghryā purata upanikṣipati/
S01divyav_u:312.016_0: sahaparityakte khalu bhikṣavo brahmaprabheṇa māṇavena svake gale,
S01divyav_u:312.016_1: ayaṃ rtisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ kampati saṃkampati saṃprakampati,
S01divyav_u:312.016_7: madhyamunnamati, anto 'vanamati, anta unnamati, madhyamavanamati, sūryacandramasau na tapato na bhāsato na virājataḥ/
S01divyav_u:312.021_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyā sā tena samayenottarāpatheṣu janapadeṣūtpalāvatīnāṃ nagarīrājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.022_1: puṣkalāvataṃ tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvataṃ nāma nagaraṃ rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.023_0: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvate nagare rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī strī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.024_1: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.025_0: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyā sā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:312.026_1: candraprabhamāṇavikā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:312.027_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyastena kālena tena samayena dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.028_1: rāhulaḥ kumāraḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dārako 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:312.029_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.030_1: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:312.031_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatānyabhūvan/
S01divyav_u:312.033_0: imāni tāni pañca etadbhadrikaśatāni tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatāni [313]abhūvan/
S01divyav_u:313.001_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:313.002_1: kauṇḍinyo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayenoñcaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:313.003_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:313.005_0: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:313.005_1: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:313.007_1: rājā śuddhodano māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūvatām/
S01divyav_u:313.008_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vanamabhūt/
S01divyav_u:313.009_0: .... syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:313.010_1: maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ suprabhaśca buddhastena kālena tena samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:313.011_0: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:313.012_1: kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dvau vyāghrapotau babhūvatuḥ/
S01divyav_u:313.015_1: nando bhikṣū rāhulaśca tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrapotakau abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:313.016_0: tadā me bhikṣavaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena galaparityāgena paścānmukhīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:313.017_1: evaṃ sacet sarve sattvā jānīyuh--dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam yathā ahaṃ jānābhi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
S01divyav_u:313.020_0: yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
S01divyav_u:313.020_1: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:313.023_0: punākṛtaṃ na paśyati no śubhāśubhaṃ na sevitam/
S01divyav_u:313.024_0: na paśyati paṇḍite jane na nāśametyāryagaṇe//3//
S01divyav_u:313.025_0: śubhāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati/
S01divyav_u:313.028_1: āttamanaso bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā upāsikā devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāḥ sarvāvatī ca pariṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan/
S01divyav_u:314.002_1: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:314.003_0: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:314.004_0: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyo yenānyatamamudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:314.005_0: tena khalu samayena tasminnudapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅgadārikā udakamuddharate sma/
S01divyav_u:314.006_0: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmetadavocat--dehi me bhagini pānīyam, pāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:314.008_0: nāhaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
S01divyav_u:314.008_1: api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyam, dehi, pāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:314.011_0_0: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā athāyuṣmata ānandasya śarīre mukhe svare ca sādhu ca suṣṭhu
S01divyav_u:314.011_0_1: ca nimittamudgṛhītvā yoniśomanasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittamutpādayati sma--āryo me
S01divyav_u:314.013_2_0: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pānīyaghaṭamādāya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya pānīyaghaṭamekānte
S01divyav_u:314.013_2_1: nikṣipya svāṃ jananīmidamavocat--yatkhalu evamamba jānīyāh--ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇagautamasya
S01divyav_u:314.016_1: śakṣyasi tamamba ānayitum? sā tāmavocat--śaktāhaṃ putri ānandamānayituṃ sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syādyo vā vītarāgaḥ/
S01divyav_u:314.018_1: rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇagautamamatīva sevate bhajate paryupāsane/
S01divyav_u:314.020_1: evamuktā prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā mātaramidamavocat--sacedadamba śramaṇo gautamo vītarāgaḥ,
S01divyav_u:314.024_0_0: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ kṛtvā vedīmālipya
S01divyav_u:314.024_0_1: darbhān saṃstīrya agniṃ pajvālya aṣṭaśatamarkapuṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā mantrānāvartayamānā
S01divyav_u:314.028_0: vismayaṃ mahārājasya samabhivardhayituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyaḥ śikhigrahā devā viśikhigrahā devā ānandasyāgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grāṇāya juhomi svāhā/
S01divyav_u:315.001_1: sa vihārānniṣkramya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma/
S01divyav_u:315.002_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaramidamavocat--ayamasau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:315.004_0: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā pramuditamanā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma//
S01divyav_u:315.011_0: ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca//1//
S01divyav_u:315.016_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīmidamavocat--ayamasau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
S01divyav_u:315.017_0: tāmāha mātā--niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:315.018_1: prakṛtirāha--kiṃ punaramba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā nāsmākam? tāmāha mātā--balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā nāsmākam/
S01divyav_u:315.020_0: ye putri mantrāḥ sarvalokasya prabhavanti, tān mantrāñ śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/
S01divyav_u:315.021_0: na punarlokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantum/
S01divyav_u:315.025_0: dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
S01divyav_u:315.028_0: tvamapyetarhi ānanda tāṃ dhārasya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
S01divyav_u:315.030_0: aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre 'rcihaste kharagrīve bandhumati vīramati dhara vidha cilimile vilo:
S01divyav_u:315.031_1: golamati gaṇḍavile cilimile sātiniṃne yathāsaṃvibhakte golamati gaṇḍavilāyai svāhā//
S01divyav_u:316.001_0: [316]yaḥ kaścidānanda ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:316.001_1: sa yadi vadhārho bhavet, daṇḍena mucyate, daṇḍārhaḥ prahāreṇa, prahārārhaḥ, paribhāṣaṇayā, paribhāṣaṇārho romaharṣaṇena,
S01divyav_u:316.003_0_0: nāhamānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sadevaloke samāraloke sabrahmaloke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:316.003_0_1: prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāṃ sāsurāyām yastvanayā ṣaḍkṣaryā vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:316.003_0_2: rakṣāsūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte abhibhavituṃ śaknoti varjayitvā paurāṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:316.007_0_0: atha prakṛtirmāraṅgadārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥsnātā anāhatadūṣyaprāvṛtā
S01divyav_u:316.007_0_1: muktāmālyābharaṇā yena śrāvastī nagarī tenopasaṃkramya nagaradvāre kapāṭamūle niśrityāsthādāyuṣmantamānandamāgamayamānā--niyatamanena
S01divyav_u:316.009_0: dadarśāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhām/
S01divyav_u:316.010_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punarjehrīyamāṇarūpo 'pragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:316.012_1: ekāntasthita āyucmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--iyaṃ me bhagavan prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantamanu gacchati,
S01divyav_u:316.014_0: yadyadeva kulaṃ pinṇḍāya praviśāmi, tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:316.015_0: trāhi me bhagavan, trāhi me sugata/
S01divyav_u:316.015_1: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamidamavocat--kiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅgadārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā? prakṛtirāha--svāminaṃ bhadanta ānandamicchāmi/
S01divyav_u:316.017_0: bhagavānāha--anujñātāsi prakṛte mātāpitṛbhyāmānandāya? anujñātāsmi bhagavan, anujñātāsmi sugata/
S01divyav_u:316.019_0: atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:316.021_0: upasaṃkramya mātāpitroḥ pādāñ śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:316.021_1: ekāntasthitā svakau mātāpitarāvidamavocat--saṃmukhaṃ me amba tāta śramaṇasya gautamasya ānandāya utsṛjatam/
S01divyav_u:316.023_0: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtimādāyā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:316.024_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:316.026_0: atha bhagavān prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarāvidamavocat--anujñātā yuvābhyāṃ prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā ānandāyeti? tāvāhatuh--anujñātā bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:316.028_0: tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtimapahāya gacchata svagṛham/
S01divyav_u:316.028_1: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikātprakrāntau/
S01divyav_u:316.031_0: atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarāvaciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmidamavocat--arthikāsi prakṛte ānandena bhikṣūṇā? prakṛtirāha--arthikāsmi bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:317.001_0: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veṣaḥ, sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:317.002_0: pravrajayatu māṃ sugata, pravrajayatu māṃ bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:317.002_1: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ bhikṣuṇī, cara brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:317.004_0: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmehibhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma,
S01divyav_u:317.006_0: yeyaṃ kathā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā,
S01divyav_u:317.006_1: tadyathā--dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmeṣvādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānam,
S01divyav_u:317.006_2: bodhipakṣāṃstān dharmān bhagavān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divyav_u:317.008_0_0: atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā samuttejitā
S01divyav_u:317.008_0_1: saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭacittā kalyāṇacittāa muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittākhilacittā
S01divyav_u:317.010_0: yadā ca bhagavāñ jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭacittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ vinīvaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanāmājñātum,
S01divyav_u:317.010_1: tadā yeyaṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ caturāyasatyaprativedhikī dhrmadeśanā,
S01divyav_u:317.010_3: tāṃ bhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divyav_u:317.015_0: tadyathā vastramapagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅgodake prakṣiptaṃ samyageva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt,
S01divyav_u:317.015_1: evameva prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturāyasatyāni abhisamayati sma,
S01divyav_u:317.018_0_0: atha praṛtirbhikṣuṇī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā akopyadharmā paryavasitadharmā
S01divyav_u:317.018_0_2: aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane anudharmacāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:317.018_0_3: pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantamidamavocat--atyayo me bhagvan,
S01divyav_u:317.021_0: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣṭrajñajātīyā,
S01divyav_u:317.024_1: atastasyā mama bhagavann atyayamatyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu anukampāmupādāya/
S01divyav_u:317.025_0: bhagavānāha--āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte atyayamatyayato 'dhyāgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:317.026_0: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣprajñajātīyā tvamānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmivādena samudācarasīti/
S01divyav_u:317.027_1: atyayaṃ paśyasi, āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaramāpadyase, ahamapi te 'tyayamatyayato gṛhṇāmi/
S01divyav_u:317.028_0: vṛddhireva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām, na hāniḥ/
S01divyav_u:317.029_0: atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatābhinanditānuśiṣṭā ekā vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinī smṛtimatī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati sma/
S01divyav_u:317.031_0: yadarthaṃ kuladuhitaraḥ keśānavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajanti,
S01divyav_u:317.031_1: tadanuttarabrahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣākṛtyopasampadya[318] pravedayate sma--kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
S01divyav_u:317.031_2: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryam, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam, nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
S01divyav_u:318.002_0: aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavatā kila caṇḍāladārikā pravrājiteti/
S01divyav_u:318.004_0_0: śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyanti--kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ
S01divyav_u:318.004_0_1: cariṣyati? bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati? kathaṃ hi nāma
S01divyav_u:318.008_0_0: śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyati--kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati?
S01divyav_u:318.008_0_2: pravekṣyati? vimṛśya ca bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya saṃbahulaiśca
S01divyav_u:318.008_0_3: śrāvasteyairbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/
S01divyav_u:318.012_1: tāvadyānena gatvāṃ sa yānādavatīrya pattikāyaparivṛtaḥ pattikāyapuraskṛtaḥ padbhyāmevārāmaṃ pravikṣat/
S01divyav_u:318.014_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.014_1: te 'pi saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.016_0: apyaikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.017_0: apyaikatyā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svakasvakāni mātāpaitṛkāṇi nāmagotrāṇi nāmagotrāṇi anuśrāvya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.018_0: apyaikatyā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.020_0_0: atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvasteyakānāṃ
S01divyav_u:318.020_0_2: bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ
S01divyav_u:318.020_0_3: pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṃ śrotum? bhikṣavo bhagavantamāhuh--etasya bhagavan
S01divyav_u:318.020_1: etasya sugata samayaḥ, yadbhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṃ kathayet,
S01divyav_u:318.025_0: bhagavānāha--tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta, bhāṣiṣye/
