S01divyav_u:318.025_1: evaṃ sādhu bhagavanniti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.027_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani gaṅgātaṭe atimuktakadalīpāṭalakāmalakīvanagahanapradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājāḥ prativasati sma saṃbahulaiśca mātaṅgasahasraiḥ sārdham/
S01divyav_u:318.028_0: sa punaribhikṣavastriśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ pūrvajanmādhītān vedān smanusmarati sma sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān sākṣaraprabhedānitihāsapañcamān,
S01divyav_u:318.028_1: anyāni ca śāstrāṇi padako{śo?} vaiyākaraṇo lokāyate yajñamantre mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:318.031_0: bhāṣyaṃ ca yathādharmaṃ vedavratapadānyanuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate sma/
S01divyav_u:318.032_1: [319]rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca sarvaguṇaiścopeto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:319.002_0: atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrvajanmādhītān vedānadhyāpayati sma yaduta sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān sākṣaraprabhedānitihāsapañcamānm,
S01divyav_u:319.002_1: anyāni ca śāstrāṇi, bhāṣyaṃ ca yathādharmaṃ vedavratapadāni/
S01divyav_u:319.005_0: atha triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumārah upeto rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca,
S01divyav_u:319.008_0: tatkuto nvahaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyamiti?
S01divyav_u:319.010_0: tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇamukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sasaptotsadaṃ stṛṇakāṣṭhodakaṃ dhānyasahagataṃ rājñāgnidattena brahmadeyaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:319.011_0: puṣkarasārī punarbrāhmaṇa upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanā {kule jātyāṃ vā} kṣipto jātivādena gotravādena yāvadāsaptamamātāmahapitāmaham/
S01divyav_u:319.013_0: yugapadupādhyāyo 'dhyāpako mantradharastrayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ sāṅgopāṅgānāṃ sarahasyānāṃ sanighaṇṭakeiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānāmitihāsapañcamānāṃ padako{śo} vaiyākaraṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:319.016_0: puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
S01divyav_u:319.016_2: sarvaguṇopetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
S01divyav_u:319.020_0: upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛto yāvat traivedike pravacane vistareṇa/
S01divyav_u:319.021_0: sa cotkūṭaṃ droṇamukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sasaptotsadaṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakaṃ dhānyabhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñāgnidattena brahmadeyaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:319.022_0_0: tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataśca kulataśca
S01divyav_u:319.022_0_1: śīlataśca srvaguṇopetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā
S01divyav_u:319.022_0_2: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:319.025_0_0: atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja etamevārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya tasyā eva
S01divyav_u:319.025_0_1: rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣakālasamaye srvaśvetaṃ vaḍavārathamabhiruhya mahatā śvapākagaṇena
S01divyav_u:319.027_0: atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja utkūṭasyottarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāmodyānaṃ nānāvṛkṣasaṃchannaṃ nānāvṛkṣakusumitaṃ nānādvijanikūjitaṃ nandanamiva devānāṃ tadupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:319.029_0: upasaṃkramya brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇamāgamayamāno 'sthāt--brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitumihāgamiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:319.031_0_0: atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā rva rātryā atyayāt srvaśvetaṃ vaḍavārathamabhiruhya
S01divyav_u:319.031_0_1: śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ pañcamatrairmāṇavakaśataiḥ puraskṛta utkūṭānniryāti sma brāhmaṇān
S01divyav_u:320.001_1_0: jvalantamiva hutavaham, yajñamiva brāhmaṇaparivṛtam, śakramiva devagaṇaparivṛtam,
S01divyav_u:320.001_1_1: haimavantamivauṣadhibhiḥ, samudramiva ratnaiḥ, candramiva nakṣatraiḥ, vaiśravaṇamiva
S01divyav_u:320.004_0: dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca enaṃ pratyudgamya yathādharmaṃ kṛtvedamavocat--haṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin,
S01divyav_u:320.006_0: evamukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--na hi bhostriśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥkāraṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:320.007_0: ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasāriñ śaknomi bhoḥkāraṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:320.007_1: yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati, naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartum/
S01divyav_u:320.008_0: api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryamānambhāḥ pūrvasamārabdhā bhavanti yaduta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vā ātmīyārthaṃ vā sarvabhūtasaṃgrahārthaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:320.010_2: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:320.013_0_0: idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī
S01divyav_u:320.013_0_1: abhiṣiktaḥ kupitaścaṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca tatpratyayātsaṃjanitvā
S01divyav_u:320.013_0_2: lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭīṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā akṣiṇī parivartya nakulapiṅgalāṃ
S01divyav_u:320.013_1: nedaṃ śvapākavacanam yuktam, yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragaṃ hīnaścaṇḍālayonijo bhūtvā icchasyavamarditum/
S01divyav_u:320.018_0: prakṛtiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi ātmānaṃ cābhimanyase/
S01divyav_u:320.019_0: bālāgre sarṣapaṃ mā bhoḥ sthāpaya {mā} kleśamāgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:320.021_0: na hi cāmīkaraṃ mūḍha bhavedbhasma kadācana/
S01divyav_u:320.024_0: hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena saṃbandhaṃ mūḍha prārthayase katham//5//
S01divyav_u:320.026_0: na hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena saṃbandhaṃ kartumicchati/
S01divyav_u:320.028_0: vidyayā ye tu saṃpannāḥ saṃśuddhāścaraṇena ca/
S01divyav_u:321.001_0: [321]na hi śreṣṭho hi hīnena saṃbandhaṃ kartumicchati/
S01divyav_u:321.006_0: caṇḍālāḥ saha caṇḍālaiḥ pukkasāḥ saha pukkasaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:321.008_0: brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha/
S01divyav_u:321.009_0: sārdhaṃ vaiśyāstathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdraistathā saha//12//
S01divyav_u:321.011_0: na hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ saṃbandhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha//13//
S01divyav_u:321.014_0: idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja idamavocat--
S01divyav_u:321.016_0: brāhmaṇe vānyajātau vā na viśeṣo 'sti vai tathā//15//
S01divyav_u:321.018_0: brāhmaṇe vānyajātau vā na viśeṣo 'sti vai tathā//16//
S01divyav_u:321.019_0: na hi brāhmaṇa ākāśānmaruto vā samutthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:321.020_0: bhittvā vā pṛthivīṃ jāto jātavedā yathāraṇeḥ//17//
S01divyav_u:321.022_0: śreṣṭhatve vṛṣalatve ca kiṃ vā paśyasi kāraṇam//18//
S01divyav_u:321.024_0: varṇāstathaiva cāpyanye kā nu tatra viśeṣatā//19//
S01divyav_u:322.003_0: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:322.004_0: putra duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayantyamī//24//
S01divyav_u:322.005_0: mitraṃ jñātiṃ sakhīṃ vāpi ye vā viṣayavāsinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:322.006_0: prokṣitāste 'pi vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatim//25//
S01divyav_u:322.007_0: sarve yajñaiḥ samāhūtā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatim/
S01divyav_u:322.008_0: paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭairātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//26//
S01divyav_u:322.009_0: na prokṣaṇair na mantraiśca svargaṃ gacchantyajaiṭakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:322.018_0: suvarṇam yo haredvipraḥ sa tenā^brāhmaṇo bhavet//31//
S01divyav_u:322.020_0: surāṃ tu yaḥ pibedvipraḥ sa tenābrāhmaṇo bhavet//32//
S01divyav_u:322.022_0: gurudārāṃ tu yo gacchetsa tenābrāhmaṇo bhavet//33//
S01divyav_u:322.024_0: hanyāttu brāhmaṇam yo vai sa tenābrāhmaṇo bhavet//34//
S01divyav_u:322.028_0: labhate na ca sāmīcīṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ samāgame/
S01divyav_u:322.029_0: āsanaṃ codakaṃ caiva vyutthānaṃ sa na cārhati//36//
S01divyav_u:322.030_0: tasy niḥsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ patitasya tu/
S01divyav_u:322.031_0: vrataṃ vai sa samādāya punarbrāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//37//
S01divyav_u:323.007_0: taditdaṃ brāhmaṇa te bravīmi--saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yadidamucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:323.008_0: sarvamidamekameveti vijñāya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ māṇavikāmanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:323.010_0_0: idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ
S01divyav_u:323.010_0_1: kupitaścaṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca tatpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ
S01divyav_u:323.010_0_2: bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā akṣiṇī parivartya nakulapiṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya
S01divyav_u:323.017_1: tadyathā deśadharme vā nagaradharme vā grāmadharme vā nigamadharme vā śulkadharme vā āvāhadharme vā vivāhadharme vā pūrvakarmasu vā/
S01divyav_u:323.019_1: yaduta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:323.019_2: teṣāṃ vivāhadharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:323.020_0: tadyathā brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/
S01divyav_u:323.022_0: śūdrasya tvekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/
S01divyav_u:323.022_1: evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:323.023_1: kṣatriyasya trayaḥ putrāḥ, kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:323.024_0: vaiśyasy dvau putrau, vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:323.024_1: śūdrasya tveka eva putro bhavati yaduta śūdra eva/
S01divyav_u:323.026_2: brahmaṇāyaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarvabhūtāni nirmitāni/
S01divyav_u:323.029_0: sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe 'pi varṇe na saṃdṛśase/
S01divyav_u:323.029_1: ahaṃ cāgre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/
S01divyav_u:323.031_0: idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇastriśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja idamavocat--idamatra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
S01divyav_u:324.003_0: sapādajaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapaṛṣṭhāśca narā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:324.005_0: ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāśca catvāra ito na santi//45//
S01divyav_u:324.007_0: atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro 'sti kaścittad brūhi yaccānumatam yathā te/
S01divyav_u:324.009_0: atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāśca catvāra ito na santi//46//
S01divyav_u:324.011_0: yathā hi dārakā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahāpathe/
S01divyav_u:324.013_0: idaṃ kṣīramidaṃ dadhi idaṃ māṃsamidaṃ ghṛtam/
S01divyav_u:324.014_0: na ca bālasya vacanātpāṃśavo 'nnaṃ bhavanti hi//48//
S01divyav_u:324.017_0: na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣeṇa na cakṣuṣā/
S01divyav_u:324.018_0: na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvayā na bāhunā//50//
S01divyav_u:324.021_0: na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:324.023_0: yathā hi jātiṣvanyāsu liṅgam yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
S01divyav_u:324.024_0: sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//53//
S01divyav_u:324.029_0: doṣo hyayaṃ cātra bhavedayukto yadyattvayā cābhihitaṃ nidāne/
S01divyav_u:324.031_0: śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yaccātra manye śṛṇu codyamānam//55//
S01divyav_u:325.001_0: [325]yaccātra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tatte pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:325.003_0: doṣo hi yaścāpi bhavedayukto vakṣyāmi te hyuttaratottaraṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:325.005_0: śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karmādhipatyaprabhavā manuṣyāḥ//56//
S01divyav_u:325.007_1: tatra yad bravīṣi--brahmā eka iti tasmātprajā api ekajātyā eva/
S01divyav_u:325.008_1: yacca bravīṣi--brahmaṇāyaṃ lokaḥ sarvabhūtāni ca nirmitānīti/
S01divyav_u:325.009_1: tadidaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktam yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇāh--brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāśceti/
S01divyav_u:325.010_0: api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet,
S01divyav_u:325.010_1: yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena manuṣyajāter nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.011_0: yaduta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā karṇato vā nāsikāto vā bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ākārato vā yonito vā āhārato vā saṃbhavato vā nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.015_0: yaduta pādato 'pi mukhato 'pi varṇato 'pi saṃsthānato 'pi āhārato 'pi yonisambhavato 'pi nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.016_0: na caivaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.018_0: api ca brāhmaṇa amīṣāṃ phalguvṛkṣāṇāmāmrātakajambukharjūrapanasadālāvanatindukamṛdvīkabījapūrakakapitthākṣoḍanārikelatiniśakarañjādīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.019_0: yaduta mūlataśca skandhataśca tvagbhāgataśca sārataśca patrataśca puṣpataśca phalataśca nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.020_0: na caivaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:325.022_0: tadyathā brāhmaṇa amīṣāṃ sthalajānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sāratamālanaktamālakarṇikārasaptaparṇaśirīṣakovidārasyandanacandanaśiṃśapairaṇḍakhadirādīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.023_0: yaduta mūlataśca skandhataśca tvagbhāgataśca gulmataśca sārataśca patrataśca phalataśca viśeṣa upalabhyate/
S01divyav_u:325.024_0: na caivaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:325.026_0: tadyathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin, amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇāmudumbaraplakṣāśvatthanayagrodhavalguketyevamādīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.027_0: yaduta mūlataśca skandhataśca tvagbhāgataśca sārataśca patrataśca puṣpataśca phalataśca nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.028_0: na tvena caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:325.029_0_1: vividhānāmoṣadhīnāṃ grāmajānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇavanaspatīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.031_0: yaduta mūlataśca skandhataśca gulmataśca sārataśca patrataśca puṣpataśca phalataśca nānākaraṇaṃ prajāyate/
S01divyav_u:325.032_0: na tveva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:326.002_0: yaduta rūpato 'pi varṇato 'pi gandhato 'pi saṃsthānato 'pi nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:326.003_0: na tveva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:326.004_0: tadyathā brāhmaṇa amīṣāmapi jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padmotpalasaugandhakamṛdugandhikādīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:326.005_0: yaduta rūpataśca gandhataśca saṃsthānataśca varṇataśca nānākaraṇaṃ parjñāyate/
S01divyav_u:326.006_0: na tveva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:326.006_1: tadyathā puṣkarasārinn amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
S01divyav_u:326.014_1: yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā utpannāḥ, tasmātkṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apyutpannāḥ//
S01divyav_u:326.016_0: evaṃ prasūtiryadi tattvataḥ syāttato hi syādvarṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:326.018_0: yadi brāhmaṇā brahmalokaṃ vrajeyustrayaśca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargam/
S01divyav_u:326.020_0: evaṃ bhavedvarṇakṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//60//
S01divyav_u:326.022_0: yasmāddhi varṇaścaturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
S01divyav_u:326.024_0: yatastapaścārṣamiha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//61//
S01divyav_u:326.028_0: caturviṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ//62//
S01divyav_u:327.001_0: [327]rāgaiśca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evamprakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:327.003_0: sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etānyakalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//63//
S01divyav_u:327.005_0: yuddhaṃ vivādaṃ kalahānyabhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇairhi/
S01divyav_u:327.007_0: atharvaṇaṃ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//64//
S01divyav_u:327.009_0: pāpecchatā bahujanavañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhauryaṃ ca tathaiva kalpam/
S01divyav_u:327.011_0: evaṃ pareṣāmahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargamito vrajeyuḥ//65//
S01divyav_u:327.013_0: ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hyupetāḥ/
S01divyav_u:327.015_0: ahiṃsakā ye damasamyame ratāste brāhmaṇā brahmapuraṃ vrajanti//66//
S01divyav_u:327.017_0: sahāsthimāṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtrapurīṣamekam/
S01divyav_u:327.019_0: pañcendriyair nāsti yato viśeṣastasmānna vai varṇacatuṣka eṣaḥ//67//
S01divyav_u:327.021_0: tadyathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasyacitpuruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:327.021_1: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryāt--nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyuriti vā/
S01divyav_u:327.022_0: iṣṭāśca punarbho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:327.025_0: nāmataḥ punarbrāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:327.025_1: tatkasya hetoh? iha khalu punarbrahmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyate/
S01divyav_u:327.027_0: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
S01divyav_u:327.028_0: yadyevaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā) parabhūtāḥ kvacit//68//
S01divyav_u:327.029_0: parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa samyageva--ko 'tra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:327.031_0: kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaśca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//69//
S01divyav_u:328.003_0: evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ ko jātikṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:328.004_0: yasmānna jāterviśeṣaṇo 'sti tasmānna vai varṇacatuṣka eva//69//(a)
S01divyav_u:328.005_0: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātramidaṃ lokasya yadidaṃ brāṃhaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāka iti vā/
S01divyav_u:328.006_1: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:328.008_0: idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājāsya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--kiṃ punarbhavatā ṛgvedo 'dhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:328.008_1_1: 'pi, adhyātmamapi, mṛgacakraṃ vā, nakṣatragaṇo vā, tithikramagaṇo vā tvayādhītah?
S01divyav_u:328.008_1_2: karmacakraṃ vā tvayādhigatam? athavā aṅgavidyā vā vastravidyā vā śivāvidyā śakunividyā
S01divyav_u:328.008_1_3: vā tvayādhītā? athavā rāhucaritaṃ vā śukracaritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ tvayādhītam? athavā
S01divyav_u:328.008_1_4: lokāyataṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītah?
S01divyav_u:328.014_0: evamukte triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat--etacca mayā brāhmaṇā adhītaṃ bhūyaścottaram/
S01divyav_u:328.015_1: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ahamasmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti,
S01divyav_u:328.015_2: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:328.016_0: na khalvevaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:328.019_0: atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ cobhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato 'nye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā,
S01divyav_u:328.020_0: athātra brāhmaṇa tadanyatamānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:328.021_0: yannu vayaṃ svaparigrahamapahāya araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇakuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyema iti/
S01divyav_u:328.023_0: atha te sattvāstaṃ parigrahamapahāyā araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapālāśakaistṛṇakuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatraiva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:328.025_0: te tatra sāyamāsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetośca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma//
S01divyav_u:328.027_0: atha teṣāṃ grāmavāsināṃ satvānāmetadabhavat--duṣkarakārakā bata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigrahamutsṛjya grāmanigamajanapadebhyo bahir nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:328.028_0: teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divyav_u:328.029_0: te ca punargrāmavāsinaḥ sattvāstānatīva satkurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:329.001_0: [329]atha etṣāmeva sattvānāmanyatame sattvāstāni dhyānānyasambhāvayanto grāmeṣvavatīrya mantrapadān svādhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:329.002_1: ime 'dhyāpakāḥ, teṣāmadhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divyav_u:329.003_0: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya//
S01divyav_u:329.005_0: athānyatame sattvā vivekakālapratisamyuktān kārmāntān vividhānarthapratisamyuktān kurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:329.007_0: athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:329.009_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūmādāya rathamāruhya anyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:329.010_1: tasmānmātaṅgam {mā tvaṃ gāmah} iti saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:329.011_0: kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā pravṛttā//
S01divyav_u:329.012_0: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlavratasamācāreṇa samyak, tasya rājā iti saṃjñābhūt//
S01divyav_u:329.014_0: tato 'nye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti, teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:329.015_1: pravrajitvā parāñ jayanti kleśāñ jayantīti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:329.017_0: api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:329.027_0: tadyathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahmasamā mahāsamā mahāyāgikāḥ sātyamugrāḥ samantavedāḥ/
S01divyav_u:330.001_1: ete brāhmaṇā ekaviṃśatyadhvaryavo bhūtvā ekottaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:330.002_0: tadyathā kaṭhāḥ kaṇimā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ praṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:330.010_0: anumānamapi brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśabhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāśca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ pauraṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:330.011_0: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokayate vā padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:330.012_2: tatte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātrakametallokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:330.014_1: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitamutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:330.016_0: idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:330.018_0: dadarśa triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:330.019_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaridamabravīt--yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syādasadṛśena saha saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:330.020_1: tatkasya hetoh? ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlaprajñādayo guṇā agryā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
S01divyav_u:330.022_0: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ye vājapeyam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:330.022_1: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:330.022_2: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
S01divyav_u:330.024_1: tatkasya hetoh? vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajña ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
S01divyav_u:330.026_0: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--na hyeṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
S01divyav_u:330.026_1: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:330.029_0: praśaṃsāṃ vittalābhaṃ ca pratya svarge ca modanam//70//
S01divyav_u:330.030_0: yairbrāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:330.030_1: yairaśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣamedho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:330.031_2: ye 'śvamedham ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:331.002_0: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ saṃbandham yojanayasva/
S01divyav_u:331.003_0: tatkasya hetoh? dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:331.005_0: śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutirjñānaṃ dayaiva ca//
S01divyav_u:331.008_2: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
S01divyav_u:331.012_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ sapta gautrāṇi svākhyāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:331.012_1: tāni śrūyantām--tadyathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kāśyapā vāsiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ityetāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:331.014_1: atra ye gautamāste kauthumāste gagarste bhāradvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇāste vaikhānasāste vajrapādāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.015_0: tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāste maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.016_0: tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāsta maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste salīlāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.016_1: tatra ye kautsāste maudgalyāyanāste gauṇāyanāste lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste somabhuvāh{vah}/
S01divyav_u:331.017_0: tatra ye kauśikāste kātyāyanāste darbhakātyāyanāste valkalinaste pakṣiṇaste laukākṣāste lohitāyanāh (lohityāyanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.018_0: tatra ye kāśyapāste maṇḍanāsta iṣṭāste śauṇḍāyanāste rocaneyāste 'napekṣāste 'gniveśyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.019_0: tatra ye kāśyapāste jātukarṇyāste dhānyāyanāste pārāśarāste vyāghranakhāste āṇḍāyanāsta aupamanyavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.021_0: tatra ye māṇḍavyāste bhāṇḍāyanāste dhomrāyaṇāste kātyāyanāste khalvavāahanāste sugandhārāyaṇāste kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:331.022_0: ityetāni brāhmaṇa evamekonapañcāśadgotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni cchandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyām/
S01divyav_u:331.023_0: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
S01divyav_u:331.025_1: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:331.027_1: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:331.029_0: idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:331.030_0: adrākṣīt triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājah [332]puskarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:332.003_0: yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalam/
S01divyav_u:332.010_0: bhavette bhavinī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//75//
S01divyav_u:332.011_0: yadi tāvadayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam/
S01divyav_u:332.013_0: atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā vā punaḥ/
S01divyav_u:332.014_0: na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//77//
S01divyav_u:332.015_0: na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
S01divyav_u:332.017_0: teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
S01divyav_u:332.018_0: atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//79//
S01divyav_u:332.023_0: manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṃkarī/
S01divyav_u:332.024_0: kākavāṇī ca mantraṃ ca indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//82//
S01divyav_u:332.030_0: na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//85//
S01divyav_u:333.003_0: na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//86//
S01divyav_u:333.004_0: kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahāmunim/
S01divyav_u:333.006_0: na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//87//
S01divyav_u:333.007_0: ye ca te manujā āsaṃs tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:333.009_0: na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//88//
S01divyav_u:333.012_0: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:333.013_1: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:333.015_0: idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--kiṃgotro bhavān? āha--ātreyagotro 'smi/
S01divyav_u:333.021_2: kathaṃ bhavati? katyakṣarā sāvitrī? katigaṇḍā? katipadā?
S01divyav_u:333.024_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin, sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:333.025_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa atīte 'dhvani vasur nāma ṛṣirbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:333.026_1: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsaditā bhāryārtham/
S01divyav_u:333.026_2: sa tatra saṃraktacittastayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunamagacchat/
S01divyav_u:333.028_0: ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhāṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/
S01divyav_u:333.031_0: iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñānaśodhanārthamimameva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divārātraṃ japati sma/
S01divyav_u:334.007_0: kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:334.009_0: tasmādbhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmāṃs tato 'tulaṃ prāpsyatha brahmalokam//91//
S01divyav_u:334.011_0: itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā, pūrvakaiśca samyaksambuddhairabhyanumoditā//
S01divyav_u:334.015_0_0: kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyah āśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī uttaraphalgunī
S01divyav_u:334.015_0_1: hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā anurādhā jyeṣṭā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit
S01divyav_u:334.015_0_2: śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī/
S01divyav_u:334.019_0: katitārakāṇi katisaṃsthānāni katimuhūrtayogāni kimāhārāṇi kiṃdaivatāni kiṃgotrāṇi?
S01divyav_u:334.021_0: kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣurasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ dadhyāhāramagnidaivataṃ vaiśyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.022_0: rohiṇīnakṣatraṃ pañcatārakaṃ śakaṭākṛtisaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpatidaivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.023_0: mṛgāśirānakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ mṛgaśīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ phalamūlāhāraṃ somadaivataṃ mṛgāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.024_0: ārdrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ hārītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.026_0: punarvasunakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhyāhāram aditidaivataṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.027_0: puṣyanakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamānasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhumaṇḍāhāraṃ bṛhaspatidaivatam aupamanyavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.028_0: āśleṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ pāyasabhojanaṃ sarpadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:334.029_0: itīmāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrvadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:334.031_0: maghānakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ nadīkubjasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilakṛsarāhāraṃ titṛdaivatam [335]piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.001_0: pūrvaphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ bilvabhojanaṃ bhavadaivataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.002_0: uttaraphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāramaryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.003_0: hastanakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ hastasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūryadaivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.004_0: citrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛtapūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.005_0: svātīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.007_0: viśākhānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilapuṣpāhāramindrāgnidaivataṃ śākhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.009_0: anurādhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnāvalīsaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatamālambāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.010_0: jyeṣṭhānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ śāliyavāgūbhojanamindradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.011_0: mūlanakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścikasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.012_0: pūrvāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikramasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.013_0: uttarāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikramasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhulājāhāraṃ viśvadaivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.015_0: abhijinnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ gośīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ ṣaṇmuhūrtayogaṃ vāyvāhāraṃ brahmadaivataṃ brahmāvatīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.016_0: śravaṇānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.017_0: ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:335.019_0: dhaniṣṭhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakunasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.020_0: śatabhiṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogam yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.021_0: pūrvabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāramahirbudhnyadaivataṃ jātūkarṇyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.022_0: uttarabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.024_0: revatīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhupāyasabhojanaṃ gandharvadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.026_0: bharaṇīnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhagasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilataṇḍulāhāram yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:335.027_0: ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttaradvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:335.028_0: amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇnakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogāni/
S01divyav_u:335.029_0: tadyathā--rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
S01divyav_u:335.030_1: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
S01divyav_u:336.001_0: [336]amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrvadvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmā,
S01divyav_u:336.002_0: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇadvārīkāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma, viśākhā paścimāa nāma/
S01divyav_u:336.003_0: amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmanurādhā prathamā nāma, śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
S01divyav_u:336.004_0: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmuttaradvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā nāma, bharaṇī paścimā nāma//
S01divyav_u:336.006_0: amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
S01divyav_u:336.006_1: katamāni sapta? yaduta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvasuḥ punarvasuḥ svātiśca/
S01divyav_u:336.009_0: śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
S01divyav_u:336.010_1: yaduta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti//
S01divyav_u:336.011_0: amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭhāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti--ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:336.012_2: tatra nakṣatram yadi purastādgacchati candraśca pṛṣṭhataḥ, ayamucyate ṛṣabhānusārī yoga iti/
S01divyav_u:336.013_0: yaduta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ, tadā bhavati vatsānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:336.014_0: yadi punaścandro nakṣatraṃ cobhau samau yugapad gacchataḥ, tadāyamucyate yoga iti//
S01divyav_u:336.016_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:336.016_2: tadyathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho 'ṅgārakaḥ sūryastārādhipatiśceti//
S01divyav_u:336.018_0: evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiśca bhavati? taducyate/
S01divyav_u:336.019_0: hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ dvādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.020_1: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāmaṣṭādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.021_1: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśamuhūrto divase bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.025_0: kiṃ bhostriśaṅko kṣaṇasya parimāṇam? kiṃ lavāsya? kiṃ muhūrtasya? tadyathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:336.029_0: āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.029_1: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.030_0: dvādaśapauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:336.031_0: ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapathe nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:337.002_0: tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:337.002_1: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:337.003_0: parivṛto madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:337.006_0: avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:337.008_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:337.013_2: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn imāni triṃśanmuhūrtāni yairahorātraṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:337.019_2: caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho 'tisamṛddha udgataḥ sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarvaraso vasuḥ sundaraḥ parabhayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:337.020_0: raudrastārāvacaraḥ samyamaḥ sāmpraiyako 'nanto gardabho rākṣaso 'vayavo brahmā ditirarko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnirabhijit/
S01divyav_u:337.029_0: yadā caivaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
S01divyav_u:337.029_1: etena nāḍikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍike eko muhūrtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:337.030_0: etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśanṃhūrtāḥ, yai rātridivasā anumīyanta iti//
S01divyav_u:338.003_0: etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭyo 'ṣṭapañcāśañca śatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:338.010_1: paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśatasahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiścaikonatriṃśatkoṭisahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śatasahasrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:338.014_0: dve koṭī pañcaviṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatānyaṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:338.017_0: paramāṇūnāmaṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate aśītiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:338.020_1: dve koṭiśate tisraśca koṭaya ekonatriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi catuḥsaptatisahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:338.024_2: koṭiśatamaṣṭapañcāśacca koṭayo dviraśītiśca śatāshasrāṇi ekaṣaṣṭiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatāni triṃśacca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:338.027_1: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatravyākaraṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tacchrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:339.001_0: maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahātmā ca/
S01divyav_u:339.004_0: svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇakamahāmātro vā/
S01divyav_u:339.006_0: mūle jātaḥ putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:339.012_1: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatranirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:339.014_0: kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:339.016_0: rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:339.023_0: punarvasau niviṣḍe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
S01divyav_u:339.025_0: śrīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
S01divyav_u:339.031_0: maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:340.003_0: uttarāyāṃ tu phalgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:340.004_0: mūrkhā janā strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//102//
S01divyav_u:340.005_0: haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:340.006_0: parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//103//
S01divyav_u:340.007_0: citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strījitāḥ sarvamānavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:340.010_0: lubdhāḥ krūrāśca mūrkhāśca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//105//
S01divyav_u:340.011_0: viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:340.023_0: abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:341.004_0: pūrṇaṃ ca dhanadhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//117//
S01divyav_u:341.005_0: pure niviṣṭe revatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:341.011_0: purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatrayogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
S01divyav_u:341.013_0: iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayettu pūrve ca janme 'dhigataṃ mayedam//121//
S01divyav_u:341.016_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:341.028_1: ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśavyākaraṇo nāmādhyāyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:342.001_0: [342]kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.005_0: rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.006_2: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
S01divyav_u:342.009_0: mṛgaśīrṣe grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.012_0: ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.014_2: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--jvaraḥ śvāso galagrahaśca/
S01divyav_u:342.016_0: punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, navatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.019_0: puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.021_2: tatra trayo rogāśca bhavanti--gāṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca/
S01divyav_u:342.023_0: āśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.027_0: maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.030_0: pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:342.031_1: tacca sasyaṃ janayitvā paracakrapīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
S01divyav_u:342.032_0: paśūnāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cātra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:343.001_0: [343]uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aśītyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.005_0: haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati, ekonapañcāśadāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.008_0: citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.011_0: svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.013_0: viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aśītyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.016_0: anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣaṣṭyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.017_0: jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse cātra dṛḍāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:343.018_0: jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.022_0: mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.026_0: pūrvasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.029_0: uttarasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:343.031_2: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--gaṇḍaḥ kacchaḥ kaṇṭharoga iti/
S01divyav_u:344.001_0: [344]abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakani pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.004_0: śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.007_0: dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekapañcādāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.011_0: śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra pravarṣati, ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.013_1: manuṣyā dārakadārikāśca skandhe kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:344.015_0: pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:344.017_1: dvau cātra mahāvyādhī bhavatah--prathamaṃ pittatāpajvaro bhavati, paścād balavān mahāgraho bhavati/
S01divyav_u:344.020_0: uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.024_0: etāśca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca saṃpādayanti/
S01divyav_u:344.025_0: revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devo pravarṣati, ekaṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.030_0: aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:344.031_0: yacca madhye varṣā bhavati, tatra niṃnāni kṛṣikartavyāni/
S01divyav_u:345.001_0: [345]bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:345.006_0: amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:345.007_0: kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candragraho bhavati, kaliṅgamagadhānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.008_0: yadi rohiṇyāṃ candragraho bhavati, prajānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.008_1: yadi mṛgaśirasi candragraho bhavati, videhānāṃ janapadānāmupapīḍā bhavati rājopasevakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:345.010_0: āśleṣāyām yadi candragraho bhavati, nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.011_0: yadi madhāsu candragraho bhavati, gauḍikānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.011_1: yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.013_0: yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate, saurāṣṭrikāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.013_1: yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.014_0: yadi svātyāṃ somo gṛhyate, sarveṣāṃ pravrajyāsamāpannānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.015_0: yadi viśākhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, audakānāṃ sattvānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.016_0: yadyanurādhāsu somo gṛhyate, vaṇijānāmupapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:345.017_0: yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.017_1: yadi mūle somo gṛhyate, adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.018_0: yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.019_0: yadyuttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati vāhlīkānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:345.019_1: yadyabhijiti somo gṛhyate, dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati tāmraparṇikānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:345.020_0: yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ copapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.021_0: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kurupāñcālānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.022_0: yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, maulikānāmātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.023_0: yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gāndhikānām yavanakāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.024_0: yadyuttarabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gandharvāṇāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.024_1: yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate, nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.025_0: yadyaśvinyāṃ somo gṛhyate, aśvavaṇijānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:345.025_1: yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate, bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati//
S01divyav_u:345.027_0: evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yasminnakṣatre candragraho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:346.008_0: navaṃ ca cchādayedvastraṃ krayaṇaṃ nātra kārayet//126//
S01divyav_u:346.012_0: taijasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayecca krīṇīta ca//128//
S01divyav_u:346.013_0: āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥsnānaṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:346.014_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya nātra vairaṃ praśāmyati//129//
S01divyav_u:346.016_0: āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca yajñaśīlo 'tra jāyate//130// kṛttikāsu//
S01divyav_u:346.021_0: ṛṇaṃ na dadyāttatraiva vairamatra tu vardhate/
S01divyav_u:346.023_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:346.025_0: āyuṣmān paśumān dhanyo mahābhogo 'tra jāyate//134// rohiṇyām//
S01divyav_u:346.026_0: saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraśca tārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:346.027_0: mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
S01divyav_u:346.028_0: yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//135//
S01divyav_u:346.029_0: sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
S01divyav_u:347.003_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ cātra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:347.004_0: svapnaśīlastathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//139// mṛgaśirasi//
S01divyav_u:347.005_0: ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayedarthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
S01divyav_u:347.008_0: ūheta (uhayet) prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyācca nātra gām/
S01divyav_u:347.018_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate//145//
S01divyav_u:347.026_0: purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvajāgraṃ ca prakārayet//149//
S01divyav_u:347.028_0: na ca rogo na cauraśca kṣemaṃ cātra sadā bhavet//150//
S01divyav_u:347.031_0: āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca mahābhogaḥ prajāyate//151// puṣye//
S01divyav_u:348.013_0: saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
S01divyav_u:348.014_0: dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//157// maghāsu//
S01divyav_u:348.020_0: bhāgam ye copajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//160//
S01divyav_u:348.023_0: naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi na tadastīti nirdiśet//161// pūrvaphalgunyām//
S01divyav_u:348.026_0: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvamastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:348.031_0: cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tacca vidvān vivarjayet//165//
S01divyav_u:349.005_0: rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//167//
S01divyav_u:349.006_0: hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
S01divyav_u:349.008_0: gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanam/
S01divyav_u:350.008_0: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//181//
S01divyav_u:350.010_0: āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//182//
S01divyav_u:350.018_0: ṛṇaṃ vai yatpurāṇaṃ syādartho vāsyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:350.021_0: nadīṣu snapanaṃ caiva mūle sarvān prayojayet//187//
S01divyav_u:350.025_0: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:350.027_0: āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaśca sarāṃsi ca/
S01divyav_u:350.029_0: utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
S01divyav_u:350.031_0: yāni cogrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyantyatra tu tāni ca//191//
S01divyav_u:351.007_0: śreṇībandhaṃ ca rājā tu samayaṃ cātra kārayet//194//
S01divyav_u:351.012_0: abhijiti na kurvīta brahmadevasya hyarcanam//197// abhijiti//
S01divyav_u:351.013_0: śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:351.014_0: gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//198//
S01divyav_u:351.020_0: naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravaṇasthe niśākare//201// śravaṇe//
S01divyav_u:351.025_0: medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahābhogī mahādhanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:351.027_0: naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ praviddhaṃ vā kleśenaivātra labhyate/
S01divyav_u:351.028_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyāccātra suvṛṣṭitām//205// dhaniṣṭhāyām//
S01divyav_u:352.004_0: ādeyaṃ ca tadādadyād vyayaṃ cātra na kārayet//208//
S01divyav_u:352.006_0: bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīt bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//209//
S01divyav_u:352.007_0: nidhiṃ vā khānayettatra nidadhyādapi vā nidhim/
S01divyav_u:352.008_0: dhanaṃ cātra prayuñjīt bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//210//
S01divyav_u:352.014_0: dīrghaśrotro mahābhogo jñātīnāṃ ca sadā priyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:352.016_0: pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet//213// pūrvabhādrapade//
S01divyav_u:352.017_0: uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīt āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca/
S01divyav_u:352.018_0: na ca dakṣiṇato gacchetpuraṃ cātra pradāpayet//214//
S01divyav_u:352.020_0: atrāpi triguṇaṃ vindedādānam yadi vā vyayam/
S01divyav_u:352.023_0: koṣṭhāgārāṇi kurvīt kiṇvaṃ cātra na kārayet//216//
S01divyav_u:352.024_0: surākarma ca kurvīd dhiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca/
S01divyav_u:353.002_0: yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaśca prayojayet//220//
S01divyav_u:353.009_0: bhṛtiṃ copanayedatra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet/
S01divyav_u:353.016_0: teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyānyoṣadhayo 'pi ca/
S01divyav_u:353.020_0: catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:353.022_1: yāni cānyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet/
S01divyav_u:353.023_0: atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ cāpi hṛtaṃ ca vā/
S01divyav_u:353.025_0: athātra jāto dhanyo 'sau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:353.027_0: catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:353.028_1: svādhyāyaṃ mantrasamārambhaṃ pravāsaprasthānaṃ gāśca turaṅgānapyatra yojayet/
S01divyav_u:353.031_1: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā, svasti bhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam//
S01divyav_u:354.004_0: kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca purohitam//231// iti//
S01divyav_u:354.005_0: pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dāruṇāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:354.006_0: maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī/
S01divyav_u:354.007_0: athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati//232//
S01divyav_u:354.008_2: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā bharaṇī ceti/
S01divyav_u:354.010_2: kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā trīṇi pūrvāṇi/
S01divyav_u:354.011_1: mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī aśvinī ceti imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi pañcādbhāgīyāni triṃśanmuhūrtayogāni kṣetrāṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:354.014_0: api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:354.014_1: aśubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti, śubhāśubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:354.015_0: saṃprayuktanakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti, tadā śobhanā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:354.016_0: yadā aśubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti, tadā na śobhanā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:354.016_1: yadā tu punaḥ śubhāścāśubhāśca samāpattayo, tadā sādhāraṇā bhavanti//
S01divyav_u:354.018_0: athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhirvā bhavatīti taducyate/
S01divyav_u:354.018_1: varṣāṇāṃ prathame māse puṣyanakṣatramamāvāsyāṃ bhavati, śravaṇā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:354.021_2: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse maghā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:354.024_0: varṣāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse phalgunyamāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, aśvinī pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:354.027_1: varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, kṛttikā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:354.030_0: hemantānāṃ prathame māse 'nurādhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, mṛgaśirā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.001_2: hemantānāṃ dvitīye māse amāvāsyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhā bhavati, puṣyaḥ pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.004_0: hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, maghā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.006_2: hemantānāṃ caturthe māse śravaṇā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:355.010_0: grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, citrā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.015_1: grīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, jyeṣṭhā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.018_0: grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, uttarāṣāḍhā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:355.021_0: saṃvatsaramanveṣaṇato muhūrtaviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvāṇi caitāni (nakṣatrāṇi) bhāgānubhāgena amāvāsyāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ ca jujyante/
S01divyav_u:355.029_0: candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro 'ṅgārako budhaśca ime grahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:355.031_0: bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etatsādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:355.031_1: ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo 'śleṣā etatsādhāraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:355.032_0: maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hastā citrā etatsādhāraṇam [356]tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:356.001_0: svātī viśākhā anurādhā etatsādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:356.001_1: jyeṣṭhā mūlāṣāḍhā dvayamatra sarvāṇi mahābhayāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:356.002_1: abhijicchravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitatsādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:356.004_1: tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā/
S01divyav_u:356.006_0: dvādaśa muhūrtāni divase dhruvāṇi, dvādaśa rātrau/
S01divyav_u:356.006_2: katame ṣaṭ? nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargodevo raudro vicārī ca/
S01divyav_u:356.008_0: athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe 'ṣṭādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.009_0: rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya cāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.009_1: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.010_0: dvādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.011_1: bhādrapade māse pūrṇe saptadaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.013_1: trayodaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.014_0: ardharātre mahābhayo vāyavo nāma muhūrto bhavati//
S01divyav_u:356.015_1: āśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.016_1: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya tvantare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.018_0: caturdaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.018_1: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇārdharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.022_0: samāne 'horātre sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.023_1: rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye bhargodevo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.026_0: mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe caturdaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāṃ muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.027_0: viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasyāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:356.028_0: ṣoḍaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ samyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.001_0: [357]pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.002_2: saptadaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.005_0: māghamāse pūrṇe dvādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.005_1: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasyāntareṇa madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.007_0: aṣṭādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.007_1: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya cāntaramardharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:357.010_3: evameteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:357.012_0: yathāmadhyaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rātrivaśena divasavaśena cotkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau/
S01divyav_u:357.012_1: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe 'rdhamāse vā/
S01divyav_u:357.013_0: dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atrāntare divase kalā vardhate, rātrau kalā hīyate//
S01divyav_u:357.019_0: trayastu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍekamāse tu bhavanti vegāḥ/
S01divyav_u:357.021_0: parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syātprakampate yatra mahī tvabhīkṣṇam//235//
S01divyav_u:357.028_0: adhyardhaṃ phalgune māse caitre triṃśattu rātrayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:357.030_0: yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī/
S01divyav_u:357.031_0: vṛkṣāstathā calanti sma jalam yadi kampate/
S01divyav_u:358.001_0: [358]nagarāṇyatha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye cātra saṃśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:358.003_0: aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca/
S01divyav_u:358.009_0: ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmamāśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:358.012_0: proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā//245//
S01divyav_u:358.013_0: gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśam/
S01divyav_u:358.023_0: kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāśca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:359.005_0: kīṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ śvānā ekakhurāśca ye mṛgāḥ//256//
S01divyav_u:359.006_0: vaidyā viṣakarāścāpi ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:359.009_0: ye ca śrāddhā nivartante samājā utsavāstathā/
S01divyav_u:359.011_0: ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye cānye 'pyagrapaṇḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:359.012_0: gandharvāśca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahākulāḥ/
S01divyav_u:359.017_0: dharme ratā āsanikā ye ca śulkopajīvinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:359.028_0: kumāryaḥ sarvaratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bījakaiḥ saha//266//
S01divyav_u:360.017_0: grahāśrayāḥ piśācāśca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:361.020_0: dharme ratāśca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ//289//
S01divyav_u:361.024_0: grāmaghātāśca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati//291//
S01divyav_u:361.029_0: yā cātra garbhamādhatte ye ca jātāśca tāniha/
S01divyav_u:362.024_0: anulomaṃ ca samyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśam//304//
S01divyav_u:362.030_0: sthāpyante tatra bījāni niṃne naśyanti vai tadā//307//
S01divyav_u:363.005_0: dṛśyate kapilā saṃdhyā candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:363.008_0: na tatra pravasetprājña ātmānaṃ cātra gopayet//311//
S01divyav_u:363.015_0: saṃdhyā ca lohitā bhāti candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:363.018_0: dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśam//316//
S01divyav_u:363.019_0: vīṇāśca divi dṛśyante nava māsānna varṣati/
S01divyav_u:363.021_0: jayati ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃśca hayagajarathamukhyān mantriṇo madhyamāhne/
S01divyav_u:363.023_0: vyathayati aparāhṇe gopaśūn vaiśyaśūdrān pradahati niśisaṃdhyā taskarānantavāsān//318//
S01divyav_u:363.025_0: rajanimiha pradoṣe hiṃsate mlecchasaṃghān striyamapi ca napuṃsaścārdharātreṣvanantān/
S01divyav_u:363.027_0: kṛṣivaṇigupajīvyān hanti yāme tṛtīye vyathayati surapakṣaṃ raudrakarmāntakṛṣṇe//319//
S01divyav_u:363.029_0: pradahati śaśipakṣe yājñikaṃ brahmakṣatra śrapayati śucivṛttāneva dharme pradhānān/
S01divyav_u:363.031_0: viduṣi ca mṛdubhāvaṃ vindate yo hyadhīte sa bhavati nṛpapūjyo brāhmaṇo vedadarśī//320//
S01divyav_u:364.005_0: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn abhiṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rogotpattiṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:364.007_0: kṛttikāsūtthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:364.009_0: agnirhi devatā tatra dadhnā hyasya baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:364.011_0: rohiṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:364.017_0: somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:364.019_0: ārdrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:364.021_0: rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:364.023_0: punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:364.027_0: puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.001_0: [365]āśleṣāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.002_0: na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu sarpastatra tu daivataḥ//334//
S01divyav_u:365.003_0: maghāsamutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.007_0: pūrvaphālgunijo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.011_0: uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.012_0: na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu bhago 'pyatra tu devatā//339//
S01divyav_u:365.013_0: hastenāpyutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya va/
S01divyav_u:365.017_0: citrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.019_0: tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtamudgairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:365.021_0: svātyāṃ samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya/
S01divyav_u:365.025_0: viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:365.029_0: anurādhotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.001_0: [366]mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛtapātraṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:366.003_0: jyeṣṭhāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.005_0: indro hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:366.007_0: mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.011_0: pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.013_0: āpo hi devatāstatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:366.015_0: uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.017_0: viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:366.019_0: abhijidutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.021_0: viṣṇuśca devatā tatra dadhimaṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:366.023_0: śravaṇenotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.024_0: guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśamāsikam//360//
S01divyav_u:366.027_0: dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:366.029_0: varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:367.003_0: uttarābhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:367.007_0: revatyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:367.009_0: pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:367.011_0: aśvinyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:367.013_0: gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:367.015_0: bharaṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:367.016_0: na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu yamastatra tu daivataḥ/
S01divyav_u:367.017_0: śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//370//
S01divyav_u:367.019_0: ayaṃ khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:367.021_0: kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:367.021_1: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:367.022_0: mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā ekaviṃśatirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:367.023_0: ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā ardhamāsena mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:367.023_1: punarvassau ruddho vā baddho vā saptarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:367.028_1: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhādrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:367.029_1: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśamāvāpsyatīti vaktavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:368.001_0: [368]mūrdhni tu yasyāstilako 'sti sūkṣmaḥ knigdho bhavet padmasamānavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:368.003_0: rājā tu tasyā bhavatīha bhartā stanopariṣṭātpratibimbamāhuḥ//372//
S01divyav_u:368.005_0: śīrṣe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhavedañjanacūrṇavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:368.007_0: senāpatistasyā bhaveddhi bhartā stanāntare 'syāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//373//
S01divyav_u:368.009_0: bhruvontare 'syāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:368.011_0: pañcaiva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahvannapānaṃ labhate nārī//374//
S01divyav_u:368.013_0: gaṇḍasya nāsādikamadhyadeśe bhavecca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:368.015_0: tāṃ śokabhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbamāhuḥ//375//
S01divyav_u:368.017_0: karṇe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:368.019_0: bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//376//
S01divyav_u:368.021_0: yasyottaroṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syāttāṃ bhinnasatyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:368.023_0: kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttimūrau tu tasyāstilabimbamāhuḥ//377//
S01divyav_u:368.025_0: yasyādharoṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:368.027_0: miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//378//
S01divyav_u:368.029_0: cibuke tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:368.031_0: miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//379//
S01divyav_u:369.001_0: [369]atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:369.006_0: vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ cāsya sadā sukham//381//
S01divyav_u:369.007_0: jāto mṛgaśire yastu mṛduḥ saumyastu mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:369.018_0: dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//387//
S01divyav_u:369.021_0: uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
S01divyav_u:369.027_0: svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuślāghī vicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:369.032_0: śuciścaiva kṛtajñaśca dharmātmā ca bhavecca saḥ//394//
S01divyav_u:370.004_0: dṛḍho vīro bhaveccāsau kilbiṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//396//
S01divyav_u:370.008_0: viśvadaive naro jāto bhavedapi ca niścitaḥ//398//
S01divyav_u:370.009_0: ācāryaḥ śāstrakartā ca viścvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
S01divyav_u:370.010_0: śravaṇe jāta āyuṣmāñ śrīmāṃśca puruṣo bhavet//399//
S01divyav_u:370.013_0: vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:371.004_0: māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivo yadi/
S01divyav_u:371.011_0: phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu āditye parikho yadi/
S01divyav_u:371.012_0: naśyanti karvaṭāstatra yadi devo na varṣati//411//
S01divyav_u:371.013_0: caitramāse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇaṃ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:371.025_0: māse 'tha śrāvaṇe mūle candrasūryau na bhāsataḥ/
S01divyav_u:372.002_0: rājñāṃ vidyāddhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam//421//
S01divyav_u:372.003_0: bharaṇyaṃ māghamāse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:372.005_0: māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutam/
S01divyav_u:372.017_0: śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhastalam/
S01divyav_u:372.028_0: aśvinyāṃ viṣaye tatra prajā śvāsena vadhyate//434//
S01divyav_u:372.029_0: māse tu phālgune yatra agnivarṣaṃ nabhastalāt/
S01divyav_u:372.031_0: svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vātavarṣitam/
S01divyav_u:373.003_0: āṣāḍhe māsi puṇye 'tha dṛśyante vyoṃni vidyutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:373.005_0: śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:373.007_0: māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
S01divyav_u:373.009_0: māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:373.010_0: kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu tadā prajā//441//
S01divyav_u:373.013_0: kārtike tu yadārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrūyeta bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:373.017_0: pauṣamāse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:373.019_0: māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyedvasuṃdharām/
S01divyav_u:373.025_0: pūrvāyāṃ cedāṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
S01divyav_u:373.028_0: anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//450//
S01divyav_u:373.029_0: jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kampedvasuṃdharā/
S01divyav_u:373.031_0: jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:373.032_0: pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//452//
S01divyav_u:374.002_0: śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//453//
S01divyav_u:374.003_0: prakampante yadā caityā ārdrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
S01divyav_u:374.005_0: caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
S01divyav_u:374.008_0: sadā parājito rājā caurai rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//456//
S01divyav_u:374.010_0: dvāraṃ vā nagarasyātha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//457//
S01divyav_u:374.011_0: vāme vā dakṣiṇe cendoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:374.016_0: jñeyaṃ rogabhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//460//
S01divyav_u:374.019_0: yasya caivātha nakṣare śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
S01divyav_u:374.021_0: rājño vai cātha nakṣatre candraṃ keturyadā viśet/
S01divyav_u:374.029_0: maghāyāṃ lohitāṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:375.002_0: somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ tadā//469//
S01divyav_u:375.003_0: kākāḥ śyenāśca gṛdhrāśca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
S01divyav_u:375.004_0: maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇastadā//470//
S01divyav_u:375.006_0: paracakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhaveccāpi punaḥ punaḥ//471//
S01divyav_u:375.009_0: garbhasthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
S01divyav_u:375.014_0: pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//475//
S01divyav_u:375.016_0: pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//476//
S01divyav_u:375.018_0: dvitriśīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//477//
S01divyav_u:375.020_0: jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//478//
S01divyav_u:375.024_0: rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//480//
S01divyav_u:375.027_0: saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣam yadi/
S01divyav_u:375.028_0: sūtaṃ caturdiśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāttatra na saṃśayaḥ//482//
S01divyav_u:375.029_0: ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
S01divyav_u:376.002_0: dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyati//484//
S01divyav_u:376.003_0: kukṣiṃ bhittvā yadā bālo garbhānniṣkramate svayam/
S01divyav_u:376.004_0: atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//485//
S01divyav_u:376.012_0: sa jano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//489//
S01divyav_u:376.014_0: śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaśca vilayaṃ vrajet//490//
S01divyav_u:376.016_0: svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//491//
S01divyav_u:376.017_0: phale phalam yadā paśyetpuṣpe vā puṣpamāśritam/
S01divyav_u:376.019_0: akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/
S01divyav_u:376.020_0: latā gulmo 'tha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//493//
S01divyav_u:376.023_0: vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
S01divyav_u:376.027_0: anāvartam yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cāpi pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:376.028_0: vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//497//
S01divyav_u:377.003_0: kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:377.005_0: devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
S01divyav_u:377.007_0: devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
S01divyav_u:377.010_0: nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rājavadho bhavet//503//
S01divyav_u:377.014_0: amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ cātra nirdiśet//505//
S01divyav_u:377.015_0: vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/
S01divyav_u:377.021_0: indurvā dīpavṛkṣo vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
S01divyav_u:377.024_0: astraṃ vāpi gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanamādiśet//510//
S01divyav_u:377.026_0: puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//511//
S01divyav_u:377.028_0: vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sāmātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//512//
S01divyav_u:378.007_0: vidyucca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇam/
S01divyav_u:378.012_0: gaganaṃ dahyate tatra lokapīḍā jvareṇa ca//519//
S01divyav_u:378.017_0: nāpsu majjati nāpyagnau pūrvavacca na dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:378.021_0: jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayam/
S01divyav_u:378.022_0: anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahadbhayam//524//
S01divyav_u:378.024_0: cakradvaye 'pi durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//525//
S01divyav_u:378.025_0: triśīrṣaḥ pañcaśīrṣo vā yadā sarpo 'tha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:379.005_0: kākaḥ śyenaśca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/
S01divyav_u:379.020_0: pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rājavadho dhruvam//538//
S01divyav_u:379.021_0: kākaśced gṛhamāruhya hā putra iti vāśati/
S01divyav_u:379.023_0: anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
S01divyav_u:380.005_0: narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca ratiharṣo na jāyate/
S01divyav_u:380.006_0: sarvatra śokacintā vā mahattatra bhayaṃ bhavet//546//
S01divyav_u:380.008_0: nadīṃ bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśo naśyate 'cirāt//547//
S01divyav_u:380.011_0: matsyāḥ kūrmāśca sarpāśca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:380.013_0: apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā/
S01divyav_u:380.018_2: kathayatu bhagavān--atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:380.020_0: aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi prakīrtitāni, yāni candrasūryaniḥsṛtānyanuvahanti/
S01divyav_u:380.021_0: tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgalapramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:380.022_1: caturdaśagṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padam yatra saṃdṛśyante, tadanyathā na bhavati/
S01divyav_u:380.023_0: nakṣatre yatra yo jātastatra tatra saṃdṛśyate//
S01divyav_u:380.025_0: kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:380.027_0: bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍato jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:380.029_0: dṛśyate vraṇa evāyam yasya vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:380.030_0: rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so 'pi vidvān dharmarataḥ sadā//554//
S01divyav_u:381.003_0: ardhadvitīyagṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
S01divyav_u:381.004_0: ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaśca saḥ//557//
S01divyav_u:381.005_0: vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaścaiva punarvasau/
S01divyav_u:381.008_0: cakramadhye ca haste ca sūryaścandro virājate//559//
S01divyav_u:381.013_0: adha urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:381.014_0: maghāyāṃ dhanavāñ jāto mahātmā dhārimiko naraḥ//562//
S01divyav_u:381.021_0: vyañjane yasya pinyastu dṛśyate niyamena hi/
S01divyav_u:381.023_0: vyañjane 'pi ca ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:381.025_0: kugṛṣṭyā yasya ūrubhyāṃ pinyo lohita eva hi/
S01divyav_u:382.001_0: [382]adho yasyeha corubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:382.009_0: dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
S01divyav_u:382.011_0: dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyām yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:382.013_0: dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:382.014_0: mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hyudakena saḥ//577//
S01divyav_u:382.015_0: adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:382.019_0: ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:382.020_0: revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa bhavatyapi//580//
S01divyav_u:382.028_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:382.032_0: strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarvakarmakam//584//
S01divyav_u:383.002_0: prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatām//585//
S01divyav_u:383.008_0: yadā savarṇapiṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ//588//
S01divyav_u:383.009_0: śīrṣe tu dhanadhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
S01divyav_u:383.013_0: aśrupāto dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:383.018_0: cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//593//
S01divyav_u:383.021_0: jāto 'yaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhanakṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:383.024_0: pārśve tu sukhaśayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//596//
S01divyav_u:383.026_0: bāhvoḥ śatruvināśāya yuktaṃ strīlābha eva ca//597//
S01divyav_u:383.029_0: saubhagaṃ dhanalābhaṃ ca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
S01divyav_u:383.030_0: puṣpito hyekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//599//
S01divyav_u:384.004_0: putrotpattistu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//601//
S01divyav_u:384.012_0: maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:384.013_0: paribādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ//605//
S01divyav_u:384.014_0: pārśve gulphe ca jānīyācchastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:384.018_0: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni cāpnuyāt//607//
S01divyav_u:384.019_0: snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:384.020_0: sthānasthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayam//608//
S01divyav_u:384.022_0: puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāśca deśe dakṣiṇataśca ye/
S01divyav_u:384.023_0: tathā cābhyantare caiva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//609//
S01divyav_u:384.024_0: strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrānteṣu ca parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:384.025_0: tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānāṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//610//
S01divyav_u:384.026_0: sthānāsthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatimeva ca/
S01divyav_u:384.028_0: vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:384.031_0: yathoktānāṃ ca saṃdhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//613//
S01divyav_u:385.005_0: na nakhena na śastreṇa nāyasena kathaṃcana/
S01divyav_u:385.008_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:385.013_0: yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//617//
S01divyav_u:385.014_0: yastu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:385.015_0: suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ caiva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//618//
S01divyav_u:385.016_0: sārasāṃśca śukān haṃsān krauñjāñ śvetāṃśca pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:385.017_0: yastu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//619//
S01divyav_u:385.018_0: samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:385.021_0: yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//621//
S01divyav_u:385.022_0: pāṇau pāde 'tha vā jānau śastreṇa dhanuṣāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:385.025_0: yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//623//
S01divyav_u:385.030_0: goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo 'bhirohati/
S01divyav_u:386.009_0: śuṣkodapānaṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//630//
S01divyav_u:386.011_0: ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhikleśaṃ vinirdiśet//631//
S01divyav_u:386.012_0: kākaṃ śyenamulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vāpyatha vartakam/
S01divyav_u:386.014_0: nagnaṃ paśyati hyātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastameva vā/
S01divyav_u:386.017_0: kuśīlāṃścāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//634//
S01divyav_u:386.020_0: dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapnānte yasya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:386.024_0: manuṣyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ vā svapnānte grasate yadi/
S01divyav_u:386.028_0: prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:387.003_0: kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naram/
S01divyav_u:387.005_0: tamasi praviśet svapne śambhorvā cāmaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:387.006_0: vṛkṣādvā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//644//
S01divyav_u:387.007_0: vṛkṣaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāpi virucam yastu paśyati/
S01divyav_u:387.008_0: svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//645//
S01divyav_u:387.009_0: devo vā varṣate yatra yatra caivāśaniḥ patet/
S01divyav_u:387.011_0: candradityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
S01divyav_u:387.016_0: labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhananāśaṃ samarcchati//649//
S01divyav_u:387.017_0: gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
S01divyav_u:387.023_0: āsane śayane yāne vastre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:387.028_0: utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandhanyāso na saṃśayaḥ//655//
S01divyav_u:387.029_0: abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśumathāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:387.030_0: aṅgāraṃ vāpi varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//656//
S01divyav_u:388.004_0: gāyate hasate caiva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//659//
S01divyav_u:388.005_0: yaṃ kṛṣṇavasanā nārī ārdrā vā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:388.007_0: kṛṣṇasārpo yadi svapne hyabhirohati yaṃ naram/
S01divyav_u:388.010_0: svapnānte puruṣo yastu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//662//
S01divyav_u:388.015_0: pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:388.016_0: evamrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//665//
S01divyav_u:388.017_0: susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śuklavāsasam/
S01divyav_u:388.018_0: puruṣaṃ vātha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahatsukham/
S01divyav_u:388.019_0: tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣamatho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍham yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:388.020_0: gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravyakṣayo bhavet//667//
S01divyav_u:388.022_0: naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naram//668//
S01divyav_u:388.024_0: svapnānte yastu paśyeta strīlābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//669//
S01divyav_u:388.026_0: narastu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patim//670//
S01divyav_u:388.028_0: labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patim//671//
S01divyav_u:388.030_0: abhivandeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate 'cirāt//672//
S01divyav_u:389.004_0: labdhvā nārī tu svapnānte śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate//675//
S01divyav_u:389.006_0: svapne yā labhate nārī sāpi putraṃ prasūyate/
S01divyav_u:389.007_0: yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ cāpi yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate///676//
S01divyav_u:389.009_0: śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣamaraṇaṃ bhavet//677//
S01divyav_u:389.012_0: badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuśca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:389.014_0: devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
S01divyav_u:389.016_0: apakṛṣṭo rudan yo vā nagno 'tha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:389.018_0: carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vātha kilāṭakam/
S01divyav_u:389.019_0: svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu{jānī}yād dhruvaṃ vastrāgamo bhavet//682//
S01divyav_u:389.020_0: amānuṣo 'tha rājā vā devaḥ preto 'tha brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:389.021_0: svapne yathā te jalpante sa tathārtho bhaviṣyati//683//
S01divyav_u:389.025_0: viṣamaṃ vā tathādhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//685//
S01divyav_u:389.026_0: agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:389.027_0: gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//686//
S01divyav_u:389.028_0: nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ samedhaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:390.002_0: madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//689//
S01divyav_u:390.003_0: pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:390.005_0: svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:390.007_0: mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:390.008_0: gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//692//
S01divyav_u:390.010_0: vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:390.012_0: dhūmrā ghanā dundubhiśaṅkhaśabdo vāto 'bhravṛṣṭiśca tathā samantāt/
S01divyav_u:390.014_0: sarvasthirāṇāṃ ca calaśca yaḥ syādye cāntare doṣakṛtā vikārāḥ//694//
S01divyav_u:390.016_0: pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvadiṣṭā rājarṣayo devagaṇāśca sarve/
S01divyav_u:390.018_0: yad brāhmaṇa gātravikartanaṃ ca etāni sarvāṇyapi śobhanāni//695//
S01divyav_u:390.022_0: gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvijapūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnametena parājitaṃ syāt//696//
S01divyav_u:390.024_0: devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyastaṃ tu parāṃścārcayitum yatena/
S01divyav_u:390.026_0: svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsarānte 'sya vipākamāhuḥ//697//
S01divyav_u:390.028_0: ṣaṇmāsikam yacca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikam yattu bhavet tṛtīye/
S01divyav_u:391.006_0: atha khalu bho puṣkarasārinn aparamapi svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:391.010_0: nimittam yādṛśam yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ//700//
S01divyav_u:391.011_0: jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:391.012_0: na tu bhayaṃ bhavettasya jānīyādeva buddhimān//701//
