S01divyav_u:391.014_0: svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītirbhaviṣyati//702//
S01divyav_u:391.017_0: madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
S01divyav_u:391.023_0: sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:391.024_0: yastu pibati svapnānte sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//707//
S01divyav_u:391.027_0: upari kākā gṛdhrāśca dhāvantyupari yānti ca/
S01divyav_u:391.031_0: ekaśca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:392.003_0: vṛkṣaṃ parvatamāruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:392.005_0: yastu svapnāntare paśyet pitṛrn yāniha cānyathā/
S01divyav_u:392.006_0: tathā mātā pitā caiva tasya jīvanti te ciram//714//
S01divyav_u:392.009_0: anānaṃ codake dṛṣṭvā madhye 'gnau ca vidhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:393.007_0: suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:393.009_0: bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu cchedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:393.015_0: yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet, manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.016_0: yadi devo garjati, prathamaṃ mahāsasyāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:393.018_0: yadi caitre māse devo garjati, tadā sarvasasyamutpattiṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.018_1: yadi candragraho bhavati, mahān saṃnipāto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:393.019_1: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:393.021_0: yadi vaiśākhe māase devo garjati, subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.021_1: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candragraho bhavati, kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.022_0: yadi colkāpāto bhavati, yasmiṃśca janapade nipatati, tatra deśe pradhānapuruṣasya vināśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:393.024_0: yadi jyeṣṭhe māse devo garjati, rogaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.024_1: yadi sūryagraho bhavati, manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.025_0: pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiṃcinnimittaṃ lakṣyate, tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.026_0: yadi madhyarātrau candragraho bhavati, manuṣyāṇāmanyonyaghātaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.026_1: yadi copari nirghoṣo bhavati, adhyakṣapuruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati, paracakrāgamaṃ ceti//
S01divyav_u:393.028_0: āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūryagraho rucirābhāso bhavati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:393.029_1: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:393.031_0: śrāvaṇamāse yadi sūryagraho bhavati, rājyaṃ parivartate/
S01divyav_u:393.031_1: yadi candragraho bhavati, prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:393.032_1: yadi tārakā yatra deśe patanti, [394]tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.001_0: yadi cātiśayaṃ bhūmicālo bhavati, rogaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.001_1: yadi nirghoṣo bhavati, tatra gṛhe yo gṛhasvāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.002_0: atra ca māse 'bhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyam/
S01divyav_u:394.004_0: yadyāśvayuje māse devo garjati, manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.005_0: yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate, subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.006_2: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyantīti codayati//
S01divyav_u:394.008_0: yadi kārtike māse devo varṣati, mahadākulaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.009_0: yadyekāntarūpaṃ vāto vāti, tatra ca manuṣyā jalena vibhramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:394.010_0: yadi pūrve yāme utpāto bhavati, mahāvarṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:394.012_0: yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati, śasyavināśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:394.013_0: yadi cākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati, yatpūrvabhāgīyā manuṣyāsteṣāmāmayaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.013_1: yadi bhūmicālo bhavati, yastatra janapade pradhānapuruṣaḥ sa vadhānmokṣyati//
S01divyav_u:394.015_0: yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati, prathame janapadanāśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:394.016_0: prathame yāme ca yadi candroparāgo bhavati lohitavarṇaśca dṛśyate, udakāgamaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.018_0: yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante, tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.018_1: yadyākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati, manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:394.020_0: yadyatraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛśyate, sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/
S01divyav_u:394.020_1: yadi bhūmicālo bhavati, mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:394.024_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭakajñānaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:395.004_0: kṛkare svalpacelatvaṃ purīṣe tu kṛśaṃ śravaḥ//736//
S01divyav_u:395.013_0: amṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā odanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//740//
S01divyav_u:395.014_0: gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhiraśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:395.016_0: uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/
S01divyav_u:395.017_0: pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasyeha maraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//742//
S01divyav_u:395.018_0: kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpāgre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:395.019_0: kumbhasthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//743//
S01divyav_u:395.020_0: antarīkṣe praḍīnaṃ tu aphalaṃ tu vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:395.024_0: sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:395.028_0: tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyādyathā tasya tathā punaḥ//746//
S01divyav_u:395.029_0: kīṭā vātha pataṅgā vā bhayam yadiha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:396.001_0: [396]apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūryodaye brāhmaṇasaṃnidhau vā/
S01divyav_u:396.003_0: mukhyaprakāśe 'pyahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//748//
S01divyav_u:396.005_0: mātaṅgarājo matimāṃstriśaṅkaḥ provāca tattvaṃ khañjanaṃ ca śāstram/
S01divyav_u:396.007_0: snigdhe sarūkṣe viṣame same ca odeśayed doṣaguṇairyathoktaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:396.011_1: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriñ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:396.015_2: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:396.017_0: yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśetteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśāñ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:396.017_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet, śivā pūrvamukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśet, vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:396.018_0: caturo vārān yadi vāśet, atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:396.022_0: dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇamukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśet, 'atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:396.023_0: caturo vārān vāśati, dakṣiṇamukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priyasamāgamaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:396.027_0: paścimāyāṃ paścimābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati, maraṇaṃ nivadayati/
S01divyav_u:397.006_0: diśi vidiśi caiva giriprāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:397.010_1: na ca śṛgālabhaye śivā (vā)me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityam/
S01divyav_u:397.013_0: adhomukho yadi vāśati, nidhānaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.013_1: ūrdhvamukho yadi vāśati, varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.014_0: dvipathe yadi vāśati, pūrvamukhaṃ sthitvā arthalābhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.015_1: dvipathe pañcimābhimukho yadi vāśati, kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nviedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.016_0: kūpakaṇaṭhake yadi vāśati, arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.017_1: atimṛdukam yadi vāśati, vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.018_0: gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati, arthamanarthaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.019_0: tribhirvārairarthaṃ caturbhiranarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priyasamāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhirbhojanaṃ saptabhirbhayamaṣṭabhirvigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:397.021_1: nānāhāre yadi vāśati, mārge saṃsthitasyāpi sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:397.023_0: atha dakṣiṇamukhaṃ vāśati, yā arthasiddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.025_0: atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati, yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.025_1: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati, yadi dakṣiṇāmukhā eva diśaḥ karmasiddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.026_0: paścimato yadi vāśati, caurato 'hitamasya duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.027_0: atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati, mahāvyādhimanarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tannivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.028_0: glānasya yadi vāśati, dakṣiṇamukham, “na sa cikitsituṃ śakyo mṛtyudūtena coditah”/
S01divyav_u:397.029_0: glānasya yadi vāśati, uttaramukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhanalābhaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.030_0: atha mūrdhnā vāśati, yā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:397.030_1: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate, yamaśāsanam {nivedayati}/
S01divyav_u:397.031_0: nānāhāre yadi vāśati, yā saṃkṣobhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.001_0: [398]śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārgaprayātasya yadi vāśati, yā agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divyav_u:398.003_0: mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmenāgatya purato vāśati, yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divyav_u:398.004_1: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta “na tanmārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅkuvacanam yathā”/
S01divyav_u:398.005_0: purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataśca niṣīdati, sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/
S01divyav_u:398.006_1: śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate, 'bhayametīha' tenāpi bhayaṃ jānīyādvicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:398.007_0: senāyāmāvāhitāyāṃ śivā vāśati, paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.008_2: senāyāṃ vrajamānāyāṃ śivā āgacchedagrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.009_1: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchatyagrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.011_0: puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati, mārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.012_1: pūrveṇottareṇāpi śivā vāśati, kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.013_0: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati, yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:398.014_0: vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathaiva vidiśāsu ca/
S01divyav_u:398.016_0: adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅkuvacanam yathā//751//
S01divyav_u:398.017_0: madhusvarāṃ śivāṃ jñātvā kāle vele upasthite/
S01divyav_u:398.019_0: vyādhirupadravāśca, “sarvaṃ tu praśamam yānti triśaṅkuvacanam yathā”/
S01divyav_u:398.020_1: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati, sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:399.008_0: tṛtīya sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
S01divyav_u:399.018_0: dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:399.022_0: avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:399.024_0: divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strīsaṃjñako bhavet/
S01divyav_u:399.025_0: rātriḥ saṃdhyā samākhyātā bhāgairanyair na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:399.031_0: yasya syād yavakaścāpi cāpo vā svastikastathā/
S01divyav_u:399.032_0: taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyante dhanyāste puruṣā hyamī//766//
S01divyav_u:400.006_0: preṣkyante śākhayā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
S01divyav_u:400.007_0: kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiścāpi satkṛtaḥ//769//
S01divyav_u:400.008_0: vaiśyo 'tha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhanadhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:400.011_0: viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahustathā//771//
S01divyav_u:400.012_0: śyāmavarṇātha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
S01divyav_u:400.013_0: trilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:400.016_0: taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatim//773//
S01divyav_u:400.019_0: matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedistu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//774//
S01divyav_u:400.021_0: anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
S01divyav_u:400.023_0: same tvaśītirvarṣāṇi saptabhiryathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//775//
S01divyav_u:400.025_0: śarīravarṇaprabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇavihīnakāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:401.003_0: dvirapi ca {sa} bhavāntare mahātmā vipuladhanaśriya āha vastralābhaḥ//778//
S01divyav_u:401.005_0: dadati satatamunnatastu pāṇirbhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
S01divyav_u:401.019_0: iha hi bahudhano balena yuktaḥ sutanususaṃcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//782//
S01divyav_u:401.021_0: dhanamupanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛtajanitā jalavacca yā sudīrghā/
S01divyav_u:401.027_0: balipuruṣamapi tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā (?) ca viśīrṇavarṇalekhā//784//
S01divyav_u:401.029_0: apagataghṛtavarṇapāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:402.006_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:402.010_0: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva lābhālābhaṃ tathaiva ca//787//
S01divyav_u:402.013_0: devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namo namaḥ/
S01divyav_u:402.020_0: asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasam//782//
S01divyav_u:402.022_0: pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ//783//
S01divyav_u:402.026_0: vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanam//785//
S01divyav_u:402.029_0: śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:402.030_0: kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//787//
S01divyav_u:402.031_0: kṣīrivṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:402.032_0: krameṇa yugamātreṇa na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyate//788//
S01divyav_u:403.005_0: pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
S01divyav_u:403.007_0: rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vāpi yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:403.009_0: gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:403.010_0: kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//803//
S01divyav_u:403.011_0: tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayecca sadā khagaḥ/
S01divyav_u:403.013_0: sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:403.015_0: yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
S01divyav_u:403.021_0: vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:403.022_0: vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛhasvāminām//809//
S01divyav_u:403.023_0: śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:403.026_0: niṣaṇṇo vāśati kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvam//811//
S01divyav_u:403.027_0: āsane śayane vāpi sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:404.008_0: kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛhamāropayanti ca/
S01divyav_u:404.010_0: nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:404.011_0: nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//819//
S01divyav_u:404.012_0: grāmānte bhayamākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:404.016_0: yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:404.023_0: vakṣo vidhunvan vāyasaḥ sadyo vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet//825//
S01divyav_u:404.026_0: prakāre toraṇāgre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:404.027_0: abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//827//
S01divyav_u:404.029_0: vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra caiva vinirdiśet//828//
S01divyav_u:404.030_0: grāme vā nagare vāpi kurvate yatra maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:405.004_0: varṣati prathame māse paścāddevo na varṣati/
S01divyav_u:405.014_0: yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:405.016_0: skandhamūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:405.018_0: caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:405.021_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:405.024_0: mohendramatha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:405.025_0: dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryameva ca//839//
S01divyav_u:405.029_0: atha vai dhanamitraṃ ca paramaṃ mairameva ca//841//
S01divyav_u:406.006_0: vyāyamato jalaṃ caiva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//845//
S01divyav_u:406.008_0: anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktam yacca putrakṣayāvaham//846//
S01divyav_u:406.024_0: mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//854//
S01divyav_u:406.027_0: puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe 'pyaśubho bhavet/
S01divyav_u:406.028_0: śoke bhūtavikāraḥ syāt śoṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//856//
S01divyav_u:407.007_0: asure maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahudoṣatā//861//
S01divyav_u:407.011_0: mahendre muktapuṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//863//
S01divyav_u:407.012_0: āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ caiva priyaṅgavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:407.013_0: antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//864//
S01divyav_u:407.014_0: nandā pratipadā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
S01divyav_u:407.015_0: tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryātprājño hyevaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//865//
S01divyav_u:407.017_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:407.023_0: dvādaśaiva tu cittāste ye loke pracaranti vai//867//
S01divyav_u:407.024_0: tānahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
S01divyav_u:407.026_0: prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:407.027_0: tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ cāpi karkaṭaḥ//869//
S01divyav_u:407.028_0: pañcamaṃ cāpi siṃhastu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:407.029_0: tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikastu tathāṣṭamam//870//
S01divyav_u:407.030_0: dhanvī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:408.003_0: cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
S01divyav_u:408.005_0: navame cintyate dharmo daśame karmajaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:408.007_0: ete dvādaśa cittāstu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:408.009_0: āgatya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:408.012_0: yadi brūyāttadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//877//
S01divyav_u:408.013_0: kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lohaṃ caiva bhṛśaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:408.018_0: grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//880//
S01divyav_u:408.019_0: yadi śabdaśca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvastathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:408.020_0: īdṛśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:408.021_0: atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//881//
S01divyav_u:408.024_0: atha śabdo bhavettatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśāstu te/
S01divyav_u:408.027_0: atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//884//
S01divyav_u:408.029_0: kacchapaṃ spṛśate yastu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:408.031_0: ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaram/
S01divyav_u:409.002_0: hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yastu apatyaṃ tatra cintitam//887//
S01divyav_u:409.004_0: śastradravyaṃ ca yattasya brāhmaṇānāṃ kule sthitam//888//
S01divyav_u:409.005_0: atha śabdo bhavettatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:409.008_0: puruṣaḥ kaścidāgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:409.009_0: spṛśate cāpi pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//890//
S01divyav_u:409.011_0: atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyāste na saṃśayaḥ//891//
S01divyav_u:409.014_0: atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//892//
S01divyav_u:409.016_0: hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayet//893//
S01divyav_u:409.019_0: sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartaṃ ca kṛtaṃ hastagataṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:409.021_0: yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//895//
S01divyav_u:409.023_0: udaraṃ caiva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//896//
S01divyav_u:409.024_0: nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ cāpi dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:409.026_0: tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:409.029_0: ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyo dharmacintā ca cintitā//899//
S01divyav_u:409.030_0: tatra śabdāśca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:410.003_0: spṛśate jānunī caiva karmacintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:410.004_0: tatra śabdā bhavantīme śrotavyāśca na saṃśayaḥ//902//
S01divyav_u:410.005_0: bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:410.008_0: jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hyarthalābhaṃ vinirdiśet//904//
S01divyav_u:410.009_0: tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:410.011_0: etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:410.014_0: pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchaṃś cittaṃ cāpyanarthikam//907//
S01divyav_u:410.015_0: yastu taccintito hyartha āśā āgantukā ca yā/
S01divyav_u:410.018_0: atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//909//
S01divyav_u:410.020_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyālakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:410.024_0: ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam//910//
S01divyav_u:410.025_0: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:410.028_0: tadvijñaiḥ saha saṃgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstravit//912//
S01divyav_u:410.030_0: pāṇilekhāśca jaṅghe ca kaṭi nābhyūrumeva ca//913//
S01divyav_u:411.001_0: [411]oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃśca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:411.002_0: akṣibhruvau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃstathaiva ca//914//
S01divyav_u:411.003_0: romarājīṃ svaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gītameva ca/
S01divyav_u:411.011_0: dhanyān sā janayetputrāṃsteṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//918//
S01divyav_u:411.012_0: yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:411.014_0: ekaṃ sā janayetputraṃ taṃ ca rājānamādiśet//919//
S01divyav_u:411.022_0: subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahuprajā//923//
S01divyav_u:411.025_0: yasyāvartau samau snigdhau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
S01divyav_u:411.029_0: ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:411.030_0: raktānte vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//927//
S01divyav_u:412.005_0: kāntajihvā tu yā nārī raktoṣṭhī priyabhāṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:412.008_0: sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//932//
S01divyav_u:412.013_0: ūrdhvaprekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:412.020_0: trīṃśca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patim//938//
S01divyav_u:412.021_0: pārśvato romarājī tu vinatā ca kaṭirbhavet/
S01divyav_u:412.023_0: kākajaṅghā ca yā nārī raktākṣī ghargharasvarā/
S01divyav_u:412.024_0: niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭabāndhavā//940//
S01divyav_u:412.027_0: yā tu sarvasamācārā mṛdvaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:412.030_0: putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vāpi jāramicchati tādṛśī//943//
S01divyav_u:412.032_0: uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patim//944//
S01divyav_u:413.001_0: [413]yasyā hastau ca pādau ca cchidrau dantāntarāṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:413.002_0: patinopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//945//
S01divyav_u:413.005_0: yasyā kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate 'ṅguliḥ/
S01divyav_u:413.006_0: kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ tyaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyam//947//
S01divyav_u:413.008_0: na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//948//
S01divyav_u:413.011_0: āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā cānubandhati/
S01divyav_u:413.012_0: na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patim//950//
S01divyav_u:413.016_0: agnikārye 'pi sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//952//
S01divyav_u:413.018_0: pralamboṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciram//953//
S01divyav_u:413.021_0: na devikā na nadikā na ca daivatanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:413.023_0: nakṣatranāmā yā nārī yā ca gotrasanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:414.006_0: punarvasuśca dhanyā syātpuṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
S01divyav_u:414.008_0: phālgunīṣu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
S01divyav_u:414.010_0: svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priyadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:414.017_0: bharaṇī ca bhayākīrṇā cauragamyā ca sā bhavet//965//
S01divyav_u:414.019_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃl luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:414.022_0: kutrotpannā ime bījāh(?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:414.024_0: vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalam yojayetkatham/
S01divyav_u:414.026_0: śāradaṃ vātha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
S01divyav_u:414.027_0: nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
S01divyav_u:414.028_0: kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//968//
S01divyav_u:415.002_0: kati saubhikṣiko luṅgāḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:415.008_0: puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkurmātaṅgādhipatiridaṃ vacanamabravīt--
S01divyav_u:415.011_0: amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:415.013_0: tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi lokasukhāvahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:415.024_0: trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
S01divyav_u:415.031_0: grāmakṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛhadevatā/
S01divyav_u:416.002_0: vāraṇendraṃ vṛṣaṃ caiva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtam//984//
S01divyav_u:416.005_0: cakrārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kākārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīm/
S01divyav_u:416.009_0: ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaśca praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:416.010_0: vikṛtaṃ kubjakuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//988//
S01divyav_u:416.018_0: śrutvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca mandavṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:416.020_0: nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:416.021_0: svayameva tu tacchasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//993//
S01divyav_u:416.022_0: nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
S01divyav_u:416.023_0: bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānānna tacchakyaṃ tu vāpitum//994//
S01divyav_u:417.003_0: pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṃcayam/
S01divyav_u:417.004_0: suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1000//
S01divyav_u:417.005_0: haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasyāpahā api/
S01divyav_u:417.005_1: parasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//1001//
S01divyav_u:417.007_0: dṛṣṭvā tu saṃcayaṃ niṃne 'nāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1002//
S01divyav_u:417.008_0: yadā tu preṣitaṃ bījaṃ saptarātreṇa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:417.009_0: suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvaśasyeṣu saṃpadā//1003//
S01divyav_u:417.011_0: alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra jāyate//1004//
S01divyav_u:417.014_0: luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta nava tathā/
S01divyav_u:417.015_0: suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1006//
S01divyav_u:417.017_0: alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//1007//
S01divyav_u:417.018_0: luṅgasya yadi pādāstu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
S01divyav_u:417.021_0: yadā pūrvamukhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:417.022_0: yadā paścānmukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1009//
S01divyav_u:417.027_0: yadā nāgamukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kvacit/
S01divyav_u:418.002_0: dharmamarthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//1014//
S01divyav_u:418.005_0: kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāśca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:418.009_0: ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ caiva prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:418.010_0: kastatra sa muniśreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//1017//
S01divyav_u:418.011_0: daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:418.012_0: yajñaṃ ca yajñabhāgaṃ ca hotavyaśca yathā baliḥ//1018//
S01divyav_u:418.013_0: pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
S01divyav_u:418.014_0: deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devī sā kalpitā//1019//
S01divyav_u:418.016_0: karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivatam//1020//
S01divyav_u:418.021_0: tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//1022//
S01divyav_u:418.022_0: eṣa vyāpnoti cākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:418.027_0: virodhanaṃ tu vāyośca agneśca anilasya ca//1025//
S01divyav_u:418.032_0: yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaśca havirmeghaśca vartate//1027//
S01divyav_u:419.004_0: pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhāstathā/
S01divyav_u:419.009_0: dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
S01divyav_u:420.006_0: tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭisahasraśaḥ//1041//
S01divyav_u:420.010_0: tadāprabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//1043//
S01divyav_u:420.018_0: digbhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣāmarthaṃ dine dine//1047//
S01divyav_u:420.021_0: sadhūmaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakam/
S01divyav_u:420.026_0: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃs tithikarmanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:421.006_0: gṛhe kṣetre vivāhe vā āvāhakarmasu mitreti//1055//
S01divyav_u:421.007_0: bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte 'dhvani/
S01divyav_u:421.008_0: nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//1056//
S01divyav_u:421.018_0: vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛhakarmasu pūjitā//1061//
S01divyav_u:421.019_0: jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitām/
S01divyav_u:421.025_0: nandādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
S01divyav_u:421.028_0: api ca mahābrāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittamabhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi,
S01divyav_u:421.030_0: syātte brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:421.031_1: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:422.002_0: mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:422.004_0: syāttava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūt/
S01divyav_u:422.005_1: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūvam/
S01divyav_u:422.006_0: mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇavikā duhitā āsāditā bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:422.007_0: so 'haṃ tatra saṃraktacitta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:422.007_1: so 'hamātmānaṃ jugupsamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe--oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ/
S01divyav_u:422.010_0: so 'haṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi--sāmānyasaṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:422.011_1: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:422.013_0: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--
S01divyav_u:422.016_0: putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṃ dadāmi śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:422.018_0: śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtistu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1067//
S01divyav_u:422.020_0: tatra tāni pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni uccaiḥśabdāni procurmahāśabdāni--mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ rocaya/
S01divyav_u:422.021_0: nārhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartum//
S01divyav_u:422.023_0: atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokenaitānarthānabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:422.026_0: tattvaṃ hyavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyaṃ nityaṃ tathā dhruvam//1068//
S01divyav_u:422.027_0_0: atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya triśaṅkuṃ
S01divyav_u:422.027_0_1: mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhostriśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cātrumahābhaitiko mahāpuruṣaḥ
S01divyav_u:423.003_0: aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cāsya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:423.004_0: bhavāṃstu paramajño 'si tanme brūhi yathā tathā//1071//
S01divyav_u:423.005_0: iha bhostriśaṅko kimāha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
S01divyav_u:423.005_1: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:423.007_0: gacchanti sattvā bahugarbhayoniṃ na caiva kaścinmanujo hyayoniḥ/
S01divyav_u:423.009_0: samastajātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutājjāyate kaścideva//1072//
S01divyav_u:423.013_0: sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaśca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hyapasmāriṇo 'pi//1073//
S01divyav_u:423.015_0: kṛṣṇāśca gaurāśca tathaiva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hyanyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:423.017_0: sahāsthicarmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtrapurīṣayuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:423.019_0: na cendriyāṇāṃ praviviktirasti tasmānna varṇāścaturo bhavanti//1074//
S01divyav_u:423.021_0: mantrairhi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:423.025_0: māṇavakaśateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahāyaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo 'bravīt--brāhmaṇo 'sau mātaṅgarājo hi triśaṅkur nāma/
S01divyav_u:423.029_0: jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ sarveṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:424.001_0: [424]śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo 'si loke bhavān hi vidyācaraṇena yuktaḥ//1077//
S01divyav_u:424.003_0: dadāmi te 'haṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:424.005_0: śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiśca bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1078//
S01divyav_u:424.012_0: kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvāśrame 'sau nagaram yaśasvī/
S01divyav_u:424.014_0: dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadotsavāḍhyam//1080// iti/
S01divyav_u:424.016_0: syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūt? naivaṃ draṣṭavyam/
S01divyav_u:424.017_0: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:424.018_0: syādevaṃ ca bhikṣavo yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śādūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.019_1: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.021_0: syādevam yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.022_0: eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.023_0: nānyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.024_1: eṣā sā prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:424.025_0: sā etarhi tenaiva snehena tenaiva premṇā ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantamanugacchati tiṣṭhantamanutiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:424.026_0: yadyadeva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati, tatra tatraiva dvāre tūṣṇīmbhūtā asthāt//
S01divyav_u:424.028_0: atha khalu bhagavānetasminnidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:424.030_0: etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//1081//
S01divyav_u:425.003_0_0: drutameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ duḥkhasyāryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya nirodhasya nirodhagāminyāḥ
S01divyav_u:425.003_0_2: tīvracchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyenāpramādato
S01divyav_u:425.007_0: asmiṃśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭimātrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāani vimuktāni/
S01divyav_u:425.008_0: saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurudapādi viśuddham/
S01divyav_u:426.002_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñchrāvastyāṃ viahrati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham/
S01divyav_u:426.003_0: tatra {bhagavān} bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--saptagtriṃśatā bhikṣava ākāraiḥ paṇḍito dānaṃ dadāti/
S01divyav_u:426.022_0: tathāagatacaityeṣu tathāgatabimbeṣu ca sugandhodakasnānaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavipākapratilābhasaṃvartanīyam/
S01divyav_u:427.002_0: buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:427.003_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati tamate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:427.005_0: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:427.006_1: sā kathayati--kasmāttvaṃ brāhmaṇa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitah? sa kathayati--mamāpatyaṃ jātaṃ jātaṃ kālaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:427.008_1: sa kathayati--yadā tava patvyāḥ prasavakālaḥ syāt, tadā māṃ śabdāpayethā iti/
S01divyav_u:427.009_0: athāpareṇa samayena tasya patnyāḥ prasavakāle jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:427.011_0: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste 'nupradattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:427.012_1: yaṃ kaṃcit paśyasi brāhmaṇaṃ vā, sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dārakaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:427.013_0: astaṃ gate āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha/
S01divyav_u:427.016_0: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:427.017_0: te kathayanti--ciraṃ jīva, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitrormanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:427.018_0: sthavirasthvirā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti/
S01divyav_u:427.019_0: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:427.020_0: sthavirāḥ kathayanti--suciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:427.021_0: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati sma/
S01divyav_u:427.022_0: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:427.023_0: bhagavānāha--ciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:427.025_1: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā--jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati--jīvati/
S01divyav_u:427.026_1: te kathayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārako mahāpathe dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:427.027_1: mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:427.028_1_0: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ brāhmaṇikāyāmīryāyāṃ śauce samudācāre bhasmagrahe autkare
S01divyav_u:427.028_1_1: bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede 'tharvavede yajane yājane 'dhyayane 'dhyāpane
S01divyav_u:427.031_1: tasya bhūyaḥ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:428.001_2: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.002_0: sā dārikoktā--imaṃ tvaṃ dārakaṃ caturmahāpathe dhāraya/
S01divyav_u:428.003_0: yadi kaṃcitpaśyasi śramaṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā, sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:428.004_0: astaṃ gata āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha/
S01divyav_u:428.005_1: sā dārikā alasajātīyā taṃ dārakamādāya panthalikāyāṃ sthitā/
S01divyav_u:428.006_1: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:428.008_0: te kathayanti--ciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:428.009_2: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā--jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati--jīvatīti/
S01divyav_u:428.010_0: te kathayanti--kutra tvayaiṣa dhāritah? sā kathayati--amuṣyāṃ panthalikāyām/
S01divyav_u:428.011_0: te kathayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārakaḥ panthalikāyāṃ dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.012_1: panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttiḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.014_0: atha tasyācāryaḥ kathayati--brāhmaṇa, mayā prabhūtadārakāḥ pāṭhayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.015_1: mahāpanthakasyālpamucyate prabhūtaṃ gṛhṇāti, asya tu panthakasya sītyukte dhamiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:428.016_0: brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarve brāhmaṇā lipyakṣarakuśalā bhavanti, vedabrāhmaṇa eṣa bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:428.017_1: tasya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:428.019_1: asya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:428.020_0: brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na sarve brāhmaṇā vedapāragā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:428.021_1: sa yatra kvacinnimantritako gacchati, tameva panthakamādāya gacchati/
S01divyav_u:428.022_0: atha tena samayena sa brāhmaṇo glānībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.023_0: sa tena mahāpanthaka uktah--putra, tvaṃ mamātyayādaśocyo 'si/
S01divyav_u:428.024_0: api tu tvayā panthakasya yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:428.027_1: te taṃ nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā satkāreṇa śmaśāne dhmāpayitvā śokavinodaṃ kṛtvā avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.029_0: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:428.030_0: śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:428.031_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:428.032_0: mahāpanthako 'pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle [429]pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:429.001_0: tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.002_1: ka eṣa mahājanakāyo nirgacchati? te tasya kathayanti--upādhyāya,
S01divyav_u:429.002_2: bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau,
S01divyav_u:429.004_0: kiṃ nu tau draṣṭavyau? yatredānīṃ tadagraṃ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:429.006_2: yadyupādhyāyasteṣāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇuyāt, sthānametadvidyate yadupādhyāyasyāpi rocate/
S01divyav_u:429.007_0: ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti, te kadācinnagarāvalokanayā gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:429.009_1: apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.011_1: tena tasya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇa saṃprakāśitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.014_2: tena tasya dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nulomapratilomo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.019_2: sa tena janapadaṃ nītvā pravrajitah upasampāditaḥ, uktaśca/
S01divyav_u:429.021_0: tena divā uddiśatā yoniśo bhāvayatā trīṇi piṭakāni,
S01divyav_u:429.021_1: rātrau cintayatā tulayatā upaparīkṣamāṇena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:429.022_0: arhan saṃvṛttastraidhatukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāḍbhukhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.026_0: yadā panthakasya bhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:429.028_0: athāyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.029_1: śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:429.031_2: sa pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kutreṣu mahājanakāyo gacchati? te kathayanti--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu [430]janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.002_0: panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--eṣāmasau na bhrātā na jñātiḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.002_2: ahaṃ kasmāttaṃ na darśanāyopasaṃkrāmāmi? so 'pi taddarśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.003_1: katham yāpayasi? kṛcchreṇa yāpayāmi? kiṃ na pravrajasi? sa kathayati--ahaṃ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.005_0: ko māṃ pravrājayiṣyatīti? āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--santyasya kānicitkuśalamūlāni? santi/
S01divyav_u:430.006_0: kenāyaṃ na yogyah? āgaccha, ahaṃ tvāṃ pravrājayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:430.008_0: pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:430.010_0: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//1//
S01divyav_u:430.012_0: tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:430.012_1: anyeṣāṃ gopālakānāṃ paśupālakānāṃ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:430.013_2: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dvau śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃnipātau bhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:430.015_2: te tāṃstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:430.018_0: āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:430.020_0: tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ,
S01divyav_u:430.022_0: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
S01divyav_u:430.024_2: na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā,
S01divyav_u:430.024_3: kimahaṃ svādhyāyinikām yāceyamiti? te kathayanti--nanūktaṃ bhagavatā--asvādhyāyamānā mattā iti/
S01divyav_u:430.026_0: kiṃ tavāsvādhyāyamānasya gāthā anupravṛttā bhaviṣyati? gaccha, yācāhi/
S01divyav_u:430.027_0: sa gatvā kathayati--upādhyāya, svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvanme dehi/
S01divyav_u:430.028_0: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimasyedaṃ svaṃ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah? sa paśyati--yāvatprayuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.029_0: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ nvayamutsahanāvineya āhosvidavasāadanāvineyah? sa paśyati--yāvadavasādanāvineyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.031_0: sa tena grīvāayāṃ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:430.032_0: kiṃ tvamasmiñ śāsane kariṣyasi? sa roditumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:431.001_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat--kasmāttvaṃ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:431.001_2: aśrūṇi vartayasi? ahamasmi bhadanta upādhyāyena niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:431.004_0: bhagavānāha--nedaṃ vatsa maunīndraṃ vacanaṃ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam,
S01divyav_u:431.004_1: api tu mayedaṃ maunīndraṃ pravacanaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:431.006_0: na śakyasi tvaṃ tathāgatasyāntikātpaṭhitum? ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:431.009_0: yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ/
S01divyav_u:431.010_0: bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate//2//
S01divyav_u:431.011_0: asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṃ vācayiṣyanti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate/
S01divyav_u:431.012_0: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--imaṃ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam/
S01divyav_u:431.015_1: bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte--rajo harāmi, malaṃ harāmīti/
S01divyav_u:431.023_0: athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat--bhagavānevamāha--rajo harāmi,
S01divyav_u:431.024_0: kiṃ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṃ rajaḥ saṃdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam? tasyaivaṃ cintayatastasyāṃ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh--
S01divyav_u:431.026_0: rajo 'tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:431.028_0: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//3//
S01divyav_u:431.030_0: rajo 'tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.001_0: [432]etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//4//
S01divyav_u:432.003_0: rajo 'tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.005_0: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane//5//
S01divyav_u:432.008_0: arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.011_1: sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah--āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvatkuru, tataḥ paścāddhyāyiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:432.012_0: athāyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, gajabhujasadṛśo bāhurutsṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.013_0: āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṃ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.014_0: sa kathayati--āyuṣman panthaka, evaṃ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ//
S01divyav_u:432.017_0: śramaṇo gautama evamāha--gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ,
S01divyav_u:432.018_0: atredānīṃ kiṃ gambhīro 'sya, yasyedānīṃ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti/
S01divyav_u:432.020_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:432.022_0: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.023_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakamidamavocat--śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha--bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:432.024_0_0: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṃ bhagavān
S01divyav_u:432.024_0_1: bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati? mamaiva guṇodbhāvanā kartavyeti śāsturmanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:432.027_0: tā bhikṣūn pṛcchanti--bhagavatā ko 'smākamavavādaka ājñaptah? te kathayanti--āyuṣmān panthakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.028_0: tāḥ kathayanti--bhaginyaḥ, paśyata kathaṃ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:432.028_1: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:432.031_0: kimāryo mahāpanthakah? na hyayam, sa tvanyaścūḍāpanthakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.001_0: [433]bhaginyaḥ paśyata, kathaṃ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtah? yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā,
S01divyav_u:433.004_0: ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṃ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:433.006_0: yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro 'lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum/
S01divyav_u:433.007_0: tāsāṃ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptam,
S01divyav_u:433.007_1: ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṃ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:433.010_0: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:433.011_0: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:433.012_0: athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṃghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.013_0: anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi--kāni ca kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:433.014_0: adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:433.015_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ pṛcchati--kataro 'tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah? kiṃ puraḥśramaṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:433.017_1: sāpi na pravṛttā, sa kiṃ bhikṣuṇīravavadiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:433.019_0: apare kathayanti--tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.020_0: āyuṣmatā panthakena siṃhāsanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prajñaptakaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih? paśyati--yāvat viheṭhanābhiprayābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.020_1: dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih? paśyati--yāvat viheṭhanābhiprāyābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.022_0: āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya taṃ siṃhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:433.023_1: sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.024_0: athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane 'ntarhitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:433.024_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:433.026_0: niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate--mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā/
S01divyav_u:433.029_0: pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:433.031_0: riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//6//iti/
S01divyav_u:434.002_1: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:434.002_3: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittānyutpāditāni/
S01divyav_u:434.005_0: yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṃnādharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:434.006_0: athāyuṣmān panthakastāṃ pariṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.007_1: te saṃlakṣayanti--adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:434.008_0: te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ saṃmukhamapriyaṃ praṣṭum/
S01divyav_u:434.009_0: āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṃ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah? āyuṣmatā na kaścit aprasāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.010_0: bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartitam,
S01divyav_u:434.011_0: yāvadgāthārthaṃ na vibhajati, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ praṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni//
S01divyav_u:434.013_0: tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.014_0: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.015_0: bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.018_0: sa tayā sardhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:434.018_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.021_0: yadā tāsāṃ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti, tadā tāḥ parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayanti/
S01divyav_u:434.022_1: sa jānāti--ayaṃ mama putrasya śabdaḥ, ayaṃ parapuruṣayeti/
S01divyav_u:434.023_0: sa puruṣāṇāṃ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati.
S01divyav_u:434.026_0: taistā uktāh--kiṃ kāraṇam yūyaṃ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṃ kāñjikacchiṭiṃ cānuprayacchata? tāḥ kathayanti--tasya puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni,
S01divyav_u:434.026_1: asyārthe piparīkāyāṃ ta:ḍulāḥ prakṣiptā bhavanti, cakaṭyodanaṃ parivartate, dadhi prakṣiptaṃ kāñjikaṃ parivartate/
S01divyav_u:434.028_0: te kathayanti--kimetadevaṃ bhaviṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti--vayam yuṣmākaṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:434.030_0: tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah--śakṣyasi tvaṃ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum? sa kathayati--śakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:434.031_1: tābhirekasyāṃ sthālyāṃ cakaṭitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyāyāṃ kāñjikam/
S01divyav_u:434.032_0: tābhiḥ svāmināṃ purastādekasya [435]sthālyāṃ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṃ dadhi/
S01divyav_u:435.003_0: tābhisteṣāṃ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam/
S01divyav_u:435.004_0: tata evaṃ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam/
S01divyav_u:435.004_1: te tasya kathayanti--tāta, tava puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni/
S01divyav_u:435.005_1: dvitīyasyāṃ dadhi, taccakaṭyodanaṃ kāñjikaṃ ca parivṛttam/
S01divyav_u:435.007_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni? tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṃ mahānasaṃ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṃspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe/
S01divyav_u:435.009_0: tena etṣāṃ putrāṇāmāgatānāṃ te pradarśite--paśyata, mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni/
S01divyav_u:435.010_0: gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṃ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī/
S01divyav_u:435.010_1: putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṃ tvakamukhamasmākaṃ mandabhāgyānām/
S01divyav_u:435.013_0: tāḥ pṛcchanti--asti sarpa iti? sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti? tāḥ kathayanti--mṛtakam/
S01divyav_u:435.014_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--kemetā mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti? nūnametā etaṃ vṛddhaṃ mārayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:435.015_0: dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ saṃkrāmati--śirasi pucche ca/
S01divyav_u:435.016_0: tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:435.017_1: hilimāṃ joma pāsyasi? sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti? nūnaṃ kiṃcit abhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:435.019_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--pibāmi, yathā ca tathā marāmi/
S01divyav_u:435.021_2: tāḥ kathayanti--tāta, bhūyaḥ pāsyasi? sa kathayati--pāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:435.023_1: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
S01divyav_u:435.024_0: tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:435.025_1: kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi? paśyāmyahamidānīmiti/
S01divyav_u:435.027_1: yo 'sau brāhmaṇaḥ, eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:435.028_0: yāstāstasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ, etā eva tā dvādaśavargīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:435.029_0: etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
S01divyav_u:435.030_0_0: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ
S01divyav_u:435.030_0_1: parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe
S01divyav_u:435.032_0: bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.001_0: [436]bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.002_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
S01divyav_u:436.004_1: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:436.006_0: tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.006_1: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ kuryāḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.008_1: tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā) pālito vardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.009_0: sa mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kimasmākaṃ pitā pitāmahāśca karmākārṣuh? sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti,
S01divyav_u:436.011_0: śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.012_0: sa kathayati--kārṣāpaṇān mamānuprayaccha, yairihaiva vāṇijyaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:436.013_0: mātā kathayati--kuto mama kārṣāpaṇāh? tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.014_0: kuto me kārṣāpaṇānāṃ vibhavah? api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:436.015_0: asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
S01divyav_u:436.017_1: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum/
S01divyav_u:436.018_0: sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:436.023_1: tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
S01divyav_u:436.025_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadyetān bhakṣayiṣyāmi, mūlameva bbhikṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:436.026_0: sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti,
S01divyav_u:436.029_1: tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
S01divyav_u:436.030_1: bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:436.031_0: tvamidānīṃ gacchan kiyatā āgamiṣyasi? taistasyaikaikaṃ kāṣṭhamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:436.032_2: sa tāṃ vikrīya [437]kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṃ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:437.002_0: te kāṣṭhahārakāstathaiva tena kalāyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ, śītalena pānīyena saṃtarpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:437.002_2: divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
S01divyav_u:437.004_2: sa teṣāṃ kathayati--mātula, mā yūyaṃ kāṣṭhabhārān vīrthāṃ nayatha/
S01divyav_u:437.010_1: tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:437.012_2: sa saṃlakṣayati--etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṃ ca tadvāṇijyānāṃ pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:437.013_1: tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:437.014_0: te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, sarve vayamanena mūṣikāhairaṇyakenābhibhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:437.015_0: vayamenaṃ mānaṃ prāhayāmaḥ, yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:437.016_0: te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:437.016_3: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:437.019_0: eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayatīti/
S01divyav_u:437.020_0: śrutvā sa kathayati--kiṃ kathayata? te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:437.021_1: hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayasi? sa gṛhaṃ gatvā mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba,
S01divyav_u:437.021_2: satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan? sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnamanena kiṃcitkutaścit śrutaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:437.026_1: tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum,
S01divyav_u:437.028_1: atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:437.031_1: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṃ mahāsamudrasya varṇam/
S01divyav_u:438.002_0: yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:438.002_1: mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
S01divyav_u:438.006_1: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimidānīṃ vakṣyāmi avatarateti? sa karṇadhārasya kathayati--ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:438.008_0: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:438.009_1: tadyadhā timibhayaṃ timiṃgalabhayaṃ timitimiṃgalabhayamāvartabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:438.011_0: caurā apyatrāgavvhanti nīlaiḥ sitairvanacāriṇaḥ, asmākaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:438.012_0: yena yuṣmākaṃ priyamātmānaṃ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṃ mahāsamudramavataratu/
S01divyav_u:438.014_0: tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṃ vastrāṃ muñcati,
S01divyav_u:438.014_1: dvitrivastrāṃ muñjati, yatastadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasaṃdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṃ mahāmegha iva saṃprasthito 'nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam/
S01divyav_u:438.016_0: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ,
S01divyav_u:438.019_0: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:438.020_0: tāḥ puruṣaṃ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante/
S01divyav_u:438.021_0: tāni yaḥ paribhuṅkte, sa saptarātraṃ mūrcchitastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:438.023_0: saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṃ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:438.024_0: yaṃ śrutvā te vaṇijo 'vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:438.027_0: sa kathayati--agradhanikaṃ tāvacchinadbhi, tataḥ paścānniveśaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:438.028_0: sa tathā uktah--putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:438.030_0: tena suvarṇasya phelāṃ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:438.031_0_0: sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati--paśyata bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ
S01divyav_u:438.031_0_1: kathaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā sarvaṃ tat suvarṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:439.002_1: sa praviśya kathayati--idaṃ te mūlam, ayaṃ lābhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:439.005_1: tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:439.006_0: tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā//
S01divyav_u:439.007_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau śreṣṭhī, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:439.007_1: yo 'sau mūṣikāhairaṇyakaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:439.009_0: etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:439.011_0_0: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya
S01divyav_u:439.011_0_1: karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah? panthakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ
S01divyav_u:439.012_0: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:439.012_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:439.016_0: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
S01divyav_u:439.017_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śastā loka utpannastathāgato
S01divyav_u:439.017_0_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:439.019_0: sa viṃśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma/
S01divyav_u:439.020_1: anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo/
S01divyav_u:439.024_0: tatra tatra praghātya neṣyāmi, yatra yatra krāyiko 'sti/
S01divyav_u:439.025_0: sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:439.028_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvadayaṃ mṛtah āhosvijjīvatīti? paśyati yāvajjīvati/
S01divyav_u:439.028_1: sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ shalaṃ kṛtvā tatrāvamūrdhakaḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:439.030_3: sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi pratyekabuddhaśatāni/
S01divyav_u:439.031_0: sa teṣāṃ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.001_0: tadā so 'pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṃ buddhcā dhyāyati/
S01divyav_u:440.003_1: yo 'sau kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane bhikṣastripiṭah āsīt,
S01divyav_u:440.004_0: yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā,
S01divyav_u:440.004_2: tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.007_0: yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:440.007_1: jīvakena śrutam--panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti/
S01divyav_u:440.008_1: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:440.009_0: bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastīṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.011_1: aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah--bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:440.013_0: apasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.013_1: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:440.015_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:440.015_1_0: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:440.015_1_1: praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ
S01divyav_u:440.018_0: sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṃ vaktuṃ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:440.018_1: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.020_0: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.021_0_1: ānanda jānīyāh--mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ
S01divyav_u:440.023_0: yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhirbhavati/
S01divyav_u:440.023_1: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.025_0: athāyuṣmānānando 'ciraprakrāntaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ viditvā yenāyuṣmān pathakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:440.028_1_0: sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:440.028_1_1: kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye
S01divyav_u:440.028_2: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:440.031_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:441.002_0: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:441.003_1: jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan vāridhārāṃ na pratigṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:441.006_0: jīvakaḥ kathayati--bhagavan, nāsau mayā nimantrita iti/
S01divyav_u:441.006_1: bhagavānāha--na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho nimantritah? bhagavan, nimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:441.007_0: kimasau bhikṣusaṃghādbahir na vā? bhagavān kathayati jīvakam--gaccha tvaṃ śabdāpaya/
S01divyav_u:441.008_0: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:441.010_1: tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:441.011_1: sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati--tathaiva veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrṇastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:441.012_0: bhagavānāha--gaccha tvaṃ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:441.013_0: sa gatvā kathayati--yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:441.014_0: āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṃ gatyāṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:441.015_1: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:441.017_0: dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante,
S01divyav_u:441.018_0: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante? mayā atra guṇodbhāvanā kartavyā/
S01divyav_u:441.020_0: āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṃ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:441.023_1: sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati,
S01divyav_u:441.025_0: nityaṃ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṃ sugandhayutpalaṃ nityaṃ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṃ vaiḍūryaśuddham/
S01divyav_u:441.027_0: nityaṃ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṃ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṃ nityaṃ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām/
S01divyav_u:441.030_1: yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:442.003_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:442.004_1: sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te 'śvā na bhūyo heṣante/
S01divyav_u:442.005_0: sārthavahaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ ca mamāśvānāṃ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante? apareṇa samayenāśvā vaḍavā prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:442.007_0: sa yameva divasamupādāya te 'śvāḥ saṃcartumapi nārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:442.007_1: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṃ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:442.010_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi gamiṣyāmi, aśvānāṃ khurāḥ kledaṃ gamiṣyanti, apaṇyoobhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:442.011_1: sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṃ kurvānti/
S01divyav_u:442.015_2: sa tasya kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, aticireṇa tvamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:442.017_1: sa kathayati--api tvayamekaḥ kiśorastiṣṭhati, yadi prayo 'si, gṛhītvā gaccha/
S01divyav_u:442.020_2: sa patnyā uktah--asti kiṃcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham/
S01divyav_u:442.023_0: sa pakkamānānāṃ bhāṇḍānāṃ madhye parisarpanna kiṃcidbhāṇḍaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:442.027_1: tena kumbhakāreṇa patnī uktā--bhadre, śobhanaḥ kiśorakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:442.028_0: na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:442.030_0: tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:443.001_1: sa teṣāṃ karapratyāyān nānuprayacchati, nāpi taṃ sa udyānaṃ samāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.002_1: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam--uttarāpathāt sārthavāho 'śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:443.006_2: sārthavāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti--bhavanto 'śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.007_1: sārthavāhamupasaṃkramya pṛcchanti--asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti? sa kathayati--nāsti kaścidvikrītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.008_0: api tvasti mayā pūjitake 'dhiṣṭhāne 'maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti/
S01divyav_u:443.011_1: upasaṃkramya kathayanti--kimanena kiśorakena karoṣi? sa āha--eṣa mama mṛttikāṃ vahati/
S01divyav_u:443.012_0: te kathayati--vayaṃ te tathā gardabhamanuprayacchāmaḥ, tvamasmākamamumanuprayacchasva/
S01divyav_u:443.014_1: te kathayanti--evaṃ cet saṃpradhāraya vayaṃ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.015_1: sa kiśorakaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ nānuprayacchasi? kiṃ tvaṃ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṃ bhakṣitavyam/
S01divyav_u:443.017_0: mayā rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāḍhavyaḥ, sauvarṇasthāle madhumrākṣitakā mūlakā bhakṣitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.018_1: vaktavyāh--kiṃ lajjadhvaṃ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? śvaḥ punarāgatvā te kathayiṣyanti mūlyenānuprayaccheti/
S01divyav_u:443.020_0: vaktavyāh--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati/
S01divyav_u:443.021_1: saṃpradhāritaṃ tvayā? saṃpradhāritam--kiṃ lajjadhvaṃ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? te kathayanti--mūrkhaḥ sa eṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:443.024_1: sa kathayati--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayaccḥ, yāvadvā suvarṇalakṣaṃ dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:443.026_1: tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭaṃ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate/
S01divyav_u:443.027_0: rājñāpi saṃdiṣṭam--yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta/
S01divyav_u:443.029_1: kiṃ sarogo bhavadbhiraśvājāneya ānītah? api tu samanuyuñjyāmahe tāvadenam/
S01divyav_u:443.032_0: smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṃ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ/
S01divyav_u:444.003_0: na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī/
S01divyav_u:444.005_0: hyavasanamidaṃ tṛṣāpanītaṃ na carasi kiṃ vada me 'dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:444.011_0: tvamiha vidhihitapradābhimānī na ca vihito bhavato yathāvadasmi/
S01divyav_u:444.013_0: nidhanamahamiha prayāyamāśu na ca biduṣāya taraya pūrvyām//12//
S01divyav_u:444.015_0: suciramapi hi na sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi saumya nāvamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:444.017_0: kṣaṇamāpi khalu sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi nāvamānaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:444.019_0: sūto rājñaḥ kathayati--devasyānupūrvī na kṛtā yanaiṣa yavasayogyāśanaṃ na gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:444.022_1: sa tasya śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ mūrdhni dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:444.022_2: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇena maṇivyajanena makṣikān vārayati/
S01divyav_u:444.023_0: rājño 'gramahiṣī sauvargasthāle madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:444.024_1: rājā kathayati--eṣa nāma rājā, nāhaṃ sa rājeti/
S01divyav_u:444.025_0: sūtaḥ kathayati--deva, nāsya sarvakālameṣa upacāraḥ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:444.026_1: rājā kathayati--yattāvadatītaṃ na śakyaṃ tatpunaḥ kartum, yadavaśiṣṭaṃ tatkriyatām/
S01divyav_u:444.027_1: tasya rājño jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ śataśalākāṃ dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:444.027_2: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇamaṇimayavālavyajanena makṣikān vārayati,
S01divyav_u:444.027_3: rājño 'gramāhiṣī sauvarṇena sthālena madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:444.030_1: sasṛtaparamasugandhivilepanānudhārī madhuramadhurakṛtāntarānurāgā nṛpamahiṣī turagottamāya dattā rājñā/
S01divyav_u:444.031_1: rājā sūtaṃ pṛcchati--rājā asya pṛṣṭhaṃ duḥkhayati/
S01divyav_u:445.002_1: rājā sūtaṃ pṛcchati--eṣo bibheti? deva, naiṣa bibheti/
S01divyav_u:445.002_2: api tu mā rājānaṃ pucchodakena sekṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:445.004_1: sāmantarājaiḥ śrutam--yathā rājā brahmadatta udyānaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:445.005_1: rājñā brahmadattena śrutaṃ sāmantarājair nagaradvārāṇi nigṛhītānīti/
S01divyav_u:445.006_1: antarā ca vārāṇasyantarā codyānamatrāntarā brahmavatī nāma puṣkiriṇyutpalakuṃdapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā/
S01divyav_u:445.010_0: kimasyopārdharājyena? api tvenamāgamya saptāhaṃ dānāni dīyantām,
S01divyav_u:445.013_0: tataḥ kumbhakārasya sakāśāt suvarṇalakṣeṇāśvājāneyaṃ gṛhītvā ihānītam/
S01divyav_u:445.014_1: tamāgamya saptāhaṃ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kriyante, akālakaumudī ca prasthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:445.015_1: sa eṣa kiśorako 'śvājāneyaḥ syāt? tattāvadgatvā paśyāmi/
S01divyav_u:445.017_2: kiṃ tvayā teṣāmaśvānāṃ sakāśāllabdham? mayaikākinaiva tasya kumbhakārasya suvarṇalakṣaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:445.020_0: kiṃ manyadhve bḥkṣavo yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva jīvakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:445.021_0: yo 'śvājāneyaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:445.021_1: tadāpi yadā asyaiṣa guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadāsyāsatkāraṃ prayuktavān/
S01divyav_u:445.022_0: yadā tu guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpitavān/
S01divyav_u:445.023_0: etarhyapyeṣa yadā guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadā asatkāraṃ prayuktavān/
S01divyav_u:445.023_1: yadā guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamapayati//
S01divyav_u:446.002_0: buddho bhagavān kuruṣu janapadacārikāṃ carat kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:446.002_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kalmāṣadamye mākandiko nāma parivrājakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:446.004_0: tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:446.004_1: tasyā asthīni sūkṣmāṇi susūkṣmāṇi, na śakyata upamā kartum/
S01divyav_u:446.005_0_0: tasyāstrīṇi saptāhānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa jātimahī saṃvṛttā yāvajjātamahaṃ
S01divyav_u:446.005_0_1: kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti? jñātaya ūcuh--iyaṃ
S01divyav_u:446.008_0: tasyā asthīni sūkṣmāṇi susūkṣmāṇi, na śakyate upamā kartum/
S01divyav_u:446.009_2: mākandikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--iyaṃ dārikā na mayā kasyacit kulena dātavyā na dhanena nāpi śrutena,
S01divyav_u:446.009_3: kiṃ tu yo 'syā rūpeṇa samo vāpyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:446.012_0: atrāntare bhagavān kuruṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:446.013_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:446.014_0: kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:446.015_0: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣāmya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā/
S01divyav_u:446.016_0: tena khalu samayena mākandikaḥ parivrajakaḥ puṣpasamidhasyārthe nirgato 'bhut/
S01divyav_u:446.017_0_0: adrākṣīnmākandikaḥ parivrājako bhagavantaṃ dūradevānyataravṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:446.017_0_1: paryaṅka baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ dūrādevānyataravṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīlṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:446.017_0_2: paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ prāsādikaṃ pradarśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa
S01divyav_u:446.020_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo 'yaṃ śramaṇaḥ prāsādikaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ sakalajanamanohārī,
S01divyav_u:446.020_2: durlabhastu sarvastrījanasya patiḥ pratirūpaḥ prāgeva anupamāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:446.022_2: upasaṃkramya patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhadre jānīyāh--labdho me duhiturjāmātā/
S01divyav_u:446.024_0: sā kathyati--kasya prayacchasīti? sa kathayati--śramaṇasya gautamasyeti/
S01divyav_u:446.027_0: dṛṣṭo mayā vipra sa piṇḍahetoḥ kalmāṣadamye vicaranmaharṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:446.029_0: bhūratnabhā santi tasya pragacchato 'tyunnamate na caiva(?)//1//
S01divyav_u:447.003_0: saceddruta samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇyeṣu raṃsyate//2// iti/
S01divyav_u:447.006_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhavati jānīyāh--eṣa te duhitustṛṇasaṃstaraka iti/
S01divyav_u:447.009_0: raktasya śayyā bhavatativikopitā dviṣṭasya śayyā sahasā nipīḍitā/
S01divyav_u:447.011_0: sūḍhasya śayyā khalu pādato gatā suvītarāgeṇa nisevitā nviyam/
S01divyav_u:447.013_0: nāsau bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nirvata, yāsyāmaḥ svaṃ niveśanam//3//
S01divyav_u:447.015_0: amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalyakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:447.017_0: sāceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//4//
S01divyav_u:447.019_1: bhagavataḥ padāni dṛṣṭvā punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--imāni te bhavanti bhadre duhiturjāmātuḥ padāni/
S01divyav_u:447.021_0: raktasya puṃsaḥ padamutpaṭaṃ syānnipīḍitaṃ dveṣavataḥ padaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:447.023_0: padaṃ hi mūḍhasya visṛṣṭadehaṃ suvītarāgasya padaṃ tvihedṛśam/
S01divyav_u:447.029_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa te bhavati huhiturjāmāturutkāśanaśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:447.031_0: rakto naro bhavati hi gadadasvaro dviṣṭo naro bhavati hi khakkhaṭāsvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:448.001_0: [448]mūḍho naro hi bhavati samākulasvaro buddho hyayaṃ brāhmaṇadundubhisvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:448.003_0: nāsau bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//3//
S01divyav_u:448.007_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate sma--eṣa te bhavati duhiturjāmātā nirīkṣata iti/
S01divyav_u:448.009_0: rakto naro bhavati hi cañcalekṣaṇo dviṣṭo bhujagaghoraviṣo yathekṣate/
S01divyav_u:448.011_0: mūḍo naraḥ saṃtamasīva paśyati dvijavītarāgo yugamātradarśī/
S01divyav_u:448.013_0: na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//7//
S01divyav_u:448.017_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa duhiturjāmātā caṃkramyata iti/
S01divyav_u:448.018_0: yathāsya tetre ca yathāvalekitam yathāsya kāle sthita eva gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:448.020_0: yathaiva padmaṃ stimite jale 'sya netraṃ viśiṣṭe vadane virājate/
S01divyav_u:448.022_0: na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//8//
S01divyav_u:448.024_0: amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:448.026_0: saceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyayaṃ kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//9//
S01divyav_u:448.030_0: dharmo munīnāṃ hi sanātano hyayamapatyamutpāditavān sanātanaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:449.003_0: imāṃ bhagavān paśyatu me sūtāṃ satīṃ rūpopapannāṃ pramadāmalaṃkṛtām/
S01divyav_u:449.005_0: kāmārthinīm yadbhavate pradīyate sahānayā sādhurivācaratāṃ bhavān/
S01divyav_u:449.008_1: sthānametadvidyate yadanupamā rāgeṇa svinnā kālaṃ kurvāṇā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:449.009_0: tattasyāḥ pratighavacanaṃ brūyāmiti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:449.011_0: dṛṣṭā mayā mārasutā hi vipra tṛṣṇā na me nāpi tathā ratiśca/
S01divyav_u:449.014_0: tasmādimāṃ mūtrapurīṣapūrṇāṃ praṣṭuṃ hi yattāmapi notsaheyam//12//
S01divyav_u:449.017_0: sutāmimāṃ paśyasi kiṃ madīyāṃ hīnāṅginīṃ rūpaguṇairviyuktām/
S01divyav_u:449.019_0: chandaṃ na yenātra karoṣi cārau viviktabhāveṣviva kāmabhogī//13// iti/
S01divyav_u:449.022_0: yasmādihārthī viṣayeṣu mūṭaḥ sa prārthayedvipra sutāṃ tavemām/
S01divyav_u:449.026_0: ahaṃ tu buddho munisattamaḥ kṛtī prāptā mayā bodhiranuttarā śivā/
S01divyav_u:449.028_0: padmam yathā vārikaṇairaliptaṃ carāmi loke 'nupalipta eva//15//
S01divyav_u:449.030_0: nīlāmbujaṃ kardamavārimadhye yathā ca paṅkena va nopaliptam/
S01divyav_u:449.032_0: tathā hyahaṃ brāhmaṇa lokamadhye carāmi kāmeṣu viviktah {eva}//16// iti/
S01divyav_u:450.001_0: athānupamā bhagavatā mūtrapurīṣavādena samudācaritā vītaharṣā durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:450.003_0: tena sa khalu samayenānyatamo mahallo, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:450.007_0: ratā vayaṃ hi pramadāmalaṃkṛtāṃ bhokṣyāmahe ghīra yathānulomam//17// iti/
S01divyav_u:450.009_0: evamukte bhaganāṃstaṃ mahallamidamavocat--apehi puruṣa, mā me puratastiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:450.011_0: idaṃ ca te pātramidaṃ ca cīvaram yaṣṭiśca kuṇḍī ca vrajantu niṣṭhām/
S01divyav_u:450.013_0: imāṃ ca śikṣāṃ svayameva dhāraya dhātrī yathā hyaṅkagataṃ kumārakam//18// iti/
S01divyav_u:450.015_0: evamukte sa mahallaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya mahānanāryo 'yamiti matvā yena mākandikaḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:450.017_0: sa paryavasthitaḥ kathayati--mahalla, draṣṭamapi te na prayacchāmi, prāgeva sparcṭumiti/
S01divyav_u:450.018_0: evamuktasya mākandikasya parivrājakasyāntike tādṛśaṃ paryavasthānamupannam yenoṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālagato narakeṣūpapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:450.020_0: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:450.021_0: bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣā mayā labhyamānā na pratigṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:450.025_0: ayaskāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--mayaiṣā duhitā na kasyacit kulena dātavyā,
S01divyav_u:450.025_1: na rūpeṇa na dhanena, api tu yo mama śilpena samo 'bhyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:450.027_0: yāavadanyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:450.027_3: tvaṃ kasyaciddattā āhosvinna datteti? sā kathayati--yadā jātāhaṃ tadaiva matpitaivāṅgīkṛtya vadati--duṣkaramasau māṃ kasyaciddāsyati/
S01divyav_u:450.029_0: kiṃ tava pitā vadati? yo mama śilpena samo 'bhyadhiko vā, asyāhamenāṃ dāsyāmīti/
