S01divyav_u:450.030_0: tava pitā kīdṛśaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte? sūcīmīdṛśāṃ karoti yāvadudake plavate/
S01divyav_u:450.031_0: sa māṇavaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahamanayānarthī, madāpanayo 'sya kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:451.001_0: [451]tenāyaskārabhāṇḍikām yācitvā anyatra gṛhe susūkṣmāḥ sūcyo ghaṭitāḥ, yā udake plavante/
S01divyav_u:451.002_0: ekā ca mahatī ghaṭitā yasyāṃ sapta sūcyaḥ pratikṣiptāḥ saha tayā plavante/
S01divyav_u:451.010_0: sacetpitā te jānīyācchilpaṃ mama hi yādṛśam/
S01divyav_u:451.011_0: tvāṃ caivānuprayaccheta anyacca vipratam (vipulam?) dhanam//21// iti/
S01divyav_u:451.012_0: sā kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ tvaṃ śilpaṃ jānīṣe? īdṛṣīṃ sūcīṃ karomi yodake plavate/
S01divyav_u:451.014_0: ayaskārabhāryā kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ tvaṃ śilpaṃ jānīṣe? tena samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:451.018_2: evaṃ dvitīyāṃ tṛtīyām yāvat saptasūcīṃ prakṣipya prakṣiptāstathāpi plotumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:451.020_1_0: iti viditvā tāṃ dārikāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ kṛtvā vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena
S01divyav_u:451.020_1_1: pāṇinā bhṛṅgārakamādāya māṇavasya purataḥ sthitvā kathayati--imāṃ te 'haṃ māṇavaka
S01divyav_u:451.022_0: sa kathayati--nāhamanayārthī, kiṃ tu tavaiva madāpanayaḥ kartavya iti mayā śilpamupadarśitamiti//
S01divyav_u:451.024_0: bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māṇavaḥ, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:451.025_0: yo 'sāvayaskāraḥ, eṣa eva mākandikastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:451.025_1: yāsāvayaskārabhāryā, eṣaivāsau mākandikabhāryā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:451.026_0: yāsāvayaskāraduhitā, eṣaivāsāvanupamā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:451.029_0: punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta ayaṃ mahallako 'nupamāmāgamyānayena vyasanamāpanna iti/
S01divyav_u:451.030_0: bhagavānāha--bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'pyadhvanyeṣa anupamāmāgamya sāntaḥpuro 'nayena vyasanamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:452.001_0: [452]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhakesarī nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:452.002_0: tena khalu samayena siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhako nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigrahaḥ pūrvavadyāvattena kalatramānītam/
S01divyav_u:452.005_0: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:452.005_1: dārako jātah abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇah chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvidtīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇa saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:452.007_0_0: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa tasya jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā
S01divyav_u:452.007_0_1: nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti? jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārakaḥ
S01divyav_u:452.010_0: siṃhalo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ pūrvavadyāvadaṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:452.011_0: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:452.014_0: sa kathayati--putra, tāvatprabhūtaṃ me dhanajātamasti yadi tvaṃ tilataṇḍulakulatthādiparibhogena ratnāni me paribhokṣyase,
S01divyav_u:452.014_1: tathāpi me bhogā na tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:452.015_0: tadyāvadahaṃ jīvāmi, tāvat krīḍa ramasva paricāraya/
S01divyav_u:452.016_1: sa bhūyo bhūyaḥ kathayati--tāta, anujānīhi, mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:452.017_0: sa tenāvaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā uktah--putra, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:452.018_1: tena siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ siṃhakalpanivāsino vaṇijo nānādeśābhyāgatāśca/
S01divyav_u:452.020_1: yo yuṣmākamutsahate siṃhalena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:452.022_2: ṅgalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhāraiḥ piṭakair mūṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya pañcabhirvaṇikśataiḥ saparivāraḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:452.026_1: sarve te vaṇijo bālahāśvarājātpatitāḥ, tābhiśca rākṣasībhirbhakṣitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:452.029_0: yadi tāvattamānayiṣyasītyevaṃ kuśalam, no cetvāṃ bhakṣayām iti/
S01divyav_u:452.030_0: sā saṃtrastā kathayati--yadi yuṣmākameṣa nirbandho māṃ dhariṣyatha ānayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:452.031_2: sā paramabhīṣaṇarūpamabhinirmāya laghuladhveva gatvā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya purato gatvā sthitā/
S01divyav_u:453.001_1: sā rākṣasī sārthavāhasya pādayor nipatyāha--sārthavāha, ahaṃ tāmradvīpakasya rājño duhitā/
S01divyav_u:453.003_0: tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:453.005_0: viśrambhakathālāpena muhūrtaṃ sthitvā kathayati--vayasya, rājaduhitāsau tvayā pariṇitā/
S01divyav_u:453.006_1: sa kathayati--vayasya, nāsau rājaduhitā, tāmradvīpādasau rākṣasī/
S01divyav_u:453.008_1: sāpi rākṣasī svayamatīvarūpayauvanasampannamahāsundarīmānuṣīrūpamāsthāya siṃhalasadṛśanirviśeṣasundaraṃ putraṃ nirmāya taṃ putramādāya siṃhakalpāṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptā/
S01divyav_u:453.011_0: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, jñāyantāmayaṃ dārakaḥ siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya putra iti/
S01divyav_u:453.013_0: te kathayanti--bhagini, kuta āgatā, kasya vā duhitā tvamiti? sā kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:453.013_1: ahaṃ tāmradvīparājasya duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:453.015_0: tenāhamamaṅgaleti kṛtvā asthāne chotitā, kathaṃcidiha saṃprāptā/
S01divyav_u:453.017_0: sa tābhyāmuktah--putra, mainām {tyaja}duhitaraṃ rājñaḥ, kṣudraputreyaṃ tapasvinī, kṣameti/
S01divyav_u:453.018_0: sa kathayati--tāta, naiṣā rājaduhitā, rākṣasyeṣā tāmradvīpādihāgateti/
S01divyav_u:453.018_1: tau kathayatah--putra, sarvā eva striyo rākṣasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:453.019_1: tāta, yadyeṣā yuṣmākamabhipretā, etāṃ gṛhe dhārayata/
S01divyav_u:453.020_1: tau kathayatah--putra, sutarāṃ vayamenāṃ tavaivārthāya dhārayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:453.020_2: yadyeṣā tava nābhipretā, kimasmākamanayā? na dhārayāma iti/
S01divyav_u:453.022_0: amātyai rājño niveditam--deva, īdṛśī rūpayauvanasampannā strī rājadvāre tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:453.024_1: svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa tāṃ samudācarya kathayati--kutaḥ kathamatrāgatā, kasya vā tvamiti/
S01divyav_u:453.025_1: ahaṃ tāmradvīpakasya rājño duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhārvārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:453.026_0: tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:453.027_0: tenāhamamaṅgaleti śrutvā asthāne chotitā, kathaṃcidiha saṃprāptā/
S01divyav_u:453.028_1: tadarhasi deva tameva siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kṣamāpayitumarhasi/
S01divyav_u:453.029_0: amātyānāmājñā dattā--gacchantu bhavantaḥ, siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhaṃ śabdayateti/
S01divyav_u:453.030_0: rājā kathayati--siṃhala, enāṃ rājāduhitaraṃ dhāraya, kṣamasveti/
S01divyav_u:453.030_1: sa kathayati--deva, naiṣā rājaduhitā, rākṣasyeṣā tāmradvīpādihāgateti/
S01divyav_u:453.031_0: rājā kathayati--sārthavāha, sarvā eva striyo rākṣasyaḥ, kṣamasva/
S01divyav_u:454.002_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasyāsvāpanaṃ datvā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--bhaginyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:454.002_1: kim yuṣmākaṃ siṃhalena sārthavāhena? mayā siṃhakesariṇo rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasyāsvāpanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:454.007_1: eṣa śabdaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ samantato visṛtah--rājadvāraṃ na mucyate/
S01divyav_u:454.011_1: amātyāḥ kathayanti--kathamatra pratipattavyamiti? sa kathayati--niśrayaṇīmānayata, paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:454.015_0: paurāmātyajanapadāḥ saṃnipatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, rājā sāntaḥpuraparivāro rākṣasībhirbhakṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:454.016_0: kumāro nāsya, kamatrābhiṣiñcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ sāttvikaḥ prajñaśceti/
S01divyav_u:454.017_0: apare kathayanti--siṃhalātsārthavāhāt ko 'nyaḥ sāttvikaḥ prajñaśca? siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhamabhiṣiñcāma iti/
S01divyav_u:454.018_1: taiḥ siṃhalaḥ sārthavāha uktah--sārthavāha, rājyaṃ pratīccheti/
S01divyav_u:454.019_1: kiṃ mama rājyeneti? te kathayanti--sārthavāha, nānyaḥ śaknoti rājyaṃ dhārayitum/
S01divyav_u:454.020_1: sa kathayati--samayena pratīcchāmi yadi mama vacanānusāriṇo bhavatha/
S01divyav_u:454.021_1: taurasau nagaraśobhāṃ kṛtvā mahatā satkāreṇa rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:454.022_0: tena nānādeśanivāsino vidyāvādikā āhūya bhūyasyā mātrayā vidyā śikṣitā,
S01divyav_u:454.025_0: siṃhalo rājā caturaṅgādbalakāyādvaravarāṅgān hastino 'śvān rathān manuṣyāśca vahaneṣvaropya tāmradvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:454.027_0: tāḥ saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavatyaḥ, āpaṇasthānīyo dhvajaḥ kampate/
S01divyav_u:454.031_0: avaśiṣṭāḥ siṃhalasya rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti--deva, kṣamasveti/
S01divyav_u:454.032_0: sa kathayati--samayena kṣame, yadi yūyametannagaramutkīlayitvā anyatra gacchatha,
S01divyav_u:455.002_0: siṃhalenāpi rājñā āvāsitamiti siṃhaladvīpaḥ siṃhaladvīpa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:455.004_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau simihalaḥ, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:455.004_1: yo 'sau siṃhakesarī rājā, eṣa eva sa mahallastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:455.005_0: yā sā rākṣasī, eṣaivānupamā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:455.009_1: strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā udyāne tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:455.010_0: devasyaiṣā yogyeti śrutvā rājā tadudyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:455.011_3: tena mākandikaḥ parivrājaka uktah--kasyeyaṃ dārikā? sa āha--deva, madduhitā deva, na kasyacid/
S01divyav_u:455.012_0: mama kasmānna dīyate? deva, dattā bhavatu rājñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:455.014_2: pañca ca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dine dine gandhamālyanimittam/
S01divyav_u:455.016_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenodayanasya rājñastrayo 'grāmātyā yogandharāyaṇo ghoṣilo mākandika iti/
S01divyav_u:455.017_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena udayanasya rājñaḥ puruṣa upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:455.019_2: so 'pi rājñā pṛṣṭah--kastvamiti? sa kathayati--deva apriyākhyāyīti/
S01divyav_u:455.022_2: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā udayanaḥ śyāmāvatī anupamā caikasmin sthāne tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:455.024_2: anupamā kathayati--mahārāja, śyāmāavatī devasya santakaṃ bhaktaṃ bhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:455.027_2: yadā devaḥ śyāmāvatī ahaṃ ca rahasi tiṣṭhema,
S01divyav_u:455.029_1: tayā teṣāṃ rahasyavasthitānāṃ sopānake kāṃsikā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:455.030_0: anupamā namo devasyetyuktvā kathayati--devasya santakaṃ bhavatī bhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:455.031_0: rājā kathayati--anupame, atra mā saṃrambhaṃ kuru, upāsikaiṣā, nātra doṣa iti/
S01divyav_u:455.032_0: rājā udayana ekasmin divase śyāmāvatyā sakāśam [456]bhuṅkte, dvitīyadivase 'nupamāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:456.001_0: rājñā śākunikasyājñā dattā--yasmin divase śyāmāvatyā bhojanavāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:456.001_1: tasmin divase jīvantaḥ kapiṃjalā ānetavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:456.004_2: rājā kathayati--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, śyāmāvatyāḥ samarpayeti/
S01divyav_u:456.005_1: sā kathayati--kimahaṃ śākunikāyinī? na mama prāṇātipātaḥ kalpate/
S01divyav_u:456.006_2: śyāmāvatī kathayati--kimahaṃ śākunikāyinī? na mama prāṇātipātaḥ kalpate/
S01divyav_u:456.008_2: yadyasāvucyate śramaṇasya gautamasyārthāya sādhayeti sāmprataṃ saparivārā sādhayet/
S01divyav_u:456.009_1: tenāsau puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, evaṃ vada--bhagavato 'rthāya sādhayeti/
S01divyav_u:456.012_1: śākunikena gatvā rājñe niveditam--sā deva saparivārā udyukteti/
S01divyav_u:456.013_0: anupamā kathayati--śrutaṃ devena? yadi tāvatprāṇātipāto na kalpate,
S01divyav_u:456.013_1: śramaṇasyārthāya na kalpate, devasyāpi kalpate? devasya na kalpate iti kuta etat? rājā paryavasthito dhanuḥ pūrayitvā saṃprathitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:456.015_1: aparayā śyāmāvatyā niveditam--devo 'tyarthaṃ paryavasthito dhanuḥ pūrayitvā āgacchati, kṣamayeti/
S01divyav_u:456.016_0: tayā svopaniṣaduktā--bhaginyaḥ, sarvā yūyaṃ maitrīṃ samāpadyadhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:456.018_0: rājñā ā karṇāddhanuḥ pūrayitvā śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:456.020_0: rājā vinītaḥ kathayati--tvaṃ devī nāgī yakṣiṇī gandharvī kinnarī mahoragīti? sā kathayati--na/
S01divyav_u:456.021_0: atha kā tvam? bhagavataḥ śrāvikā anāgāminī/
S01divyav_u:456.021_1: maya bhagavato 'ntike 'nāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, ebhiśca pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti/
S01divyav_u:456.027_1: anupamā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ rājā maya sārthaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhavati/
S01divyav_u:456.028_0: śyāmāvatyā navaiḥ phalair navaiḥ sasyakair navartukaiḥ kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:456.029_0: sā ca tasyāḥ praghātanāya randhrānveṣaṇatatparā avasthitā/
S01divyav_u:456.031_1: amātyāḥ kathayanti--devasya balaṃ hīyate, kārvaṭikasya balaṃ varthate/
S01divyav_u:456.032_0: yadi devaḥ svayameva na gacchati, sthānametadvidyate yat sarvathāsau durdamyo [457]bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:457.001_0: tena kauśāmbyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yo mama vijite kaścicchastropajīvī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:457.004_0: rājñā mākandikaḥ sthāpita uktaśca--śyāmāvatyā yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:457.006_0: tayā pṛṣṭah--tāta, ka iha devena sthāpitah? aham/
S01divyav_u:457.007_0: śakyamanena sahāyena vairaniryātanaṃ kartumiti viditvā kathayati--nānujānīṣe śyāmāvatī kā mama bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:457.008_2: nānujānīṣe kataro dharmo 'tyarthaṃ bādhata iti? putri, jāne īrṣyā mātsaryaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:457.010_0: sa kathayati--kiṃ me dve śirasī? yāvat trirapyahaṃ rājñā siṃdiṣṭah--śyāmāvatyā yogodvāhanaṃ kariṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:457.011_1: sā kathayati--tāta, īdṛśo 'pi tvaṃ mūrkhah? asti kaścitpitā duhiturarthe vimukhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:457.011_2: yaḥ sapatnyāḥ sakāśe atīva snehaṃ karoti? praghātayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/
S01divyav_u:457.016_0: sa kathayati--devi, kiṃ te karaṇīyamasti? sā kathayati--mākandika, na kiṃcitkaraṇīyamasti/
S01divyav_u:457.017_0: api tvetā dārikā rātrau pradīpena buddhavacanaṃ paṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:457.017_1: atra bhūrjena prayojanaṃ tailena masinā kalamayā tulena/
S01divyav_u:457.020_0: mākandikaḥ kathayati--devi praveśayāmi, na bhūyo bhūyaḥ praveśitavyam/
S01divyav_u:457.023_0: tiṣṭhata, kim yūyaṃ rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ draṣṭum? kauśāmbyām yantrakarācāryaḥ kathayati--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantam yantreṇānyasthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:457.029_0: naivāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:457.031_0: na vidyate pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//22// iti/
S01divyav_u:458.003_0: ājñātāni ca satyāni kṛtaṃ buddhasya śāsanam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:458.004_1: iti tatra śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatāni dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:458.005_1: mākandikena teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi śmaśāne choritāni/
S01divyav_u:458.009_0: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kauśāmbīnagare udayanasya vatsarājasya janapadān gatasya antaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:458.010_0_0: śrutvā ca punaḥ kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya praviśyā caritvā pratikramya punaryena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā
S01divyav_u:458.010_0_1: etadūcuh--aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya caranta udayanasya
S01divyav_u:458.010_0_2: vatsarājasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:458.014_0: bhagavānāha--bahu bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇāpuṇyaṃ prasūtam yenodayanasya vatsarājasya janapadagatasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:458.015_0: kiṃ cāpi bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇa bahvapuṇyaṃ prasūtam, api tu na tā durgatiṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:458.017_0: tatkasya hetoh? santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādupapādukāḥ/
S01divyav_u:458.019_1: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā sakṛdāgāminyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:458.021_1_0: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇācchrotāpannā avinipātadharmiṇyo
S01divyav_u:458.021_1_1: niyatasamādhiparāyaṇāḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃśca manuṣyāṃśca saṃdhāvya
S01divyav_u:458.024_1: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ svajīvitahetorapi śikṣāṃ na vyatikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:458.025_1: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yā mamāntike prasannacittālaṃkāraṃ kṛtvā kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:458.027_1: āgamyata bhikṣavo yena śyāmāvatīpramukhānāṃ pañcastrīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi/
S01divyav_u:458.028_1: atha khalu bhagavān saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdham yena tāsāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatāṇāṃ kalevarāṇi tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:458.030_0: upasaṃkramya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--etāni bhikṣavastāni pañcaśatakalevarāṇi yatra udayano vatsarājo raktaḥ sakto gṛddho grathito mūrcchito 'dhyavasāyamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459.003_0: asatsaditi paśyanti paśyatāṃ nāsti kiṃcana//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:459.004_1: yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ prāgeva savijñānake kāye/
S01divyav_u:459.007_0: tatko nvasmākaṃ rājña ārocayiṣyatīti? tatrekai kathayanti--yo 'sāvapriyākhyāyī sa ārocayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:459.011_0: samayato nivedayāmi yadahaṃ bravīmi tatkurudhvam? brūhi, kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459.011_2: pañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇalakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānam/
S01divyav_u:459.011_3: 459.013 paṭe lekhayata puṣpadantaprāsādam yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime ca bhūrjabhāge 'gniḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459.016_0: yathā yantrakalācārya āgatya kathayati--dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:459.018_1_1: pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānaṃ paṭe
S01divyav_u:459.020_0: yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime bhūrjabhārake 'gniḥ prakṣipto yathā dvārako 'ṣṭhake prajvālitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459.023_0: yathā yantrakalācārya āgatah--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti,
S01divyav_u:459.024_0: yathā śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañcastrīśatānyagnāvutplutya nipatitāni, tatsarvaṃ paṭe likhitam/
S01divyav_u:459.025_0: tato 'priyākhyāyino 'mātyānāṃ lekho 'nupreṣito rājña īdṛśo 'nartha utpanno 'hamasyānenopāyena nivedayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:459.027_0: sa teṣāṃ lekhāṃ lekhayitvā caturaṅgabalakāyayukto 'nyatamasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459.028_0: udayanasya ca lekho 'nupreṣitah--deva, ahamanuṣmin pradeśe rājā/
S01divyav_u:459.029_1: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena niyoktumityevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:459.029_2: no cetpañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:459.032_0: rājña udayanasya sa kārvaṭiko balavān saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:460.001_0: [460]bhavantaḥ, īdṛśo 'pi rājā mūrkhah? asti kaśṣinmṛtyunāpahṛtaḥ śakyata ānetum? tadgatam/
S01divyav_u:460.002_0: etattasyaivaṃ likhitam--mamaivaṃnāmā kārvaṭikaḥ saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:460.002_1: sa tvamasmākaṃ tāvatsāhāyyaṃ kalpaya, paścāttavāpi sāhayyaṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:460.004_1: sa saṃlakṣayati--ekena tāvadahaṃ rājñā daśa diśo viśrāntaḥ, ayaṃ ca dvitīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:460.006_0: sa kaṇṭhe 'siṃ baddhvā nirgatya rājña udayanasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:460.007_0: athasāvapriyākhyāyī rājalīlayā rājña udayanasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:460.009_1: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena nirjetumiyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:460.009_2: no cetpañcahastiśatāni pañcahastinīśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:460.012_0: asti kaścicchakyate mṛtyoḥ sakāśādānetumiti? sa kathayati--deva, na śakyate/
S01divyav_u:460.013_2: rājā paṭaṃ nirīkṣya marmavedhaviddha iva ruṣyamāṇaḥ kathayati--bhoḥ kim? kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:460.013_3: kiṃ kathayasi śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dagdhānīti? sa paṭṭaṃ mauliṃ cāpanīya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:460.016_0: nāhaṃ narendro na narendraputraḥ pādopajīvī tava deva mṛtyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:460.020_1: iyaṃ kauśāmbī nagarī, idaṃ rājakulam, ayaṃ mākandikaḥ puṣpadantaṃ prāsādaṃ bhūrjādinā prayogeṇa dahati,
S01divyav_u:460.020_2: imāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dahyamānānyutplutya nipatitānīti/
S01divyav_u:460.022_2: nāhaṃ kathayāmi api tu deva eva kathayati/
S01divyav_u:460.023_0: bhoḥ puruṣa, upāyena me tvayā niveditam, anyathā te mayāsinā nikṛntitamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitamanvabhavisyadityutkvā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:460.028_2: tato yogandharāyaṇasyājñā dattā--gaccha mākandikamanupamayā saha yantragṛhe prakṣipya dahyatām/
S01divyav_u:460.029_0: tato yogandharāyaṇena suguptaṃ bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:460.030_2: sa kathayati--yogandharāyaṇa, kutrānupameti? tena yathāvṛttaṃ niveditam/
S01divyav_u:460.031_2: tvayāpyanupamayā saparivārayā sārdhaṃ mayā pravrajitavyaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:460.032_0: yogandharāyaṇaḥ kathayati--deva, ityarthameva mayā asau bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:461.002_0: nūnamanayā parapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricāritamiti viditvā kathayati--anupame,
S01divyav_u:461.003_0: kathaṃ jāne? abhiśraddadhasi tvaṃ bhagavatah? abhiśraddadhe gautame/
S01divyav_u:461.004_1: api tu kiṃ navaśavāyā arthe bhagavantaṃ pravakṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:461.004_2: śyāmāvatyā arthe pravakṣyāmīti viditvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:461.006_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:461.006_1: udayano vatsarājo bhagavantamidamavocat--kiṃ bhadanta śyāmāvatīpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ karma kṛtam yenāgninā dagdhāni? kubjottarā anukrameṇa niṣpalāyiteti/
S01divyav_u:461.008_0: bhagavānāha--ābhireva mahārāṭ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām/
S01divyav_u:461.010_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryā brahmadatto rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:461.011_0: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:461.017_1: sā kathayati--pravrajito vā tiṣṭhatu, agniṃ datvā tāṃ prajvalayeti/
S01divyav_u:461.021_2: sa tāsāmanukampārthaṃ tata evākāśamutplutya tapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:461.023_0: tā mūlanikṛntita iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamayitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:461.025_0: tāni tasmin kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kārtumārabdhāh--yadasmābhirevaṃ sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:461.026_0: yattu kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlenaivaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo,
S01divyav_u:461.028_0: kiṃ manyase mahārāja tadā sāsau rājño brahmadattasyāgramahiṣī,
S01divyav_u:461.028_1: eṣaiva sā śyāmāvatī tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:461.029_0: yāni pañca strīśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañca strīśatāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:461.030_0: yā sā preṣyadārikā, eṣaivāsau kubjottarā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:461.031_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣāṇi narakeṣu patkā yāvadetarhyapi dṛṣṭasatyā agninā dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:462.001_1: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ pūrvavadyāvadevamābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:462.003_0: atrodayano vatsarājo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinindyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikātprakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:462.005_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:462.005_0_1: bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena kubjā saṃvṛttā? bhagavānāha--kubjottarayaiva
S01divyav_u:462.005_0_2: bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvad phalanti khalu dehinām/
S01divyav_u:462.008_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:462.009_1: rājñā vārāṇasyāmevaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yasya dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktamasti, tena sthātavyam/
S01divyav_u:462.010_0: yasya nāsti tenānyatra gantavyamiti yataḥ kolenāgantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:462.011_0: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ saṃdhāno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ pūrvavadyāvad vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:462.013_1: bhaviṣyati mama saparivārasya dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti? sa kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:462.014_0: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante pūrvavadyāvadbhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:462.014_1: vinyasya pravrajitasahasrasya mama dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti/
S01divyav_u:462.018_1: sandhānasya duhitā kathayati--tāta, eko 'dya pravrajito nāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:462.019_1: sā pṛṣṭhaṃ vināmayitvā kathayati--tāta, īdṛśa iti/
S01divyav_u:462.020_0: yadanayā pratyekabuddho vināḍitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena kubjā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:462.021_0: punarapi bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:462.021_1: kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena śrutadharāa jāteti? bhagavānāha--tena kālena tena samayena pratyekabuddhānām yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ sa vāyvādhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:462.023_1: tasya saṃdhānaduhitrā hastāt kaṭānavatārya sa pratyekabuddha uktah--ārya, taistatpātraṃ sthāpayeti/
S01divyav_u:462.025_2: evameva mamāpi saṃtāne ye dharmāḥ praviśeyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:462.026_0: yattayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena śrutadharā saṃvṛtā//
S01divyav_u:462.028_0_0: punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena
S01divyav_u:462.031_0: punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta anupamayā karma yadeṣā nirāhārā bhūmigṛhe sthāpitā amlānagātrī cotthitā/
S01divyav_u:462.032_0: bhagavānāha--anupamayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:463.001_0: [463]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake dve dārike anyonyasaṃstutike kṣatriyadārikā brāhmaṇadārikā ca/
S01divyav_u:463.002_0: asti buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:463.004_0: aparasmin divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya piṇḍārthī pracalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.004_1: taṃ dṛṣṭvā te dārike prasādite, asmai praṇītānnapūrṇaṃ pātraṃ prayacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.005_0: tatkarmaṇo vipālenānupamā jātā, ekā ghoṣilasya gṛhapaterduhitā jātā mahāsundarī śrīmatī nāma/
S01divyav_u:463.006_0: ekasmin samaye rājñā dṛṣṭā pṛṣṭā ca--kasyeyaṃ kanyā? māntribhiḥ kathiyam--ghoṣilasya gṛhapateḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.007_0: tato ghoṣilo gṛhapatiḥ samāhūyoktah--gṛhapate, tava duhiteyaṃ kanyā? sa prāha--mama deva/
S01divyav_u:463.009_2: udayanena vatsarājenāntaḥpuraṃ praveśya mahatā śrīsamudayena pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:463.011_0: sa kathayati--ākāṅkṣase kiṃ tu bhikṣavo rājakulaṃ praviśānti/
S01divyav_u:463.012_1: sarvathā yadi bhikṣudarśanaṃ na labhe, adyāgreṇa na bhokṣye na pāsya iti/
S01divyav_u:463.015_0: tadātmano gṛhe bhaktaṃ sādhitvā kāyām(?) bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojaya,
S01divyav_u:463.017_0: tato bhūri karma kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.017_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.018_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ ghoṣilaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:463.019_0: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tuṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:463.020_0: atha ghoṣilo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena mama nimantritaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
S01divyav_u:463.022_1: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālāṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:463.024_0: pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairbuddhā bhagavanta aupadhike tiṣṭhanti--abhinirhṛtaṃ manrtayate sma/
S01divyav_u:463.027_0: sa praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:463.027_1: atha śrīmatī devī sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śāriputrapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavadyāvannīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:463.029_0: athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ devīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:463.030_1: āyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimāsyāḥ santi kānicitkuśalamūlāni? na santīti paśyati/
S01divyav_u:464.003_0: tena tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ ca prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:464.003_1: yāṃ śrutvā śrīmatyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ vādyaṃ triśaraṇagamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:464.005_0: athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.006_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.006_1: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñchāriputra etatprakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavate vistaraṇārocayati/
S01divyav_u:464.010_0: atha bhagavāñchikṣākāmatayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā pūrvavadyāvat pūrvikā prajñaptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.011_1_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣuranirgatāyāṃ rajanyāmanudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
S01divyav_u:464.011_1_1: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā idrakīlasāmantaṃ vā samatikrāmedanyatra
S01divyav_u:464.013_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣurityudāyī iti, so vā punaranyo 'pyevaṃjātīyah anirgatāyāṃ rajanyāmityaprabhātāyām,
S01divyav_u:464.016_0: tatra nīlāruṇo nīlābhāsaḥ, pītāruṇaḥ pītābhāsaḥ, tāmrāruṇas tāmrābhāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.017_0: ratneṣu veti ratnānyucyante maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddakṣiṇāvartaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.018_0: ratnasaṃmateṣu veti ratnasaṃmatamucyate sarvaṃ saṃgrāmāvacaraśastraṃ sarvaṃ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:464.019_0: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyeti vā rājye stryapi rājyābhiṣikeṇābhiṣiktā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:464.020_0: kṣatriyo 'pi brāhmaṇo 'pi vaiśyo 'pi śūdro 'pi rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto bhavati rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:464.024_1: tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavati? bhikṣuraprabhāte prabhātasaṃjñī nagarendrakīlaṃ samatikrāmati,
S01divyav_u:464.027_0: bhikṣuraprabhāte aprabhātasaṃjñī antaḥpurendrakīlam asmatikrāmati āpadyate pāpāntikam/
S01divyav_u:464.028_2: anāpattih--rājā śabdayati--devyaḥ kumārā āmātyā aṣṭānāmantarāyāṇāmantyatamānyatamamupathitaṃ bhavati rājā cauramanuṣyāmanuṣyavyālāgnyudakānām/
S01divyav_u:465.002_0: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:465.003_0: yadā pāṭaliputraṃ saṃvartate, tadā rorukaṃ vivartate/
S01divyav_u:465.003_1: roruke mahānagare rudrāyaṇo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:465.006_0: tasya candraprabhā nāma devī, śikhaṇḍī putraḥ kumāraḥ, hirubhirustasyāgrāmātyau/
S01divyav_u:465.007_0: rājagṛhe rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:465.008_0: tasya vaidehī mahādevī, ajātaśatruḥ putraḥ kumāraḥ, varṣakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmātyo 'grāmātyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:465.010_2_0: asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca?
S01divyav_u:465.010_2_1: sadāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣāh? devaḥ kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhārāmanuprayacchati? atīva śasyasampattirbhavati?
S01divyav_u:465.010_2_2: te vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--asti deva pūrvadeśe rājagṛhaṃ nagaram/
S01divyav_u:465.014_0: tatra rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:465.017_1: so 'mātyānāmantrayate--kiṃ bhavantastasya rājño durlabham? te kathayanti--devo ratnādhipatiḥ,
S01divyav_u:465.019_0: tena tasya ratnānāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:465.020_0: yadā tava kiṃcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:465.021_1: te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:465.022_1: taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca/
S01divyav_u:465.022_2: rājā bimbisāro lekhaṃ vācayitvā amātyānāmantrayate--kiṃ bhavantastadrājño durlabham? amātyāḥ kathayanti--devo vastrādhipatiḥ,
S01divyav_u:465.024_1: tena tasya mahārhāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:465.026_0: yatkiṃcittava rājagṛhe prayojanaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:465.027_0: te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:465.028_0: taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca/
S01divyav_u:465.029_1: kīdṛśastasya rājño ānāhapariṇāhah? te kathayanti--yādṛśa eva devasya,
S01divyav_u:465.029_2: api tu sa rājā svayaṃ prahartā/
S01divyav_u:465.029_3_0: 465.030 prātisīmaiḥ kīdṛśaṃ rajabhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayati? rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma
S01divyav_u:465.029_3_1: pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakaṃ
S01divyav_u:465.032_1: idaṃ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ pañcāṅgopetaṃ śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakam/
S01divyav_u:466.003_0: sa dūtastanmaṇivarma ādāya lekhaṃ ca, yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:466.006_0: dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartum, tasyaikaikasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:466.007_0: rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati? sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:466.009_2: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:466.010_0: rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--roruke bhadanta nagare rājā rudrāyaṇo nāma prativasati mamādṛṣṭasakhā/
S01divyav_u:466.012_0: ahaṃ tasya kiṃ prābhṛtamanupraṣeyāmi? bhagavānāha--tathāgatapratimāṃ paṭe likhāpayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣaya/
S01divyav_u:466.017_0: te yamevāvayavaṃ bhagavataḥ paśyanti, tameva paśyanto na tṛptiṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:466.019_0: bhagavānāha--mahārāja, khedamāpatsyante, na śakyate tathāgatasya nimittamudgrahītum/
S01divyav_u:466.020_0: tatra bhagavatā chāyā utsṛṣṭā, uktāśca--raṅgaiḥ pūrayata/
S01divyav_u:466.027_0: yadi kathayati--kimidam? vaktavyam--iyamabhyupapattiriyaṃ śikṣā iyaṃ lokasaṃvṛtiriyamatyutsāhatā/
S01divyav_u:466.029_0: asya tvayā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyam/
S01divyav_u:466.031_0: vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvodghāṭayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:466.032_0: rājñā bimbisāreṇa yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ lekho likhitvā saṃpreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:467.001_3: kīdṛśaṃ mama tena prabhṛtamanupreṣitam yasya satkāraḥ kartavyo bhaviṣyati? saṃnāhayata caturaṅgabalakāyam/
S01divyav_u:467.004_0: na śakyaṃ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:467.005_0: yadi devasya na cittaparitoṣo bhaviṣyati, tatra kālajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:467.007_0: vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvoddhāṭitā/
S01divyav_u:467.008_0: tairbuddhapratimāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaraveṇa nādo muktah--namo buddhāyeti/
S01divyav_u:467.009_0: tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇyāhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:467.009_1: sa kathayati--ka eṣa bhavanto buddho nāma? te kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:467.009_2: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'sti himavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyāstīre kapilasya ṛṣerāśramapadasya nātidūre/
S01divyav_u:467.012_1: rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgairvijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:467.013_1: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:467.014_0: pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:467.015_0: sa imāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthvīṃkhilāmalaṇṭakāmanutpīḍāmadaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa śamenābhinirjitya adhyāvasiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:467.016_0: sacet keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:467.021_0: atha rudrāyaṇo rājā sāmātyaḥ pratyūṣasamaye sarvārthān sarvakarmāntān pratiprasrabhya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:467.022_2: asyotpādādidamutpadyate yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavati/
S01divyav_u:467.024_0: tenemaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:467.030_0: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:467.032_2: atha sa rājā bimbisāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.001_0: [468]upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.001_1: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhadanta rājñā satyāni dṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:468.003_0: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katamasya bhikṣo rudrāyaṇo rājā saparivāro vineyo rairukanivāsī ca janakāyah? kātyāyanasya bhikṣoḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.004_0: tatra bhgavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamāmantrayate--samanvāhara kātyāyana rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇaṃ rājānaṃ saparivāraṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam/
S01divyav_u:468.007_0: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastasyā eva rātryā atyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:468.008_0_0: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ paribhuktaṃ
S01divyav_u:468.008_0_1: śayanaṃ pratiśāmya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivāro yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ
S01divyav_u:468.011_0: priyavayasya, eṣa te bhikṣurmayā śāstṛkalpo mahāśrāvako 'nupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.012_0: asya tvayārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:468.015_2: nagaraśobhā kṛtā, pañca vihāraśatāni, yena ekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa rorukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.019_0: ayuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.021_1: tata āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena tasyāḥ pariṣada āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:468.026_0: yadbhūyasā sā pariṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:468.027_0: rauruke nagare tiṣyaḥ puṣyaśca gṛhapatī vasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:468.028_0: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:468.029_0: tiṣyapuṣyau gṛhapatī āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocatām--labhevahi āryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:468.031_1_0: tābhyām yujyamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāmidameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
S01divyav_u:469.002_0: arhantau saṃvṛttau traidhātukavīrāgau samaloṣṭakāñcanāvākāśapāṇisamacittau vāsīcandanakalpau vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośau vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptau bhvalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhau/
S01divyav_u:469.004_0: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyavabhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau/
S01divyav_u:469.004_1: tau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau/
S01divyav_u:469.006_0: tayorjñātṛbhiḥ śarīrapūjāṃ kṛrtvā dvau stūpau kāritau--ekastiṣyasya, dvitīyaḥ puṇyasya//
S01divyav_u:469.007_0_0: rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā antaḥpurasyārocayati--āryo
S01divyav_u:469.007_0_1: mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudramiva madhuraṃ praprīṇayatīti/
S01divyav_u:469.010_0: yadyevam, yūyaṃ kasmāñ śṛṇutha? deva, vayaṃ hrīmantyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:469.010_1: kathaṃ vayaṃ tatra gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇumah? yadyāryo mahākātyāyana ihaivāgatya dharmaṃ deśayet,
S01divyav_u:469.011_0: rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah--mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum/
S01divyav_u:469.012_0: sa kathayati--mahārāja, na bhikṣavo 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dharmaṃ deśayanti/
S01divyav_u:469.014_0: ārya, atra ko 'ntaḥpurasya dharmaṃ deśayati? mahārāja, bhikṣuṇyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:469.016_0: bimbisāro rājā taṃ lekhaṃ vācayitvā yena bhagvāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:469.016_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:469.017_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhagavan rājñā lekho 'nupreṣitah--antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṃ śrotum/
S01divyav_u:469.019_0: tadatra kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti? bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti? paśyati śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:469.021_0: tatra bhagavāñchailāṃ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate--samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpurajanaṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ strījanamiti/
S01divyav_u:469.022_0: evaṃ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:469.024_0_0: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī tasyā eva rātrertyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ
S01divyav_u:469.024_0_2: śayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivārā yena raurukaṃ nagaraṃ
S01divyav_u:469.027_0: bimbisāreṇa ca rājñā rudrāyaṇasya rājño lekho 'nupreṣitah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:469.027_1: eṣā te mayā mahāśrāvikā śāstrānugatā pañcaśataparivārā preṣitā/
S01divyav_u:469.028_0: asyāṃ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:469.029_1: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni,
S01divyav_u:469.032_0: rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṃ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kāritā/
S01divyav_u:470.001_0: anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitā/
S01divyav_u:470.002_0: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni,
S01divyav_u:470.003_0: śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dine dinai dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:470.004_0: rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāyāṃ kṛtāvī, candraprabhā devī nṛtye/
S01divyav_u:470.005_0: yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṃ vādayati, candraprabhā devī nṛtyati/
S01divyav_u:470.007_1: candraprabhā devī kathayati--deva, mā mayā durnṛtyam? devi, na tvayā dunṛtyam/
S01divyav_u:470.008_0: api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam--saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:470.009_0: candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva yadyevam, kṛtopasthānāhaṃ devasya/
S01divyav_u:470.011_0: yadi tāvatpravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroṣi, eṣa eva te duḥkhāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:470.012_0: atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanā kālaṃ kṛtvā deveṣūpapadyase, devabhūtayā te mamopadarśayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:470.013_1: sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā--āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikcuṇībhāvam/
S01divyav_u:470.017_1: sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
S01divyav_u:470.018_0: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya,
S01divyav_u:470.021_0: kena karmaṇā? bhagavataḥ śāsane brāhmacaryaṃ caritveti/
S01divyav_u:470.021_1: tasyā etadabhavat--tadapratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitum/
S01divyav_u:470.023_0_0: atha candraprabhā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī tāmeva
S01divyav_u:470.026_0: bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:470.026_1: yāṃ śrutvā candraprabhayā devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃsatkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:470.028_1: na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:471.007_0: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇaśca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//5//
S01divyav_u:471.013_0: avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā/
S01divyav_u:471.015_0: parigamya pradakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma//7//
S01divyav_u:471.017_1: sasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ, śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturaḥ, yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:471.020_0: atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:471.020_1: tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:471.021_0: sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:471.022_0: sa middhāvasthalocanāparisphuṭo 'vijñātaḥ kathayati--kā tvamiti? sā kathayati--ahaṃ candraprabheti/
S01divyav_u:471.023_1: sā kathayati--deva, cyutāhaṃ kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
S01divyav_u:471.024_0: yadīcchasi mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamam, bhagavato 'ntike pravraja/
S01divyav_u:471.025_0: yadi tāvaddṛṣṭadharmā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyase, sa eva te 'nto dukhasya/
S01divyav_u:471.026_0: atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanaḥ, kālaṃ kṛtvā cārturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyase/
S01divyav_u:471.026_1: tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:471.027_1: rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:471.027_2: candraprabhā devī kva tiṣṭhatīti? te kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:471.029_0: rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ devatācodito 'ham agāramadhyāvaseyam/
S01divyav_u:471.031_0: yannvahaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:471.032_1: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:472.001_0: sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.003_1: yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase,
S01divyav_u:472.003_2: tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.005_1: tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.007_0: ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:472.008_0: bhūyaśaḥ putramāha--putra, tvayā rājyaṃ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṃ na kṣantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:472.009_1: śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.010_0_0: tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā
S01divyav_u:472.010_0_1: śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena
S01divyav_u:472.012_0: tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.017_1: so 'pi janakāyaḥ samāśvāsyoktah--bhavantaḥ, eṣa yuṣmākaṃ rājā samanuyukto mayā/
S01divyav_u:472.019_0: rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.020_0: tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.021_0: tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:472.021_1: rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:472.022_0: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva,
S01divyav_u:472.024_0: na yuṣmākaṃ kenacidvijñāt iti? sa kathayati--deva, kuto 'sya sādhanam? ātmanā dvitīya āgata iti/
S01divyav_u:472.025_0: rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ rāhānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam/
S01divyav_u:472.027_0: mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.028_0: kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:472.030_1_0: sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam?
S01divyav_u:472.030_1_1: mā kenacidbhūmyantareṇa rājñā rāṣṭrāvamardanaḥ kṛtah? kumāreṇa vā kenacidduṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena
S01divyav_u:473.001_0: iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:473.001_1: aho dharmaḥ, aho saṃghah aho dharmasya svākhyātatā,
S01divyav_u:473.001_2_0: yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ
S01divyav_u:473.001_2_1: sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
S01divyav_u:473.005_0: ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:473.006_0: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:473.007_0: adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:473.007_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:473.009_1: rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:473.010_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:473.012_0: sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara brāhmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:473.013_0: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:473.015_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:473.017_0: sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho manorathena//8//
S01divyav_u:473.019_0: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:473.020_1: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:473.023_1: rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:473.024_0: śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:473.028_0: bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
S01divyav_u:474.011_0: koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
S01divyav_u:474.017_0: kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:474.019_0: kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:474.020_0: dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:474.022_0: na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
S01divyav_u:474.026_0: śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:474.027_0: śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
S01divyav_u:474.031_0: trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
S01divyav_u:475.002_0: śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
S01divyav_u:475.003_0: na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
S01divyav_u:475.004_0: na sarvavidyā na balaṃ na śauryaṃ trāyate 'ntakāt//27/
S01divyav_u:475.007_0: āyuḥkṣayānte 'pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt//28//
S01divyav_u:475.009_0: rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca/
S01divyav_u:475.011_0: saṃpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṃ nopagantum//29//
S01divyav_u:475.013_0: na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā/
S01divyav_u:475.015_0: na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṃ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam//30//
S01divyav_u:475.017_0: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:475.019_0: na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ//31//
S01divyav_u:475.021_0: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praciśya/
S01divyav_u:475.023_0: na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//32//
S01divyav_u:475.028_0: śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ//34//
S01divyav_u:476.005_0: purā hi tvāṃ vyāghra iva mṛgaṃ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati antakaśca/
S01divyav_u:476.007_0: na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṃ saṃgamya sodaryagaṇāśca sarve//38//
S01divyav_u:476.009_0: yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpam/
S01divyav_u:476.013_0: sacedṛṇaṃ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṃ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?)/
S01divyav_u:476.017_0: āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti/
S01divyav_u:476.019_0: jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti//41//
S01divyav_u:476.021_0: dūṣyairenaṃ prāvṛtaṃ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya {ca tam} dahanti/
S01divyav_u:476.023_0: sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam//42//
S01divyav_u:476.025_0: eko hyayaṃ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo 'yamekaḥ/
S01divyav_u:476.027_0: eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṃsarataḥ sahāyaḥ//43//
S01divyav_u:476.029_0: etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ/
S01divyav_u:476.031_0: te sarvasaṃgānabhisamprahāya na garbhaśayyāṃ punarāvasānti//33// iti/
S01divyav_u:477.001_0: [477]atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṃ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:477.003_0: atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṃciddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:477.004_0: sa hirubhirukābhyāmuktah--deva, dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā adharmeṇa/
S01divyav_u:477.005_0: tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṃ samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti,
S01divyav_u:477.005_1: evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti/
S01divyav_u:477.007_0: sa tābhyāṃ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapyadharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:477.009_3: ruṣito 'mātyānāmantrayate--yo bhavanto rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṃ prativahati,
S01divyav_u:477.011_0: tatra kecidduṣṭāmātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimatra jñātavyam? tasya vadho daṇḍa iti/
S01divyav_u:477.013_0: amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca/
S01divyav_u:477.016_0: kośasthaṃ ca balasthaṃ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate//43// iti/
S01divyav_u:477.017_0: śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mamaitau pitrā saṃnyastau/
S01divyav_u:477.018_0: kiṃ tvābhyāṃ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:477.019_0: tau kathayatah--deva, nākranditā nāluñcitā nātaptā notpīḍitāstilāstailaṃ prayacchanti,
S01divyav_u:477.025_0: dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṃ na cāsya kaścitparatopasargaḥ//47// iti/
S01divyav_u:477.028_0: tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:477.030_0: na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṃ karoti nityam//48//
S01divyav_u:478.001_0: [478]athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nupūrvyā praṣṭumārabdhah--kastatrāmātyapradhānah? kasya śikhaṇḍī vaśena janapadān pīḍayatīti? sa kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:478.003_1: rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa, raurukanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ samāścāsaya/
S01divyav_u:478.006_0: sa vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa raurukamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:478.007_0: tena jñātīnāṃ rahasi niveditam--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ paṇyamādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:478.008_2: hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti/
S01divyav_u:478.010_0: evaṃ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:478.012_0: tadupāyasaṃvidhānaṃ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti/
S01divyav_u:478.013_0: tābhyāṃ rājñaḥ śikhaṇḍina ārocitam--deva, śrūyate vṛddharājā āgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:478.014_2: sa vinā rājyenābhiraṃsyata iti kṛta etat? punarapyasau rājyaṃ kārayitukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:478.016_0: śikhaṇḍī kathayati--yadyasau rājā bhaviṣyati, ahaṃ sa eva kumāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:478.016_1: ko nu virodha iti? tau kathayatah--deva, apratirūpametat/
S01divyav_u:478.017_0: kathaṃ nāma kumārāmātyapaurajanapadairañjalisahasrair namasyamānena rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam? varaṃ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam/
S01divyav_u:478.019_0: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:478.019_3: evameva rājyaṃ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti/
S01divyav_u:478.021_0: sa tābhyāṃ vipralabdhaḥ kathayati--kimatra yuktam? kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti? tau kathayatah--deva,
S01divyav_u:478.022_0: yadi na praghātyate, niyataṃ duṣṭāmātyavigrāhito devaṃ praghātayatīti/
S01divyav_u:478.023_0: sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṣpoparudhyamānahṛdayaḥ karuṇadīnavilambitairakṣaraiḥ sa kathayati--bhavantau,
S01divyav_u:478.023_1: kathaṃ pitaraṃ praghātayāmīti? tau kahtayatah--na devena śrutam?
S01divyav_u:478.026_0: pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:478.030_0: ekaśca tatra śatruḥ syāttadarthe tānnimajjayet//50// iti/
S01divyav_u:478.033_0: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet//51// iti/
S01divyav_u:479.001_2: yadi devo 'tra vilambate, yaddevasyānuraktāḥ kumārāmātyapaurajanapadāste kṣobhamāpannā niyatamanarthaṃ kurvantīti/
S01divyav_u:479.002_0: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcitpāpaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti tenādhivāsitam--evaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:479.006_0: tābhyāṃ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante/
S01divyav_u:479.007_1: bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṃścārake baddhvā sthāpayateti/
S01divyav_u:479.008_0: te śrutvā bhītāḥ saṃpratipannāḥ kathayanti--deva, alaṃ krodhena/
S01divyav_u:479.010_0: āyuṣmānapi rudrāyaṇastrayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.011_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--icchāmyahaṃ bhadanta raurukaṃ nagaraṃ janapadacārikāṃ caritumiti/
S01divyav_u:479.013_1: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.014_0: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:479.015_0: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ karmabalapreritam--
S01divyav_u:479.018_0: dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate/
S01divyav_u:479.019_0: tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate//52//
S01divyav_u:479.020_0: iti yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.020_1: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carannantarmārge 'nyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.022_2: sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṃdevā samupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.026_0: dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṃ rājyaṃ na cāsya kaccitparatopasargaḥ//53// iti/
S01divyav_u:479.029_0: deva, tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:479.031_0: na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṃ tu karoti nityam//54//
S01divyav_u:480.002_0: tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṃ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti//55//
S01divyav_u:480.003_1: kimasau mama tatra gamanaṃ nābhinandatīti? te kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:480.004_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yadevaṃ na gacchāmi, pratinivartāmīti/
S01divyav_u:480.006_0: kva yāsyasi tvaṃ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena/
S01divyav_u:480.008_0: vayaṃ hyadhanyā nṛpasamprayuktā ihābhyupetāstava ghātanāya//56// iti//
S01divyav_u:480.010_0: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yūyaṃ nāma mama vadhakapuruṣāh? deva, vadhakapuruṣāḥ/
S01divyav_u:480.011_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yattaduktaṃ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa manasikartavyeti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:480.012_0: sarvathā dhik saṃsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṃ kathayati--bhadramukhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:480.014_0: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--deva, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:480.014_1: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathenāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:480.015_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsā bāhuśrutye--skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ,
S01divyav_u:480.017_0_0: tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
S01divyav_u:480.019_0: arhan saṃvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisavitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:480.022_0: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:480.025_0: adyāpyudrāyaṇo bhikṣū rājadharmair na mucyate//57// iti/
S01divyav_u:480.026_0: ityuktvā tān vadhakapuruṣānuvāca--bhadramukhāḥ, yaṃ mayā prāptavyaṃ tatprāptam/
S01divyav_u:480.027_0: te kathayati--deva, yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati--kiṃ vṛddharājena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtamiti,
S01divyav_u:480.031_0: ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyasi//58// iti/
S01divyav_u:481.001_0: [481]idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:481.002_1: atyayamatyayato deśaya, apyetatkarma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchediti/
S01divyav_u:481.004_1: yam yam ṛddhyupāyaṃ prārabhate, tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro 'pi na pratibhāti prāgeva ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:481.005_0: tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṃ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:481.008_1: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:481.008_2: tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:481.010_0_0: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ
S01divyav_u:481.010_0_1: pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padman mahāpadmaṃ
S01divyav_u:481.010_0_2: narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti,
S01divyav_u:481.013_1: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:481.015_0: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:481.016_2: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṃ narakanivedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:481.018_0_3: puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ
S01divyav_u:481.027_0: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:481.028_0: tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:482.001_0: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:482.013_0: tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:482.018_0: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//64// iti/
S01divyav_u:482.020_1: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:482.024_0: rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṃ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:482.025_0: atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṃ khikkhitaṃ cādāya raurukamanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:482.026_1: tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:482.028_1: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yo devasya śatruḥ, sa praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:482.029_1: kathaṃ jñāyate 'sau? praghātita iti? tābhyāṃ te vadhakapuruṣā darśitāh--deva,
S01divyav_u:482.030_0: śokhaṇḍanā rājñā te pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, kiyadvṛddharājasya balam/
S01divyav_u:482.031_0: deva, kutastasya balam? idaṃ pātracīvaraṃ khikkhiraṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:482.031_1: śikhaṇḍī [483]rājā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:483.004_0: ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyase//66// iti/
S01divyav_u:483.005_0: idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:483.008_1: na yuvābhyāmahamīdṛśakarma kurvāṇo nivārita iti? tau kathayatah--vayaṃ devenādarśanapathe vyavasthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:483.010_0: kathaṃ nivārayāma iti? tena tau duṣṭāmātyau adarśanapathe vyavasthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:483.011_1: tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ pracchannaṃ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau sthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:483.012_1: yena satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau,
S01divyav_u:483.012_2: tena satyena satyavacanena māṃsapeśīṃ kṛtvā svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ balaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:483.015_1: tadā tābhyāṃ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā--devi,
S01divyav_u:483.017_0: kimadhyupekṣasa iti? sā kathayati--kimahaṃ karomīti? yuvābhyāmevāsāvīdṛśakarma kārita iti/
S01divyav_u:483.018_0: tau kathayati--devi, yatra gha{aḥ patitaḥ, kiṃ tatra rajjurapi pātayitavyā? sā kathayati--satyametatpiturvadham/
S01divyav_u:483.021_1: kasmātvamutpāṇḍūtpāḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti? sa kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:483.021_2: tvamapyevaṃ kathayasi--kasmāttvamutpāḍūtpāṇḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:483.021_3: kathamahaṃ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:483.021_4: yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah? ciramavīcau mahānarake vastavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:483.026_0: sā kathayati--putra, abhayaṃ tāvatprayaccha, yatsatyaṃ tatkathayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:483.027_1: nāsau tava pitā, kiṃ tu mayā ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṃ paricaritam,
S01divyav_u:483.029_0: iti viditvā kathayati--amba, yadyevaṃ pitṛvadho nāsti, athadvadho 'sti/
S01divyav_u:483.029_1: sa kathaṃ nistārya iti? sā kathayati--putra, jñānakocidāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:483.031_0: tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau--mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:483.032_0: śikhaṇḍinā rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā, sarvāmātyān [484]saṃnipātayata ye ca kecijjñānakovidā iti/
S01divyav_u:484.001_0: taiḥ sarvāmātyāḥ saṃnipātitāḥ, ye ca kecijjñānakovidāḥ/
S01divyav_u:484.003_0: tatra kecitkathayanti--deva, kenāsau dṛṣṭo 'rhattvam iti? apare kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:484.004_1: kimatra śokaḥ kriyate? sa kathayati--yuvāmapyevaṃ kathayatha--kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate iti,
S01divyav_u:484.006_1: kuto 'rhadvadhah? sa kathayati--mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau/
S01divyav_u:484.008_1_0: kuto 'rhadvadha iti? tau kathayatah--vayaṃ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṃ
S01divyav_u:484.008_1_1: vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau adyatve 'pi
S01divyav_u:484.010_0: rājā amātyānāmantrayate--bhavantaḥ, yadyevamāgacchata gacchāmaḥ, paśyāmaḥ kiṃ bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:484.011_0: eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:484.012_1_0: tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena satyavacanena yuvāṃ
S01divyav_u:484.012_1_1: māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau
S01divyav_u:484.014_0: anena satyena satyavacanena imāṃ māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ bilaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:484.016_1: tau māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakastūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakabilaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:484.017_0: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayata--dṛṣṭaṃ deveneti? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:484.018_2: tasya yāsau dṛṣṭih--santi loke 'rhanta iti, sā prativigatā/
S01divyav_u:484.019_1: ye madhyasthāsteṣāṃ kāṅkṣā, ye śraddhāsteṣāmadbhutaṃ saṃvṛttam/
S01divyav_u:484.020_1: śikhaṇḍī rājā saṃlakṣayati--yadi na santyeva loke 'rhantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:484.020_2: kimarhtamāryakāśyapasya kātyāyanasya pañcaśataparivārasya śaulāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ plañcaśataparivārāyāḥ piṇḍakamanuprayacchāmīti? tena bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ca piṇḍapātaḥ samucchinnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:484.023_1: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śaulā ca bhikṣuṇī vinayāpekṣayā tatraivāvasthatau/
S01divyav_u:484.025_0: āyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviśati/
S01divyav_u:484.027_2: kimarthamayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:484.029_0: tau kathayatah--deva, āryo mahākātyāyanaḥ saṃlakṣayati--devaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalo gacchati,
S01divyav_u:484.029_1: mā aprasādaṃ vedayiṣyati, duḥkhaṃ caradgacchati, karma kriyate, pātracīvarāṇi pāṃśunā avatariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:484.031_1: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati, rājā ca śikhaṇḍī praviśati/
S01divyav_u:485.003_0: ko 'tra heturiti? tasya pṛṣṭhatastau duṣṭāmātyau gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:485.003_1: tau kathayatah--deva, eṣa kathayati--mā ahamasya pitṛmārakasya rajasā pravrajyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:485.005_0: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yasyāhaṃ priyaḥ, so 'sya muṇḍakasya śramaṇakasyoparyekaikaṃ pāṃśumusṭiṃ kṣipatviti/
S01divyav_u:485.006_2: ekaikayā pāṃśumuṣṭyā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyopari mahān pāṃśurāśirvyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:485.010_0: tau pṛcchatah--bhavantaḥ, kimidamiti? te kathayanti--tena kalirājena pitṛmārakeṇa āryo mahākātyāyano 'duṣyanayakārī pāṃśunā avaṣṭabdha iti/
S01divyav_u:485.011_0: tau sāśrukaṇṭhau rudanmukhau gopālakapaśupālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pāṃśūnapanetumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:485.012_2: yadidaṃ śikhaṇḍinā mahākātyāyane janakāyasahāyena karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:485.015_0: itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyate/
S01divyav_u:485.015_2: prathame divase mahāvāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:485.017_1: tṛtīye vastravarṣam, caturthe hiraṇyavarṣam, pañcame suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmāntanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:485.019_0: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratvavarṣaṃ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṃśuvarṣamiti/
S01divyav_u:485.019_1: tau kathayatah--ārya, kimāvāmasya karmaṇo bhāvinau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau/
S01divyav_u:485.021_0: ārya, yadevaṃ kathamasmābhirasmānnagarānniṣkramitavyamiti? sa kathayati--yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:485.023_0: yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā niṣpalāyitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:485.023_1: tau tasya pādayor nipatya raurukaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:485.024_0: rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ praviṣṭau kathayatah--kiṃ devenāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ kiṃciduktaḥ pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhah? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:485.025_0: kiṃ kathayati--deva, evaṃ kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyata iti/
S01divyav_u:485.026_0: kānupūrvī? kathayati--deva, sa evaṃ kathayati, prathame tāvaddivase mahavāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:485.026_2: tṛtīye divase vastravarṣam, caturthe hiraṇyavarṣam, pañcame suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtaṃ te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pravekṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:485.026_3: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:485.031_0: tau kathayatah--ārya, kimāvāmapyasya karmaṇo bhāginau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau/
S01divyav_u:485.032_0: ārya, yadyevaṃ kathamasmānnāgrānniṣkramitavyamiti? sa kathayati--[486]yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:486.002_0: yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā niṣpalayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:486.002_1: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--samucchinnapiṇḍapātaḥ pāṃśuvarṣeṇāvaṣṭabadhaḥ sa kimanyadvadatu? īdṛśaṃ vā vadate,
S01divyav_u:486.004_1: hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau mukhaṃ vibhaṇḍya hastān saṃparivartya prakrāntau/
S01divyav_u:486.006_1: hitukena śyāmāko dāraka āyuṣmate mahākātyāyanāya dattah--ārya,
S01divyav_u:486.008_0: bhirukenāpi śyāmāvatī dārikā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyā dattā--ārye,
S01divyav_u:486.009_0: no cet kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilo nāma gṛhapatirmama vayasyastasya samarpayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:486.010_1: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī śyāmāvatīmādāya ṛddhyā raurukānnagarāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:486.012_2: hirubhirukābhyāmagrāmātyābhyām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe ca nauḥ sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:486.015_1: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitamiti/
S01divyav_u:486.019_0: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--devasyedaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam, nacirādeva suvarṇavarṣaṃ patiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:486.020_1: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--devasyedaṃ suvarṣaṃ ptatitam, nacirādeva ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:486.021_0: yau raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtam, te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:486.022_0: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:486.023_0: tatra hirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe hirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:486.024_1: bhirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe bhirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:486.026_1: śyāmākaḥ kathayati--ārya, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:486.027_0: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ kathayati--putra, vātāyanena kāśikāṃ niṣkāsayeti/
S01divyav_u:486.030_2: atha yā raurukanivāsinī devatā sā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:487.001_1: āyṣmatā mahākātyāyanena śyāmāka uktah--putra, gṛhāṇa cīvarakarṇikam/
S01divyav_u:487.002_2: sa ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:487.005_0: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ khalabhidhāne sthāpayitvā pinṇḍapātraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:487.007_0: yastatra puruṣo 'vasthitaḥ, sa taṃ dārakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--bho dāraka,
S01divyav_u:487.008_0: sa kathayati--na mama prabhāvāt khalabhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti,
S01divyav_u:487.008_1: api tu raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā amuṣmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:487.008_2: tasyāḥ prabhāvāt khalābhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti/
S01divyav_u:487.010_0: sa tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate,
S01divyav_u:487.011_0: na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:487.012_0: tenāpi karvaṭakaṃ gatvā karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ saṃnipātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:487.013_0: uktaśca--bhavantaḥ, raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā khalābhidhāne tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:487.014_1: tasyā haste mayā tāḍakaṃ kuñcikā ca dattā/
S01divyav_u:487.015_0: {uktam} ca--devate, tāḍakaṃ kuñcikāṃ ca tāvaddhāraya yāvad grāmaṃ gatvā āgacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:487.016_0: na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:487.019_1: tataḥ sarvaṃ tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ gandhapuṣpośobhitaṃ chatradhvajapatākāśobhitaṃ ca balimādāya yena devatā tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:487.021_0: upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate, adhiṣṭhā bhava, ihaiva tiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:487.022_3: samanvāhara asya yasya sakāśāt tāḍakaḥ kuñcikā ca gṛhīteti/
S01divyav_u:487.025_0: tauryādṛśameva tasyā devatāyāḥ sthaṇḍilaṃ kāritaṃ tādṛśamevāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya/
S01divyav_u:487.027_1: tamasau gṛhītvā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sthaṇḍile sthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:487.028_0: sā anyatamena puruṣeṇa prākārakaṇṭake sthitena pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā gacchantī dṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:487.029_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--eṣā devatā āryasya mahākātyāyanasyābhisātikā gacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:488.001_0: adhiṣṭhānanivāsinā janakāyena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh--kimetaditi? te kathayanti devatāprakopa iti/
S01divyav_u:488.002_1: sākathayati--yūyamāryasya mahākātyāyanasya nirāmagandhasyāsatkāramanuprayacchatheti? te bhūyaḥ kathayanti--kṣamakha devate,
S01divyav_u:488.005_0: te kathayanti--devate kṣamakha, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ kurma iti/
S01divyav_u:488.006_2: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastatra varṣoṣitaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya devatāmupāmantrya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:488.007_0: sā kathayati--ārya, mama kiciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ kārāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:488.009_0: tayātra prakṣipya stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito mahaśca prasthāpitah--kāśīmaha kāśīmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:488.011_0: tairlambate lambata iti uccair nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:488.011_1: tasmiñ janapade manuṣyāṇāṃ lambakapāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:488.013_0: tatra śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ vṛkṣamūle sthāpayitvā piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:488.014_1: kaṃ rājānamabhiṣiñcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti/
S01divyav_u:488.015_0: apare kathayanti--kathamasau prajñāyata iti? anye kathayanti--parīkṣakāḥ prayujyantāmiti/
S01divyav_u:488.018_1: tasya vṛkṣasya cchāyā asya śyāmākasya dāraksya kāyaṃ na vijahātīti/
S01divyav_u:488.019_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃjalpitumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ, etamabhiṣiñcāma iti/
S01divyav_u:488.022_2: kimasya dārakasya rājñaḥ saṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi na veti/
S01divyav_u:488.023_1: sa kathayati--putra, pratīccha rājyam, kiṃ tu dharmeṇa te kārayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:488.027_0: sā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--dṛṣṭvā cirasya bara putrakaṃ paśyāmi,
S01divyav_u:488.029_1: tasyā āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanenāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:488.029_2: yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:488.032_0_0: sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati sma--idamasmākaṃ bhadanata na mātrā [489]kṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:488.032_0_1: na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhavatā
S01divyav_u:489.002_1: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamauṣyeṣu/
S01divyav_u:489.006_0: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge ca te aham/
S01divyav_u:489.007_0: sthāpitā putra yatnena sādhu te duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam//68//
S01divyav_u:489.008_0: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastāṃ bhadrakanyāṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:489.009_0: sā kathayati--putra, yadyevaṃ mama kiṃcidanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:489.010_1: tayā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sā tasmin pratimāropitā/
S01divyav_u:489.014_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--uktaṃ bhagavatā madhyadeśe pule na dhārayitavye iti/
S01divyav_u:489.015_2: tayā sthaṇḍile kārayitvā te pratiṣṭhāpite itaścarasantisaṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:489.017_1: kiccitkuśalacaryeti? sa kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ, kiṃcit sukhacaryā kiṃcidduḥkhacaryeti/
S01divyav_u:489.018_0: bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti--kiṃ sukhacaryā kiṃ duḥkhacaryeti? sa kathayati--yatsattvakāryaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:489.019_0: yad rājā śikhaṇḍī raurukanivāsī ca janakāya ahaṃ ca pāṃśunāvacṭabdhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:489.024_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:489.024_0_1: bhadanta āyuṣmatā rudrāyaṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule pratyājātah?
S01divyav_u:489.024_0_2: bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? arhattvaprāptaśca
S01divyav_u:489.024_0_3: śastreṇa praghātita iti? bhagavānāha--rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacittāni
S01divyav_u:489.028_1: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:489.028_2: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:490.002_0: sāmagarīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//69// iti/
S01divyav_u:490.003_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīti^dhvani asti buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā lola utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:490.005_1: tasya karvaṭakasya ca nātidūre udapānaṃ prabhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāmāvāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.006_0: tatrāsau lubdhakaḥ pratidinaṃ prabhūtān kūṭān pāśālepāṃśca pratikṣipati prabhūtānāṃ mṛgānāmutsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya/
S01divyav_u:490.008_0: yāvadanyataraḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāaṃ caraṃstaṃ karvaṭakamanuprāpto devatāyatane rātiṃdivā samupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.009_0: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya taṃ karvaṭakamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.010_0: tataḥ piṇḍapātamaṭitvā saṃlakṣayati--idaṃ devāyatanaṃ divā ākīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:490.011_0: bahiḥ karvaṭakasya śānte sthāne piṇḍapātaṃ velāṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:490.011_1: sa karvaṭakānniṣkramyedaṃ śāntamidaṃ śāntamiti yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.012_0_0: upasaṃkramya pātrasnāvaṇamekānta upanikṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:490.012_0_1: parisrāvya śīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktaketyaṃ kṛtvā hastau nirmādya mukhaṃ
S01divyav_u:490.012_0_2: pātraṃ ca pātraparisrāvaṇam yathāsthāne sthāpya pādau prakṣālya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ
S01divyav_u:490.012_0_3: niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.016_1: atha sa lubdhakaḥ kālyamevotthāya yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.018_2: kimatra kāraṇam yenādya ekamṛgo 'pi na baddha iti?/
S01divyav_u:490.021_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--ete pravrajitāḥ śāntātmāna īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
S01divyav_u:490.021_1: yadyadyāhamasya jīvitāpacchedaṃ na karomi, niyatameṣa mama vṛttisamucchedaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:490.023_0: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena karākārasadṛśaṃ dhanurākarṇaṃ pūrayitvā saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.024_0: sa mahātmā pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--mā ayaṃ tapasvī lubdho 'tyantakṣataśca bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:490.025_1: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:490.027_0: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
