S01divyav_u:490.030_0: sa saṃlakṣayati--yanmayā anena pūtikāyena prāptavyaṃ tadidānīṃ śāntaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśāmīti/
S01divyav_u:490.031_0: sa tasyaiva purastātpunargaganatalamabhyudgamya vicitrāṇi pratihāryāṇi vidarśya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:491.001_2: tānyasthīni nave kumbhe prakṣipya śārīrastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:491.002_1: gandhairmālyairdhūpaśca kumbhe kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāro kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:491.004_0: yattu kārā kṛtā, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:491.007_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena lubdhakaḥ, eṣa evāsau rudrāyaṇo bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:491.008_0: yadanena pratyekabuddhaḥ saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:491.008_1: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu paktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:491.008_2: tasminnapi codapāne saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:491.011_0_0: punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:491.011_0_1: bhadanta śikhaṇḍinā raurukanivāsinā janakāyenāyucmatā mahākātyāyanena ca karma kṛtam
S01divyav_u:491.011_1: hirubhirukau tvagrāmātyau niṣpalayitāviti? bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi prariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:491.015_0: ke 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bḥkṣavaḥ karmaṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:491.015_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāayataneṣu karmaṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:491.019_0: samagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//70//
S01divyav_u:491.021_0: sa tayā saha krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:491.021_1: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:491.022_0: punarasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato dārikā jātā/
S01divyav_u:491.023_0: yā janmikā dārikāḥ, tāsām yācanakā āgacchanti/
S01divyav_u:491.024_1: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanasanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:491.026_0: yāvattayā dārikayā gṛhaṃ saṃmṛjya vāṭasyopariṣṭāt saṃkāraśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:491.029_1: sā bhrātrā pṛṣṭā--kiṃ tvayādya kṛtam yena te yācanakā nāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:491.032_0: yasyā yasyā yācanakā āgacchanti, sā sā tasya pratyekabuddhasyopari saṃkāram [492]chorayatviti/
S01divyav_u:492.003_0: tasmin karvaṭake dvau gṛhapatī samakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:492.005_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau dārikā yayā pratyekabuddhasyopari saṃkāraśchoritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:492.006_0: yo 'sau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ, eṣa evāsau raurukanivāsī janakāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:492.008_0: yo 'sau gṛhapatī yābhyāṃ nivāritam, etāvetau hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau/
S01divyav_u:492.009_1: yo 'sau dārikāyā bhrātā yena vipuṣpitam, eṣa evāsau kātyāyano bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:492.010_0: yadanena bipuṣpitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:492.011_0: yadi tena na vipuṣpitam (cittam) na pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdho 'bhaviṣyaditi/
S01divyav_u:492.013_0: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:492.014_0: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:493.002_0: mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣairmātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:493.015_0: dṛṣṭvā lokamimaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ lokakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam/
S01divyav_u:493.017_0: kāruṇyāt sa dadāvanāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṃ matvā ca prahatārṇavormicapalaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ bhūyasā/
S01divyav_u:493.019_0: yeṣu vyāsajjacetā bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu labdhā gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram/
S01divyav_u:493.023_0_0: tasmāt putradhanatvāt putrābhilāṣiṇo yadā manorathaśatairasakṛdunmiṣitonmiṣitāḥ putraśriyaḥ
S01divyav_u:493.023_1: yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham yācitumārebhe/
S01divyav_u:493.029_0: tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ manye raviriva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam//5//
S01divyav_u:494.001_0: [494]rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam/
S01divyav_u:494.003_0: gaṅgāśaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃstāṃstāṃśca devānasau putrārthī śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau/
S01divyav_u:494.009_0: evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ,
S01divyav_u:494.015_0: na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase//9//
S01divyav_u:494.018_0: ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran//10//
S01divyav_u:494.022_0: tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṃ dyāmadhigantumicchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt/
S01divyav_u:494.024_0: vidhimaparamahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadācit/
S01divyav_u:494.026_0: yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyā//13//
S01divyav_u:494.028_0: atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāmbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:495.005_0: mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurairveṣṭitam/
S01divyav_u:495.017_0: atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:495.021_0: pitaryatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti//20//
S01divyav_u:495.028_0: yāvaccāyaṃ janapadamimaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:495.030_0: tāvadyuktaṃ mama sutamimaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhiṣaktaṃ niṣeddhum/
S01divyav_u:496.001_0: [496]paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam/
S01divyav_u:496.003_0: nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punareva putraḥ//24//
S01divyav_u:496.008_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṃ kusumamālāmiva śirasā samabhivandya anyasminnahani aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:496.012_0: svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai/
S01divyav_u:496.016_0: atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikāḥ,
S01divyav_u:496.020_0: sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā//28//
S01divyav_u:496.024_1: atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayāmāsuh--
S01divyav_u:496.026_0: gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra/
S01divyav_u:496.028_0: tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho//30//
S01divyav_u:496.030_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakrāra/
S01divyav_u:497.001_0: [497]lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca//31//
S01divyav_u:497.005_0: atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh--
S01divyav_u:497.010_0: vivartitaṃ ślāghyamatīva puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṃ pravṛttam//34//
S01divyav_u:497.016_0: yadāśritaṃ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā/
S01divyav_u:497.018_0: kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṃ piturvyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam//36//
S01divyav_u:497.022_0: tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām//37//
S01divyav_u:497.024_0: ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṃ bhajante 'nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ/
S01divyav_u:497.026_0: ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat/
S01divyav_u:497.028_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo 'pi tathānuguṇinīṃ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaramupasṛtyovāca--amba,
S01divyav_u:497.030_0: sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsamlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayeva svatanayamāha--
S01divyav_u:497.033_0: jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:498.003_0: na yāvadevaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam/
S01divyav_u:498.005_0: kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayairamitraiḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:498.007_0: yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:498.009_0: te saṃtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam//42//
S01divyav_u:498.013_0: saṃtyajya yātuṃ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco madīyam(?)//43//
S01divyav_u:498.017_0: saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'hamevaṃ suta vārayāmi//44//
S01divyav_u:498.019_0: sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃcidīdṛśaṃ pratyāha--
S01divyav_u:498.021_0: varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:498.022_0: jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam//45//
S01divyav_u:498.024_0: arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ//46//
S01divyav_u:498.025_0: ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante/
S01divyav_u:498.027_0: lokaṃ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭaṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ//47//
S01divyav_u:498.029_0: tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam/
S01divyav_u:498.031_0: tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya//48//
S01divyav_u:499.001_0: [499]atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṃ puryāmātmānaṃ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:499.003_0: asyāmeva purā puraṃdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṃ vaṇik mitro nāma babhūva yatsuranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:499.005_0: putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti/
S01divyav_u:499.007_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo vividhopakaraṇasambhārasādhanānāṃ samāgṛhītapuṇyāhaprasthānabhadrāṇāmupahṛtamaṅgalavividhānāṃ vaṇijāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ kṛtaparivāraḥ prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:499.014_0: anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:499.016_0: satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām//50//
S01divyav_u:499.018_0: maitrakanyako 'pi dharaṇi{tala}niṃnāṃ mātaraṃ śokavaśyāṃ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā/
S01divyav_u:499.021_0: muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ//51//
S01divyav_u:499.026_0: vyasanaphalamanantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya punarapi guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato 'pi//52//
S01divyav_u:501.009_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpyanāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahaddhairyaparākramaṃ sasambhramaṃ phalakamādāya prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:501.016_0: saṃsmṛtya māturvacanaṃ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṃ jagāda//62//
S01divyav_u:501.018_0: śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram/
S01divyav_u:501.024_0: prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām//64//
S01divyav_u:501.026_0: māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya/
S01divyav_u:501.028_0: puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya//65//
S01divyav_u:501.032_0: guruśirasi dadhānaḥ pādavajraṃ khalo 'haṃ kathamavanividāryaśvabhrarandhre na lagnaḥ//66//
S01divyav_u:502.001_0: [502]ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryām yathā/
S01divyav_u:502.003_0: ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṃ vācaṃ śrayante 'nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te 'ham yathā/
S01divyav_u:502.009_0: ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:502.011_0: sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ/
S01divyav_u:502.015_0: vaṃśaistālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasampādibhiḥ saṃgītāhitacatasaḥ pramuditā gāyantyamī kinnarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:503.005_0: likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhaistamaḥ sāgarāṇām/
S01divyav_u:503.024_0: prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṃ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam/
S01divyav_u:503.026_0: ityevamasāvatikāntāradurgaṃ salilaphalāhāramātraparāyaṇaḥ paribhrannajñānatamaḥpaṭalāvaguṇṭhitamiva jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:504.025_0: adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṃ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram/
S01divyav_u:505.003_0: teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇameva te 'laṃ saṅgastvayā kiṃ punareva dīghyam (rgha?)//87//
S01divyav_u:505.005_0: adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:505.007_0: dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:505.009_0: ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:505.018_0: nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge/
S01divyav_u:505.024_0: haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra//92//
S01divyav_u:505.029_0: hā kiṃ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito 'bhūt//93//
S01divyav_u:506.009_0: krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ//96//
S01divyav_u:506.011_0: pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:506.011_1: so 'pi yathā yathā nivāryate, tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:506.015_0: yadi kuryādayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:506.016_0: paraiti svargaṃ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato 'pi na//98//
S01divyav_u:506.017_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāmaparijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:506.018_0: tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayāmāsuḥ/
S01divyav_u:506.019_0: tatrāpyaticiraṃ ratimanubhūya pratiṣiddhamānagamanakriyastenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:506.021_0: tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau/
S01divyav_u:506.021_1: tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:506.023_0: icchāmi gantuṃ tadahaṃ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:506.025_0: saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke//99//
S01divyav_u:506.027_0: sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle/
S01divyav_u:507.001_0: [507]viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ//101//
S01divyav_u:507.003_0: athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuh--
S01divyav_u:507.005_0: asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu/
S01divyav_u:507.009_0: gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayaste ciram/
S01divyav_u:507.011_0: gantavyaṃ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:507.015_0: kathaṃ teṣu nivāryerannivarteran kathaṃ nu vā//104//
S01divyav_u:507.016_0: niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo 'suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam/
S01divyav_u:507.018_0: nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo mitratayā bhavanti//105//
S01divyav_u:507.020_0: divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto 'smi niṣevaṇāya paraṃ saukhyaṃ sadāmattakam/
S01divyav_u:507.022_0: saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:507.024_0: tasmādato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no 'styapāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:507.028_0_0: atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāṃ hitamapi vākyamahitamivāvajñayā tiraskṛtya
S01divyav_u:508.001_0: [508]samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram/
S01divyav_u:508.019_0: kṣaṇādabhūttannagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ//111//
S01divyav_u:508.021_0_0: tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tamatidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrājvalanamālāliṅgitamudāreṇa
S01divyav_u:508.025_0: kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kimasi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā/
S01divyav_u:508.027_0: kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayam yāsyāmi vyasanaṃ duruttaramidaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat/
S01divyav_u:508.030_0: nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājaḥ/
S01divyav_u:509.001_0: [509]rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātistulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ//113//
S01divyav_u:509.004_0: kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtam yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
S01divyav_u:509.007_0: nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā/
S01divyav_u:509.009_0: yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśādakāryagurukastasyā jananyā mahat/
S01divyav_u:509.011_0: sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
S01divyav_u:509.013_0: atha bodhisattvastasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayastāṃ parajugupsāmātmanyanupaśyannāha--
S01divyav_u:509.017_0: yeṣu svayaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu magnas taireva lokaṃ kathamaṅkayāmi//116//
S01divyav_u:509.025_0: kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām/
S01divyav_u:509.027_0: ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍenāyāsakarmotkaṭe ye tyaktvā guruvākyamandhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate/
S01divyav_u:509.029_0: muktāḥ karmabhireva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyam yadavāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā jarmiṇah (janminah?)/
S01divyav_u:509.031_0_0: atha tasya vacanānantarameva karmānilāvegotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ
S01divyav_u:509.031_0_1: tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayad
S01divyav_u:510.003_0: tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākramyamāṇaśarīrakaṃ maitrakanyakaṃ bodhisattvamāha--
S01divyav_u:510.007_0: saṃtyajya karmāda parāṇi tāni prāptastvidaṃ sthānamanantaduḥkham//121//
S01divyav_u:510.009_0: devālayaṃ divyasukhopabhogaṃ ko nāma saṃprāpya śubhairatulyaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:510.016_0: saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//123//
S01divyav_u:510.020_0: yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//124//
S01divyav_u:510.024_0: mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśam yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//125//
S01divyav_u:510.030_0: teṣāṃ munīnāṃ vigatavyathānāṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ pādarajena mūrdhni/
S01divyav_u:511.018_0: yo mātaryapakārakartumanasaḥ kṛtvā samāyāsyati tasyedaṃ śirasi bhramiṣyati punarmūrdhnā tava pracyutam/
S01divyav_u:511.020_0: atha bodhisattvastena mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākulahṛdayo 'pi sattveṣvananteṣu samutpāditatīvrakāruṇyāśayastaṃ puruṣamābabhāṣe--
S01divyav_u:511.024_0: sphuritakaṭakahārāḥ prajvalanmaulayo ye punaramarasamūhāste 'pi śeṇvantu santaḥ//133//
S01divyav_u:511.026_0: kṛtvā duścaritaṃ svamātari jagatkṛtsnam yadi prodvahedetatprajvalitāgnirāgakapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhanmūrdhani/
S01divyav_u:511.028_0: kalpaṃ kalpasamairahobhirayutān voḍhuṃ cirāyotsahe sattvārthaṃ pratipadyamānamasya hi me cittaṃ na saṃkhidyate/
S01divyav_u:511.030_0: atha tasya sarvasattvapriyasya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya vacanānantarameva mūrdhnā samutpāṭyotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ saptatālocchrayāccakraṃ nabhastalaṃ samutpatyāvatasthe/
S01divyav_u:512.023_0: bhagavati guṇarāśau saṃprasādya svacittaṃ svagṛhamiva sa sādhurdyāmayāttatkṣaṇena//141//
S01divyav_u:512.031_0_0: tatkimidamupanītam? evaṃ hi mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇinah ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino
